quest.name: Santiago's Dilemma
quest.desc: $npc:11000021$의 막내 손자 $npc:11000054$$pp:는,은$ 알현식에 보내 달라고 떼를 쓰다가 갑자기 사라져버렸다. $npc:11000054$$pp:는,은$ 어디에 있을까? $map:63000001$에 있는 $npc:11000148$$pp:를,을$ 만나, $npc:11000054$의 행방에 관해 물어보자.

quest.name: The Start of a Journey
quest.desc: I heard from $npc:11000062$ that the upcoming levee for the Empress will be open to the public. It's going to be a once in a lifetime opportunity you won't want to miss. Should I attend as well?
quest.manual: Talk to $npc:11000016$ in $map:63000002$ to board a ship headed towards Lith Harbor

quest.name: The Empress' Levee
quest.desc: It was nice seeing $npc:11000080$ the island boy again in $map:02000062$. You'll probably find even more familiar faces in $map:02000001$. The Royal Road that connects $map:02000062$ and $map:02000001$ should make the journey quick and easy. But first, find a path that connects $map:02000062$ to $map:02000114$.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02000001$, the location where the levee will be held

quest.name: 그것이 알고 싶다
quest.desc: 산 넘고 물 건너 먼 길을 달려 트라이아에 도착한 $npc:11000003$$pp:는,은$ 알현식 취소 소식에 단단히 화가 난 모양이다. $npc:11000003$의 말을 듣고 보니 갑자기 알현식이 취소된 이유가 석연찮다. 정말 뭔가 다른 이유가 있는 것은 아닐까? $npc:11000003$$pp:가,이$ 가리킨 $map:02000001$의 무기고 경비병에게 살짝 물어볼까?

quest.name: 그들의 속사정
quest.desc: $map:02000140$의 왕실 관리인 $npc:11000492$$pp:라,이라$… 알현식 행사 준비를 도맡아 진행하던 그 사람이라면 알현식이 취소된 이유를 보다 상세하게 알려줄 수 있을지도 모르겠다. 일단, $map:02000140$$pp2:로,으로$ 가보자.

quest.name: 떠나는 사람들
quest.desc: $npc:11000179$$pp:가,이$ $npc:11000492$$pp:를,을$ 높이 평가하는 것은 단순히 $npc:11000492$$pp:가,이$ $npc:11000179$에게 새로운 거래처를 소개해 주었기 때문만은 아닌 것 같다. 정신없이 바쁜 와중에도 똑같은 말을 수십 번 반복하면서도 누구에게나 미소를 잃지 않는 $npc:11000492$의 행동만 보더라도 $npcName:11000179$ 뿐만 아니라 대부분의 사람들에게 그는 꽤나 좋은 사람으로 기억되리라는 것을 짐작할 수 있다. $map:02000033$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 체크아웃을 대신 해달라는 $npcName:11000179$의 부탁을 들어준다면 그에게 나도 $npc:11000492$처럼 좋은 사람으로 기억될 수 있을까?

quest.name: Porters in Danger
quest.desc: The porters that carried the goods in preparation for the levee came to $map:02000116$ despite the dangers that awaited. It seems that some particularly thorny vines may have trapped some of them. Try and save any porters you come across.
quest.manual: Rescue the porters stuck inside the vines in $map:02000116$

quest.name: Relaying the Message
quest.desc: $npc:11000129$ says that there is a group that went on ahead into $map:02000117$. I was asked to meet them to relay the tale of the porters that have fallen into trouble, and ask them to wait until everyone has arrived. Let's head on over to $map:02000117$ to look for another royal porter.

quest.name: 훈련병의 고민
quest.desc: 근위대 훈련병 $npc:11000169$$pp:는,은$ 자신이 경비를 서고 있는 무기고에서 감쪽같이 사라진 무기들 때문에 홀로 속앓이를 하고 있다. 자리를 비운 적도 거의 없고, 심지어 무기고의 자물쇠도 단단히 잠긴 채 그대로인데 누가, 어떻게 무기를 훔쳐 간 것일까? $npc:11000169$의 말대로 도둑맞은 무기들이 장물로 거래될 수도 있으니 $map:02000001$의 장비 상인 $npc:11000004$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가서 장물로 거래된 무기가 없는지 알아봐야겠다.

quest.name: 골든타워를 향해
quest.desc: 결국, $npc:11000170$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000173$에게서 철광석을 구입했다는 사실을 털어놓았다. $npcName:11000170$$pp:가,이$ 거래한 철광석이 무기고 도난 사건과 아무 관련이 없다고 하더라도… 악명 높은 장물아비 $npcName:11000173$$pp:라,이라$면 도난당한 무기들에 대해 알고 있는 것이 있을지도 모른다. 일단, $npc:11000170$$pp:가,이$ 준 철광석 매매 광고 전단을 들고 $map:02000141$ 입구가 있다고 하는 $map:02000083$$pp2:로,으로$ 가 보자!

quest.name: 철광석의 출처
quest.desc: $npc:11000365$$pp:는,은$ 내가 찾아다 준 $item:30000018$ 중에서 $npc:11000173$$pp:가,이$ $npcName:11000171$에게서 철광석을 구입한 거래 기록을 나에게 주었다. $map:02000084$에서 고물상을 운영하고 있는 $npc:11000171$! 한낱 고물상이 대량의 철광석을 어디서 구한 걸까? 일단, $map:02000084$에서 $npc:11000171$$pp:를,을$ 먼저 만나봐야겠다.

quest.name: 택배 트럭의 행방
quest.desc: $npc:11000171$$pp:는,은$ 철광석을 싣고 간 골두스 택배 트럭이 $map:02000001$에서 왔다고 말했다. $npcName:11000171$의 말이 사실이라면, $map:02000001$의 $npc:11000012$$pp:가,이$ 트럭의 행선지를 알고 있지 않을까? $map:02000001$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:11000012$$pp:를,을$ 만나봐야겠다.

quest.name: 의문의 배송
quest.desc: 운송 기록부를 한참을 뒤적이던 $npc:11000012$$pp:는,은$ 결국에는 그 기록을 찾아내고야 말았다. 트럭의 행선지는 $map:02000064$ 로얄 로드 125번지! 과연 철광석을 배달받은 사람은 누구일까? $map:02000064$$pp2:로,으로$ 가 보자!

quest.name: 무기고 도난의 진실
quest.desc: $map:02000020$에서 발견한 수상한 장부… 뭔가 왕실 물품들이 거래된 기록 같은데… 일단, 장부를 가지고 $map:02000001$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가서 $npc:11000169$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.
quest.manual: $map:02000020$ 책상 위에 있는 수상한 장부 챙겨 넣기

quest.name: 넬프의 집으로!
quest.desc: $npc:11000012$$pp:가,이$ 주소록에서 찾아 준 $npc:11000492$의 집 주소는 $map:02000119$ 플라워 파크 674번지였다. 플라워 파크 구역에서 붉은색 지붕으로 수리한 집을 찾아가보자.

quest.name: 의문의 메모
quest.desc: $map:02000122$ 내에서 정말 넬프의 행적을 추적할 수 있는 단서를 찾을 수 있을까? $map:02000119$에 위치하고 있는 $map:02000122$ 곳곳을 샅샅이 살펴보고, 넬프의 행방을 추적할 수 있는 단서를 찾아내자.

quest.name: 넬프가 남긴 것
quest.desc: 구겨진 메모에 표시된 $map:02000043$의 $map:52000037$까지 찾아왔지만… 안타깝게도 $npc:11000492$는 죽어 있었다. 그리고 때마침 나타나 동굴의 비밀문을 열고 사라진 정체불명의 사람. 수상하기 짝이 없는 저 사람을 쫓아가면 이 모든 사건에 대한 단서를 찾을 수 있지 않을까? 정신을 가다듬고 정체불명의 사람을 쫓아 동굴 깊숙한 곳으로 들어가 보자.
quest.manual: $map:52000037$에서 비밀문을 통해 사라진 정체불명의 사람을 쫓아 단서 찾아내기

quest.name: 새로운 단서
quest.desc: $npc:11000492$의 죽음과 그 주변에서 발견된 의문의 수첩에 대한 이야기를 들고 난 후, $npc:11000169$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000119$에게 직접 지금까지 조사한 내용을 보고해달라고 했다. $map:02000001$에서 $npcName:11000119$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 원숭이의 난
quest.desc: $map:02000064$에는 종종 $map:02000017$에서 넘어온 $npc:21000055$들이 주민들의 물건을 훔치고 집을 어지럽히는 등 사고를 치는 모양이다. $npc:11000172$의 $item:30000019$도 $map:02000017$에서 넘어온 $npc:21000055$들이 훔쳐간 것 같다. $npc:21000055$들은 먹을 수 없는 물건들은 숲 속 나뭇가지 사이에 숨겨두는 습성이 있다고 하니, $map:02000017$의 나무들을 흔들어 $item:30000019$$pp:를,을$ 찾아보자!

quest.name: 둘만의 비밀
quest.desc: $map:02000064$의 $npc:11000172$$pp:가,이$ 어렵게 마음을 돌려 $map:02000020$의 문을 열어 주었다. 빨리 $map:02000020$$pp:를,을$ 둘러보고 나와야겠다.

quest.name: 마지막 편지
quest.desc: $npc:11000012$의 말을 듣고 보니 어머니를 살뜰하게 챙기던 $npc:11000492$의 모습이 어렴풋하게 떠오른다. 아들이 어머니에게 보낸 마지막 편지… 이제 더 이상 만날 수 없는 아들의 편지를 받게 된 $npc:11000492$의 어머니를 똑바로 볼 자신은 없지만, 아들을 기다리고 있을 엄마의 마음을 생각하면 조금이라도 더 빨리 가야 할 것 같다. $npc:11000012$에게서 받은 $item:30000025$$pp:를,을$ 들고 $map:02000076$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:11000178$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: A Boy's Curiosity
quest.desc: Although she nags every now and then, $npc:11000107$ is a kind sister that is simply worried for $npc:11000114$. But where could $npc:11000114$ have gone? Could he really have gone to Royal Road?

quest.name: 돈이 되는 타이어
quest.desc: $npc:11000395$$pp:는,은$ 하루 벌어서 하루 먹고 살아가는 $map:02000084$ 빈민촌 주민이다. 매일같이 무거운 폐타이어를 옮기다 보니 온몸에 힘이 빠져 서 있기도 힘들다는 그의 사정을 듣고 그냥 지나치면 마음이 무거울 것 같다. $map:02000084$의 $npc:11000395$ 주변에 쌓여있는 폐타이어를 $npc:11000171$$pp:와,과$ 잡부들이 일하고 있는 고물상 구역으로 옮기자.

quest.name: A Stinging Revolt
quest.desc: The honey bees that have worked hard to gather all this honey are furious ever since $npc:22000022$ stole their honey. You should give $npc:22000022$'s honey pot to the honey bees that have lost their food. Look for a pot of honey below a stone roof in $map:02000117$, where $npc:22000022$ appears.
quest.manual: Recover the pot of honey in $map:02000117$

quest.name: 비운의 가족
quest.desc: 푸른 초원 한가운데 꽁꽁 언 땅과 얼음 조각이 있다는 것이 의아하긴 했지만, 그 얼음 조각이 진짜 사람이 얼어 있는 것일 줄이야… $map:02000085$ 중심부에 있는 얼음땅 위 얼음 사람들 중에서 $npc:11000186$의 누나 $npc:11000188$$pp:를,을$ 찾아 $item:30000028$의 따뜻한 기운으로 녹이자. 일단, $npc:11000186$ 옆에 있는 붉은 단풍나무의 가지를 꺾어 가지고 얼음땅 쪽으로 내려가자.
quest.manual: $npc:11000186$ 옆에 있는 $item:30000028$$pp:를,을$ 꺾기|$map:02000085$ 중심부에 얼어버린 희생자들 중 $npc:11000188$$pp:를,을$ 찾아 녹이기

quest.name: 누나가 돌아왔다
quest.desc: 그 오랜 시간을 얼음이 되어 있었던 것을 생각하면 $npc:11000188$$pp:가,이$ 되살아 온 것은 기적인 것 같다. $npc:11000188$$pp:를,을$ 만나서 따뜻하게 손이라도 꼭 잡아줘야겠다. $map:02000150$ 안으로 들어가 보자.

quest.name: A Grandmother's Love
quest.desc: $npcName:11000187$ is deeply worried for the health of her granddaughter $npcName:11000188$, and has asked you to get medicine from an herbalist in $map:02000059$.

quest.name: That Man of Mine
quest.desc: It seems that $npcName:11000190$ wandered off days ago without any consideration for his wife and children, and hasn't been back since. You should talk see if $npcName:11000192$ the $npcTitle:11000192$ knows where $npcName:11000190$ went.

quest.name: O Husband, Where Art Thou?
quest.desc:
What started as a simple trip to pick up medicine has turned into a missing persons case, and now two families are counting on you to find $npcName:11000190$.
Take $npcName:11000190$'s $item:30000026$ and search for him in the $map:02000082$, which is located right below $npcName:11000192$'s house in $map:02000059$.

quest.name: A Recipe for Disasters
quest.desc:
Being a forgetful man, $npc:11000190$ carefully documents all his notes on herbs and plants in a guide book. If you can find the book, you should be able to discern how to help $npcName:11000188$.
Go to $map:02000151$ in $map:02000059$ and look for the herb guide.
quest.complete: Find the herb guide in the herbalist's house in $map:02000059$

quest.name: Eat Fruits and Leaves
quest.desc:
According to $npc:11000190$'s herb guide, a $item:20000044$ just might help restore $npcName:11000188$'s health.
Go shake some $item:20000044$ trees in $map:02000059$!

quest.name: Get Your Hands Off My Wood
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000203$ the $npcTitle:11000203$ is furious about monsters making off with his firewood.
You should grab any firewood you find on the path to $map:02000054$ and bring it back to him.
quest.manual: Place $npcName:11000203$'s liberated firewood in front of him

quest.name: A Father's Duty
quest.desc:
It looks like $npcName:11000190$ has decided to stay in $map:02000082$ and harvest more mushrooms.
He's asked you to deliver a bag-full to $npc:11000191$ in $map:02000059$, and re-light some candles on your way out.

quest.name: Pincerific Choice
quest.desc: It seems as though $npc:11000098$ really likes $npc:11000151$. You can get $item:30000011$ by catching $npc:21000059$ right? Well then, you better stretch and get warmed up! You don't want to pull a muscle! Go to $map:63000002$ and catch $npc:21000059$ to gather $item:30000011$.

quest.name: Everything for Her
quest.desc: Is $npc:11000151$ simply horrible at expressing her feelings, or is she just always this blunt? Is it possible that $npc:11000151$'s boyfriend had enough of her abrasive attitude and decided not to return from $map:63000002$?
quest.complete: Go to $map:63000002$ after checking the location by pressing the TAB key

quest.name: Unusual Circumstances
quest.desc: Poor $npc:11000118$… She needs some assistance after injuring her hand. Someone needs to help her harvest the clams that hold pearls in $map:63000002$! Start searching for $item:30000008$!

quest.name: O Turtle! My Turtle!
quest.desc: $npc:11000053$ made a request to bring $item:20000013$, which is located at Turtle Hill where $npc:22300149$ appears. It's not going to be easy…but nothing worthwhile ever is, right?

quest.name: Leaving Lith Harbor
quest.desc: Are there not enough ships because so many people are trying to go to $map:02000062$? If that's the case, it'll probably be best to go to $map:63000002$ port and speak with $npc:11000016$ personally to see if a ship is available.

quest.name: 쓰레기도 돈이다
quest.desc: $map:02000084$ 빈민촌 주민 $npc:11000396$$pp:는,은$ 며칠을 굶었는지 서 있는 것조차 힘들어보인다. 지친 듯한 그를 위해 $map:02000084$ 곳곳에 널려 있는 $item:30000120$들을 수거해서 가지고 오자.

quest.name: Iron Transformation
quest.desc: $npc:11000181$ of $map:02000084$ mistakenly assigned you work, thinking you were a worker who had just recently started. The assignment was to heat up the blast furnace to make an iron mold… Having this kind of experience can only help, right? Go to $map:02000084$ and gather the $item:30000120$ needed to make the $item:30000121$ with the blast furnace.
quest.manual: Make $item:30000121$ at the blast furnace in $map:02000084$

quest.name: 수첩의 주인은 누구?
quest.desc: 죽어있는 $npc:11000492$의 주변 짐가방 속에서 발견된 바로타 상단의 로고가 있는 수첩… 이것으로 $npc:11000492$의 죽음과 관련된 의문들을 해결할 수 있을까? 일단, 바로타 상단 본부가 있는 $map:02000139$$pp2:로,으로$ 가보자.

quest.name: 수첩의 비밀
quest.desc: 바로타 상단의 단장 레이먼의 수첩임을 확신하던 $npc:11000097$$pp:는,은$ 수첩 속 내용을 확인하고서는 당황하며 수첩을 떨어뜨렸다. 도대체 수첩 속에 무슨 내용이 적혀 있었길래 그런 것일까?

quest.name: 금지된 거래
quest.desc: 정말 바로타 상단에서 보관하는 물품들 중에 $item:20000046$$pp:가,이$ 있을까? $map:02000139$에서 바로타 상단 창고를 찾아 그 주변에 보관 중인 물품들을 살펴봐야겠다. 바로타 상단 창고는 $npc:11000208$ 바로 앞에 있는 도로를 따라 내려가면 그 길 끝에 위치하고 있다.

quest.name: 지원 요청
quest.desc: 며칠째 행방이 묘연한 레이먼… 그와 넬프는 어떤 관계가 있었던 걸까? $map:02000100$의 $map:02000152$$pp2:로,으로$ 찾아가서 다크윈드 대장 $npc:11000044$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 뼈 빠지는 돈벌이
quest.desc: 배에서 $item:30000048$$pp:를,을$ 옮기는 건 $map:02000139$에서 몇 년 동안이나 일한 베테랑 인부에게도 위험한 일이다. 잠시만 방심해도 허리를 다칠 수 있기 때문이다. 하지만 아픈 사람의 부탁을 그냥 지나칠 수는 없지… 붉은 컨테이너 $item:30000048$$pp:를,을$ 선착장으로 옮기는 일을 도와줘야겠다. 컨테이너가 줄지어 쌓여있는 선착장에서 붉은 컨테이너가 배치된 곳으로 $npc:11000207$$pp:가,이$ 부탁한 화물 상자를 옮겨두자!

quest.name: 위태로운 석유관
quest.desc: 석유는 커닝시티 생활 전반에 걸쳐 아주 중요한 자원으로 사용되고 있는 것 같다. 문제가 커지기 전에 서둘러서 $map:02000148$에 있는 석유관들 중에서 녹슨 파이프의 녹을 제거하고 보수 작업을 해야겠다.

quest.name: 레이먼은 어디로 갔을까?
quest.desc: $npc:11000044$$pp:는,은$ 은밀하게 흑성회 조직에 침투해서 그들이 $npc:11000526$의 행방을 알고 있는지 알아보라는 임무를 주었다. 다크윈드에서 공식적으로 나설 수 없는 은밀한 임무… 과연 성공할 수 있을까? 일단, $map:02000138$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 흑성회 조직의 본거지가 어디인지부터 알아내도록 하자.

quest.name: 시크릿 클럽
quest.desc: $map:02000149$? 흑성회가 은밀하게 운영하고 있는 비밀스러운 오락실이라… $map:02000149$$pp:를,을$ 찾아 가 보자.

quest.name: 네가 알고 있는 모든 것
quest.desc: 영업에 방해가 된다며 큰소리치는 $npc:11000212$의 입을 열게 하려면 그의 오락실 영업을 방해하는 수밖에 없을 것 같다. $npc:11000212$$pp:가,이$ 실토할 때까지 오락실 안에 있는 손님들을 모두 쫓아내 버리자!

quest.name: 블랙 오피스
quest.desc: $map:02000149$의 관리자 $npc:11000212$$pp:는,은$ 흑성회 조직원 추천 암호코드 코드블랙 365와 함께 $map:02000149$에서 $map:02000156$으로 가는 방법을 알려주었다. $map:02000149$에서 나와 남동쪽으로 열 칸 이동 후, 다시 북동쪽으로 열한 칸 이동하면 만나게 되는 작은 철문이 바로 $map:02000156$$pp2:로,으로$ 들어가는 입구라는데… 일단, $map:02000138$에서 $map:02000156$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가보자.

quest.name: 공짜는 없다
quest.desc: $item:20000015$$pp:가,이$ 도대체 뭐길래… 받은 만큼 돌려준다는 것이 이 골목의 룰이라면 따를 수 밖에… $map:02000138$ 골목의 몬스터들을 처치하고 $item:20000015$$pp:를,을$ 찾아오도록 하자.

quest.name: 결단
quest.desc: $npc:11000044$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000215$에게 $npc:11000064$ 수배령을 강화하라는 지시를 전달하라고 했다.

quest.name: 수배 시작
quest.desc: $map:02000153$의 $npc:11000215$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000064$ 수배 전단을 각 구역 게시판에 붙이는 작업을 도와달라고 부탁했다.

quest.name: 수배활동, 첫 번째
quest.desc: $map:02000138$의 $npc:11000343$에 $npc:11000064$ 수배 전단을 붙이자. 만일, $item:30000038$$pp:를,을$ 잃어버렸다면, $map:02000153$의 $npc:11000215$에게 돌아가서 물어보자.

quest.name: 수배활동, 두 번째
quest.desc: $map:02000137$의 $npc:11000343$에 $npc:11000064$ 수배 전단을 붙이자. 만일, $item:30000038$$pp:를,을$ 잃어버렸다면, $map:02000153$의 $npc:11000215$에게 돌아가서 물어보자.

quest.name: 수배활동, 세 번째
quest.desc: $map:02000135$의 $npc:11000343$에 $npc:11000064$ 수배 전단을 붙이자. 만일, $item:30000038$$pp:를,을$ 잃어버렸다면, $map:02000153$의 $npc:11000215$에게 돌아가서 물어보자.

quest.name: 수배활동, 마지막
quest.desc: $map:02000146$의 $npc:11000343$에 $npc:11000064$ 수배 전단을 붙이자. 만일, $item:30000038$$pp:를,을$ 잃어버렸다면, $map:02000153$의 $npc:11000215$에게 돌아가서 물어보자.

quest.name: Quite a Quandary
quest.desc: $map:02000100$'s $npc:11000065$ seems to be stuck in a predicament regarding the conflict between Goldus Pharmaceutical and the residents. What a sticky situation… Try to find out some more information and meet with $npc:11000216$, who is participating in the demonstration in front of $map:02000154$.

quest.name: Transparency Is a Virtue
quest.desc: It seems the demonstration won't end until full transparency is achieved, and the whole truth is revealed. $npc:11000216$ begged you to gather any sort of evidence that could help expose the truth. Begin your investigation with aplomb by heading over to $map:02000134$.

quest.name: An Inconvenient Truth
quest.desc: $map:02000134$'s $npc:11000124$ told you how to procure the material that may serve as evidence of how products from Goldus Pharmaceutical brought upon negative side effects. Make your way to $map:02000159$ connected to $map:02000134$, and activate both the drug mixing and data collecting devices to find $item:30000049$ and $item:20000048$.

quest.name: Lifetime Duty
quest.desc: The new drug $npc:11000124$ risked life and limb to create… Providing some assistance could be the perfect opportunity to ask him to help uncover the truth behind the drug's side effects. Head on over to $map:02000134$ to defeat all the monsters that have invaded, and look for $npc:11000124$'s $item:20000050$.

quest.name: The Cat in the Cliff
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000217$'s boss's cat $npc:11000049$ is stuck on the side of a cliff and in need of rescue.
Defy the law of gravity by way of wall-climbing or flying mount, and rescue $npc:11000049$.
quest.manual: Rescue $npc:11000049$ from the side of the cliff in $map:02000137$

quest.name: 영업의 신
quest.desc: $map:02000166$의 $npc:11000311$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000136$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:11000220$에게 록펠러 타워 건설에 필요한 자재들을 대량 주문 받아 온다면 자신이 본 것을 모두 이야기 해 주겠다고 한다.

quest.name: 영업 성과
quest.desc: $map:02000136$의 $npc:11000220$$pp:는,은$ 록펠러 타워 건설에 필요한 공사 자재 리스트가 적힌 주문서를 건네주었다. $map:02000166$의 $npc:11000311$에게 돌아가자!

quest.name: 불굴의 의지
quest.desc: 메이플 월드 최대 규모의 초고층 빌딩 록펠러 타워를 건설하는 데 있어서 공사 도면은 없어서는 안될 중요한 물건이다. $map:02000136$$pp:를,을$ 습격한 몬스터들을 처치하고 $item:30000043$$pp:를,을$ 찾아오자.

quest.name: 효녀 모니카
quest.desc: 동그란 눈에 수줍음이 많은 소녀, $npc:11000221$의 부탁을 그냥 넘길 수는 없다. 어렵지 않은 부탁이니 $map:02000136$에서 $npc:11000222$$pp:를,을$ 찾아서 도시락을 배달해주자.

quest.name: Containment Breach
quest.desc:
$map:02000145$ was thrust into chaos by an invasion of monsters, resulting in the injury of numerous researchers. But worse, they escaped with highly experimental $itemPlural:20000049$ that could wreak havoc on the environment should they escape the lab.
$npc:11000125$ has tasked you with defeating the monsters and retrieving the samples before it's too late.

quest.name: Love Hurts
quest.desc:
$npc:11000223$'s girlfriend got upset and threw her $item:30000046$ away. Before he can patch things up with her, he needs your help to recover it.
Search $map:02000135$ for the missing $item:30000046$.
quest.manual: Search the field in $map:02000135$ for the $item:30000046$

quest.name: Reasonable Expectations
quest.desc: Why is $npc:11000223$'s girlfriend $npc:11000224$ upset? Ride the cable car up to the restaurant in $map:02000135$ and ask her.

quest.name: Twinkle Toes
quest.desc: How dare they cause such trouble for the good fairies! It would be a shame to let such nice gifts go to waste. Defeat the monsters in $map:02000041$ and find $item:30000050$.

quest.name: The Realest Estate
quest.desc: $npc:11000185$ seems to always be busy since so many people are trying to buy and sell houses. Let's go see $npc:11000246$ in $map:02000002$ and help her out.

quest.name: Now That's What I Call Labor
quest.desc: It's not that difficult a task, and the pay seems to be pretty generous to boot…. Why don't I try packing and moving by going to $map:02000160$? I can check the location of $map:02000160$ using the mini map of $map:02000002$.

quest.name: Prison Package
quest.desc: $npc:11000401$ was so busy getting the comic books that he didn't notice that I was already inside packing the comic books that have already been piled up high. Since I already agreed to help, I'll move the $item:30000124$ scattered around $npc:11000401$ to the yard.
quest.manual: Move the $item:30000124$ scattered around $npc:11000401$ to the yard

quest.name: The Fates That Bind Us
quest.desc: I met $npc:11000110$ again in Victoria Island and he made another request. I don't hesitate to help those who I've only met once, so there's no reason why I can't help someone I've known since Maple Island. Let's defeat the monsters in the grass underneath the $map:02000114$ bridge, and find item:30000054$ that $npc:11000110$ lost.
quest.manual: Defeat the monsters in $map:02000114$ and recover $item:30000054$

quest.name: An Unexpected Event
quest.desc: The Royal Guard are also confused by the sudden earthquake. They're quickly trying to find out what caused the earthquake… Maybe I can lend a hand? I'll carry the equipment box that lies near $npc:11000157$ and move it below the stairs.
quest.manual: Move the equipment box that lies near $npc:11000157$ down the stairs

quest.name: Strong Eats
quest.desc: $map:02000001$'s safety is at jeopardy if hunger also becomes a factor in these intense battles. Defeat the monsters in $map:02000118$ and bring back the $item:20000014$ that the monsters have taken.
quest.manual: Bring back the $item:20000014$ that the $map:02000118$ monsters have taken

quest.name: 전우를 위하여
quest.desc: $npc:11000260$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000064$$pp:를,을$ 원망하며, 쉐도우 게이트 수호군으로서의 고충을 토로했다. 수호군을 도와 $map:02000146$ 그림자 문 주변 어둠의 땅에서 넘어 온 몬스터들을 처치하자.

quest.name: 응급상황
quest.desc: 긴급 상황이다. $map:02000146$에 있는 $map:02000026$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:11000122$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자!

quest.name: 짓밟힌 버섯밭
quest.desc: 점점 강해지는 어둠의 땅의 기운으로 연구소 근처 버섯밭이 온통 그림자 기운으로 오염되어 버렸다. 과연 약의 재료로 쓸 만한 $item:20000045$$pp:를,을$ 구할 수 있을까? 그림자 기운에 오염된 땅에서 감염되는 그림자 독을 주의하면서 연구소 근처 버섯밭은 물론 $map:02000146$ 곳곳에서 $item:20000045$$pp:를,을$ 찾아 구해오도록 하자!

quest.name: 기적의 약
quest.desc: $map:02000146$에 있는 $map:02000026$의 배합기에 $item:20000045$$pp:를,을$ 넣고 작동시켜 $item:20000016$$pp:를,을$ 제조하자.

quest.name: 조교의 임무
quest.desc: $npc:11000121$$pp:는,은$ 그림자 에너지의 근원을 밝히기 위해서 $npc:11000122$$pp:와,과$ 함께 $map:02000146$의 그림자 문을 봉쇄한 방어막을 뚫고 어둠의 땅에서 넘어 온 몬스터들의 DNA를 연구하기로 했다고 한다. $map:02000146$ 그림자 문 주변의 몬스터를 처치하고 $item:20000047$$pp:를,을$ 모아서 $npc:11000121$에게 가져다주자!
quest.manual: $map:02000146$ 그림자 문 주변 몬스터를 처치하고 $item:20000047$ 수집하기

quest.name: 스파이를 찾아라
quest.desc: 산산조각 난 블루 라펜타 조각들을 빠짐없이 모두 모으면 복원이 가능하다니… 이 세계가 다시 평화를 찾을 수 있는 방법이 완전히 사라져 버린 건 아니었나보다. $map:02000146$의 그림자 문 주변에서 다크윈드로 위장하고 있는 스파이, $npc:21000178$$pp:를,을$ 찾아서 $item:30000058$$pp:를,을$ 되찾아오자!

quest.name: 알현의 자격
quest.desc: $npc:11000076$의 추천장! 이것은 $map:02000025$의 출입과 함께 $npc:11000075$$pp:를,을$ 알현할 수 있는 자격을 부여하는 증명서나 다름없는 것이었다. $map:02000001$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:11000119$에게 추천장을 보여주고 $map:02000025$ 출입 허가를 받도록 하자.

quest.name: 트라이아 왕궁으로!
quest.desc: 드디어 $npc:11000075$$pp:를,을$ 만날 수 있게 되는 것인가? 가슴이 두근거린다. 어서 빨리 $map:02000025$$pp2:로,으로$ 들어가자!

quest.name: 푸른 희망의 빛
quest.desc:
$npc:11000075$$pp:를,을$ 만나겠다는 일념으로 $map:63000001$$pp:를,을$ 떠나 빅토리아 아일랜드로 왔던 그 길… 그리고 그 길을 참 허무하게도 만들었던 알현식 취소 소식… $npc:11000075$$pp:와,과$ 직접 마주하니 지난 시간들이 주마등처럼 스쳐가며 감회가 새롭다.
$npc:11000075$의 이 한마디는 앞으로도 잊을 수 없을 것 같다. "이 세계를 위해 앞으로 더 큰 힘을 보태주세요. 여제의 이름으로 부탁합니다."

quest.name: The Call of the Minister
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$ said that $npc:11000074$ made an order to recommend a person that could be trusted with the utmost confidentiality. I was told to go to $map:02000065$ and meet $npc:11000074$.

quest.name: The Minister's Request
quest.desc: After hearing what $npc:11000074$ said, I remember finding $item:30000174$ among the wreckage of the stolen royal carriage while chasing the red cape in $map:02000238$. At that time, $npc:11000119$ and $npc:11000074$ didn't speak much and only provided some vague answers after seeing $item:30000174$… After all, what could these two know? Let's first go to $map:02000218$ in $map:02000001$ and look for the picture $npc:11000074$ asked for.

quest.name: The Vid-Bleim Mansion
quest.desc: What could have happened in the Vid-Bleim family? $npc:11000074$, $npc:11000119$, and even $npc:11000530$… The fact that everyone is giving off such a tense vibe is making me a bit suspicious. What kind of stories will I hear if I bring back the picture to $npc:11000074$? Let's go to $map:02000190$ in $map:02000119$.

quest.name: A Daughter's Face
quest.desc: $npc:11000058$ was left alone to watch over $map:02000190$. Observing $npc:11000058$'s mood, there seems to be a silent but profound pain between her and her father $npc:11000074$… Why did $npc:11000074$ order this portrait…? Take the $item:30000182$ you received from $npc:11000058$ and return to $map:02000065$.

quest.name: Unfortunate Truth
quest.desc: 데블린을 앞세워 세계를 위협하고 있는 의문의 붉은 망토! 그 정체는 바로 벨라 비드블라임… 왕실 총리 $npc:11000074$의 딸이자 $npc:11000058$의 쌍둥이 동생… 그리고 지금은… 그림자 기운의 지배를 받는 악의 수하로 다시 돌아왔다. 마치 금기처럼 누구도 다시 되돌리고 싶지 않았던 뼈아픈 기억이 $map:02000001$를 덮쳐 온 순간이다!

quest.name: Comprehending the Situation
quest.desc: $npc:11000044$ asked for assistance in finding $npc:11000069$, who has gone missing. Typically level-headed $npc:11000044$ is exhibiting an impatience you've never seen before, as she does not want to lose $npc:11000069$ to $npc:11000522$, just like her father and previous leader Win Stilton had in the past. Could $npc:11000522$ really have kidnapped $npc:11000069$?

quest.name: 굳게 다문 입
quest.desc: $npc:11000258$ says that $npc:11000531$, who resents the Dark Wind, is not divulging any details regarding the disappearance of $npc:11000069$, and told me to go talk to $npc:11000531$ if I want more details.

quest.name: Start of the Clue
quest.desc: It's going to be difficult gaining any more useful information from $npc:11000531$. However, carefully tracking $npc:11000069$'s movement before the disappearance may lead to more clues that could become invaluable for this search.
quest.complete: Look for any clues between $item:39000012$ and $item:39000013$, and enter investigative questioning

quest.name: Deadliest Part-Time Job
quest.desc: $npc:11000532$ says that he was paid from a person he never met to merely borrow and return books. Just exactly who paid $npc:11000532$ to do this job? Could that person be connected to $npc:11000069$ disappearance? I still don't see how all of the clues I have really fit together, but I have no choice but to follow each clue like a trail of bread crumbs and continue my search…

quest.name: A Surreptitious Pursuit
quest.desc: $npc:11000301$ didn't see anyone suspicious looking in the area, but did mention that there is an area below the moving bone bridge in $map:02000045$ that hasn't started construction and could be a perfect place for someone to hide. If this person went through such great lengths to stay hidden, what $npc:11000301$ said about dark and hidden places is likely to be true, and these locations could possibly unearth some vital clues.
quest.manual: Look for the hideout beneath the moving bone bridge in $map:02000045$

quest.name: Perion and Yamarcha
quest.desc: You found the words Yamarcha and $map:02000051$ written on the dusty walls of $map:02000223$. I'm pretty sure $map:02000051$ is the name of a location, but Yamarcha… What could that mean…? Would the people in $map:02000051$ know the meaning behind this?
quest.complete: Go to $map:02000051$ and find out what Yamarcha means

quest.name: The Pursuit of Meaning
quest.desc: $npc:11000018$ apologized for not knowing what Yamarcha means, but was still helpful enough to refer me to $npc:11000136$. $npcName:11000136$, a unique girl that can tame savage wolves as if they were mere puppies… Could she possibly know what Yamarcha means?

quest.name: Catch the Varaha
quest.desc: Let's defeat $npc:22000002$, who appears sporadically in $map:02000087$, and claim the bounty. He is just as ferocious as he is notorious, so it'd probably be a good idea team up with some other people to hunt it down.

quest.name: Kanto's Dream
quest.desc:
The $item:30000065$ is $npc:11000292$'s last shot at love, but it was stolen by $npc:22000002$. Wait for $npc:22000002$ to appear in $map:02000087$ and recover the potion for $npc:11000292$.
This will be a dangerous fight, so be sure to bring some friends!

quest.name: Holding Back Reinforcements
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$ suddenly held back the $map:02000146$ Defender reinforcements, even though $npc:11000044$ is leading the Dark Wind. Suspending the Defender reinforcements out of nowhere like this… Could there have been a more dangerous and urgent situation than the protection of $map:02000146$?

quest.name: An Uncertain Fate
quest.desc: It might be fun to get your fortune read by $npc:11000283$ at $map:02000088$.

quest.name: Overcoming Destiny
quest.desc:
No one can see the future. Not really. And yet, something about this fortune gnaws at the back of your mind…
Maybe you should get $item:30000068$, after all. Just in case.

quest.name: Arwen's Glass Slippers
quest.desc:
You found $npc:11000284$ in $map:02000006$ bawling her little eyes out. Apparently her prized glass slippers were stolen by monsters. As everyone knows, fairies are extremely possessive of shiny baubles and things of beauty. Sadly, none of the people who offered to help her were able to follow through on their promise.
And so it falls to you to dry the tears in her eyes. Go forth and rough up the monsters of $map:02000006$ until one coughs up $npc:11000284$'s prized slippers!

quest.name: A Turtley Pure Love
quest.desc: $npc:11000285$ planted the flowers in remembrance for his loved one, but is fed up with having monsters trample them to death. I was asked to help revive the flowers in $map:02000089$. Let's help him with his request so that $npc:11000285$ can be at peace once more.

quest.name: Broken Tree
quest.desc: 통나무 굴의 주인 $npcName:11000293$$pp:는,은$ 나무껍질을 갉아 먹으며 보금자리를 파고 든 몬스터들 때문에 이 곳을 떠나려 하는데… $item:20000052$$pp:는,은$ 그냥 두고 가기에는 너무 아깝다며 울상이다. $npc:11000293$$pp:가,이$ 끔찍하게 싫어하는 거미줄이 얼마나 강하게 찐득거리는지는 모르겠지만 보금자리도 잃고 쫓겨나게 된 $npc:11000293$$pp:를,을$ 위해서 나무통 속에 들어 있다는 $item:20000052$$pp:를,을$ 찾아서 가져다주자.

quest.name: Operation Frog Rescue
quest.desc: The 'gogs at the $map:02000022$ are on a campaign to wipe out the local frog population. Defeat $npcPlural:21090175$, $npcPlural:21090176$, and $npcPlural:21090177$, find the captured $itemPlural:30000071$, and return them to their lily pads.
quest.manual: Free $itemPlural:30000071$ from 'gogs at the $map:02000022$ and put them on lily pads

quest.name: 꿋꿋하게, 변함없이
quest.desc: $npc:11000097$$pp:는,은$ 단장 $npc:11000526$의 비리로 쑥대밭이 된 바로타 상단을 지키기 위해 고군분투하며 애쓰고 있는 것 같다. $npcName:11000097$의 부탁을 들어주고 그에게 작은 힘이라도 보태주는 것이 좋을 것 같다.

quest.name: 늑대 공포증
quest.desc: $npc:11000426$$pp:는,은$ $item:30000072$$pp:를,을$ 그냥 내줄 수는 없다며 자신이 무서워하는 $map:02000085$의 늑대들을 모두 잡아달라고 요구했다.

quest.name: 황금잉어와 함께
quest.desc: $npc:11000426$$pp:는,은$ 약속대로 $item:30000256$$pp:를,을$ 내주었다. 속을 태우며 기다리고 있을 $npc:11000097$$pp:를,을$ 생각하면 빨리 $map:02000139$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가는 것이 좋겠다.

quest.name: Flight of the Butterflies
quest.desc:
$npc:11000298$ says that there are butterflies trapped inside the petrified toy trees in $map:02000004$.
Release the butterflies so that they can fly free once more.
quest.manual: Free the butterflies trapped inside toy trees

quest.name: The Concerned Farmer
quest.desc:
The water of the basin in $map:02000056$'s ground has gradually begun to turn into ludibrium blocks, and $npc:11000299$ is worried about how he will water his crops.
Gather water from what remains of the basin below the waterfall.

quest.name: A Load of Crop
quest.desc: $npc:11000299$ finally has some water for his crops, but too much ground to cover. Help him out by watering carrot sprouts in $map:02000056$!

quest.name: Champion of Carrots
quest.desc:
With a dash of water, $npc:11000299$'s crop will live another day—provided it's not eaten by monsters.
Reduce the monster population in $map:02000056$ and protect the budding plants.

quest.name: All Sold Out
quest.desc: $npc:11000268$ is obsessed with money, wealth, and buying expensive things. She says that she needs $item:20000054$, but is unable to purchase it because it's constantly sold out in the shop. If I remember correctly, there are supposedly a lot of $npc:21000053$ in $map:02000173$ and $map:02000174$…
quest.manual: Gather $item:20000054$ around the Ant Tunnel area

quest.name: The Missing Hawker
quest.desc: $npcName:11000300$ went missing while collecting a $item:20000075$ for $npcName:11000268$. Go to $map:02000039$ and find him.

quest.name: The Tail Trade
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000300$ climbed the mountain peak at $map:02000039$, but he's too frightened to enter the $map:02000052$ due to his fear of heights. It's time for you to do $npcName:11000300$'s job and get the $item:20000075$ from $npcName:22000005$!
You might want to get some help for this one.

quest.name: Misplaced Plans
quest.desc: $npc:11000301$ is building an outpost for $npc:11000134$ at $map:02000045$, but his $itemPlural:30000077$ were stolen from monsters. Round the monsters up and get the plans back.

quest.name: Clumps for a Friend
quest.desc: $npcName:11000271$ in $map:02000051$ is looking for $itemPlural:30000015$. Why could he possibly want such a thing? And how much will he pay for them? Find out by searching the rocks at the $map:02000045$ and going to him.

quest.name: Cursed Love
quest.desc: Rumor has it that $npc:29000024$ will appear at the top of $map:02000046$ when all 4 of the altars are lighted. Let's defeat $npc:29000024$ and take the $item:30000080$ that holds cursed power.

quest.name: Search and Seek
quest.desc: $npc:11000272$ of $map:02000051$ asked me to look for $npc:11000302$ in $map:02000046$.

quest.name: Legends of Perion
quest.desc: On the way out of the library, you were tasked with delivering a copy of $item:30000087$ to $npcName:11000327$ in $map:02000001$. Hop to it!
quest.manual: Find $item:30000087$ in the book cart at the entrance of $map:02000031$

quest.name: More Than a Myth
quest.desc: It's time to unravel the mystery! Go to $map:02000076$ and meet with $npc:11000328$.

quest.name: Unmasking the Past
quest.desc: $npc:11000328$ told you the legend of $npc:21000425$ as he heard it from $npc:11000039$. To find out whether it's true, you'll need to get your hands on a $item:30000088$ recently liberated from a tourist shop by the $npcPlural:21000225$ of $map:02000056$.

quest.name: The Legend Lives
quest.desc:
$map:02000047$'s entrance is somewhere near the rocky hills in the western side of $map:02000060$! If you go there and hang the $item:30000088$ on the altar, you should be able to once and all put this myth to rest.
Where you're going is a dangerous place. Tread carefully!

quest.name: Robots Running Amuck
quest.desc: $npc:11001031$ from the $map:02000163$ says that the robots in the lab are malfunctioning. To get the $item:30000084$, you'll first need to free $npc:11000335$ and obtain his $item:30000083$. Then you can retrieve the $item:30000084$ and for $npc:11000244$.
quest.manual: Free $npc:11000335$ at the $map:02000163$ to get the master key card|Retrieve the $item:30000084$ from the $map:02000163$

quest.name: A Match Maid in Heaven
quest.desc: What's holding up $npc:11000335$? Head to $map:02000163$ and see what you can find out.

quest.name: Praise the Pigming
quest.desc: $npc:11000136$ asked me to fill the $item:30000086$ in $map:02000077$, and take it to $npc:11000039$ in $map:02000049$. Would $npc:11000039$ know about Yamarcha?

quest.name: Enemy of the Pigming
quest.desc: $npc:11000039$ explained that the Yamarcha was one of the tribes that existed in ancient Perion, and asked me to stop the Inakimos that were prowling around the altar attempting to interrupt the Pigmings' tribal activities. Let's go to $map:02000049$ and defeat the strange $npc:21000332$ and $npc:21000333$, who were continuously flapping their wings, and return to $npc:11000039$ to learn more about the Yamarcha.

quest.name: Murpagoth's Eagle
quest.desc: $npc:11000039$ relays the story of the Yamarcha's insatiable lust for power, and their subsequent decline after falling for a demon's trap. Yamarcha…the only clue that was left in $map:02000223$… The answer is still shrouded in mystery. Will I be able to find $npc:11000069$ using only this clue? I wish Perion's chief $npc:11000069$ would return soon since he is the only person I feel is capable of unraveling this mystery, thanks to his vast knowledge about the Yamarcha… There are five Murpagoth's eagles in $map:02000049$. The eagles all sit along the edges of the cliffs on the east, west, south, and north sides. I think it'd be a good idea to send an eagle to the chief!

quest.name: Up and Down, Up and Down
quest.desc: $npc:11000338$'s bread cart flipped over, and he needs you to carry his delicious bread to $map:02000178$ at the top of a steep set of stairs.

quest.name: The Heavenly Scent of Bread
quest.desc: $npc:11000339$ is trying to avoid $npc:11000340$'s wrath, so he sends you to deliver a Bread Sample in his stead.

quest.name: Keeping Promises
quest.desc: $npc:11000341$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000178$$pp:가,이$ $map:02000171$에서 안정적으로 자리잡기 위해서는 코로푸 부족의 마음을 얻는 것이 중요하다고 말한다. 그들의 마음을 얻기 위해 $map:02000171$에서 코로푸 부족을 괴롭히는 몬스터들을 없애 달라는 $npc:11000341$의 부탁을 들어주자!

quest.name: A Tragic Decision
quest.desc: When $npc:11000027$ tried to help a young child that was having his soul being slowly eaten away by an evil spirit, his friends also became corrupted by the dark aura. $npcName:11000027$ blames himself for exposing his friends to the darkness, and pleads that you free their souls. Let's go to $map:02000053$, where the $npc:21000109$ corrupted by dark aura are located, and release the souls of $npcName:11000027$'s friends.
quest.manual: Defeat $npc:21000109$ in $map:02000053$ to liberate the unicorns' souls

quest.name: A Rotten Malcontent
quest.desc:
After reports of a $npc:22000011$ menacing the people of $map:02000059$, $npc:11000015$ has tasked you with tracking down the undead assailant.
$npc:22000011$ was last seen near the $map:02000082$. Defeat him and recover his axe, for the safety of the people!

quest.name: Let Me Axe You a Question
quest.desc: $map:02000059$에 살고 있는 $npc:11000203$$pp:는,은$ $npc:21000041$$pp:가,이$ 자신의 도끼를 훔쳐 갔다고 확신하고 있었다. 그의 말에 따르면 $npc:21000041$들이 나무꾼들의 도끼를 훔쳐 자기 몸에 꽂고 $npc:21000045$$pp:가,이$ 되어 돌아다니고 있다는데… 이들이 자기 몸에 해를 가하면서 이렇게 하는 이유가 도대체 뭘까? 일단, $npc:21000045$$pp:가,이$ 정말 $npcName:11000203$의 도끼를 훔쳐 갔는지 확인부터 해 보는 게 좋을 것 같다. $npc:21000045$$pp:가,이$ 자주 출몰한다는 $map:02000058$$pp2:로,으로$ 가 보자.

quest.name: Discovering the Truth
quest.desc: $npc:11000203$ wanted to know the reason why $npc:21000041$ stole the tree cutters' axes, and impaled it in their own bodies to become $npc:21000045$. I was asked to go to $npc:11000328$ in $map:02000076$ and discover the truth behind this strange phenomenon.

quest.name: Axe-amine the Stumps
quest.desc: Who is the little girl that persuaded $npc:11000134$ with tears in her eyes to save $npc:21000041$? I'll go to $map:02000076$ and ask $npc:11000001$ for more answers.

quest.name: 인정 많은 소녀
quest.desc: Wait, it's $npc:11000188$… Isn't she the older sister of $npc:11000186$ who unfroze and saved?! If what $npc:11000001$ says is true…could $npc:21000041$ have waited with an axe stuck on its head this whole time, waiting for $npc:11000188$, who couldn't go because she was frozen? I'll try to think this through while I meet with $npc:11000188$ in $map:02000085$.

quest.name: 소녀의 부탁
quest.desc: After hearing $npc:21000045$'s story, $npc:11000188$ was obviously extremely sad and heartbroken. Let's go to $map:02000059$ and relay $npc:11000188$'s message to $npc:11000203$ in her stead, as she has not yet fully recovered.

quest.name: 항구의 난봉꾼
quest.desc: $map:02000139$의 $npc:11000207$$pp:는,은$ 항구의 화물들을 마구 파손하고 다니는 몬스터들을 처치해 달라는 부탁을 해왔다. 한 번 도와준 인연을 여기서 끊어내는 건 너무 매정한 일 같다. $npcName:11000207$의 부탁을 들어주도록 하자!

quest.name: Risky Business
quest.desc: $npc:11000307$, who runs an interior shop in $map:02000119$, asks that I collect the Ludibrium meteoric fragments that fell on the back hill, claiming that the fragments can be used as a new materials when they are refined. Let's go to $map:02000014$ and collect those fragments.

quest.name: 수상한 철광석
quest.desc: $npc:11000004$$pp:가,이$ 앞뒤 따져보지도 않고 급하게 $npc:11000170$에게서 철광석을 구입한 이유는 요즘 철광석을 구하기 힘들기 때문이라고 했다. $npcName:11000170$$pp:는,은$ 구하기도 힘든 철광석을 어디서 구했길래 싼 값에 상인에게 팔 수 있었던 걸까? $npc:11000004$의 말대로 만들어진 무기를 다시 녹여서 만든 철광석은 아닐까? 만약 그렇다면 혹시 도난당한 무기들도 다시 녹여서 철광석 재료로 만들어진 것은 아닐까? 일단, $map:02000140$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:11000170$의 행방을 알아보자.

quest.name: 브로커 랄프를 찾아라!
quest.desc: $map:02000083$에서 만난 거리의 힙합보이들은 특유의 리듬감을 뽐내며 경고와 함께 $map:02000141$은 $map:02000083$ 북동쪽에 있다고 알려주었다. 도대체 얼마나 위험한 곳이길래 이렇게 호들갑을 떠는 걸까? $map:02000083$ 북동 쪽 끝에 위치하고 있는 $map:02000141$ 입구를 찾아보자!
quest.complete: $map:02000083$ 북동 쪽 끝에 위치하고 있는 $map:02000141$ 입구를 찾아 들어가 $npc:11000173$ 만나기

quest.name: 랄프의 도발
quest.desc: $npc:11000173$$pp:를,을$ 더 붙잡고 늘어져봤자 얻을 수 있는 것은 별로 없을 것 같다. 이럴 땐 무대포 정신으로 $map:02000141$$pp:를,을$ 샅샅이 뒤져보는 게 답일 수도 있을 것 같다. 그러다보면 뭔가 하나라도 도움이 될만한 단서를 얻거나 나를 도와줄 수 있는 조력자를 만나게 될 수도 있지 않을까? $npc:11000173$의 수하들을 처치하며 $map:02000141$$pp:를,을$ 돌아다녀보자. $map:02000141$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000083$에 위치하고 있다.

quest.name: 장물 거래의 흔적
quest.desc: $npc:11000173$에게 쫓기며 사는 것에 지친 $npc:11000365$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000173$의 장물 거래 문서를 빼돌려 근위대나 다크윈드 쪽에 넘기고 자신의 안전을 보장받으려고 한다. 그의 자세한 사정은 알 수 없지만, $npcName:11000365$$pp:가,이$ 찾아 달라고 부탁한 $item:30000018$들 중에는 그가 철광석을 누구에게 구입해서 되팔았는지 알 수 있는 거래 기록도 포함되어 있을 것 같다. $map:02000141$ 각 방의 벽마다 설치된 금고를 열고 그 속에 보관되어 있는 $item:30000018$$pp:를,을$ 찾아 $npc:11000365$에게 가져다주자. $map:02000141$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000083$에 위치하고 있다.

quest.name: For the Love of Pudding
quest.desc:
$npc:11000002$ heard her friend $npcName:11000350$ was building a home in $map:02000017$ and asked you to deliver some pudding as a housewarming gift.
She said $map:02000001$ is close by, so it should be a quick trip. Find $npc:11000350$ at $map:02000017$.

quest.name: Only You Can Preserve the Forest
quest.desc:
$npc:11000368$, the guardian of $map:02000017$, wishes for $map:02000041$ to return to its past glory… the way it was before the humans came. He planted lots of trees, but the pesky tree bugs known as $npcPlural:29000022$ keep eating them.
Help $npc:11000368$'s by searching under wrocks in $map:02000041$ and taking care of any $npcPlural:29000022$ you find.
quest.manual: Eliminate the $npcPlural:29000022$ hiding underneath the rocks in $map:02000041$

quest.name: 늑대 가죽의 품격
quest.desc: $npc:11000374$, whom I met in $map:02000117$, told me of a great moneymaking venture that involves getting $item:30000112$ and then bringing it to $npc:11000546$. Let's go hunt $npc:21000062$, gather $item:30000112$, and hand them over to $npc:11000546$.

quest.name: Secret of the Mushroom
quest.desc: $npc:11000375$, whom I met in $map:02000117$, told me that he would pay well for $item:20000058$, a rare herb found only in the most pristine of areas. The path may be narrow and the monsters tough…but I think it's worth a shot, since $npc:11000375$ will most likely pay very well. Let's go to $map:02000117$ and collect $item:20000058$.

quest.name: 물탱크 점검기간
quest.desc: $map:02000083$ 구역 $npc:11000393$$pp:는,은$ 물탱크 정기점검을 하러 왔다가 몬스터들의 난동에 한 발자국도 떼지 못한 채 심호흡만 이백스물쉰한번째라고 한다. $npc:11000393$$pp:를,을$ 대신해서 $map:02000083$ 건물들의 옥상에 있는 물탱크를 점검하고 $item:30000117$$pp:를,을$ 수거해오자.

quest.name: 마트 습격 사건
quest.desc: $map:02000083$$pp:를,을$ 휘젓고 다니는 몬스터들이 강도로 돌변해 $map:02000121$$pp:를,을$ 습격하는 사건이 벌어졌다. $map:02000121$의 직원들은 갑자기 들이닥친 몬스터들을 피해 겨우 빠져나와 목숨은 건졌지만, 이대로 마트 안 계산대 현금을 모두 털리면 마트 사장에게 꼼짝없이 강도들과 한패라고 의심받을 지경이라고 한다. 선량하고 힘없는 직원들이 억울한 일을 당하지 않도록 $map:02000121$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 계산대와 강도들이 털어 간 현금을 모두 되찾아오자!

quest.name: Rise Against
quest.desc: They say $npc:22300105$ redefines the meaning of pain to everyone who has the misfortune to meet him. $npc:11000150$ has challenged you to face $npc:22300105$ one-on-one to see how strong he really is. It sounds like he hangs around $map:02000083$. He's definitely a challenge to face alone, so you should probably bring some allies with you.

quest.name: 악취의 원인
quest.desc: 물이 굳어버린 원인을 파악하기 위해 $map:02000092$에 온 $npc:11000399$$pp:는,은$ 코를 찌르는 악취에 괴로워하고 있다. 악취의 원인은 $map:02000084$에서 흘러 들어온 것으로 추정되는 폐수 때문에 생긴 큰넝쿨이끼와 $npc:21000387$!! $map:02000092$에서 폐수가 유입된 곳 주변에 자라고 있는 큰넝쿨이끼를 찾아서 제거하고, $npc:21000387$$pp:를,을$ 처치하자!
quest.manual: $map:02000092$ 오염지역 주변 $npc:21000387$ 처치하기|$map:02000092$ 오염지역 주변 큰넝쿨이끼 제거하기

quest.name: 아빠는 관리소장
quest.desc: $npc:11000174$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000092$ 관리를 맡고 있는 아빠가 며칠 동안이나 집에 들어오지 않고 있다며 걱정하고 있다. $npc:11000174$의 아빠 $npc:11000400$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가서 딸이 걱정하고 있다며 집에 들어가라고 전해주자.

quest.name: 굳어가는 물
quest.desc: $npc:11000400$$pp:가,이$ 며칠 동안이나 집에 들어갈 수 없었던 이유가 있었다. 바로 $map:02000092$ 상류 쪽 물이 중앙에서부터 점점 딱딱하게 굳어가고 있는 것! 이상 현상의 원인을 파악하기 위해서는 현장조사가 필요하지만 쉴 새 없이 출몰하는 몬스터들 때문에 접근조차 하지 못하고 있는 상황이다. $map:02000092$ 상류 굳어버린 물 위에서 날뛰고 있는 몬스터들을 없애주자.
quest.manual: $map:02000092$ 상류 굳어버린 물 위 몬스터 처치하기

quest.name: Power of Poison
quest.desc: $map:02000043$에서 새어나온 독액에 빠져 중독이 되어버린 $npc:11000402$$pp:와,과$ $npc:11000403$! 이들에게는 독을 중화시킬 수 있는 $npc:21000078$의 $item:20000060$$pp:가,이$ 필요하다. $map:02000043$의 초원 지역에 종종 나타나는 $npc:21000078$$pp:를,을$ 처치하고 $item:20000060$$pp:를,을$ 모아오자.

quest.name: Free Gift with Vengeance
quest.desc: $npcName:11000404$ at $map:02000181$ says that $npc:23000024$, who awoke after the Blue Lapenta shattered, slew his papa. He wants vengeance! Defeat $npc:23000024$ for justice! And also for the free gift…

quest.name: 제자리 찾기
quest.desc: $map:63000001$의 마을 창고를 관리하고 있는 $npc:11000148$$pp:는,은$ $map:63000001$에서 생산된 $item:30000130$들을 배에 싣고 대륙으로 보내려고 했지만, 갑자기 출항에 문제가 생겨 꼼짝없이 $item:30000130$들을 다시 $map:63000004$ 앞으로 옮겨야 하는 상황이라고 한다. $npc:11000148$의 허리가 괜찮아질 때까지만이라도 $item:30000130$들을 $map:63000004$ 앞으로 옮기는 일을 도와주자!

quest.name: By the Seaside
quest.desc: $npc:11000360$'s friend, $npc:11000420$, recommended that $npc:11000360$ and his mother move to $map:02000111$, since it's a beautiful, safe, and comfortable place to have a home. But $npc:11000360$ says that he's swamped with work and doesn't have time to check the place out right now. Go to $map:02000111$ and scope the place out.

quest.name: Struggling to Survive
quest.desc:
A $npc:23000018$ is wreaking havoc on the beaches of $map:02000111$, and $npc:11000421$'s business is struggling to stay afloat.
Dispatch the $npc:23000018$ at $map:02000111$! Be warned, it's best to bring friends when facing a foe this fierce!

quest.name: Borrower's Remorse
quest.desc:
$npc:11000055$, $npc:11000002$'s lovely son, is a frequent visitor to $map:02000031$. However, he's a bit of a headache for $npc:11000005$, as he rarely returns his books.
Find $npc:11000055$ in $map:02000001$ and inform him that he should check out a book on manners once he returns the last book he borrowed.

quest.name: Forest Legends and Folktales
quest.desc: $npc:22000003$ and $npc:22000004$ were supposed to be just a creepy campfire story… But if they're real, how many other legends could be true? You should find $npc:11000327$ in $map:02000001$ to ask if they really did reappear. And if so, where?

quest.name: A Tragic Love
quest.desc:
$npc:11000327$ has asked you to investigate whether $npc:22000003$ and $npc:22000004$, elves mentioned in an old folktale, have actually returned to $map:02000041$, and whether they possess the trinkets Alberto gave to Roanna to confess his love.
Travel to $map:02000041$ and find out! If the tales are true, you'll want to bring allies to aid you in battle.
quest.manual: (Elite) Defeat $npc:22000003$ and obtain $item:30000131$|(Elite) Defeat $npc:22000004$ and obtain $item:30000132$

quest.name: Bury Your Love
quest.desc: $npc:11000327$ of $map:02000001$ has asked that you leave $item:30000133$ at her grave, which is located somewhere in the treetops in the northwest of $map:02000017$.

quest.name: Those We Leave Behind
quest.desc:
You found $npc:11000422$ located deep in the $map:02000017$. Alongside it was a nameless marker for a grave that could only belong to Alberto.
You should leave $item:30000133$ in front of her grave, in hopes that it brings her some peace in the afterlife.
quest.manual: Place the jewel box in front of $npc:11000422$ in $map:02000017$

quest.name: 손녀를 그리며
quest.desc: $map:02000100$ 병원 의사 $npc:11000419$$pp:는,은$ 얼마 전 병원에서 치료를 받고 나가던 길에 실종되어버린 $npc:11000424$의 손녀 사진을 건네주며 $npc:11000424$에게 전해달라고 부탁했다. 어느 날 갑자기 자취를 감춰버린 사랑스러운 손녀딸을 그리며 눈물로 하루하루를 보내는 $npc:11000424$에게는 그 무엇보다 소중한 사진일 것 같다. $map:02000100$에서 $npc:11000424$$pp:를,을$ 찾아 손녀딸의 사진을 전해주자.

quest.name: 괴물소녀의 비밀
quest.desc: $npc:11000424$$pp:는,은$ 조심스럽게 $map:02000147$에 종종 나타나는 의문의 괴물소녀가 손녀의 인형은 아닌지 확인을 해달라고 부탁했다. $npc:22090165$$pp:가,이$ 지니고 있던 물건 하나만 있어도 손녀의 인형인지 아닌지 단번에 알 수 있다고 하니, $npc:22090165$$pp:가,이$ 가지고 있는 물건을 가지고 와서 $npc:11000424$에게 보여주자.

quest.name: Fly Like a Vulture
quest.desc:
Afraid of plummeting to his death, $npc:11000425$ asked you to deliver the $item:30000141$ to $npc:11000427$ in $map:02000085$. All you have to do is grab onto a vulture and let it fly you to your destination.
You should wait near $npc:11000425$ for a vulture to arrive, and grab on tight.
quest.complete: Grab hold of a vulture in $map:02000085$ and fly to $npc:11000427$

quest.name: Wings of Rage
quest.desc:
$npc:11000427$ wants to train the vulture hatchlings on the highland plains of $map:02000085$ as transportation for the local populace, but $npc:23000019$ keeps destroying all the eggs.
Work alongside other adventurers to defeat $npc:23000019$ in $map:02000085$ when it finally appears.

quest.name: Prison Pen Pals
quest.desc: Unable to face $npc:11000526$, who has been connected to the death of $npc:11000492$, $npc:11000012$ of $map:02000001$ requested that a letter be delivered to $npc:11000526$, who is currently trapped in $map:02000310$.

quest.name: Nelph's Keepsake
quest.desc: $npc:11000526$, currently trapped in $map:02000310$, handed over $npc:11000492$'s keepsake, a tape containing an audio message from $npc:11000492$ for $npc:11000492$'s blind mother, and asked to have it delivered to $npc:11000178$ in $map:02000076$.

quest.name: Broken Promises
quest.desc: Being blind, $npc:11000178$ gave $item:30000342$ back and asked to have the audio message be played for her. Find the small audio player next to the bed in $map:02000198$ and play $item:30000342$.

quest.name: Searching the Wreckage
quest.desc: $npcName:11000025$ in $map:02000062$ is worried about her older brother, $npcName:11000021$, who disappeared during a typhoon on his way to visit her from $map:63000001$. She wants you to head to $map:02000183$, where the wreckage of his boat was found, to investigate. She says $npcName:11000994$ down by the docks might be able to get you to the island quickly.

quest.name: Undead Pirates
quest.desc: You found $npcName:11000782$ at $map:02000183$, who told you about a frightening experience with undead pirates, during which you found out that $npcName:11000021$ is alive! $npc:11000025$ will be so happy! Time to go find $npcName:11000021$ at $map:02000067$.

quest.name: Santiago's Story
quest.desc: $npcName:11000021$ shares a terrifying tale of undead pirates and a grand escape from a phantom pirate ship. Could this be the first major clue to finding the truth behind what happened to the Victoria?

quest.name: A Timely Interview
quest.desc:
$npc:11000476$ hurt her feet delivering interview requests to prospective interns, but she still has one left to deliver to $npc:11001054$ in $map:02000166$…
Lucky for her, you've agreed to go in her place.

quest.name: A Difficult Delivery
quest.desc:
$npc:11001054$ is ecstatic to be considered for the Goldus intrernship. But with his part-time pizza delivery job, there's no way he can make it to the interview…
Thankfully for him, that's where you come in! Deliver the pizzas sitting at the first floor of $map:52000004$ to the top floor in $npc:11001054$'s place.
quest.manual: Take the pizza from $map:52000004$ 1F and deliver it to the top floor
quest.complete: Find $npc:11001055$ at the top floor of $map:52000004$

quest.name: 30 Minutes or Less
quest.desc:
$npc:11001054$ seems to have made it through the first round of interviews, but there's no time to prepare for the second one while fulfilling his delivery obligations.
Lucky for him, you've agreed to take the pizzas from the first floor of $map:52000004$ and deliver them to the roof so that $npc:11001054$ can prepare with peace of mind.
quest.manual: Take the pizza from $map:52000004$ 1F and deliver it to the top floor
quest.complete: Find $npc:11001055$ at the top floor of $map:52000004$

quest.name: Unidentified Thieving Assailant
quest.desc: $npc:11001028$ of $map:02000309$ said that the results from the study regarding the principles of time, $item:30000320$, $item:30000321$, and $item:30000322$ all disappeared after an invasion by an unknown assailant. $map:02000298$ in $map:02000259$ is the place where the Chaos Time Key is the most useful! By using the $npc:11001056$ located behind $npc:11001028$, teleport to $map:02000259$ and assess the situation at $map:02000298$!

quest.name: Dungeon: Hacker's Ambush
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21008001$ (Entrance: $map:2000259$) Party Size (4 players)
$npc:11001057$ of $map:02000259$ said that this hacker group appeared out of nowhere and overtook $map:02000298$. Stop this army of hackers and investigate the perilous situation at $map:02000299$.
quest.manual: Stop the hacker group Funny Fingers in $map:02000298$ | Investigate $map:02000299$

quest.name: Dungeon: Protect the Time Hole!
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:2000298$ (Entrance: $map:2000259$) Party Size (4 players)
$npc:11001057$ in $map:02000259$ said that the unidentified assailant who took the Chaos Time Key must be stopped from seizing the universe's center of time. $npc:11001057$ said that this unknown attacker will be found at $map:02000298$ as a result of the unstable time traveling process, and must be stopped in order to protect $map:02000304$'s safety.
quest.manual: Find $map:02000304$ in $map:02000298$ | (Elite) Find and stop the unidentified assailant with the Chaos Time Key

quest.name: Utterly Charmed
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000010$ of $map:02000001$ has fallen head-over-heels for a man with a bamboo hat. Unfortunately, he vanished without warning. She's heard rumors that a man matching his description was spotted near the Ant Tunnel.
Head to the $map:02000173$ and get some answers.
quest.complete: Search for the man in the bamboo hat at the $map:02000173$

quest.name: Memory of the Man
quest.desc:
Instead of finding the man in the bamboo hat, you found a strange fellow wearing a high-tech monocle: $npc:11000145$. He claims that the man who saved his life from a $npcName:22000322$ was wearing a $item:11300119$ and left an origami flower behind. It must be the same man that $npcName:11000010$ told you about!
Maybe you'll find another clue if you find the $npcName:22000322$ in the $map:02000173$.

quest.name: 단 하나의 단서
quest.desc: $npc:11000492$는 $npc:11000170$의 보부상 수첩에 적혀 있던 주소를 기억해내며 $map:02000092$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:11000170$의 행방을 찾아보라고 말했다. 밑져야 본전이다. 일단, $map:02000092$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:11000170$를 찾아보자!

quest.name: 배달의 기수
quest.desc: $npc:11000012$$pp:는,은$ 운송 기록부를 살펴보는 동안, $map:02000140$의 $npc:11000492$에게 우편물을 전해달라고 부탁했다. 철광석을 싣고 온 택배 트럭의 행방을 조금이라도 더 빨리 알아낼 수 있다면 이 정도는 아무것도 아닌 것 같다. $npc:11000012$에게 받은 우편물을 가지고 $map:02000140$로 가자.

quest.name: 감사의 인사
quest.desc: $npc:11000492$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000012$에게도 감사의 인사를 잊지 않았다. 사소한 일에도 감사할 줄 알고 다른 사람을 배려하는 그의 태도가 사람들의 마음을 움직이는 힘이 되는 것 같다. $map:02000001$ $npc:11000012$에게 가서 $npc:11000492$의 인사를 전해주자.

quest.name: 부서진 믿음
quest.desc: $npc:11000169$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000119$에게 무기고 도난 사건과 $npc:11000492$의 비리에 관해 보고하는 사이에 $npc:11000492$가 도망가지 못하도록 그를 감시해달라고 부탁해왔다. $map:02000140$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:11000492$의 동태를 살피며 그를 감시하도록 하자.

quest.name: 커져가는 의혹
quest.desc: 언제나 환하게 웃으며 $npc:11000492$$pp:가,이$ 맞아주던 $map:02000140$의 문은 굳게 닫혀 있었다. $npc:11000492$$pp:는,은$ 어디로 간 것일까…? $map:02000140$가 바로 보이는 택시 정류장에 서서 항상 전단지를 나눠주고 있는 아르바이트생 $npc:11000373$라면 뭔가 보지 않았을까?

quest.name: 사라진 넬프
quest.desc: $npc:11000373$$pp:는,은$ 좀처럼 $map:02000140$를 비우지 않는 $npc:11000492$가 집에 들릴 일이 있다며 가는 것을 보았다고 한다. $npc:11000012$에게 $npc:11000492$의 집주소를 물어보자.

quest.name: 수색의 첫 단추
quest.desc: $npc:11000044$$pp:는,은$ 다크윈드 대원들을 모아 $npc:11000526$의 비리 증거를 찾기 위한 수색대를 꾸리는 동안, $map:02000157$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:11000065$$pp:를,을$ 만나 바로타 상단 수색 허가를 받아올 것을 부탁했다. 어떤 일이든지 첫 단추를 잘 끼워야 하는 법! $npc:11000065$에게 모든 상황을 보고하고 바로타 상단 수색 허가를 받아오자.

quest.name: 수색 허가증
quest.desc: $npc:11000065$$pp:는,은$ 이번 일로 바로타 상단 전체가 무너지는 일은 없도록 단장 $npc:11000526$의 개인적인 비리를 밝히는 선에서 마무리 했으면 좋겠다는 당부와 함께 $item:30000165$$pp:를,을$ 발부해 주었다. $map:02000152$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가서 $npc:11000044$$pp:를,을$ 만나자.

quest.name: 금지 품목 단속기
quest.desc: $npc:11000044$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000209$에서 $item:20000046$$pp:와,과$ 함께 유통이 금지된 불량식품 $item:20000015$$pp:를,을$ 판매하고 있다는 제보가 들어왔다고 말하며, 유통 경로를 확인해보라는 지시를 내렸다. $npc:11000044$의 추측대로 $item:20000015$의 유통 과정에서 $npc:11000526$$pp:가,이$ 연관되어 있다면 정말 그의 행방에 대한 뜻밖의 수확을 얻을 수도 있지 않을까? $map:02000147$의 $map:02000209$에서 $item:20000015$$pp:를,을$ 찾아낸 후, $npc:11000491$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 새로운 실마리
quest.desc: $npc:11000491$$pp:는,은$ 약속대로 $item:20000015$의 유통 경로에 대해 말해주며, $npc:11000526$$pp:가,이$ 행방을 감추는 과정에서 흑성회가 개입되어 있을 가능성을 언급했다. 아직은 아무런 증거도 없는 $npc:11000491$의 추측에 불과하지만 $npc:11000526$$pp:를,을$ 찾을 수 있는 결정적인 단서가 될 수도 있을 것 같다. 일단, $map:02000152$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가서 $npc:11000044$$pp:를,을$ 만나자.

quest.name: 사업권 경쟁
quest.desc: $npc:11000491$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000148$의 석유 개발 사업권을 따내기 위해 $npc:11000245$의 지지가 필요하다고 한다. 쉽사리 마음의 문을 열지 않는 $npc:11000245$… $item:30000166$에 추천인 사인을 받으려면 어떻게 해야 할까? 일단 $map:02000148$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:11000245$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 설득의 노동학
quest.desc: $map:02000148$의 $npc:11000245$$pp:는,은$ 사업권 획득 추천을 받고 싶다면 $map:02000148$에서 일하고 있는 인부들의 마음을 먼저 얻어야 한다고 충고했다. 하루종일 땡볕 아래에서 고생하는 $map:02000148$의 인부 $npc:11000353$, $npc:11000533$, $npc:11000543$의 일을 거들어주며 친분을 쌓도록 하자.
quest.manual: $npc:11000543$의 [위태로운 석유관] 도와주기|$npc:11000353$의 [코브라들이 뿔났다] 도와주기|$npc:11000533$의 [몹쓸 방화범] 도와주기

quest.name: 참된 결실
quest.desc: $npc:11000245$$pp:는,은$ 추천인 란에 자신의 사인을 하고 $item:30000167$$pp:를,을$ 돌려주었다. $map:02000209$의 $npc:11000491$에게 $item:30000167$$pp:를,을$ 전해주자.

quest.name: 초보자 라펜샤드 활용법
quest.desc: 숙련된 초보자 중 라펜샤드를 사용하지 못한다는 소식에 라펜샤드를 사용할 수 있도록 비밀기사단에서 배려해주었다.

quest.name: 몹쓸 방화범
quest.desc: $map:02000148$의 $npc:11000533$$pp:는,은$ 석유관을 뚫고 불을 붙이고 다니는 몬스터들 때문에 골머리를 앓고 있다. 몬스터의 수가 조금 더 줄어들기만 해도 $npc:11000533$$pp:와,과$ 이곳의 인부들이 일하기가 훨씬 더 편해질 수 있다고 하니 $map:02000148$의 사고뭉치 몬스터들을 처치하도록 하자.

quest.name: 금괴를 찾아라!
quest.desc: 흑성회 대부 $npc:11000251$$pp:는,은$ 조직의 배신자가 빼돌린 금괴를 모두 찾아온다면 조직의 일원으로 받아주겠다고 했다. 누구보다 빠르게 $map:02000138$ 곳곳에 숨겨진 금괴 가방을 찾아내거나 금괴를 털어 간 몬스터들을 처치하고 녀석들이 가지고 있는 $item:30000168$를 빼앗아야 한다. $npc:11000526$$pp:를,을$ 찾기 위해서는 흑성회 조직의 일원으로 인정받고 신뢰를 쌓아야만 한다. 서둘러 움직이자.

quest.name: 사건 탐색
quest.desc: $npc:11000251$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000144$에 무슨 일이 일어났는지 알아보라는 지시를 내렸다. $map:02000144$$pp2:로,으로$ 가보자.

quest.name: 발로 뛰는 현장
quest.desc: $map:02000144$ 입구에서 만난 $npc:11000213$$pp:는,은$ 사건에 대한 자세한 내용은 $npc:11000534$에게 물어보라며 끔찍하다는 말만 되풀이했다. $map:02000144$에서 현장 감식 중인 $npc:11000534$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 사건 경위 보고
quest.desc: $npc:11000534$$pp:는,은$ 시신 주변에서 발견된 신분증에 $npc:11000526$이라는 이름이 있었다고 말했다. $npc:11000526$이라니… 잘못 들은 것은 아닐까…? 그렇다면 $npc:11000526$$pp:가,이$ $map:02000144$에서 죽어갔다는 것인가… 믿기 어려운 일이지만 $map:02000144$에서 알게 된 사실들을 $npc:11000251$에게 보고하도록 하자. $map:02000156$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가자.

quest.name: 레이먼의 죽음
quest.desc: $map:02000139$에서 만났었던 $npc:11000524$$pp:와,과$ $map:02000144$에서 다시 만났다. 다크윈드로서 실적을 더 올리기 위해 바로타 상단 수색 작업이 끝난 이후에 개인적으로 $npc:11000526$의 행방을 추적하고 다닌 모양이었다. 그라다가 우연찮게 $map:02000144$의 사건 현장을 발견한 것… 그의 말대로 하늘이 그를 돕고 있는 것인지, 어떤지는 모르겠지만 지금 중요한 것은 모든 정황이 이 후미진 뒷골목에서 쓸쓸하게 죽어간 이의 정체가 $npc:11000526$일 가능성이 아주 높다는 것이다. $npc:11000524$에게서 받은 $item:30000036$$pp:를,을$ 가지고 $map:02000153$의 $npc:11000044$에게 전해주자.

quest.name: 막혀버린 길
quest.desc: $npc:11000044$$pp:는,은$ 고민 끝에 $npc:11000526$의 죽음을 끝으로 무기고 도난 사건부터 $npc:11000492$의 비리와 죽음에 얽힌 사건 수사를 종결하겠다고 선언했다. $map:02000001$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가서 $npc:11000119$에게 수사 종결 상황을 보고하도록 하자.

quest.name: 자경단 지원 임무
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000076$ 자경단에서 긴급 지원 요청이 왔다며, 근위대 지원군보다 한 발 앞서 출발해서 상황을 파악하고 $npc:11000015$$pp:를,을$ 돕고 있으라고 말했다. $map:02000076$$pp2:로,으로$ 출발하자.

quest.name: 북동 초소를 구하라!
quest.desc: $npc:11000015$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000054$에 위치한 자경단 북동 초소가 의문의 몬스터로부터 기습 공격을 받았다며, 자경단원들과 함께 북동 초소를 지켜달라고 한다. $map:02000054$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 북동 초소를 공격한 악마 날개를 달고 있는 박쥐들을 처치하고, 자경단원들을 돕자!
quest.manual: $map:02000054$ 북동 초소 주변 기절한 자경단원 깨우기|$map:02000054$ 북동 초소 주변 $npc:21000191$ 처치하기

quest.name: 처음 보는 물건
quest.desc: $map:02000054$ 북동 초소 $npc:11000547$$pp:는,은$ 초소를 기습한 $npc:21000191$들을 이끌고 온 우두머리 녀석과 혈투를 벌이며 빼앗은 $item:30000172$$pp:를,을$ $npc:11000015$에게 전해 달라고 한다. $map:02000076$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가자!

quest.name: 네르만 대장장이
quest.desc: $npc:11000015$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000547$$pp:가,이$ 전해 준 $item:30000172$$pp:를,을$ $map:02000203$의 대장장이 $npc:11000508$에게 전해달라고 부탁했다. $map:02000203$$pp2:로,으로$ 가보자.

quest.name: 최전방에서
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$$pp:는,은$ 지진으로 땅이 갈라지는 바람에 소식이 끊어졌던 $map:02000115$ 초소를 지키던 자경단원들에게 연락이 왔다는 반가운 소식과 함께 그곳에 무자비한 $npc:23000001$$pp:가,이$ 나타난다는 무서운 소식을 전해 주었다. $npc:11000015$$pp:가,이$ 그리워하던 대원들이 무사한 것은 너무 기쁘고 환영할 일이지만, $map:02000001$의 안전을 위협하는 무시무시한 존재의 등장은 반가운 일은 아니다. $item:30000173$$pp:를,을$ $map:02000115$ 초소의 자경단원들에게 전해주도록 하자. $map:02000115$ 끊어진 땅의 간격이 가장 좁은 곳을 찾아 날아서 이동하자.

quest.name: 승리를 위하여
quest.desc: $map:02000115$ 초소의 $npc:11000548$$pp:는,은$ $item:30000173$$pp:를,을$ 가지고 망가진 석궁들을 수리해 달라는 부탁을 했다.
quest.manual: $npc:11000548$에게 $item:30000173$ 받기|$map:02000115$ 끊어진 땅에서 망가진 석궁 수리하기

quest.name: Red Dead Witness
quest.desc: $map:02000001$'s $npc:11000119$ said that the red caped man was found at $map:02000117$, counterattacking with $npc:23000008$ when $npc:23000001$ fell in combat. The search began quickly after the report came in, but there has been no news from the guards themselves… Did something happen to them? No time to waste! Go find out what happened at $map:02000117$!

quest.name: Traversing the Cliff Cave
quest.desc: $map:02000117$'s $npc:11000549$ saw the guards locked in fierce combat at $map:02000238$ below the cliff. $map:02000238$ is now unusually still and quiet… Just exactly happened there? Return to $map:02000117$'s $map:02000238$.

quest.name: Battle of Cliff Cave
quest.desc: $npc:11000551$, who fell in $map:02000238$, could no longer continue speaking due to the immense pain. $map:02000238$ seems to be a trap set for the red cape's pursuers. I can lend a hand to the guards who are currently engaged in an intense battle with the monsters from $map:02000238$.
quest.manual: Take care of the monsters at $map:02000117$'s $map:02000238$

quest.name: The Color Green
quest.desc: You managed to discover $item:30000174$ from a broken wagon deep inside $map:02000238$. Ask $npc:11000551$ to find out more information about it.
quest.manual: Pick up $item:30000174$ from the $npc:11000550$ wreck at $map:02000117$'s $map:02000238$

quest.name: Emergency Dispatch
quest.desc: $map:02000238$의 $npc:11000551$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000001$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가서 $npc:11000119$에게 $item:30000174$$pp:를,을$ 전해주고 지원병을 요청해 달라고 부탁했다.

quest.name: 새로운 국면
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000100$의 $npc:11000529$$pp:가,이$ 알현식 물품 도난 사건과 관련이 있다는 정황을 포착했다는 $npc:11000044$의 전갈을 받았다며 그의 수사 과정을 도와주라고 말했다.

quest.name: 풍문으로 들었소
quest.desc: $npc:11000044$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000100$ 주민들을 대상으로 험플스를 보거나 그들에 대해 알고있는 사람들이 있는지 조사하며 그들의 아지트를 알아보라고 말했다.

quest.name: 목격자 진술
quest.desc: $map:02000100$의 주민 $npc:11000232$$pp:는,은$ 험플스에 대해 들은 것들을 말해주며, $npc:11000233$$pp:가,이$ 더 자세히 알고 있을 것이라고 알려준다.

quest.name: 무법깡패 험플스
quest.desc: $map:02000100$의 주민 $npc:11000233$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000137$에서 메이드로 일하고 있는 쌍둥이 여동생에게서 험플스가 교복입은 학생들을 괴롭히는 모습을 직접 봤다는 이야기를 들었다고 한다. $map:02000137$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 험플스에 대해 계속 알아보자.

quest.name: 감춰진 진실
quest.desc: $map:02000137$에서 험플스에게 피해를 입은 학생들을 만났다. 얼마나 호되게 당했는지 군기가 바짝 들어 잔뜩 얼어있는 모습을 보니 험플스가 생각보다 훨씬 고약한 놈들인 것 같은 느낌이다. $npc:11000219$에게 다시 돌아오겠다고 했다니 어쩌면 녀석은 아직 이 주변에 있을지도 모르겠다. $map:02000137$$pp:를,을$ 돌아보며 험플스를 찾아보자.

quest.name: 험플스 아지트
quest.desc: $map:02000137$에서 험플스를 찾아 다니다가 만난 $npc:11000218$$pp:는,은$ 지금까지 알아본 것과 전혀 다른 이야기를 들려주었다. 기찻길 앞에서 벌을 서고 있는 학생들이 사실은 지금까지 $npc:11000218$$pp:를,을$ 괴롭히던 불량 학생들이었고 험플스는 오히려 $npc:11000218$$pp:를,을$ 도와 준 정의의 사도였다는 것…!! 운 좋게 $npc:11000218$의 실수로 $map:02000208$$pp:가,이$ $map:02000166$의 폐건물 어딘가에 있다는 사실을 알게 되었다. $map:02000166$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 철거를 앞둔 폐건물을 찾아서 들어가보자.

quest.name: 명백한 무죄
quest.desc: $map:02000208$에서 만난 $npc:11000529$$pp:는,은$ 그가 다크윈드를 나오게 된 배경과 $npc:11000044$$pp:와,과$ 있었던 과거 이야기들을 들려주었다. $npc:11000529$$pp:가,이$ 굳게 믿고 있는 $npc:11000064$… 그의 진실은 무엇일까? $map:02000152$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:11000044$에게 밝혀낸 사실들을 보고하자.

quest.name: 흔적없는 습격
quest.desc: $map:02000208$에서 만난 $npc:11000529$$pp:는,은$ 진짜 진실을 밝히고 싶은 것이라면 $npc:11000044$에게 곧장 가서 보고하는 것보다 상자의 출처를 한번쯤 되짚어 확인해 보고 가는 것이 좋을 것이라는 충고를 한다. 섣불리 움직이기 전에 $map:02000166$에서 최근에 수상한 사람은 없었는지 한번쯤 알아보는 것이 현명할 것 같다.

quest.name: 함정
quest.desc: 모든 것이 음모이고 함정이라는 $npc:11000529$의 말이 사실이었던 것일까? $map:02000166$의 건설 상인 $npc:11000311$$pp:는,은$ 어둠이 드리워진 폐건물 근처에서 수상한 자들이 속삭이는 이야기를 들었다며 그대로 전해주었다. $map:02000166$의 $map:02000208$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:11000529$에게 이 사실을 알려줘야 할 것 같다.

quest.name: 감시와 경호사이
quest.desc: $npc:11000044$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000064$의 손에 윈 스틸턴의 유일한 딸 $npc:11000069$까지 잃게 될까 두렵다고 말한다. 지난날 그가 목격했다고 하는 그 끔찍한 기억이 그에게는 지울 수 없는 트라우마로 남은 것 같다. $map:02000147$$pp2:로,으로$ 가면 $map:02000205$ 주변을 지키고 있는 다크윈드 대원을 찾아 $npc:11000069$의 일상에 문제가 없는지 확인해보자.

quest.name: 그녀의 일상
quest.desc: $npc:11000258$$pp:는,은$ 집 밖으로 나오지 않고 있는 $npc:11000069$$pp:가,이$ 별 탈 없이 잘 지내고 있는지 확인해 달라고 부탁했다.

quest.name: 보이지 않는 진실
quest.desc: $npc:11000069$$pp:는,은$ 낯선 사람의 방문을 경계하며 조용히 지내기를 원하는 것 같이 보였다.

quest.name: Harbinger of Doom
quest.desc: When the Royal Guard came to check her safety, $npc:11000058$'s intuition told her that something had happened to $npc:11000074$. Was she right in thinking that something bad had happened…? Let's go to $map:02000001$'s $npc:11000119$ and learn what exactly transpired.

quest.name: Chasing Footprints
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$ seems to place great priority on the value of justice. As $npc:11000119$ said, the world is full of disagreements, and everyone has their own personal reasons for their own perspective. I suppose then it does make sense that some people would see merit in the concept of sacrificing the few for the good of the many… $npc:11000075$ must also have carefully considered the options after $npc:11000057$ returned as a servant of evil… Let's trust $npc:11000075$ for now and join the Royal Guard Chasers following $npc:11000057$ as $npc:11000119$ says.
quest.complete: Find the Royal Guard Chasers at $map:02000053$

quest.name: Endless Pursuit
quest.desc: I saw $npc:11000602$ collapsed in the alleyway in $map:02000053$, which leads to $map:02000090$. He seemed to be more concerned about the other members who were hot on the tail of the red-caped figure. Let's head to $map:02000090$ before anything else.
quest.complete: Find the Royal Guard Chasers at $map:02000090$

quest.name: Inside the Forest of Chaos
quest.desc: Deep inside $map:02000090$, the Royal Guard Chasers were found collapsed and severely injured near the entrance of $map:02000206$. $npc:11000603$ was still somewhat conscious, and said that $npc:23000025$ emerged from the deep, dark $map:02000206$ to protect the red cape from the Royal Guard Chasers. Let's not take any chances and head to $map:02000001$ to report to $npc:11000119$ and request for backup.

quest.name: The Fog Sets In
quest.desc: As $npc:23000025$'s punishment is prepared, $npc:11000119$ requested that the $npc:11000057$'s news be delivered to $npc:11000075$.

quest.name: Conflicting Hearts
quest.desc: $npc:11000075$'s resolve to return to $npc:11000057$ seems to be unshaken. Despite the difficult decision, even for $npcTitle:11000075$, who is essentially the guardian of Maple World, her firm determination is a testament to her unbreakable will. How will $npc:11000074$ respond to $npcTitle:11000075$'s resolve…?

quest.name: Know Thy Enemy
quest.desc: In order to defeat $npc:23000025$, the Royal Guards have been collecting all sorts of information. $npcName:11000169$ wants to make up for not having been able to properly protect the armory, but his timid personality that makes him shy and fidgety in front of women is worrisome. Let's go to $map:02000031$ in $npc:11000169$'s place and retrieve the Book of Shadow Healing from $npc:11000005$.

quest.name: The Book of Legends
quest.desc: $map:02000031$'s $npc:11000005$ said that more can be learned about the Book of Shadow Healing from $map:02000023$'s $npc:11000033$.

quest.name: Apollo the Genius
quest.desc: $npc:11000033$ said that the last person who read the Book of Shadow Healing, $npc:11000604$, might remember the contents of the tome. Let's look for $npc:11000604$ at $map:02000023$'s $map:02000109$.

quest.name: A Fastidious Demand
quest.desc: $npc:11000604$ will share the information related to $npc:23000025$ from Book of Shadow Healing…if I bring $item:30000179$. Let's defeat $npc:22090107$, often found in $map:02000112$ near $map:02000023$, and bring back $item:30000179$.

quest.name: The Brothers Grim
quest.desc:
Here are the passages in the Book of Shadow Healing pertaining to the Baphomet Brothers…
"The Baphomet Brothers were immensely powerful demons who were able to open their eyes and see through the darkness of the Demon King. The eldest, $npc:23000026$ was filled with unspeakable evil, the second, $npc:23000025$ was overflowing with wickedness, and the third, $npc:23000024$ was consumed with pure insanity, annihilating everything in its wake. $npc:23000025$ was the one responsible for engulfing $map:02000023$ with darkness and chaos…which is why it is now called $map:02000206$. As the source of chaos overwhelming the forest stems $item:30000190$, once $npc:23000025$ loses control of it, only then will the Shadow of Chaos be diminished."
There appears to be even more information, but much of the text has withered away…

quest.name: Wisdom of a Sage
quest.desc: $npc:11000075$ said that $map:02000023$'s $npc:11000031$ might be able to find a way to rescue $npc:11000057$, and asked me to deliver a letter.

quest.name: Library of the Forest
quest.desc: $npc:11000031$ told me to find $map:02000019$ in $map:02000019$ and bring back $item:30000191$ from $npc:11000282$.
quest.complete: Find and enter $map:02000019$ in $map:02000215$ to meet with $npc:11000282$

quest.name: Curse of Akabonari
quest.desc: $npc:11000282$ was finicky for a long time. Looking for the hidden $map:02000219$ in a library this large… Guess I don't have much of a choice. Since it's been said that $map:02000219$ is hidden behind a bookcase, let's first find the bookcases that can be moved in $map:02000019$ and try pushing them.
quest.manual: Find $map:02000219$ hidden behind a bookcase in $map:02000019$ | Find $item:30000191$ in $map:02000219$

quest.name: Confirming the Legend
quest.desc: $map:02000019$'s $npc:11000282$ said that in order to obtain $item:30000191$, I must find Hephaestus's travel log, figure out where he hid $item:30000184$, and bring $item:30000184$ back. As it is somewhat of a convoluted request, there is no time to waste, especially considering the urgency at which $npc:11000031$ wants $item:30000191$ back. Let's first search the bookshelves in $map:02000019$ for Hephaestus's travel log!
quest.manual: Search $map:02000019$'s bookshelves to find $item:39000008$ | Go to the marked location on $item:39000008$ and find $item:30000184$

quest.name: Witchin' Treasure
quest.desc: Considering all the difficulty $npc:11000282$ went through in order to obtain $item:30000191$, I guess it shouldn't be a surprise that analyzing the contents have also taken an excruciatingly long time. Fortunately, the everything that's been learned thus far made it clear that $item:30000187$ is necessary. $item:30000187$, the treasure of the witches that is passed from one generation to the next… Can it be obtained?

quest.name: Orb of Souls
quest.desc: $npc:11000304$ divulged the hidden location of $item:30000187$, and imparted some particularly deep and profound messages. Although I can't seem to get $npcName:11000304$'s messages out of my mind, let's try to push that to the side and find $item:30000187$ first before returning. Let's also find the fairy $npcName:11000284$ in the center of $map:02000006$'s large lake and look around the pink-leafed tree for the hidden passageway that goes under the lake. The jar hidden in the bottom of the lake contains $item:30000187$.
quest.manual: Find $item:30000187$ at the bottom of $map:02000006$'s lake

quest.name: You Can Never Be Too Careful
quest.desc: Although $npc:11000031$ finished decoding $item:30000191$'s records and secured $item:30000187$, there seems to be a bigger issue at hand. Using the witches' Soul Curse spell to save $npc:11000057$ runs the risk of throwing off balance one of the powers that drives this world, the balance of life itself. What will $npcTitle:11000075$ decide to do…? Let's return to $map:02000025$ and meet $npc:11000075$.

quest.name: What a Witch Wants
quest.desc: As expected, $npc:11000304$ was not willing to lend out $item:30000187$ so easily. Considering the circumstances, I guess I can't say I'm all that surprised. Let's go to $map:02000113$ and bring $npc:21000266$'s prey, $item:30000072$.

quest.name: The Power of the Wind
quest.desc: $npc:11000304$ wants the power to control the wind! She needs $npc:22000007$'s $item:30000186$. Let's take $item:30000186$ when $map:02000180$'s $npc:22000007$ appears.

quest.name: Specialized Order
quest.desc: After careful deliberation, $npc:11000075$ ordered me to enter $map:02000220$. It's possible that a live being entering $map:02000220$ can disturb the order of life… But if this is necessary to ensure the current world does not fall into confusion and chaos, then such an act should not be solely viewed as transgression against the very nature of life itself. It's time to go to $map:02000023$ and meet $npc:11000031$.

quest.name: The Chief of Perion
quest.desc: Perion Chief $npc:11000134$ has returned! I should go meet with him and hear more about Yamarcha.

quest.name: Muphaza the Wolf King
quest.desc: I'll meet with $npc:11000078$ at $map:02000170$ as $npc:11000134$ said.

quest.name: Unexpected Discovery
quest.desc: I found a suspicious bag in $map:02000229$… My first instinct was that this was $npc:11000069$'s bag.
quest.manual: Find clues from the bag behind $map:02000229$'s altar

quest.name: A Heartwarming Reunion
quest.desc: To meet $npc:11000407$ here, who regaled me with so many stories during the Maple Island days… The nostalgia warms my heart. $npc:11000407$ shared everything, all the way from the first encounter with $npc:11000064$, to how $npc:11000064$ left for the Land of Darkness to save $npc:11000069$. $npc:11000064$ left a letter for $npc:11000529$ before leaving! I wonder what kind of message he left to one of his most dependable friends? Let's go to $map:02000166$'s $map:02000208$ and deliver $item:30000340$ to $npc:11000529$.

quest.name: Unyielding Friendship
quest.desc:
$item:30000340$ contained a request for $npc:11000529$'s help, as $npc:11000069$ left alone for Katramus, the slave's tower. Overjoyed at the news that $npc:11000064$ is still alive, $npc:11000529$ began preparing to leave for Katramus without a moment's hesitation. He left one piece of advice before he left…
"Remember, you still have time to listen to the entire story from $npc:11000064$ first before relaying the news of $npc:11000064$ to $npc:11000044$."
It is now up to me to decide how much should be reported to $npc:11000044$. Let's first go to $map:02000100$'s $map:02000152$ and meet $npc:11000044$.

quest.name: The Final Gift
quest.desc: After sharing $map:02000229$'s location, $npc:11000078$ asked me to help free the trapped soul of his fallen friend, the Red Wolf King Machar. Let's carefully take $item:30000076$ from $npc:11000078$ and travel to the entrance of $map:02000229$ in the red lands below the center of $map:02000170$.
quest.manual: Defeat the monsters at $map:02000229$ | Free Machar's soul with the embers of purification at $map:02000229$

quest.name: Witness Protection
quest.desc: $npc:11000529$ could not help but show unbridled joy while meeting with $npc:11000064$ at Katramus. Although it isn't completely credible, $npc:11000529$ said that there has been an anonymous informant who can reveal $npc:11000044$'s true identity, and that he must be found before the Dark Wind finds him.

quest.name: No Corner Left Behind
quest.desc: $npc:11001021$ at $map:02000279$ requested that I conduct a thorough investigation of $map:02000307$. I'll head to $map:02000307$'s entrance, which is right behind $npc:11001021$.
quest.manual: Enter through $map:02000307$'s entrance behind $npc:11001021$ and defeat the monsters

quest.name: Everybody Loves Raymon
quest.desc: The anonymous informant from $map:02000279$… He was $npc:11000526$, thought to have been dead for a long time now. $npc:11000526$ said that both the robbery of the armory and the death of $npc:11000492$ are $npc:11000044$'s doings, and that the proof can be found behind $map:02000226$'s wall clock.

quest.name: Decisive Evidence
quest.desc: $npc:11001021$ told me to go to $map:02000139$ and look behind $map:02000226$'s wall clock. $map:02000226$ can be reached by going up through $map:02000225$.
quest.manual: Find the evidence behind $map:02000226$'s wall clock at $map:02000139$

quest.name: The Unusual Suspect
quest.desc: $npc:11000529$ said that $npc:11000044$ can be proven to be guilty with testimony from $npc:11000526$ and $item:30000075$ as evidence. I was told to go to $map:02000152$ and make sure $npc:11000044$ cannot run away.

quest.name: Into Thin Air
quest.desc: $npc:11000044$ has already left $map:02000153$ and vanished. It's apparent that $npc:11000044$ already figured out what was going on and hid. I should return to $map:02000208$ and tell $npc:11000529$ the news.

quest.name: Flip Flopped
quest.desc: $npc:11000529$ told me to show $item:30000075$ to $map:02000001$'s $npc:11000119$ and say that a bounty must be set for $npc:11000044$.

quest.name: Reporting Facts
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$ told me to report everything to $npcName:11000075$.

quest.name: The Great Rescue
quest.desc: The doppelganger of $npc:11000685$, the absolute good…$npc:11000068$, the absolute evil! Until $npc:11000068$ is sealed away back into the Shadow World, not even Green Lapenta's safety is guaranteed… This is a crisis that only the Defenders, the guardians of the world, must resolve. It's vital that $npc:11000057$'s rescue plan first be executed. Let's find the door to $map:02000227$ near the Green Lapenta's apparition at the lowest part of $map:02000023$.
quest.manual: Receive $item:30000107$ from $npc:11000031$ at $map:02000023$'s $map:02000035$ | Find and enter $map:02000227$'s entrance near Lapenta's apparition

quest.name: Soul Dimension
quest.desc: $npc:11000685$ in $map:02000227$ said that in order to diminish the impact of the fissure from both life and soul, the Spirit Lantern must be absorbed. Let's enter $map:02000220$ after absorbing the Spirit Lantern behind $npc:11000685$.
quest.manual: Receive $item:30000107$ from $npc:11000685$ at $map:02000227$ | Enter $map:02000220$ after absorbing the Spirit Lantern

quest.name: No Turning Back
quest.desc: Bella was found hardened like a rock at $map:02000220$, and was unresponsive to $item:30000107$. Just what in the world happened to Bella's soul…?

quest.name: A Lost Hope
quest.desc: It seems like the only hope of saving $npc:11000057$ has been extinguished.

quest.name: Back to Square One
quest.desc: The memories of all the work I did for $npc:11000282$ and $npc:11000304$ with the hopes of saving $npc:11000057$ from the Demon King flashed before my eyes. But now… Everything's back to square one… Is it time to give up trying to save $npc:11000057$…?

quest.name: A Hole That Cannot Be Filled
quest.desc: Unable to see $npc:11000074$ face to face, $npc:11000075$ asked me to deliver the news along with some words of consolation to $npc:11000057$.

quest.name: A Word A Day
quest.desc: $npc:11000074$ asked me to deliver the news that $npc:11000057$ will not be returning, so that $npc:11000057$ will not have to suffer more from any pretense of false hope.

quest.name: Incoming Storm
quest.desc: $npc:11000076$ said that $npc:11000057$ and his minions stormed $map:02000146$ and attempted to overtake it. I was asked to join the reinforcements $npc:11000119$ and $npc:11000057$ brought in order to track $npc:11000057$ down. Let's find an entrance to a tunnel near the path to $map:02000145$!
quest.complete: Find $map:02000237$ in $map:02000146$ and join the reinforcements

quest.name: Light at the End of the Tunnel
quest.desc: The reinforcements $npc:11000119$ and $npc:11000015$ brought from $map:02000237$ have already been almost completely obliterated. $npcName:11000015$ told me to leave the injured $npcName:11000119$ with him and to continue pursuing $npc:11000057$.

quest.name: The One That Got Away
quest.desc: $npc:11000703$, who was injured while pursuing $npc:11000057$, told me to return to the Defender's Alliance HQ and request for reinforcements to continue chasing $npc:11000057$.

quest.name: 어둠의 존재들
