quest.desc: Empress $npcName:11000075$ stated that she's discovered an entrance to $map:52010007$ in $map:02010034$. If the power of light is to be maintained by $npcName:11000735$, $npcName:11000735$ must be taken to $map:52010007$ immediately. Let's return to $map:02010053$ and relay the message to $npcName:11001216$.

quest.name: To Find the Power of the Light
quest.desc: $npcName:11001216$ said that he heard about $map:52010007$ before, and that he and his friends will take $npcName:11000735$ and meet me at $map:52010007$.

quest.name: The Secret of the Temple
quest.desc: Speaking on how the power of light was weakly connected in $map:52010007$, the empress spoke of the Irunba Sanctuary of Light in $map:02010055$, where the ancient Lumieragon elders gathered to discuss connection the light. Could the Rame Stone really be in $map:02010055$ as the empress said? If that is the case…with what intentions would someone have taken the Rame Stone to $map:02010055$? First, let's find the Nazkar Temple map to help locate $map:02010055$.
quest.manual: Defeat the monsters in the Nazkar Temple region and find the map of Nazkar

quest.name: To Find the Sanctuary of Light
quest.desc: Empress $npcName:11000075$, disappointed after seeing the $item:30000513$, hoped that one of the dragon knights, $npcName:11001216$, $npcName:11001218$, or $npcName:11001217$, would find and bring back the torn portion of the map.
quest.manual: Wait until the dragon knights return from $map:52010007$
quest.complete: Find the dragon knights who have gone to $map:02010029$

quest.name: Dungeon: What Moore Saw
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20018002$ (Entrance: $map:02010029$) Party Size (10 players)
Scout $npcName:11001483$ was hiding and shaking by the entrance to $map:02010055$, which was discovered in $map:02010029$! Although scared, due to scout habit she didn't take her eyes off the entrance to $map:02010055$. It's clear she saw the dragon knights $npcName:11001216$, $npcName:11001218$, and $npcName:11001217$, enter. Will the dragon knights be able to find the Rame Stone in $map:02010055$? Let's get to $map:02010055$ and meet them.
quest.manual: Go into $map:02010055$ and meet the dragon knights

quest.name: With Hope
quest.desc: Still hidden by the entrance to $map:02010055$, $npc:11001483$ explained that $npcName:11001216$ and his friends just came out of $map:02010055$ and ran off claiming they had to meet the empress. I remember before I left $map:52010007$, the empress said that as soon as the Rame Stone is taken from $map:02010055$, $map:52010007$ will disappear into the darkness. She said to return to $map:02010059$ once the Rame Stone is reclaimed.

quest.name: The Nightmare
quest.desc: They who followed the ancient Lumieragons and protected the royals: the Moropapa! $npc:11001314$'s granddaughter, $npcName:11001215$, shared that her grandfather has been suffering from a nightmare, where in the depths of Nazkar Temple a giant black dragon appears and the temple crumbles. For $npcName:11001215$, who is shaking with anxiety, let's get into Nazkar Temple and explore $map:02010029$ to see if anything has happened.

quest.name: Dungeon: Secrets of Lubelisk
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:2010055$ (Entrance: $map:02010029$) Party Size (10 players)
$npc:11001483$, hiding by the entrance to $map:02010055$, noted that $npcName:11001215$'s grandfather's nightmare may actually be true. $npc:11001483$ says that if I have the courage, I should into $map:02010055$ and find out what's going on.

quest.name: Through the Darkness
quest.desc: How long has it been since the dragon knights recovered the Rame Stone from $npcName:23000068$ for $npcName:11000735$, who's been inflicted with shadow poison…? From $npcName:11000076$ came the delightful news that $npcName:11000735$ left to find the sacred stone carrying an ancient Lumieragon martyr who can help her overcome the shadow poison and achieve her destiny as the Light's Descendant. However, this sacred stone of the ancient Lumieragon is being kept within $map:02010055$, the place $npcName:23000068$ and the Kargon troops took over… It will be too dangerous with only $npcName:11000735$ and the dragon knights… Let's follow $npcName:11000735$ and look for the $map:52010017$ entrance in $map:02010029$, which is an alternate route to $map:02010055$.

quest.name: Light Gathering
quest.desc: $npcName:11000735$, who I met in $map:52010017$, despite suffering from shadow poison, says she heard her mother's voice telling her that she needs to find the sacred stone of the ancient Lumieragon. Hearing Leila's voice could have been a miracle that rose from a mother's concern that her daughter may lose her life before fulfilling her destiny as the Light's Descendant… Let's help $npcName:11000735$ safely find the pieces of light in $map:52010017$!
quest.manual: Help $npcName:11000735$ find the pieces of light at $map:52010017$

quest.name: New Birth
quest.desc: It seems that $npcName:11000735$ and her friends were all sent to different locations when $npcName:11000735$ opened the path of light before the light's power was under control. With $npcName:11000075$, let's look for $npcName:11000735$'s party in $map:52010007$.
quest.manual: Wait for the birth of the Light's Descendant at $map:52010007$
quest.complete: Greet $npcName:11000735$, who was reborn as the Light's Descendant, at $map:52010007$

quest.name: Return with the Light
quest.desc: $npcName:11000735$, reborn as the Light's Descendant, went back to Drachenheim promising to return after defeating Drachenheim and freeing Lumieragon from the darkness with all of the Lumieragon's power intact.
quest.manual: At $map:52010007$, see $npcName:11000735$ off, who is returning to Drachenheim.

quest.name: [Dungeon] Puri's gift.
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001228$ is a who fairy who is collecting havi fruit outside the $map:02000350$! She provides gifts and services for warriors fighting the corruption of the $map:02000350$.
If you manage to make it deep enough inside, she'll give you a gift!

quest.name: 성난 호랑이
quest.desc: $map:02000001$의 $npc:11000160$$pp:가,이$ 골이 난 $npcName:11000003$$pp:를,을$ 달래주라고 부탁해왔다.

quest.desc: $map:02000001$ $npc:11000169$$pp:가,이$ 날 찾고 있다고 한다. 그를 만나보자.

quest.desc: 다크윈드 대장 $npcName:11000044$$pp:가,이$ 나를 찾고 있다고 한다. $map:02000100$ $map:02000152$$pp2:로,으로$ 가 보자.

quest.desc: 다크윈드 대장 $npcName:11000044$$pp:가,이$ 나를 찾고 있다고 한다. $map:02000100$ $map:02000152$$pp2:로,으로$ 가 보자.

quest.desc: $map:02000146$의 $npc:11000076$$pp:가,이$ 나를 찾고 있다고 한다. 그를 만나보자.

quest.name: 어둠 속 대피소
quest.desc: 어둠의 땅 $map:03009001$의 $npcName:11000804$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 해방군의 전갈
quest.desc: 어둠의 땅 $map:03000135$의 $map:03009022$에서 $npcName:11000613$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가 보자.

quest.name: Knightly Call
quest.desc: $npc:11000076$ of $map:02000146$ is said to be looking for me. I should meet with him.

quest.name: A Mysterious Atmosphere
quest.desc: $map:02000001$ $npc:11000119$ is said to be looking for me. I'll go meet him.

quest.desc: $map:02000001$ $npc:11000119$ is said to be looking for me. I'll go meet him.

quest.name: Disturbances
quest.desc: $npc:11000076$ of $map:02000146$ is said to be looking for me. I should meet with him.

quest.name: Dark Clouds
quest.desc: Did something happen in $map:02000190$?

quest.name: Palace Call
quest.desc: I'm told that the empress is waiting for me. What could it be…?

quest.name: The Empress's Determination
quest.desc: I'm told that the empress is waiting for me. What could it be…?

quest.name: Worrisome Heart
quest.desc: Did something happen in $map:02000190$?

quest.name: A Captain's Concern
quest.desc: $map:02000001$ $npc:11000119$ is said to be looking for me. I'll go meet him.

quest.name: Wolf Girl's Scorpion
quest.desc: Does $npc:11000136$ have something to tell me? Let's go to $map:02000051$.

quest.name: The New Ally
quest.desc: Is there new information from $map:02000228$ of $map:02000146$? Let's meet $npc:11000076$.

quest.name: Item Delivery
quest.desc: Did something happen in $map:02000190$?

quest.name: Mysterious People
quest.desc: I'm told that the empress is waiting for me. What could it be…?

quest.name: Unfamiliar Land, Happy News
quest.desc: $npc:11001309$ at Karkar Island's $map:02010002$ is said to be looking for me. I wonder why…?

quest.name: Unfamiliar Land, Unexpected News
quest.desc: Some familiar guards at Karkara Island $map:02010002$ are said to be looking for me.

quest.name: To Starts' Restaurant!
quest.desc: Let's go to $map:52010014$ at Karkar Island's $map:02010002$.

quest.name: To the Temorro Mud Hut!
quest.desc: Let's go find $map:52010011$ of Karkar Island's $map:02010023$

quest.name: Keeping Friends Waiting
quest.desc: Let's go to $map:52010014$ at Karkar Island's $map:02010002$.

quest.name: News of Friends
quest.desc: Let's go to $map:02010059$ of $map:02010002$.

quest.name: A Story of Them
quest.desc: $npc:11001309$ at Karkar Island's $map:02010002$ is said to be looking for me. I wonder why…?

quest.name: Teacher's Call
quest.desc: $npcName:11001229$'s teacher is looking for me. Let's go to $map:52000018$.

quest.name: 여관에서 온 소식
quest.desc: $npcName:11001229$ 스승님이 나를 찾고 있다. $map:52000018$$pp2:로,으로$ 가 보자.

quest.name: New Knowledge
quest.desc: $npcName:11001229$'s teacher is looking for me. Let's go to $map:52000018$.

quest.name: 초조한 걸음
quest.desc: $npcName:11001229$ 스승님이 나를 찾고 있다. $map:52000018$$pp2:로,으로$ 가 보자.

quest.name: 은밀한 연통
quest.desc: $map:02000031$의 $npc:11000005$$pp:가,이$ 나를 찾고 있다고 한다.

quest.name: 그녀의 해석, 하나
quest.desc: $map:02000361$에 머물고 있는 $npcName:11001280$$pp:가,이$ 나를 찾고 있다고 한다.

quest.name: Her Interpretation, Two
quest.desc: $npcName:11001280$, staying at $map:02000361$, is said to be looking for me.

quest.name: Her Interpretation, Three
quest.desc: $npcName:11001280$, staying at $map:02000361$, is said to be looking for me.

quest.name: A Good Feeling
quest.desc: $npcName:11001280$, staying at $map:02000361$, is said to be looking for me.

quest.name: 동태를 살펴라
quest.desc: 다크윈드 대원 $npc:11000215$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000139$에서 바로타 상단의 동태를 감시하고 있으라는 지령을 내렸다.

quest.name: 임무 수행 준비
quest.desc: $npc:11000208$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000153$에서 급히 돌아오라는 소식이 전달되었다며 어서 가 보라고 한다.

quest.name: Traces of Runes
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$ finished the decryption of one of the ancient books brought over from Calibre Island, and says he's found a clue that should bring them closer to finding the truth about the "Ultimate Transcendence." I should get to $map:02000129$ and look for any clues the ancient Runeblader ancestors may have left and return to $map:52000028$.
quest.manual: Search for clues in $map:02000129$ to find out the truth behind the Ultimate Transcendence
quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11000031$ at $map:52000028$, which is located to the southwest of $map:02000023$

quest.name: Hidden in the Book
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$ stated that through combining the $item:30000538$ we may be able to discover the history of how the ancient ancestors of the Runebladers collected the "Ultimate Transcendence" and find the method to restore its power. Let's watch $npcName:11000031$ combine $item:30000538$.
quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11001229$ at $map:52000028$, which is located to the southwest of $map:02000023$

quest.name: Road to the Rune
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$ told me to assist $npcName:11001229$, who is moving with the first group. She will join the second group after she assembles the expedition team and does a final inspection. Let's follow $npcName:11001229$ and move to $map:52000029$.
quest.manual: Go find $map:52000029$, located in $map:02000112$, and join $npcName:11001229$'s first group
quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11000032$ at $map:02000179$, which is located below $map:02000023$

quest.name: Loyalty of Starlight
quest.desc: $npcName:11000032$ was sad to hear about $npcName:11001229$, who has been the mental support for all the Runebladers. He says he will concentrate wholly on the recovery of $npcName:11001229$. He advised me to meet $npcName:11000031$ and ask him for advice on future steps.
quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11000031$ at $map:02000179$, which is located below $map:02000023$

quest.name: Asimov's Call
quest.desc: $npcName:11000033$ relayed the message that $npcName:11000031$ is urgently looking for me. Let's go find $npcName:11000031$ at $map:02000035$.

quest.name: Heavy Heart
quest.desc: Having heard that the Runeblade expedition was to arrive in $map:02000063$, $npcName:11000031$ was worried that they wouldn't be able to safely arrive due to the pirates in $map:02000063$. $npcName:11000031$ requested that I go to $map:02000063$ and check out the situation. I'll head to $map:02000063$ and check if the Runeblade expedition arrived safely.
quest.complete: Go to $map:02000063$ and figure out the situation inside $map:52000025$, which is located by the water in the direction of $map:02000067$

quest.name: Descendants in Danger
quest.desc: $npcName:11001567$ fell to the pirates' sudden attack. He requested that I help $npcName:11001229$ and the expedition team and defeat the pirates.
quest.manual: Help the expedition team and $npcName:11001229$ defeat the pirates

quest.name: A Tough Situation
quest.desc: $npcName:11001229$ requested that I go back to $npcName:11000031$ to relay the Runeblade expedition's situation, and to ask for support in moving the ancient book the Runerbladers left behind to $map:02000023$.

quest.name: Asimov's Wisdom
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$ requested that I deliver the command to dispatch a wizard who can decipher the ancient book to $npcName:11000042$ at $map:02000188$ of $map:02000001$, and then go to $npc:11000075$ and ask that a draft be issued to gather support for the guardians.
quest.complete: Relay the command of $npcName:11000031$ to $npcName:11000042$ at $map:02000001$ $map:02000188$

quest.name: Checking In
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ says that in order to deliver $npcName:11000031$'s command to $npcName:11000075$, I must first go meet $npcName:11000119$ and get permission to enter the palace.

quest.name: Asimov's Command
quest.desc: After hearing I've been sent to deliver $npcName:11000031$'s command to $npcName:11000075$, $npcName:11000119$ permitted me to enter the palace and meet the empress.

quest.name: The Place to Gain Trust
quest.desc: $npc:11000075$ said that she will issue a draft for every guardian representative, and that we should go to $map:52000026$, where everyone is gathered, to review the current situation. The entrance to $map:52000026$ can be found by the $map:02000119$ entrance, northwest of $map:02000001$, near the top of the palace walls.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000026$ through the $map:02000119$ palace wall, northwest of $map:02000001$, and observe the situation

quest.name: Reliable Time Management
quest.desc: $npcName:11000075$ says that she will provide the strength needed to gather everyone under one purpose, and has requested I return to $npcName:11000031$ in $map:02000023$ to relay the purpose of the palace.

quest.name: What Happened in Cheliska Bay
quest.desc: $npcName:11000043.$ has learned that everyone, including the adventurer from $map:02000001$, has been suffering in $map:02000063$ because of the pirates. She says to go to $map:02000063$ and defeat the pirates to help the people who are suffering.
quest.complete: Go to $map:02000063$ and help the people suffering from the pirates inside $map:52000025$ by the water in the $map:02000067$.

quest.name: Unexpected Situation
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$ has fallen from an injury inside $map:52000025$. He requested that I defeat the pirates to help $npcName:11001229$ and the expedition team.

quest.name: In That Moment
quest.desc: Before respectfully saying his good-byes, $npcName:11001229$ said that one day he will repay me for my kindness. Let's go back to $npcName:11000043$ and report everything that has happened in $map:02000063$.

quest.name: Their Extended Hands
quest.desc: $npcName:11000043$ told me to go to $map:52000026$ of $map:02000025$ to uncover the reason the guardian representatives have gathered upon the request of $npc:11000031$. The entrance to $map:52000026$ can be found by the $map:02000119$ entrance, northwest of $map:02000001$, toward the top part of the palace walls.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000026$ through the $map:02000119$ palace wall, northwest of $map:02000001$, and observe the situation

quest.name: An Act of Duty
quest.desc: Pushed by the principles of a priest and $npcName:11000031$'s purpose, $npcName:11000601$ has decided to join the Starlight Expedition. I am told to go to $map:02000023$ and meet $npcName:11000031$.

quest.name: Scum of the Sea
quest.desc: $npcName:11000041$ cried out in anger, having heard the news that fellow Berserkers were struck by the pirates at $map:02000063$. $npcName:11000041$ says to go immediately to $map:02000063$ and defeat the pirates to put the fear of the Berserker in their hearts.
quest.complete: Go to $map:02000063$ and defeat the pirates inside $map:52000025$ by the water in the $map:02000067$.

quest.name: Unforeseen Encounter
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$ has fallen from an injury inside $map:52000025$. He requested that I defeat the pirates to help $npcName:11001229$ and the expedition team.

quest.name: Pay It Forward
quest.desc: Before respectfully saying his good-byes, $npcName:11001229$ said that one day he will repay me for my kindness. Let's go back to $npcName:11000041$ and report everything that has happened in $map:02000063$.
quest.complete: Return and report to $npcName:11000041$ in $map:02000188$ of $map:02000001$

quest.name: Gathering at the Hall
quest.desc: $npcName:11000041$ told me to go to $map:52000026$ of $map:02000025$ to uncover the reason the guardian representatives have gathered upon the request of $npc:11000031$. The entrance to $map:52000026$ can be found by the $map:02000119$ entrance, northwest of $map:02000001$, toward the top part of the palace walls.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000026$ through the $map:02000119$ palace wall, northwest of $map:02000001$, and observe the situation

quest.name: The Berserker and the Loyalty
quest.desc: $npcName:11000041$, speaking calmly, said that as being a Berserker is founded upon loyalty, ignoring another guardian's plight is frowned upon. He will join the Starlight Expedition. As $npcName:11000041$ said, let's get to $map:02000023$ $map:02000035$ and meet $npcName:11000031$.

quest.name: Sudden Attack
quest.desc: $npcName:11000045$ said to go to the pirates' base in $map:02000063$ and defeat them, for the Green Hood eagle recon team was struck by the pirates in $map:02000063$.
quest.complete: Go to $map:02000063$ and defeat the pirates inside $map:52000025$ by the water in the $map:02000067$.

quest.name: Encounter of the Unexpected Kind
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$ has fallen from an injury inside $map:52000025$. He requested that I defeat the pirates to help $npcName:11001229$ and the expedition team.

quest.name: We've Got a Situation
quest.desc: Before respectfully saying his good-byes, $npcName:11001229$ said that one day he will repay me for my kindness. Let's go back to $npcName:11000045$ and report everything that has happened in $map:02000063$.
quest.complete: Return and report to $npcName:11000045$ in $map:02000188$ of $map:02000001$

quest.name: To the Banquet Hall!
quest.desc: $npcName:11000045$ told me to go to $map:52000026$ of $map:02000025$ to uncover the reason the guardian representatives have gathered upon the request of $npc:11000031$. The entrance to $map:52000026$ can be found by the $map:02000119$ entrance, northwest of $map:02000001$, toward the top part of the palace walls.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000026$ through the $map:02000119$ palace wall, northwest of $map:02000001$, and observe the situation

quest.name: Heart Cannot Be Ignored
quest.desc: After thinking long and hard, $npcName:11000015$ decided to join the Starlight Expedition, for he knew that if he ignored his allies his heart would be burdened for the rest of his life. $npcName:11000015$ said that he too will soon leave for $map:02000023$, and that I should go ahead to $map:02000023$ $map:02000035$ and meet $npcName:11000031$.

quest.name: Unwelcomed Guest
quest.desc: $npcName:11000040$ says to go to the pirates' base in $map:02000063$ and defeat them, for the knighthood was struck by the pirates in $map:02000063$.
quest.complete: Go to $map:02000063$ and defeat the pirates inside $map:52000025$ by the water in the $map:02000067$.

quest.name: Unbreakable Spirit
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$ has fallen from an injury inside $map:52000025$. He requested that I defeat the pirates to help $npcName:11001229$ and the expedition team.

quest.name: What They Faced
quest.desc: Before respectfully saying his good-byes, $npcName:11001229$ said that one day he will repay me for my kindness. Let's get back to $npcName:11000040$ at $map:02000001$ $map:02000188$ and report everything that has happened in $map:02000063$.

quest.name: Special Invitation
quest.desc: $npcName:11000040$ told me to go to $map:52000026$ of $map:02000025$ to uncover the reason the guardian representatives have gathered upon the request of $npc:11000031$. The entrance to $map:52000026$ can be found by the $map:02000119$ entrance, northwest of $map:02000001$, toward the top part of the palace walls.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000026$ through the $map:02000119$ palace wall, northwest of $map:02000001$, and observe the situation

quest.name: Chivalry
quest.desc: $npcName:11000119$ said that although the opinions of the Royal Guard are scattered, they ultimately decided to join the Starlight Expedition, and then told me to go to $map:02000023$ $map:02000035$ and meet $npcName:11000031$.

quest.name: 넌 겁 없던 녀석이었어!
quest.desc: $npcName:11000046$ is expressing the injustice of how the pirates at $map:02000063$ have struck the Heavy Gunners. $npcName:11000046$ says to go defeat the pirates at their base in Cheliska Bay.
quest.complete: Go to $map:02000063$ and defeat the pirates inside $map:52000025$ by the water in the $map:02000067$.

quest.name: An Unbelievable Scene
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$ has fallen from an injury inside $map:52000025$. He requested that I defeat the pirates to help $npcName:11001229$ and the expedition team.

quest.name: The Power of a Super Cannon?
quest.desc: Before respectfully saying his good-byes, $npcName:11001229$ said that one day he will repay me for my kindness. Let's go back to $npcName:11000046$ and report everything that has happened in $map:02000063$.

quest.name: Annoying…or Hilarious?
quest.desc: $npcName:11000046$ told me to go to $map:52000026$ of $map:02000025$ to uncover the reason the guardian representatives have gathered upon the request of $npc:11000031$. The entrance to $map:52000026$ can be found by the $map:02000119$ entrance, northwest of $map:02000001$, toward the top part of the palace walls.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000026$ through the $map:02000119$ palace wall, northwest of $map:02000001$, and observe the situation

quest.name: Up in the Air!
quest.desc: Believing it may be the perfect chance to test the newly acquired weapon, the super cannon, and to show off the blinding power of the Heavy Gunners, $npcName:11000046$ decided to join the Starlight Expedition. $npcName:11000046$ says to go to $map:02000023$ $map:02000035$ and meet $npcName:11000031$.

quest.name: These Rookies
quest.desc: $npcName:11000050$ says to go to the pirates' base in $map:02000063$ and defeat them for our Thief comrades who were hit by the pirates in $map:02000063$.
quest.complete: Go to $map:02000063$ and defeat the pirates inside $map:52000025$ by the water in the $map:02000067$.

quest.name: Injured Runeblader
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$ has fallen from an injury inside $map:52000025$. He requested that I defeat the pirates to help $npcName:11001229$ and the expedition team.

quest.name: Sincere Greetings
quest.desc: Before respectfully saying his good-byes, $npcName:11001229$ said that one day he will repay me for my kindness. Let's get back to $npcName:11000050$ at $map:02000188$ of $map:02000001$ and report everything that has happened in $map:02000063$.

quest.name: Walk Hard
quest.desc: $npcName:11000050$ told me to go to $map:52000026$ of $map:02000025$ to uncover the reason the guardian representatives have gathered upon the request of $npc:11000031$. The entrance to $map:52000026$ can be found by the $map:02000119$ entrance, northwest of $map:02000001$, toward the top part of the palace walls.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000026$ through the $map:02000119$ palace wall, northwest of $map:02000001$, and observe the situation

quest.name: Without a Choice
quest.desc: $npcName:11000050$ strongly disagrees in assisting other troops who offer no help of their own. However, the Thief troop leader, Jonathan Button, has commanded that they go support the expedition. And so it appears they've no choice but to join the Starlight Expedition. Let's go to $map:02000023$ $map:02000035$ and deliver the news to $npcName:11000031$.

quest.name: Outside of Interest
quest.desc: $npcName:11000051$ says there is an emergency at the palace and to get to $map:52000026$ immediately. $npc:11000051$ seems irritated and hopes it's not all a waste of time… The entrance to $map:52000026$ can be found by the $map:02000119$ entrance, northwest of $map:02000001$, toward the top part of the palace walls.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000026$ through the $map:02000119$ palace wall, northwest of $map:02000001$, and observe the situation

quest.name: Interest Is Poison
quest.desc: It wasn't something the assassin was part of, says $npcName:11000051$. Nevertheless, $npcName:11000006$ asked what the emergency was about. $npcName:11000051$ requested I go to $map:02000208$ in $map:02000166$ and relay what happened at the banquet hall to $npcName:11000006$.
quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11000006$ at $map:02000208$ located somewhere in $map:02000166$

quest.name: Individual Duty
quest.desc: $npcName:11000529$ shook his head nonchalantly at $npcName:11000051$'s words, and said an assassin just needs to do an assassin's job. $npc:11000529$ says I should help $npcName:11000051$, who was going to $map:52000027$ alone. A Humples member went undercover into Darkstar in order to reveal the link between $npc:11000065$ and $npcName:11000251$, but was caught and isolated in $map:52000027$. We must rescue him as well as acquire the evidence. Let's go to $map:52000027$ to help $npcName:11000051$ rescue the isolated Humples member.
quest.manual: Help $npcName:11000051$ at $map:52000027$ and secure the evidence

quest.name: A Courageous Act
quest.desc: $npcName:11000006$ says that $npcName:11000051$ took the Humples member and the Runeblader to the hospital. $npcName:11000006$ also says that the Humples member was able to stay alive before $npcName:11000051e$ got there because of the Runeblader. Touched by the courageous act of the Runeblader protecting one of his men, $npcName:11000006$ revealed that he will join the Starlight Expedition. $npcName:11000006$ says since $npcName:11000051$ left with the first group to $map:02000023$, I should hurry and go to $map:02000035$ of $map:02000023$ and meet with $npcName:11000031$.

quest.name: 뒷골목을 떠도는 루머
quest.desc: $npcName:11000515$$pp:는,은$ 최근 뒷골목의 어수선한 분위기에 심상찮은 낌새를 느끼고 알아본 바, $map:02000001$에서 여제의 명으로 각 세력 지도자들의 은밀한 집회가 있었다는 사실을 알아냈다고 한다. $map:02000001$ $map:02000188$에서 $npc:11000050$$pp:를,을$ 만나 은밀한 집회가 열린 이유를 알아보자.

quest.name: 전설 속 성전
quest.desc: $npc:11000050$$pp:는,은$ 룬 블레이더의 배신자 $npcName:11001231$$pp:를,을$ 막기 위해 모두가 힘을 보태 별빛 원정대를 꾸리게 된 사연을 말해준다. 그들이 $npcName:11001231$$pp:를,을$ 쫓아 가게 될 곳은 고대 $npc:23000078$이 잠들었다는 룬의 성전! $map:02000112$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 룬의 성전 입구를 찾아보자.

quest.name: 거친 파도에 밀려온 전설
quest.desc: $npcName:11000003$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000001$에서 각 세력 지도자들의 은밀한 집회가 있었다는 소문이 돌고 있다고 말한다. $map:02000001$에서 $npc:11000119$$pp:를,을$ 만나 은밀한 집회가 열린 이유를 알아보자.

quest.name: 베일에 가려진 성전
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$$pp:는,은$ 룬 블레이더의 배신자 $npcName:11001231$$pp:를,을$ 막기 위해 모두가 힘을 보태 별빛 원정대를 꾸리게 된 사연을 말해준다. 그들이 $npcName:11001231$$pp:를,을$ 쫓아 가게 될 곳은 고대 $npc:23000078$이 잠들었다는 룬의 성전! $map:02000112$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 룬의 성전 입구를 찾아보자.

quest.name: 차갑고도 따뜻한 그녀
quest.desc: $map:02000100$의 $map:52000044$에서 은밀히 보자고 말하는 $npcName:11001675$… 평소 그녀답지 않게 긴장한 듯 보이는데… 무슨 일일까?

quest.name: 음모의 실체
quest.desc: $map:52000044$에서 $npcName:11001733$$pp:와,과$ 대화하는 중 들이닥친 흑성회 조직원들! 조직원들을 따돌리고 차고까지 무사히 갈 수 있을까?

quest.name: 그들을 찾아서
quest.desc: $map:52000044$까지 뒤쫓아온 조직원들을 따돌리고 $npcName:11000779$로부터 $map:52000045$에 뒷골목 사람들이 갇혀 있다는 정보를 전해 들었다. $map:02000100$의 $map:52000044$에 정차되어 있는 차량을 타고 $map:52000045$$pp2:로,으로$ 이동하자!

quest.name: 꺾을 수 없는 의지
quest.desc: $npcName:11000779$$pp:는,은$ 걱정 가득한 얼굴로 $map:52000047$$pp2:로,으로$ 곧장 들어갈 수 있는 비밀통로를 알려준다. $map:02000138$에서 $map:02000156$$pp2:로,으로$ 들어가는 입구 주변에서 비밀통로로 연결되는 문을 찾아보자!
quest.manual: $map:02000138$에서 $map:02000156$ 입구 주변 비밀 통로를 통해 $map:52000047$ 찾아 들어가기

quest.name: 인내의 한계
quest.desc: $map:02000138$ $map:02000156$ 입구 주변 비밀통로를 통해 들어간 $map:52000047$에서 만난 $npcName:11000251$!! 그는 일말의 가책도 느끼지 않는 뻔뻔한 얼굴로 뒷골목 사람들의 목숨 따위는 중요하지 않다며 도발한다. 그의 뻔뻔함에 끓어오르는 분노를 주체할 수가 없다.
quest.manual: 흑성회 본부 $map:52000047$에서 $npcName:11000251$$pp:를,을$ 필두로 하는 흑성회 타파하기

quest.name: 은인이 전한 소식
quest.desc: $map:52000045$에서 목숨을 빚졌던 정체불명의 친구가 보낸 것으로 추측되는 한 통의 쪽지… 그 속에는 그토록 찾아 헤매던 뒷골목 사람들의 행방에 대한 단서가 적혀 있었다. $map:02000275$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 자세히 알아보자.

quest.name: 반갑고도 미묘한 그
quest.desc: $npcName:11000003$$pp:가,이$ 어울리지 않게 반가운 인사를 건넨다. 이 녀석… 내 사정을 알고 이러는 것일까…?

quest.name: 진심 어린 충고
quest.desc: $npcName:11000003$의 따끔한 충고에 정신이 번쩍 드는 것 같다. 아프고 무서워서 피하기만 하면 아무것도 해결되지 않는다. $map:03000145$의 $map:52000039$$pp2:로,으로$ 다시 돌아가서 진짜 진실이 무엇인지 똑바로 확인해보자.

quest.name: 멈출 수 없어!
quest.desc: 정신을 잃고 쓰러질 때마다 꿈인지 현실인지 구분되지 않는 그곳에서 만난 정체모를 그 녀석이 비욘드 링크에서 날 밀어낸 것 같다. 하지만 이대로 포기할 수는 없다. 그 녀석은 누구인지 또 나는 누구인지… 알아내야만 한다. $map:03000145$의 $map:52000039$$pp2:로,으로$ 다시 가 보자.

quest.name: 스승의 발자취
quest.desc: $map:52000040$에서 마치 스쳐가듯 보인 $npc:11001556$의 모습… 그 발자취를 따라 비욘드 링크 캡슐 속으로 들어가보자.
quest.manual: $map:52000040$에 있는 비욘드 캡슐을 통해 진실을 쫓아가기

quest.name: 다시 돌아오다
quest.desc: $map:52000049$에서 다시 만난 $npcName:11001557$$pp:는,은$ 다시 가이던스의 일원으로 받아주겠다는 뜻을 밝혔다. $npcName:11001557$$pp:와,과$ 함께 가이던스의 새로운 거처인 $map:52000050$$pp2:로,으로$ 가자.

quest.name: 수행길을 쫓아서
quest.desc: $map:02000101$에 새롭게 마련한 가이던스의 임시 거처 $map:52000050$에서 다시 만난 $npcName:11001558$! 꽤 오랜 시간이 지났지만 변함없는 모습이다.

quest.name: 성지를 찾아서
quest.desc: $map:52000050$$pp2:로,으로$ 날아들어온 새들을 통해 무나크라 수행길의 최종 목적지 입구가 $map:02000192$에 위치하고 있다는 사실을 알게 되었다. 신기를 찾고 가이던스에게 진 마음의 빚을 조금이나마 갚을 수 있는 기회다. $npcName:11001557$, $npcName:11001558$$pp:를,을$ 따라 $map:02000192$$pp2:로,으로$ 가자.

quest.name: 인도자의 등불
quest.desc: $map:02000192$에서 인도자의 성지 입구를 찾은 것 같다. 안쪽에서 $npcName:11001558$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:11001557$의 목소리가 들려오는 것 같은데… 안으로 들어가보자!
quest.complete: 인도자의 성지 가장 안 쪽에 위치한 $map:52000053$에서 $npcName:11001556$$pp:와,과$ 대화하기

quest.name: 운명의 계시
quest.desc: $map:52000053$에서 재회한 $npc:11001556$$pp:는,은$ $map:52000050$에서 기력을 회복하라며 $npcName:11001557$, $npcName:11001558$$pp:와,과$ 함께 $map:52000050$$pp2:로,으로$ 이동시켜주었다. 이곳에서 빛나는 돌을 살펴보면 다음 해야 할 일을 알 수 있을 거라고 했는데…

quest.name: 그 길을 따라 떠나다
quest.desc: 운명의 계시를 따라 $map:02000275$$pp2:로,으로$ 떠나기 전에 $npcName:11001559$의 수하들에게 끌려간 사람들에 대한 소식을 $map:52000045$에서 만났던 의문의 괴인에게 전해줘야 할 것 같다. $map:52000050$에서 지저귀고 있는 새들에게 부탁해보자.
quest.manual: $map:02000101$에 위치한 $map:52000050$에 있는 새들에게 소식 전달 부탁하기

quest.name: 보로보로 구출 일기
quest.desc: $map:02000100$의 $npcName:11000424$$pp:는,은$ 환청인지 저 멀리 어디선가 어린 아이의 울음소리가 자꾸만 들려온다고 한다. 손녀딸을 잃고 슬픔에 멍울진 마음 때문일까… 할머니의 귓가에 들려오는 울음소리의 주인공은 누구일까? 울음소리가 이끄는대로 발길을 돌려보자.

quest.name: 자연으로 돌아가다
quest.desc: $map:02000100$의 $npcName:11000233$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000167$의 $dungeonTitle:25001001$에서부터 풍겨오는 고약한 냄새에 얼굴을 잔뜩 찌푸리며 고통을 호소한다. 아름답던 정원에 도대체 무슨 일이 일어난 것일까?

quest.name: 어둠 속 거래
quest.desc: $map:02000203$에서 상점을 운영하고 있는 $npc:11000623$$pp:는,은$ 최근들어 활개치고 있는 장물 거래 때문에 시장 균형이 깨지고 있다며, 공공연히 장물 거래가 이뤄지는 장소로 알려진 $dungeonTitle:21005001$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 소문이 사실인지 알아봐 달라고 부탁해왔다.

quest.name: 자유의 날개
quest.desc: $map:02000146$에서 수호군 지원 활동을 하고 있는 $npc:11000007$! 난감한 얼굴로 어릴 때부터 자신을 돌봐줬던 고마운 $npcName:11001835$ 아저씨네 양계장에 있던 닭들이 모두 사라졌다며 자리를 비울 수 없는 자기 대신 $map:02000087$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npcName:11001835$$pp:를,을$ 도와달라는 부탁을 해왔다.

quest.name: 흉포한 경비병
quest.desc: $map:02000146$에서 수호군 활동을 하고 있는 $npcName:11000009$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000023$에서부터 들려오는 흉흉한 소문을 전해주며, $map:02000023$의 요정들을 공포로 몰아넣고 있는 흉포한 경비병 $npc:23000039$$pp:를,을$ 처치하고 오라는 권유를 한다.

quest.name: 위험한 숨바꼭질
quest.desc: $map:02000146$에서 수호군 지원 활동을 하고 있는 $npc:11000007$! $map:02000023$ 숲에서 놀던 아이들이 반나절이 넘도록 집에 돌아오지 않고 있다는 소식을 전하며 곧장 $dungeonTitle:25004001$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 아이들을 찾아 무사히 집으로 돌려보내 달라고 말한다.

quest.name: Revealed Identity
quest.desc: A member of the Red Cape has infiltrated $map:02000025$ and kidnapped $npc:11000074$. There is no time to wait for the Royal Guard to be summoned, for $npc:11000074$'s life may be in danger. Let's hurry to $dungeonTitle:21004001$ and rescue the minister.

quest.name: Protect the Barrier of Life
quest.desc: $npc:11000031$ at $map:02000023$ $map:02000035$ intuits that the barrier of life is in danger from the dark energy coming from the east part of the forest. Let's go to $dungeonTitle:21002001$, located deep in the $map:02000023$ eastern forest, and cleanse the darkness!
quest.complete: Follow the open road at $map:02000066$, go inside $map:02000179$, and speak with $npcName:11000032$

quest.name: Honest Logs
quest.desc: $npc:11000136$ of $map:02000051$, having shared that an eagle from distant seas came and delivered news of ghost pirates, expressed curiosity in regards to the secret logs that could potentially reveal the identity of the pirate captain.
quest.manual: Defeat $npc:23000015$ in the $dungeonTitle:20010001$ dungeon and acquire $item:39000032$

quest.name: The Secret of the Clocktower
quest.desc: $npc:11000039$, having a memorial service in $map:02000049$, said that an ominous energy was felt from the northwest skies, and that I should observe it before something bad occurs.

quest.name: Real Friendship
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$ says to go find Katramus, whom $npcName:11000006$$ mentioned, and bring back every clue that could help find Lennon or Eve.

quest.name: End of a Long Parting
quest.desc: Join $npcName:11000006$ in the $dungeonTitle:21017001$ slave rescue.

quest.name: Turn Back Time!
quest.desc: $npc:11000003$ of $map:02000001$, sharing the story of the $map:02000309$ robbery incident, said with confidence that the culprit who stole the time key had to have gone to $dungeonTitle:21008001$. Could $npc:11000003$'s assumption be right? Let's go to $dungeonTitle:21008001$ and check it out.

quest.name: To the Highlands
quest.desc:
The forces of darkness have set their sights on the Seven Heroes. The only two who remain in the public eye are $npc:11000134$ and $npcName:11000601$. It's up to you and Allon to keep them safe from the so-called "ragged wraith."
Head to $map:02000051$ and protect $npcName:11000134$.

quest.name: The Warrior's Test
quest.desc: $npcName:11003421$ refuses to let you into $map:02000051$ without passing his test. Go to $map:02000010$ and vanquish the $npcNamePlural:21090102$ and $npcNamePlural:21000088$.

quest.name: After the Attack
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000134$ joined the war party that's tracking down the mysterious figure in rags who attacked town. Meet with the town shaman, $npcName:11000039$, and warn her of the danger.
If you leave by mistake, talk to $npcName:11000289$ in $map:02000051$ to return to $map:52010033$.

quest.name: Wolf Girl
quest.desc: $npcName:11000039$ is off looking for medicine to treat all the wounded. She's left $npcName:11000136$ behind to watch the hospital in the meantime, but it seems like she has something to ask you…

quest.name: Shells of Wellness
quest.desc:
The shell of $npcName:21000267$ can be used as a medicine to treat the injured. These critters like to live near the lava flows in places like $map:02000010$.
Gather some for $npcName:11000136$. It's not like you have more pressing business.

quest.name: Honorary Doctor
quest.desc: $npcName:11000136$ wants you to use her medicine to treat the injured. You're not a doctor, but what have you got to lose?

quest.name: Perion Persistence
quest.desc: You've finally found a responsible adult. Tell $npcName:11000039$ about your business in $map:02000051$.

quest.name: The Missing Warriors
quest.desc: $npcName:11003422$ says that the war party was ambushed. You should look for more survivors.

quest.name: The Casualty
quest.desc: You found $npcName:11003423$ from the war party, but she's badly hurt. Find something nearby that you can use to treat her wounds.

quest.name: Path of War
quest.desc: In spite of your best efforts, $npcName:11003423$ was too wounded to save. Before she passed away, she said that the war party was headed for the $map:02000048$.

quest.name: The Interlopers
quest.desc: You met $npcName:11000541$ at the $map:02000048$. She seems to know something about the war party, but she refuses to say anything until someone does something about the $npcNamePlural:21000065$, $npcNamePlural:21090082$, and $npcNamePlural:21091082$.

quest.name: End of the Chase
quest.desc: The war party should still be at $map:02000046$. But they were ambushed, and now monsters are closing in on the area. You need to find $npcName:11000134$ before something happens to him.
quest.complete: Search for $npcName:11000134$ at the top of $map:02000046$

quest.name: Burning Clue
quest.desc: $npcName:11000134$'s trail ends at the top of $map:02000046$. Where did $npcName:11000134$ and $npcName:11000009$ vanish to? It seems the nearby torches have been lit recently. Perhaps you should see what happens when you relight them.
quest.manual: Light the first torch |Light the second torch |Light the third torch |Light the fourth torch
quest.complete: Search the hidden temple at the top of $map:02000046$

quest.name: Inside the Hourglass
quest.desc:
You found the entrance to a hidden temple at the top of $map:02000046$. There's a good chance that $npcName:11000134$ and $npcName:11000009$ are inside.
If you leave by mistake, examine the $npc:11003430$ in $map:02000046$ to return.

quest.name: Son of the Chief
quest.desc: $npcName:11000134$ attacked his own son, $npcName:11000009$. What could have caused him to do so? Since both father and son are unconscious, talk to $npcName:11000009$ in $map:52010033$.

quest.name: The Mysterious Woman
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000009$ isn't sure what happened to $npcName:11000134$. The so-called ragged wraith seems to be involved, along with a mysterious woman.
If $npcName:11000134$'s mind is being controlled, who is doing it… and how?

quest.name: Returned from Darkness
quest.desc: $npcName:11000039$ seems especially distressed after hearing what $npcName:11000009$ had to say. She's asked you to meet her in $map:52010034$.

quest.name: A Secret Treatment
quest.desc: $npcName:11000039$ is convinced that the attack on Perion was led by the Inakimo, a tribe that vanished into the Land of Darkness a generation ago. She's seen their magic before, and she thinks she knows how to treat $npcName:11000134$'s illness. Gather $item:30000864$ from $map:02000095$.

quest.name: The Sleepy Witch
quest.desc: $npcName:11000039$'s medicine will stop $npcName:11000134$ from getting any worse, but it's not a true cure. $npcName:11000746$, the witch of the $map:02000103$ in Ellinia, knows many rituals to purify dark magic. Seek her out.

quest.name: A Divine Being
quest.desc: The ritual to cure the war chief requires pure, divine energy—and, as a witch, $npcName:11000746$ doesn't have access to that kind of energy. However, the unicorns of $map:02000053$ may be able to help.

quest.name: Unicorn Rescue Party
quest.desc: $npcName:11000027$, the unicorn you met in $map:02000053$, is in dire need of your help. All of his unicorn friends have been transformed by dark magic. You'll need those unicorns' help if you're going to save $npcName:11000134$…
quest.manual: Purify the $npcNamePlural:21000109$ by beating them up

quest.name: Aura of Light
quest.desc: $npcName:11000027$ and his friends have granted you the aura of light you need to save $npcName:11000134$. Return to $npc:11000039$ in $map:52010032$.

quest.name: The Light of Hope
quest.desc: The ritual successfully purified $npcName:11000134$ of darkness, but…

quest.name: The Guardian of Perion
quest.desc:
Even though the purification ritual was successful, the curse on $npcName:11000134$ returned moments later. $npc:11000039$ suspects that the Inakimo have found a way to corrupt $npcName:11003392$, a guardian golem who shares a magical bond with the war chiefs of $map:02000051$.
$npcName:11003391$ was sent to scout out $map:52010029$ and never returned. Go there and save both him and $npcName:11003392$ from the Inakimo's clutches!
quest.manual: Go to the $map:52010029$ via $map:52010031$, then save $npcName:11003392$ and $npcName:11003391$

quest.name: Perion's Coldest Heart
quest.desc: You had a… falling out with $npcName:11003391$ in $map:52010029$. How are you going to win him back over to your side?

quest.name: A Quick Apology
quest.desc:
Nothing says "I'm sorry" like a gift that you obtained for free. Give some incense to $npcName:11003391$ so that he forgives you for your earlier disagreement.
$npcName:11000289$ should be able to get you to $npc:11003391$'s house.

quest.name: House Visit
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000289$ says that $npcName:11003391$ looks depressed. Go to $npcName:11003391$'s house in $map:52010027$ and leave your gift.
If you leave by mistake, talk to $npcName:11000289$ in $map:02000051$ to return.

quest.name: A Gift Left Behind
quest.desc: You just missed $npcName:11003391$. Break into his house and leave your apology gift for him to find later.

quest.name: A Bad Turn
quest.desc: There's something happening outside. You're certain you hear screaming. Go outside to $map:52010027$ and see what's happening.

quest.name: Suspect Victory
quest.desc:
You encountered $npcName:11003431$, chief of the Inakimo, in $map:52010027$. But where has he vanished to? And who is this viper he mentioned?
For now, hurry back to $map:02000051$.

quest.name: An Unexpected Raid
quest.desc:
You've returned to $map:02000051$ to find it under attack by the Inakimo. It seems that $npcName:11003431$ was a diversion…
$npcName:11000289$ will get the civilians to safety. You need to get to $map:52010031$ to join forces with $npcName:11000078$ and $npcName:11000009$.

quest.name: Save the Guardian
quest.desc:
$map:02000051$ won't be able to survive another attack if the Inakimo manage to take control of $npcName:11003392$'s golems. While $npcName:11000078$ and $npcName:11000009$ fight off the main Inakimo force, you need to sneak off to $map:02000313$ and save $npcName:11003392$ from its captivity.
Use the secret passage to get there.

quest.name: The War Chief's Mission
quest.desc: Go to $map:02000313$ through the $npcName:11003468$ in $map:52010031$ and rescue $npcName:11003392$ from the Inakimo.

quest.name: Looking Forward
quest.desc: After a long battle, $npcName:11000134$, $npcName:11000078$, and $npcName:11003392$ fell to protect $map:02000051$. $npcName:11000039$ blames herself for not doing enough to save them.

quest.name: A New Chief for a New Age
quest.desc: The new war chief of $map:02000051$, $npcName:11003457$, has pledged to support the battle against the darkness.

quest.name: To a Deeper Place
quest.desc: $npcName:11004577$ says you can finally explore beyond $map:02020036$. What is beyond $map:02020036$? Hurry over to $map:02020036$ and find out.

quest.name: Optimal Scout
quest.desc: You were at a loss since everyone pointed at you as the optimal scout, but you decided to go beyond $map:02020036$ to live up to their expectation. $npcName:11004582$ asked you to investigate $map:02020066$ which was discovered during the initial exploration… Move out to investigate $map:02020066$ and defeat the interfering Kharon.

quest.name: New Place, New Encounter
quest.desc: $npcName:11004571$ was surprised that you came from beyond $map:02020036$, and was surprised again that you defeated the Kharon to come here. When you asked about this place, $npcName:11004571$ told you to go see their leader, $npcName:11004574$. However, he told you to not mention Humanitas to $npcName:11004574$. What is the reason for that? For now, go see $npcTitle:11004574$.

quest.name: Tightly Closed Mind
quest.desc: You tried to explain the situation by meeting the refugee leader, but $npcName:11004574$ expressed strong hostility after hearing the word Humanitas. $npcName:11004574$ asked what Humanitas did for them when the Daemon Army appeared and they couldn't move anywhere. You objected that Humanitas had difficulty fighting on two fronts, but $npcName:11004574$ didn't listen. This won't do. You need to help the refugees to turn around $npcName:11004574$'s mind.

quest.name: Leader's Recommendation
quest.desc: $npcName:11004574$ finally opened up. When you asked for details on this place, she tells you the existence of $npcTitle:11004576$ who knows all the rumors in this vicinity. She even wrote you a recommendation as if feeling sorry for everything that happened. Take the recommendation and go see $npcTitle:11004576$.

quest.name: Paying the Price
quest.desc: There was nothing $npcTitle:11004576$ didn't know! Just a brief conversation and $npcTitle:11004576$ knew you are looking for $npcName:11004430$, but he asked for something in return. $npc:11004576$ asked for an item instead of the information fee when you gave the puppy dog eyes. Bring $item:30001349$ that he wants.

quest.name: Information Dealer's Intuition
quest.desc: $npc:11004576$ said many materials are being transported to $map:02020067$ recently. His intuition says something is being built in $map:02020067$. Trust in his intuition and go to $map:02020067$ to check for anything suspicious.
quest.manual: Use the binoculars to check for anything suspicious in $map:02020067$

quest.name: New Place, Joyful Encounter
quest.desc: The facility looks very suspicious, but no action can be taken as the facts haven't been grasped yet. It would be great if there was more information… Go to $npcTitle:11004576$ for now and ask for other information.

quest.name: Importance of Information
quest.desc: $npcName:11004576$ said the facility is related to Tairen's newest weapon, Arkeon. $npcName:11004576$ said Arkeon has tremendous power and it will be dangerous if it falls into the hands of $npcName:11004430$. You are about to go when he suggests a great idea since it's impossible to go barehanded. $npcName:11004576$ said you will know how to control Arkeon if you go to $map:02020035$ and obtain the blueprint. Now go and obtain the blueprint.

quest.name: Learned Hacking Through Errands
quest.desc: You need to go inside the factory to obtain the blueprint, but the entrance is hidden. $npcName:11004580$ and $npcName:11004579$ said you need to hack in this situation… You should give it a try.

quest.name: Security System in Operation
quest.desc: The robot guide inside the factory said Arkeon's blueprint is further inside. However, the facility's security has to be shut down to proceed inside… Go in for now since you don't really have any methods.

quest.name: Clash! Arkeon
quest.desc: You met $npcName:11004584$ and handed the blueprint, but he was stubborn saying he didn't need it. You suggested going together to defeat Arkeon, but $npcName:11004584$ firmly refused. When you persuaded him that he doesn't know the place, he changed his mind and promised to go together. All that's left is to defeat Arkeon.

quest.name: Unidentified Energy Source
quest.desc: $npc:11004577$ found out that $npcName:11004430$ is commanding the Daemon Army from $map:02020071$ which is beyond $map:02020070$. But she is hesitant to go through the gateway towards $map:02020071$ as an unidentified energy source was detected there. You will need to see this energy source with your eyes for everyone's sake. $npcName:11004584$ wanted to go as well, but you asked $npcName:11004582$ to lead the way since he doesn't know much about Kritias yet. $npcName:11004582$ felt very grateful. Wonder why? You are curious, but you need to check out the energy source and teach the interfering monsters a lesson.

quest.name: Relic of the Past
quest.desc: You suddenly felt a great tremor while you were defeating the interfering enemies. What is this tremor?

quest.name: Side Effect of Learning
quest.desc: $npcName:11004582$ saw the photo taken in $map:02020070$ and said the unidentified energy source is $npcName:11004684$, a weapon that used to guard Tairen in the past. $npcName:11004582$ said it was a superior weapon that guarded the kingdom from the front, but it became sentient through repeated learning and was discarded by $npcName:11004575$. Listen carefully to what she is saying.

quest.name: Trusting You
quest.desc: $npcName:11004582$ said they would need to consider retreating, but you can't do that when you came this far. You will stop $npcName:11004684$ and enter $map:02020071$.

quest.name: Dignity of Royalty
quest.desc: $npcName:11004684$ always has a barrier protecting itself, but that barrier gets removed when before royalty. $npcName:11004582$ tells you to defeat $npcName:11004684$ with her, but $npcName:11004583$ is vehemently against it. $npcName:11004583$ said they should make an aetherine disruptor instead to trick $npcName:11004684$. The problem is there's no way to obtain $item:30001350$ which is a material to make the aetherine disruptor… $npcName:11004583$ said refugees who were recently expelled from Tairen might have $item:30001350$. Go see $npcName:11004574$ for now.

quest.name: Getting Material
quest.desc: $npcName:11004574$ said the refugees don't have that material, but the Tairen soldiers in $map:02020066$ might have $item:30001350$. While you obtain the material, teach those Tairen soldiers observing the refugees a lesson.

quest.name: Decisive Battle! Timaion
quest.desc: Now, all preparations are complete. Let's go and defeat $npcName:11004684$!

quest.name: Ambiguous Feeling
quest.desc: You finally arrived in $map:02020071$. The moment you decided to enter, you felt an ominous aura. What is the identity of this aura?

quest.name: Prepare to Charge!
quest.desc: The sudden appearance of $npcName:11004430$ made it chaotic, but $npcName:11004577$ said to focus on the important task and that is to apprehend $npcName:11004430$. $npcName:11004577$ suggested that should split into 2 routes to charge in. Thorough preparation must be made for this important battle.

quest.name: Moment to End the Ill-fated Relationship
quest.desc: All preparations are done. Now it's time to end the long ill-fated relationship with $npcName:11004430$.

quest.name: The Final Battle
quest.desc: There is nothing to fear when you are with everyone. The moment to defeat $npcName:11004430$ has come.

quest.name: Her Reason
quest.desc: The shocking truth that $npcName:11004430$ was a robot and the Tairen forces drawing near. It was a dangerous situation, but everyone was able to survive due to the dramatic appearance of $npcName:11004603$. What was $npcName:11004603$ doing after parting ways? Hear the details from her.

quest.name: Shocking Truth
quest.desc: $npcName:11004430$ was a clone made by $npcName:11004575$ to break the seal on Kritias. Everyone became silent at the shocking truth that $npcName:11004430$, one of the Seven Commanders of $npcName:11004613$ who troubled Maple World for a long time, was a robot and born in Kritias. But there is no time to gape. Although the situation is like this, there must be something that can be done.

quest.name: Marlene's Gift
quest.desc: $npcName:11004609$ prepared a small gift thanking you for the help in driving out the Daemon Army from this land. What could the gift be? Go and ask.

quest.name: Back to Maple World
quest.desc: $npcName:11004609$'s gift was a letter proclaiming the amicable alliance between Humanitas and the Maple Alliance. $npcName:11004604$ says the letter should be delivered to Empress $npcName:11004390$. It's finally time to return to Maple World.

quest.name: A New Goal
quest.desc: Life in Kritias was difficult, but it was a precious time where you met $npcName:11004609$ and $npcName:11004603$. $npcName:11004390$ is proud of everyone. Now it's time to move forward with a new goal.

quest.name: Everything as Planned
quest.desc: How much does $npcName:11004613$ know about Kritias? Did he know $npcName:11004430$ was a robot? How will he react to $npcName:11004430$'s death? You're curious what $npcName:11004613$ is thinking right now.

quest.name: An Unexpected Request
quest.desc:
It's $npcName:11004520$, the pilot in charge of the $map:02020041$ airship...
What's going on? If it's regarding my work in Kritias, there is only so much I can tell you.
Ever since my adventures in Maple World, something bad has always happened when someone calls for me. Perhaps this time will be an exception.

quest.name: Guard's Troubles
quest.desc:
Fortunately, it doesn't seem like a big deal. If it's just $npcName:11000169$, a guard in $map:02000001$, it can't be something too important.
As $npcName:11004520$ said, tell him "Don't worry, go!".

quest.name: Dark Blue Light
quest.desc:
A dark blue light...? Unlike anywhere else, $map:02000001$ is the home of the Royal Palace and the Royal Guard. It is not a place where external threats can easily penetrate.
If the guards didn't report it to their superiors and told me instead, it's because they might be unsure of what they saw... but what is this ominous feeling?
quest.manual: Take a look at $map:02000001$ with the binoculars

quest.name: Where rumors gather
quest.desc:
I looked through the telescope, but I couldn't find anything.
No dark blue lights that $npcName:11000169$ spoke of and, of course, $map:02000001$ was as peaceful as usual.
$npcName:11000318$ may be right. If there is something going on here, people may already be spreading rumors about it.

quest.name: Rumors of Tria
quest.desc:
Every insignia hanging on the walls of $map:02000001$ bears these words: All light comes from the Empress.
These rumors of dark blue lights in $map:02000001$ could be insulting to the Empress. The truth behind them should be clarified.

quest.name: Appear, Dark Matter
quest.desc:
It appeared? What the hell could appear in $map:02000001$? Multiple people are saying Sudas is out of his mind.
This time, I must see what it really is.
quest.manual: Investigate the $npcName:11004727$ that suddenly appeared in $map:02000001$
quest.complete: Investigate the $npcName:11004727$ that suddenly appeared in $map:02000001$

quest.name: Revealed Threat
quest.desc:
I finally encountered with the Dark Matter. What everyone was talking about actually existed here in $map:02000001$.
All light comes from the Empress. Then what is the meaning of the darkness that appears here, where the Empress's palace is located?
quest.manual: Go to the front of the $map:02000001$ Armory where $npcName:11000169$ is
quest.complete: Go to the front of the $map:02000001$ Armory where $npcName:11000169$ is

quest.name: A Private Invitation
quest.desc:
The time has come...? $npc:11004778$'s reaction is making me more anxious.
$npc:11004778$'s office is no place for chit chatting. Asking me to come there obviously means that this is a serious matter for the royal palace.

quest.name: The Empress's Dream
quest.desc:
Meanwhile, at the same time in the $map:52000193$, $npc:11000075$ was also drowsy with worries about the dark blue light. For $npc:11000075$, the symbol of light and light itself, this strange phenomenon in $map:02000001$ could not not be a source of worries.
Even without anyone professing, the royal family could still see that the appearance of a strange figure in $map:02000001$ was related to the safety of $npcTitle:11000075$ $npc:11000075$ or, at least, Maple World.

quest.name: Prime Minister's Anxiety
quest.desc:
$npc:11004727$ appeared in $map:02000001$ and everyone in the royal family is trembling with anxiety. $npc:11004782$, in particular, was reassuring the empress, but seemed to be more concerned about the situation than anyone else.
What does $npc:11004778$ think about this?

quest.name: Erased Hero
quest.desc:
$npc:11004778$ talked about one of the Seven Heroes, now the Dark One.
$npc:11004744$, a friend of the great hero $npc:11001812$ and formerly one of the Seven Heroes. He said he was detained in the $map:52000189$.
Why is he locked up in a place where criminals and traitors are imprisoned?

quest.name: An Unspeakable Decision
quest.desc:
I have been asked to kill $npcName:11004744$. $npc:11004778$ deems him a traitor.
However, it is difficult to imagine killing a hero who was once one of the Seven Heroes and helped the Empress in the past. Even if it is $npc:11004778$'s wish...

quest.name: Prison Tower
quest.desc:
I answered that I would try to fulfill $npc:11004778$'s request for the sake of $map:02000001$, but I'm still confused. Would it be right of me to take $npcName:11004744$'s life?
I'll leave my confusion behind, find the key and head to the $map:52000189$ in $map:02000001$. If I met $npcName:11004744$, wouldn't I be able to get a clue like a ray of light in this chaos? Or maybe it would be right to follow $npc:11004778$'s orders and kill him.
quest.manual: Take the $item:30001479$ from the flower pot in the $map:02000065$
quest.complete: Find $npc:11004792$ on the bottom floor of the $map:52000189$ in $map:02000001$

quest.name: Hero's Shadow
quest.desc:
I can already feel from here a powerful energy radiating from $npcName:11004744$. $npc:11004778$ told me to get rid of him... but maybe he overestimated me.
Will I be able to deal with him?
quest.manual: Punish $npc:11004793$ in $map:52000191$, in the bottom of $map:52000189$ in $map:02000001$
quest.complete: Have a calm conversation with $npc:11004793$ in $map:52000191$, in the bottom of $map:52000189$ in $map:02000001$

quest.name: Conflicting Truth
quest.desc:
강력한 마력의 결계 속에서 $npcName:11004744$$pp:는,은$ 무언가 할 말이 많아 보인다. 오랜 세월 속박에서도 그는 진실을 갈구하는 눈을 하고 있다.
속박되어 있는 상태에서 아무 것도 할 수 없는 이자를 죽여야 한다면 굳이 지금이 아니어도 괜찮을 것이다. 어쩐지 그의 이야기에 귀 기울이게 된다.
quest.manual: Have a calm conversation with $npc:11004793$ in $map:52000191$, in the bottom of $map:52000189$ in $map:02000001$
quest.complete: Have a calm conversation with $npc:11004793$ in $map:52000191$, in the bottom of $map:52000189$ in $map:02000001$

quest.name: Confusing Times
quest.desc:
A traitor taken by the darkness that tried to harm the Empress, is now creating Dark Matter from his prison to attempt to injure her once again. That is the truth of $npcName:11004744$ I heard from $npc:11004778$. But $npcName:11004744$ tells a different story.
A loyal counsellor who sacrificed himself to end the war against darkness and headed to the Land of Darkness to seal the lapenta. Or perhaps just a traitor... What is the truth?
quest.manual: Have a calm conversation with $npc:11004793$ in $map:52000191$, in the bottom of $map:52000189$ in $map:02000001$
quest.complete: Have a calm conversation with $npc:11004793$ in $map:52000191$, in the bottom of $map:52000189$ in $map:02000001$

quest.name: An Unexpected Encounter
quest.desc:
The treacherous, or loyal $npcName:11004744$. In a situation where the truth is unknown, more clues must be obtained.
His words to go to the Door of Light let us know that his truth remains in the past. Maybe the truth remains where he headed to seal the darkness. Let's go to the Door of Light... that we now call the $map:02000146$.
quest.manual: Take a closer look at the $npc:11004803$ in $map:02000146$|Listen closely to the $npc:11004803$ in $map:02000146$|Touch $npc:11004803$ at its core in $map:02000146$
quest.complete: Talk to $npcName:11004795$ at the center of the $map:02000146$

quest.name: 선택의 기로
quest.desc:
진실을 알아야 하는 이유는, 단순히 호기심을 풀고자 함이 아니다. $npc:11004778$의 명령만 듣고 $npcName:11004744$$pp:를,을$ 처단할 수는 없기 때문이다.
누군가의 목숨을 빼앗는다는 것, 그 일에는 그만큼의 무게가 있다. 진실을 알고 선택해야 한다. 그것이 죽음에 대한 예의다.
반드시, 진실을 밝혀야 한다.
(맵 이탈시 $map:02000146$의 $npcName:11004795$$pp:를,을$ 통해 재진입 가능)

quest.name: 또 하나의 진실
quest.desc:
진실에 다가왔음을 직감으로 알 수 있다. $npc:11004778$에게 들은 진실, 또는 $npcName:11004744$에게 들은 진실.
그리고 여기 또 한 사람이, 진실에 대해 이야기하고 있다.
(맵 이탈시 $map:02000146$의 $npcName:11004795$$pp:를,을$ 통해 재진입 가능)
quest.manual: $map:52000199$에서 $npcName:11004798$의 이야기 끝까지 듣기 <font color="#909090">맵 이탈시 $map:02000146$의 $npcName:11004795$$pp:를,을$ 통해 재진입 가능</font>

quest.name: 권력자의 얼굴
quest.desc:
어둠의 물질에서 시작된 이 혼란은 먼 과거의 이야기로 거슬러 간다.
$npcName:11004744$$pp:과,와$ 함께 목숨을 바쳐서라도 라펜타 봉인을 하려 했다는 $npc:11001812$, $npcName:11003894$. $npc:11004778$$pp:는,은$ 이들을 여제의 안위를 위협하며 $map:02000001$에 어둠의 물질을 생성하고 있는 반역자라고 이야기한다. 하지만, $npc:11001812$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:11004744$의 이야기에는 나름의 일관성이 있었고 그들의 눈빛에는 진실을 말하고 있는 비장함이 엿보였다. $npc:11004778$$pp:는,은$ 오랜 세월 왕실에서 여제 에레브의 안위를 지켜온 충직한 총리이다.
$npc:11004778$에게 두 가지 진실에 대해 이야기해 보는 것이 좋겠다.
(맵 이탈시 $map:02000001$ $map:52000189$의 $npcName:11004826$$pp:를,을$ 통해 재진입 가능)

quest.name: 고뇌의 시간
quest.desc:
공존할 수 없는 두 가지 진실 앞에 있을 때 거짓의 그림자에 매몰될 수 있다는 사실을 생각했어야 한다.
과거에 대해 $npc:11004778$$pp:과,와$ 다른 주장을 하고 있던 두 사람, $npc:11004778$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:11004744$의 이야기가 사실이라면 $npcName:11004744$$pp:를,을$ 살해하려 했던 $npc:11004778$을 의심했어야만 한다.
$npc:11004778$에게 알게 된 사실들을 말하자 그의 눈동자에서 두려움이 스쳤다.
그리고 그에 의해 이곳에 갇히고 말았다. 탈출해야 한다.
(맵 이탈시 $map:52000189$의 $npcName:11004826$$pp:를,을$ 통해 재진입 가능)

quest.name: 예기치 못한 만남
quest.desc:
지금까지 믿고 있었던 많은 것들이 흔들리고 있다. $npcName:11003894$의 말대로 진실 혹은 거짓을 택해야 한다.
그리고 큰 단서를 얻게 되었다. 그것은 바로 $npc:11004778$의 맨 얼굴, 거짓을 감추고 있던 자의 눈에서 본 두려움이다.
$npc:11004778$$pp:가,이$ $npcName:11004744$$pp:를,을$ 죽이려 했던 이유는 진실을 감추기 위해서였을까? 이곳에서 탈출해야만 하는데, 방법이 생각나지 않는다.
(맵 이탈시 $map:52000189$의 $npcName:11004826$$pp:를,을$ 통해 재진입 가능)

quest.name: 거짓과 진실 사이
quest.desc:
$map:52000190$에 홀로 갇혀 있었는데 두건을 뒤집어 쓴 누군가의 희미한 실루엣이 보였다. 점점 다가오는 희미한 실루엣이 내 앞에서 두건을 벗자 $npc:11000075$$pp:라는,이라는$ 것을 알 수 있었다
$npc:11000074$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000075$에게 왜곡된 진실을 보고하고 있었다.
$npc:11000075$$pp:는,은$ 내가 어둠의 힘에 잠식된 $npcName:11004788$에게 감화되었다는 보고를 받았지만 그 말을 완전히 믿고 있는 것 같지는 않았다. $npcName:11004778$의 보고가 미심쩍어서 직접 $map:52000198$$pp2:로,으로$ 왔을지도 모른다.
내가 알게 된 내용들에 대해 이야기를 하던 중, 어디에선가 연기가 나는 듯 하더니 곧 불길이 치솟기 시작했다.
(맵 이탈시 $map:52000189$의 $npcName:11004826$$pp:를,을$ 통해 재진입 가능)
quest.manual: $map:02000001$ $map:52000190$에 나타난 $npcName:11004786$ 여제에게 여태까지 알게 된 사실 털어놓기
quest.complete: $map:02000001$ $map:52000190$에 나타난 $npcName:11004786$ 여제에게 여태까지 알게 된 사실 털어놓기

quest.name: 불길 속으로
quest.desc:
불길은 삽시간에 지하 감옥을 점령하고 있다. 탈출해야 한다!
하지만 이대로 탈출하면 $npcName:11004744$$pp:는,은$… 그를 두고 갈 수는 없다.

quest.name: 비밀 통로를 따라
quest.desc: 불길이 사방으로 번져 더 이상 희망이 없다고 생각했을 때, $npc:11000075$$pp:가,이$ 우리를 왕족들만이 알고 있다는 $map:52000192$$pp2:로,으로$ 인도했다. 고대로부터 왕족들은 신변의 위협에 시달리며 살아왔다 해도 과언이 아닐 것이다. 왕궁에서 탈출을 위한 $map:52000192$$pp:를,을$ 여기저기에 만들어 두었다는 이야기를 들어 보기는 했었는데, 그것을 실제로 보게 되다니…

quest.name: 단서를 찾아
quest.desc:
불길 속에서 간신히 살아서 탈출했다. 그리고 $npc:11000075$$pp:는,은$ 엇갈리는 진실에 대해 추궁하기 시작했다. 하지만 여제만큼이나 모두가 진실을 원한다.
여제는 이 일과 관련 있는 모든 사람들을 불러 모았다. 곧 $map:52000193$에서 과거의 진실에 대해 이야기하는 모든 사람들이 모이게 될 것이다.

quest.name: 진실 공방
quest.desc:
$map:52000193$에 모이게 된 $npcName:11004780$, $npcName:11004787$, 그리고 $npcName:11000075$의 진실 공방이 시작됐다. $npcName:11004780$$pp:는,은$ 분명 무언가 감추고 있다. 지금의 사태가 자신의 우유부단함이라고 말하며 $npcName:11004787$$pp:를,을$ 일찍 처단했어야 한다는 주장은 앞뒤가 맞지 않는다. 애초에 그를 죽이라고 명령하지 않았던가.
이어 여제는 $npc:11001812$$pp:가,이$ 목숨을 바쳐 라펜타의 봉인을 완수했다는 사실을 알고 있다고 했다. 또한 그 과정에서 어둠에 물든 $npcName:11004744$$pp:가,이$ 여제를 해하려 했다고 알고 있었다. $npcName:11004787$의 주장과 전혀 다르다. 이는 모두 $npcName:11004780$에게서 나온 이야기인 것 같다.
분명히 $npcName:11004780$$pp:는,은$ 내가 단서를 가지고 있다는 사실을 모른다. 그의 집에서 찾아낸 $item:30001480$$pp:를,을$.
여제는 $npcName:11004780$의 충성심을 의심하지 않았다고 했지만 그를 추궁하는 것으로 보였다. 하지만 $npcName:11004780$은 자신의 충성심에 대해서만 말할 뿐, 진실에 대해서 말할 수 있어 보이지는 않았다.

quest.name: 여제의 분노
quest.desc:
자신의 충성을 주장하는 $npcName:11004780$, 그와는 다른 주장을 하는 $npcName:11004787$ 사이에서 진실은 미궁에 빠지는 듯했다.
여제는 $npcName:11004780$에게 자백의 기회를 주고 싶었는 지도 모른다. 하지만 기회는 끝나버렸고, $npcName:11004780$$pp:는,은$ 위기에 빠졌다. 누구보다 왕실에 충성하고 왕실을 수호해야했던 그의 말이 거짓이었다니… 그 거짓으로 인해 생겼던 수 많은 사건들, 그 진실들을 $npcName:11004780$$pp:는,은$ 어떤 마음으로 감당하려고 하는 것일까.

quest.name: 시공의 균열
quest.desc:
라펜타 봉인에 얽힌 진실이 밝혀졌다. $npcName:11004787$의 주장은 사실이었다. $npcName:11004780$$pp:는,은$ 정말로 여제를 지키려고 그런 선택을 했을 지도 모른다. 하지만 존재를 지킨다는 것은 그 존재가 거짓에 속아 안위를 도모하게 하는 것은 아닐 것이다.
$npcName:11004825$ 여제는 극도의 분노를 느꼈다. 단순히 $npcName:11004780$에 대한 분노가 아닌, 거짓에 속아 라펜타 봉인에 자신의 도움을 기다리고 있었을 영웅들을 배신하게 된 자신… 그리고 그로 인해 태어난 존재에 의해 고통받은 수많은 사람들을 구원하지 못한 자신의 무기력함에 대하여 깊고 어둡게 분노했다.
그 분노는 예사롭지 않았다. 여제의 안에 있던 힘은 폭발하였고, 여제는 정신을 잃었다. 그리고… $npcName:11004801$$pp:가,이$ 나타났다.

quest.name: 영웅이여, 다시 한 번
quest.desc: 최초에 이 일이 시작된 것은 작은 균열 때문이었다. $map:02000001$ 곳곳에 나타나 사람들을 불안하게 했던 $npc:11004727$… 그것들이 빛의 상징, $npc:11000075$$pp2:로,으로$부터 시작된 것이라는 놀라운 가설. 그리고 눈 앞에 나타나고 만, $npc:11004801$. 이제 이 세계의 빛이었던 여제로 인한 파멸을 우려해야 한다는 말인가.

quest.name: 길을 찾아서
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004787$$pp:과,와$ $npcName:11004783$$pp:는,은$ 여제가 정신을 잃은 것과 동시에 나타난 $npc:11004801$에 대해 걱정했다.
그 너머에 메이플 월드의 평화를 지킬 수 있는 실마리가 있다. 하지만 함부로 그곳으로 향했다가는, 돌아오기 어려울 수도 있다고 한다. $npc:11004801$ 속에서 영원히 돌아갈 길을 찾을 수 없는 미아가 될 수도 있다는 것이다.

quest.name: 엉켜버린 시간
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004783$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:11004789$$pp:가,이$ 시공의 균열을 향해 기운을 모아주고 있다. 이들이, 내가 돌아올 길을 만들어 주고 있는 것이다. 이들을 믿고 $npc:11004801$ 너머에 가서 메이플 월드의 평화를 위해 무엇이라도 해야 한다.
왠지 이들에게 강한 믿음이 생긴다.

quest.name: 환영의 습격
quest.desc:
$npc:11004801$$pp:를,을$ 넘었다. 이곳에서 만나는 것들은 분명 이전에도 본 적이 있는 것들이다. 하지만 뭔가 다르다. 그 존재들만으로 공기가 무겁게 내려 앉는 것 같은 기분이다. 이 기운의 정체를 확인해 봐야겠다.
(맵 이탈시 $map:52000201$의 중앙 포탈을 통해 재진입 가능)

quest.name: 흔들리는 빛의 조각
quest.desc:
$npc:11004801$ 너머에서 마주친 존재들과 난전을 벌이고 돌아와서 $npcName:11004787$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:11004783$에게 보고하는데, 몸에 이상한 조각이 붙어 있다고 했다.
전투하다 보니 미처 의식하지 못했다. 방어구 여기저기에 알 수 없는 결정과도 같은 조각들이 붙어 있었던 것을.
균열 너머에서 온 이 조각들의 정체는 무엇일까? $npcName:11004783$$pp:는,은$ 조각들에서 혼란한 파장의 빛이 춤추고 있다고 말했다. 상당한 에너지가 있는 물질인 것 같다.

quest.name: 새로운 물질
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004783$$pp:과,와$ $npcName:11004787$$pp:는,은$ 계속 $map:52000194$$pp:를,을$ 지키면서 불안정한 균열을 안정된 상태로 유지될 수 있도록 하려는 것 같다.
균열의 너머에서 가지고 온 이 새로운 물질에 대해서는 상세하게 조사를 해봐야 한다고 한다. $map:02000487$에 가서, 이 물질에 대해 자세한 이야기를 들어보자.

quest.name: 프론티어 재단으로
quest.desc: $map:02000487$에서 $npcName:11003883$$pp:를,을$ 만났다. 그녀는 이 물질에 대해 알고 있을까? 지금으로서는 이 물질만이 쓰러진 여제를 살릴 수 있는 단서이다.

quest.name: 프리즘 연구소
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003883$$pp:는,은$ 이 물질의 연구를 위해 따로 설립한 공간인 $map:52000196$에 이 물질을 가져가 보라고 했다. 아무래도 $npcName:11004801$ 너머에서 온 이 물질이 예사로운 것은 아닌 것 같다.
예상했던 일이다. 이 물질에는 어떤 비밀이 숨겨져 있는 것일까?

quest.name: 새로운 건 언제나 짜릿해
quest.desc:
$map:52000196$의 $npcName:11004816$$pp:는,은$ $npcName:11004801$에서 가지고 온 이 물질에 지대한 관심을 보였다. 자신이 세워둔 가설을 증명할 수 있는 절호의 기회라고 생각한 것이다.
$item:40100055$의 힘의 진짜 정체, 그리고 그 힘이 영향을 미칠 수 있는 범위를 확인하기 위해 다시 균열의 너머에 다녀와야 한다. 그곳의 기운을 온몸에 묻히기 위해, $npcName:11004801$ 가운데 있는 물에 몸을 푹 담그고 돌아오자.
quest.manual: $map:02000554$의 신비한 물에 몸을 푹 담가 그곳의 기운 듬뿍 묻히기

quest.name: 한계를 돌파하라
quest.desc:
$npc:11004802$$pp:는,은$ $item:40100055$$pp:가,이$ 가진 힘을 이용해 한계돌파를 할 수 있다고 하며, 이에 대해 설명해 주었다.
$item:40100055$$pp:를,을$ 이용하면 물질이 가진 한계를 돌파해 기존의 인챈트보다 더욱 강력한 힘을 끌어낼 수 있다는 것.
한계돌파를 할 수 있는 장비는 환영의 던전에서 수집할 수 있는, 파이어 프리즘이라고 부르는 무기 뿐이며 15단계 이상으로 인챈트가 되어 있어야 한다는 것.
$npcName:11004801$$pp:와,과$ 이어진 환영의 던전에 출몰하는 몬스터들은 기존에 만난 몬스터들의 환영이지만, 내가 강해진 이상으로 그들이 강해진 만큼 끊임없이 도전해야 한다는 것.
$item:40100055$$pp:와,과$ $item:40100056$$pp:는,은$ 파이어 프리즘 장비를 분해해 수집할 수 있으니, 한계돌파를 위해서는 꾸준히 환영의 던전들에 도전해야 한다는 것.
아직까지 알 수 있는 것은 이 정도지만, 꾸준히 도전해 힘을 기르며 앞으로 생길 또다른 일들에 대비하는 것이 좋겠다. 언젠가 찾아올, 또다른 위기에 대비하기 위해…

quest.name: 정체 불명의 구슬
quest.desc:
균열의 힘이 더욱 강해졌다는 $npcName:11004793$의 부름. 도대체 무슨 일이 생긴 걸까?
$map:52000201$에서, $npcName:11004782$$pp:를,을$ 만나보는 게 좋겠다.

quest.name: 시공으로 다시 한번
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004793$의 부름을 받고 달려간 $map:52000201$. 중앙에 있는 $map:52000202$에서 뿜어져 나오는 기운은 확실히 예전과는 다른 것이었다. 그리고 가끔 그곳에서 퉁겨져 나온다는 구슬…
$npcName:11004828$의 말에 따르면, 구슬을 깨부수자 놀라운 것을 발견할 수 있었다고 하는데… 바로, 새로운 장비였던 것!

quest.name: 균열 속 존재
quest.desc:
이런 것을 밖으로 마구 뿌려대는 걸 보면, 우리를 유인하고 있는 게 틀림없다고 말하는 $npcName:11004828$. 다시 한번 균열 속으로 들어가서, 진상을 확인해봐야 할 것 같다고 말한다.
그렇게 균열 속으로 들어와 중앙 쪽을 살피자, 뜻밖의 일이 벌어지는데…!

quest.name: 더 강해지기 위해서
quest.desc:
균열 속에서 만난 검은 덩어리는, 자신과 함께 놀아준다면 좋을 것을 주겠다는 이야기를 끝으로 사라져버렸다. 자기가 할 말만 하고 사라지다니…?
침실로 돌아와 $npcName:11004828$에게 균열 속에서 있었던 일을 설명해주자 뭔가 알 것 같다는 눈초리로 주기적으로 그 녀석과 시간을 보내고 오라고 하는데…

quest.name: 예언의 때
quest.desc:
더 강해질 수 있다면야 뭐든지 못하겠어! 앞으로 검은 덩어리던, 파란 덩어리던 누구든지 놀아주겠다, 이거야.
한편, $npcName:11001812$$pp:는,은$…

quest.name: 갑작스런 호출
quest.desc:
갑작스런 $npcName:11003883$의 호출.
혹시 새로운 단서라도 발견한 것일까?

$map:02000487$$pp:로,으로$ 가서 $npcName:11003883$를 만나보자

quest.name: 수상한 단서
quest.desc:
프론티어 재단에서 발견한 수상한 움직임.
메이플 아일랜드 곳곳에서 발견되고 있다는 어둠의 물질이 시공의 균열과 관련이 있을지도 모른다는 연구 결과가 나왔다.

$map:02000487$에 있는 $map:52000196$$pp:로,으로$ 가서 연구 결과를 확인해보자.

quest.name: 어둠의 물질 조사
quest.desc:
라네모네가 조사한 바에 따르면 어둠의 물질에서 블루 라펜타의 힘이 느껴진다고 한다.
대체 무슨 일일까?

$map:02000487$에 있는 $map:52000196$의 메이리에게 가서 연구 결과 자료를 받아보자.

quest.name: 조사 결과
quest.desc:
$map:52000196$에서 조사한 어둠의 물질 연구 자료.
시공의 균열과 어떤 관련이 있을까?

$map:02000487$에 있는 $map:52000196$에서 연구 결과를 확인해보자.
quest.manual: $map:52000196$에서 연구자료 확인하기|$map:02000487$에 있는 $npcName:11003883$ 만나기|$map:02000487$에 있는 $npcName:11003883$ 만나기

quest.name: 균열의 실마리
quest.desc:
라네모네의 연구 결과에 따르면 더 강한 환영의 몬스터들이 나오고 있는 것도 어둠의 물질과 관련이 있을 것이라고 한다.
그리고 이 현상이 인위적인 현상일 수도 있다는 가설도 있다.

$map:52000201$에 있는 $npcName:11004790$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:11001577$에게 이 이야기를 전해주자.

quest.name: 블루 라펜타의 힘
quest.desc:
라네모네의 연구 결과를 들은 두 사람.
누가 이런 일을 벌이는 지는 알 수 없지만, 블루 라펜타의 힘이 느껴진다는 이야기에 $npcName:11004790$$pp:는,은$ 블루 라펜타의 힘에 대한 이야기를 기억해 냈다.
현재로서는 알 수 없지만, 프론티어 재단이라면 혹시 이 힘에 대한 조사를 하지 않았을까?

$map:02000487$의 $npcName:11003883$에게 가서 블루 라펜타의 힘이 남아있는 곳에 대한 실마리가 있는지 확인해보자.

quest.name: 영원의 동굴 조사
quest.desc:
블루 라펜타의 힘이 계승된 장소는 정확하지 않지만, 프론티어 재단에서 조사한 바에 따르면 의심가는 장소가 있다고 한다.

프론티어 재단의 $npcName:11003883$는 얼음으로 뒤덮힌 $map:02000192$에 과거 영혼의 성채라고 불리었던 장소에서 심상치 않은 에너지가 느껴졌다며 조사를 부탁했다.

빅토리아 아일랜드의 $map:02000192$$pp:로,으로$ 가서 수상한 장소가 있는지 찾아보자.

quest.name: 수상한 공간 조사
quest.desc:
빅토리아 아일랜드의 영원의 동굴에서도 어둠의 물질을 발견했다.
그리고 그 옆의 강력한 에너지가 느껴지는 공간.
대체 이 곳은 어떤 힘이 있는걸까?

$map:02000192$에 있는 어둠의 물질을 조사해보자.
quest.manual: $map:02000192$의 수상한 장소로 들어가기|어둠의 물질 살펴보기|어둠의 물질 살펴보기

quest.name: 균열의 상태
quest.desc:
$map:02000192$에서 발견한 어둠의 물질과 폭주하고 있는 수호 골렘.
상황이 점점 더 심각해지는 것 같다는 이야기에 불안은 점점 확신으로 바뀌어 간다.

$map:52000201$에 있는 $npcName:11004790$에게도 이 사실을 전해주자.

quest.name: The Rift Grows Stronger
quest.desc: The dark matter and the frantic guardian golem found in $map:02000192$... The rift growing wider everyday... What is the correlation between them? Let's talk more with $npcName:11004790$ in the $map:52000201$.

quest.name: Another Emergency?
quest.desc:
Beatrice is calling for you again.
What is wrong with the rift in space-time this time?

Head to the $map:02000487$ and speak to $npcName:11003883$.

quest.name: Concert Preparations
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003883$ suddenly asked for help with the preparations for a concert.
One meant to appease the minds of the anxious people. I agreed to help, to some extent.

I decided to listen to $npcName:11003884$ for more details.

quest.name: Band Check
quest.desc: $npcName:11003884$ ordered me to check on the band members practicing in the meeting room to see if they needed anything.\n\nBut when I went to the meeting room, the musicians were nowhere to be seen and only dark matter could be found.

quest.name: Kidnapped Musicians
quest.desc:
I entered the space-time rift through the dark matter.
Inside, I found the missing musicians turned into monsters.

Head to the $map:02000487$ and report to $npcName:11003884$.

quest.name: Grasp the Situation
quest.desc: $npcName:11003883$ is astonished by the disappearance of the musicians and the appearance of dark matter in the middle of the foundation.\n\nHead to the $map:52000196$ in the $map:02000487$ and ask $npcName:11004802$ to investigate the situation.

quest.name: Dark Red
quest.desc: I told $npcName:11004802$ that, unlike last time, the dark matter glowed red.\n\nIt has been decided the conference room should be locked down. Report to $npcName:11003883$.

quest.name: More Disappearences
quest.desc: Multiple $map:52100404$ performers are missing. To get to the bottom of the case, I met $npcName:11004876$ and heard his eyewitness account. He said that the musicians disappeared into the dark matter in front of his eyes.\n\nAccording to him, the aria flowing out of the dark matter belongs to a dead prima donna.

quest.name: Phantom of the Opera
quest.desc: Head to the $map:02000487$ quickly and report your work on the $map:52100404$ to $npcName:11003883$.

quest.name: Red Darkness
quest.desc: $npcName:11003883$ is convinced that the forces of darkness are behind the incident, targeting the Red Lapenta.\n\nLet's go to the $map:52100402$ in Henesys, where we could find clues on where the Red Lapenta is.

quest.name: Temporary Guardian
quest.desc: I encountered $npcName:11004872$ by accident at the $map:52100402$. She came to light as the temporary guardian of the Red Lapenta.\n\nFrom her, I learned that the true guardian of the Red Lapenta was Clarke, the Elder's wife and $npcName:11004873$'s mother.

quest.name: A Mother's Words
quest.desc: I searched inside the $map:52100402$ for any clues.\n\nBut instead I found a torn envelopes and letters. Clarke left it to her son $npcName:11004873$.

quest.name: Secret of the Music Sheet
quest.desc: According to the contents of the letter Clarke left, it is said that she left to her son $npcName:11004873$ the key to find the Red Lapenta. $npcName:11004872$ says she wants to find the whereabouts of $npcName:11004873$ who has the sheet music.\n\nHead to the $map:52000196$ in the $map:02000487$ and inform $npcName:11004802$ what $npcName:11004872$ has told you.

quest.name: Hidden in Time
quest.desc: Head to the $map:02000487$ and report to $npcName:11004802$, warning her that once the aria, combining the energy of the Red Lapenta and the power of darkness is performed, the axis of time will be twisted and the rift in space-time will be accelerated.

quest.name: Practice Well
quest.desc: $npcName:11003883$ says that this situation may cause a world wide crisis, and that she will protect the musicians of Maple World.\n\n$npcName:11003883$ asked me to stop the the prima donna from performing the aria.

quest.name: DIY Cement
quest.desc: Hunt the $npcPlural:21000029$ gathered around the river in $map:02000017$ and acquire $itemPlural:20000055$ to use as building materials!
quest.manual: Hunt the $npcPlural:21000029$ at the river and acquire $itemPlural:20000055$

quest.name: Handcrafted with Care!
quest.desc: Craft $item:30000094$ at the furnace next to $npc:11000350$ of $map:02000017$! If you don't have the $itemPlural:20000055$ you need to craft it, you can hunt $npcPlural:21000029$. Those things are everywhere, so you don't have to be sparing with the materials!
quest.manual: Get the $itemPlural:020000055$ from $npc:11000350$ and craft the $item:30000094$ in the furnace

quest.name: 코브라들이 뿔났다
quest.desc: $map:02000148$의 $npc:11000353$ 주변의 레버를 당겨 나타나는 $npc:99000038$들을 처리해주자!

quest.name: 노인과 타임캡슐
quest.desc: $map:02000147$의 $npc:11000225$$pp:를,을$ 위해 벚꽃나무 주변 꽃을 파서 $item:30000095$$pp:를,을$ 찾아보자.

quest.name: 원숭이는 캡슐을 좋아해
quest.desc: $map:02000147$의 경비원 스티브의 말로 유추하건데, $npc:99000039$$pp:가,이$ 캡슐을 파내어 나무 위로 올라간것 같다.

quest.name: Puppy Rescue Strategy
quest.desc: Let's rescue $npc:11000355$'s puppy friends from around the meteor in $map:02000014$.

quest.name: Mini Pim Hide-and-Seek
quest.desc: All you need to do is pull all the levers in $map:02000110$, defeat the $npcPlural:29000023$, and deliver the $itemPlural:30000097$ to $npc:11000358$. Why not help a criminal come clean and start a new life?
quest.manual: Pull the levers at $map:02000110$ and retrieve $item:30000097$ from $npc:29000023$

quest.name: Noise Pollution
quest.desc: $npc:11000359$ is really concerned about her son's beauty sleep. You should help them get a little peace and quiet by hunting monsters in $map:02000086$ for $npc:11000359$.

quest.name: Between a Hot and a Cold Place
quest.desc: $npc:11000359$ in $map:02000086$ is really worried about her son. She's asked you to take the ice pack to $npc:11000360$ just for safety's sake. You should be able to find him just to the right of the lava area.

quest.name: Lava, Meet Ice
quest.desc: The only way to save the house and bring the heat down is to block the lava holes. Maybe these ice blocks can cool the lava enough to solve both problems. Put ice in the lava hole near $npc:11000360$'s house in $map:02000086$.
quest.manual: Block the lava hole with ice

quest.name: Crabby Capture
quest.desc: $npc:11000362$ in $map:02000111$ is really excited about cooking a tasty seafood meal. But, he needs lots of crab to do it. Why not help him lure $npcPlural:29000033$ into the traps at the beach?
quest.manual: Lure $npcPlural:29000033$ to the open traps and get $itemPlural:20000056$

quest.name: Word-of-Mouth Advertising
quest.desc: So many people are missing out! Spread the word about $itemPlural:30000140$ and other culinary delights to all the tourists at the beach in front of the portal to $map:02000085$ in $map:02000111$.
quest.manual: Promote $itemPlural:30000140$ to the tourists at the beach

quest.name: The Pig Takes Flight
quest.desc: The discovery of a pig's body amidst the wreckage of what seems to have been an aircraft has left you with questions that must be answered. Perhaps he jumped from above? Search the nearby tower in $map:02000088$.
quest.complete: Climb the tower at $map:02000088$ and read the pig's diary

quest.name: Cat on a Crane
quest.desc: $npcName:11000366$ is wandering around $map:02000139$, worried sick about her lost cat, $npcName:11000367$. Maybe if you climb the crane behind her, you'll find the poor little kitty.

quest.name: The Break Up
quest.desc: $npcName:11000367$ has eloped with another cat. Break the news to $npcName:11000366$.

quest.name: Wood Blocked
quest.desc: You've got to save the forest! Get some $item:30000104$ from the basket next to $npc:11000368$ of $map:02000017$, then spray it on the seedlings that are planted on the roads around $map:02000017$.
quest.manual: Get $item:30000104$ from $npc:11000368$'s basket |Spray $item:30000104$ on the seedlings along $map:02000017$

quest.name: Unbiased Science
quest.desc: Copy data from $npc:11000369$, a computer in $map:02000145$.

quest.name: Composition Analysis
quest.desc: Copy data from $npc:11000370$, one of the computers in $map:02000145$.

quest.name: Usage Simulations
quest.desc: Copy data from $npc:11000371$, a computer in $map:02000145$.

quest.name: Data Delivery
quest.desc: Deliver the acquired information to $npc:11000372$.

quest.name: I Want to Believe
quest.desc: Do aliens walk among us? It's time to find out! Investigate the "messages" $npc:11000376$ left for them in $map:02000087$, and see if there's been any response!

quest.name: The Long Ascent
quest.desc: Speak with $npc:11000382$ at the top of $map:02000148$.

quest.name: Beginning the Climb
quest.desc: Speak with $npc:11000379$ at the top of $map:02000135$.

quest.name: Reaching the Summit
quest.desc: Speak with $npc:11000380$ at the top of $map:02000110$.

quest.name: Cure All Mandecassol
quest.desc: Let's go retrieve $item:20000057$ from near the $map:02000159$ entrance in $map:02000134$ for $npc:11000384$, who was injured in $map:02000135$.
quest.manual: Retrieve $item:20000057$ from near the $map:02000159$ of $map:02000134$ entrance

quest.name: Unexpected Capture
quest.desc: Let's clean the fruit basket for $npc:11000385$ of $map:02000088$.

quest.name: Happy Little Trees
quest.desc: Hurum would be so much happier with friends. You should find some red trees south of $npc:11000386$ and replant them in $map:02000041$.
quest.manual: Find the red trees located south of $npc:11000386$ and replant them

quest.name: Clandestine Photo Shoot
quest.desc:
$npc:11000387$ is desperate for photos of $npcName:11000406$, the celebrity currently visiting $map:02000137$.
