Sure, it may seem odd, but it's a victim-less crime. Help a lovesick girl out and take some photos with her totally inconspicuous $item:30000109$.
quest.manual: Get the $item:30000109$ from $npc:11000387$|Take photos of $npc:11000406$ from the structure near the stage

quest.name: Balloon Grabber
quest.desc: Let's retrieve the balloon over the tree above the portal to get to $map:02000116$. $npc:11000389$, who sells balloons in $map:02000115$, wants it.
quest.manual: Use rock climbing skills to retrieve the balloon from the tree above the $map:02000116$ portal

quest.name: Apple Commotion
quest.desc: Let's go pick the apples from the apple tree located on the road to $map:02000116$ from $map:02000115$.
quest.manual: Bring back $item:30000128$ from the apple tree in $map:02000115$

quest.name: Into the Woods
quest.desc: Let's deliver the packed lunch to $npc:11000128$ in $map:02000116$.

quest.name: Artist vs. Artiste
quest.desc: Time to erase the ugly mushroom graffiti all over $map:02000110$. It's pretty unsightly, really. Who'd want to stare at a fungus all day?

quest.name: Artistic Vengeance
quest.desc: The best way to get rid of that terrible mushroom 'art' is to cover it over with something worth looking at. It'll be a piece of cake to replace the graffiti around $npc:11000412$'s hideout in $map:02000086$.
quest.manual: Replace the graffiti around $npc:11000412$'s house in $map:02000086$

quest.name: Petals of Fire
quest.desc: If you're going to prove you're an adventurer worthy of respect, you'll have to uproot the $item:20000061$ growing in the lava of $map:02000086$. A little lava's nothing you can't handle. After all, it's just a bit of blazing, liquid fire of doom.

quest.name: Fiery Combat
quest.desc: Another opportunity to prove you're a real adventurer. Banging on the smelting furnace in $map:02000086$ is sure to annoy the $npc:21000086$. Wait for them to come find you and grab that $item:30000142$ fast! You can double-check the location of the furnace on the mini map.
quest.manual: Bang on the smelting furnace in $map:02000086$ and steal $itemPlural:30000142$

quest.name: Crabby Sabotage
quest.desc: The economy in the area has been totally disrupted by $npc:11000362[gender:0]$'s new venture. Sabotage may not be very nice, but that $npc:11000420$ is definitely someone you don't want to cross. Use tubes to block $npc:11000362$'s $npc:29000033$ traps in $map:02000111$ before she gets mad at you.
quest.manual: Use tubes to block $npc:29000033$ traps on the beach

quest.name: Sticky Fish Fingers
quest.desc: $npc:11000420$ suspects that the $npcPlural:21000101$ in $map:02000111$ city center have stolen the fish her mother was trying to sell. You should help her confront them to find out if they really are the culprits.

quest.name: Making it Big
quest.desc: $npc:11000471$ is tired of coming up short, and wants to make a change. Help him recover $itemPlural:20000064$ from the crates belonging to the $npcPlural:21099049$ in $map:02000136$!
quest.manual: Retrieve $itemPlural:20000064$ from the crates near the $npcPlural:21099049$

quest.name: The Itsy-Bitsy Spiders
quest.desc:
$npc:11000472$, who is not the slightest bit afraid of spiders, was about to go and squish all of the $npcPlural:29000025$ infesting the crawl space behind him—that is, until you volunteered.
Well, get to stomping!
quest.manual: Enter the crawl space behind $npc:11000472$ and squish $npcPlural:29000025$

quest.name: Below His Station
quest.desc: $npc:11000065$ is complaining of a bad stench coming from lower $map:02000100$, where his least favorite constituents live. Help clean up that part of town.

quest.name: Interview of a Lifetime
quest.desc: To thank you for your service, $npc:11000065$ has sent a letter of recommendation on your behalf to Goldus Group. Go to $map:02000189$ for your interview.

quest.name: Praise Goldus
quest.desc: As Goldus Group's newest employee, it's time for you to meet $npc:11000252$ and sing the company song to him. The lyrics to the song, "$npc:11000477$," are hanging on the wall next to him.

quest.name: Demonic Roots
quest.desc: $npc:11000169$ requested that I go to $map:02000315$ and steal the $item:30000190$ from $npc:23100025$. Although I am bothered by his attitude (he seems to ask others for help in every difficult situation), I will aid him this one time, like $npc:11000169$ said to.

quest.name: Secret of the Dance
quest.desc:
$npc:11000542$ loves to dance, so he decided to raise some $npcPlural:21000069$ to dance with. However, his $npcPlural:21000069$ look pretty sad compared to the ones you see dancing in the wild.
Hunt some wild $npc:21000069$ around the $map:02000049$ and learn their secret.

quest.name: Dancing Cactus
quest.desc: You found $itemPlural:30000029$ while hunting $npcPlural:21000069$. Is this what Tanz needs to get his own $itemPlural:30000029$ to dance?

quest.name: Rain, Rain, Come Again
quest.desc: Worried about the lack of rain in the Perion region, $npc:11000039$ set up totems in the lower area of $map:02000049$. Let's hold a rain ritual in front of all the totems in $map:02000049$.
quest.manual: Hold a rain ritual in front of all the totems in $map:02000049$

quest.name: Exciting Teleportation
quest.desc: TELI is a strange teleportation machine discovered in $map:02000163$. Why is this machine installed here in the midst of the chaos of other machines and robots?

quest.name: Back to Home
quest.desc: The teleportation device operates as normal. Now it's time to turn it on and get home.

quest.name: Melting Lava
quest.desc: The lava that needs to flow into $map:02000162$'s lava generator has hardened, and therefore the generator is not working. I should follow the path of the lava, locate the problem, and fix it.
quest.manual: Follow the lava, locate the blockage, and fix it

quest.name: The Smooshed Shoe
quest.desc: $npcName:11000599$ lost his shoe while spelunking at the $map:02000045$. Enter the cave system behind him and retrieve $item:30000180$.

quest.name: Flying Lessons
quest.desc: $npcName:11000629$ is unhappy with how her husband, $npcName:11000630$, is teaching their children how to fly. She may have a point—$npcNamePlural:11000628$ who failed to make it across the $map:02000046$ are littering the canyon floor. Give them a helping hand.

quest.name: Things Best Left Buried
quest.desc:
$npc:11000372$ speaks cryptically of a failed experiment, and an abomination that must be destroyed. Travel to $map:02000240$ in the $map:02000145$, destroy the failed experiment, and bring back proof of your deed.
The entrance to the $map:02000240$ is located below $npc:11000372$.
quest.manual: (Elite) Defeat $npc:22090166$ in the $map:02000240$ under the $map:02000145$ and obtain proof of your deed

quest.name: All Fired Up
quest.desc: $npcName:11000541$ is furious at the Tumbai who have stolen her peoples' homes. She wants you to gather $itemPlural:30000198$s from the $map:02000048$.

quest.name: Burn, Burn, Burn!
quest.desc: In a twist that nobody could have predicted, $npc:11000541$ has decided to burn down her whole village rather than let the T'oomba kick them out. Use the $item:30000198$ you gathered to burn down homes at the $map:02000048$.
quest.manual: Use $item:30000198$ to burn homes at the $map:02000048$

quest.name: No Contact
quest.desc: $npc:11000664$ wants to hack $map:02000162$'s antenna in order to see his girlfriend's text message log. Let's hunt the monsters in $map:02000162$ and acquire $item:30000035$ for $npc:11000664$.

quest.name: To Hack, or Not to Hack
quest.desc: Using $item:30000035$, $npc:11000594$ produced $item:30000040$. Let's go to $npc:11000666$ at the upper region of $map:02000162$ and attempt to hack.
quest.complete: Hack $npc:11000666$, located in the upper region of $map:02000162$

quest.name: The Howling Stone
quest.desc: Rumor has it that, on a full moon, the wolf statue in northwestern $map:02000051$ howls like a real wolf. You need to see this for yourself.
quest.manual: Watch the wolf statue in northwestern $map:02000051$

quest.name: The Voice of the Statue
quest.desc: Find a place to hide within the $map:02000081$ attic and wait for $npcName:11000694$ to appear.
quest.manual: Hide in the $map:02000081$ attic and learn $npcName:11000694$'s secret

quest.name: A Habit of Three…
quest.desc: $npc:11000001$ has been so worried he hasn't been able to sleep ever since a man in black came by looking for $npc:11000502$, his son. Let's go ask $npc:11000101$ in $map:02000083$ about $npc:11000502$'s whereabouts.

quest.name: Big Dreams, Bigger Punishments
quest.desc: $npc:11000502$ is being chased…for it has been revealed that he stole the $item:30000016$ from the Darkstar. I'm going to look for those who robbed $npc:11000502$ at $map:02000141$ and see if I can't find the stolen $item:30000016$.
quest.complete: Find the culprit who stole the $item:30000016$ from $map:02000141$

quest.name: Dungeon: Black Market Den
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21005001$ (Entrance: $map:2000083$) Party Size (4 players)
$item:30000016$ can only be found in $map:02000241$. If I go down the stairs by the Golden Tower in $map:02000083$, there will be a emergency door that is connected to $map:02000241$! I must keep in mind $npc:11000365$'s advice on gathering comrades and advancing in a group of 4 within $map:02000241$…
quest.manual: Go downstairs from $map:02000241$ and look for $item:30000016$

quest.name: Broken Melody
quest.desc: The beautiful music of $map:02000095$ has been silenced, and $npcName:11000890$ thinks that some strange totems are behind it. Remove the totems and restore music to $map:02000095$.
quest.manual: Remove the strange totems in the $map:02000095$

quest.name: Chechy's Plan
quest.desc: Now that the totems are gone, $npc:11000890$ wants you to tell her brother, $npc:11000891$. He can be found near the highest point at $map:02000095$.
quest.complete: Talk to $npc:11000891$ at the top of $map:02000095$

quest.name: Flute Felony
quest.desc: $npc:11000891$ says that he needs his $item:30000261$ to awaken the guardians of the fountain. Unfortunately, it was stolen by a $npc:21000065$. Get the $item:30000261$ back.
quest.complete: Talk to $npc:11000891$ at the top of $map:02000095$

quest.name: An Uplifting Tune
quest.desc: $npc:11000891$ has asked you to awaken the fairfolk guardians of the fountain by playing his $item:30000261$. You might as well give it a try.
quest.manual: Play the $item:30000261$ to summon the guardians
quest.complete: Talk to $npc:11000891$ at the top of $map:02000095$

quest.name: A Call to Action
quest.desc: You found a notice calling for heroes to defend the $map:02000095$ from monsters. Fight for the future of the Picchu Picchu people!
quest.complete: Check the bulletin board in the $map:02000095$

quest.name: 은밀한 접선
quest.desc: 우연히 찾게된 의문의 지령서. 내용을 확인해 보니, $map:03000145$에서 일어나고 있는 사건에 대한 기록이 적혀있다. 사건에 대한 자세한 정보를 알아내기 위해 $map:03000145$에 있는 $npc:11000910$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가보자.

quest.name: Dr. 로켈의 음모
quest.desc: $npc:11000910$$pp:는,은$ $map:03000145$ 내부에서 일어나고 있는 음모에 대해 알려준다. Dr. 로켈의 위험한 연구를 막기 위해 $map:03000145$에 있는 $npc:11000911$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가 도움을 청하자.

quest.name: 실패해야 산다!
quest.desc: $npc:11000911$$pp:는,은$ 그림자 세포를 생산하는 배양기의 작동을 중단시켜야 한다고 말한다. Dr. 로켈이 배양된 세포를 수거하기 전에 서둘러 그림자 세포를 생산하는 배양기의 작동을 중단시키자.
quest.manual: 그림자 세포를 생산하는 배양기의 작동 멈추기

quest.name: 꺼진 불안도 다시 보자
quest.desc: $npc:11000911$$pp:는,은$ 세포를 생산해내는 세포 배양기는 가까스로 중단시켰지만, 아직은 안심할 수 없다고 한다. 이미 그림자 세포 바이러스에 노출되어버린 $map:03000145$의 변종 몬스터들을 사냥하자.

quest.name: 위험한 사람들
quest.desc: $npc:11000912$$pp:는,은$ $map:03000145$에 붙잡혀 세뇌되어 버린 노예들의 건강이 악화되고 있다고 한다. 철장을 감시하고 있는 $npc:40000019$$pp:를,을$ 수색하면 $item:30000264$$pp:를,을$ 구할 수 있으니, $item:30000264$$pp:를,을$ 구해 철창에 갇혀있는 노예들을 구출하자.
quest.manual: $item:30000264$$pp:를,을$ 구해 철창문을 열고 갇혀 있는 노예들 구출 하기

quest.name: Memory Trace
quest.desc: Once upon a time, $npc:11000929$ wrote a great book. But after spending a thousand years in Perion, $npc:11000929$ can't remember the location of the original manuscript. After tracing the ancient memory back, $npc:11000929$ found out the book is inside of an egg. The nest, decorated with multi-colored feathers, is located on the peak of the $map:02000267$. The eggshell has hardened and solidified as time passed, so I'll need to hunt the $npc:21000255$ around the area and use its $item:30000268$ to hatch the egg. Let's go to the $map:02000267$ to find the original manuscript of the book written by $npc:11000929$.
quest.manual: Use the $item:30000268$ to hatch the egg and find the $item:30000265$|Use the $item:30000268$ to hatch the egg and find the $item:30000266$|Use the $item:30000268$ to hatch the egg and find the $item:30000267$

quest.name: Sharing Is Caring
quest.desc: $npc:11000929$ was practically leaping for joy after I managed to locate the original manuscript. $npc:11000929$ claims the book will be a big hit as long as it gets published. If that's the case, I might be able to make a lot of money if I show the manuscript to $npc:11000327$ in $map:02000001$. I should go speak with $npc:11000327$.

quest.name: I'm a Survivor
quest.desc: $npc:11000930$ was deeply hurt and disappointed by the humans when she lost her husband to the poachers. She has been raising her babies by herself in $map:02000267$. It's been difficult for $npc:11000930$ to hunt, as dangerous lava fountains have formed around the area recently. Let's help and bring $item:30000269$ so that she can feed her baby birds.
quest.manual: Hunt the $npc:29000041$ in the bushes and bring it to $npc:11000930$

quest.name: Mournful Vision
quest.desc:
Although $npc:11000931$ is blind, he has the ability to see visions. He's been having recurring dreams about his mate, Anka, who never returned from her last hunt.
Go to the lava flows of $map:02000267$ and find $item:30000270$, then find a sunny place to lay her to rest.
quest.manual: Find $item:30000270$ in $map:02000267$ and lay her to rest at the altar

quest.name: Life Finds a Way
quest.desc:
A huge monster wanders the city wreaking chaos after industrial waste enters the ecosystem and turns an unsuspecting frog into a thumping freak.
Defeat $npc:23000013$ in $map:02000084$ and put an end to the clomping croaker. It really won't change much in the grand scheme of things, but it sure will make one more day in this city a little more tolerable!

quest.name: Dungeon: Catastrophic Jealousy
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20012001$ (Entrance: $map:02000024$) Party Size (4 players) The quest is only available in Normal mode.
As the fallen angel Ariel spread the seeds of darkness, $npc:23100039$, the violent guard of the underground, became awakened. $npc:23100039$ must be stopped, with it becoming increasingly more violent as it continues to absorb dark spirits. It's time to defeat $npc:23100039$ captured in $map:02000312$.

quest.name: The Long Silence
quest.desc: $npc:11000961$ hasn't heard back from the Green Hoods who were deployed to the $map:02000013$. Head out there and find out what happened to them.
quest.manual: Search for missing Green Hoods at the $map:02000013$

quest.name: Uphill Battle
quest.desc: You found one of the missing Green Hoods, $npc:11000962$. Her squad was ambushed by monsters and they don't have enough supplies to take care of the wounded. Find $npc:11000832$ and help take care of the injured Green Hoods.

quest.name: Triage
quest.desc: $npcName:11000832$ is swamped taking care of wounded Green Hoods. She needs to make more medicine, and it falls on you to gather the materials. Hunt $npcNamePlural:21000353$ and $npcNamePlural:21000003$ to acquire $itemPlural:30000285$ and $itemPlural:30000286$.

quest.name: Rubbing It In
quest.desc: $npcName:11000963$ gave you some medicine for the injured people below.

quest.name: Holding the Fort
quest.desc: $npcName:11000972$ is making a desperate stand against an army of monsters after the rest of her squad was injured and scattered. Alone and without supplies, she refuses to give up—help her by fighting off the hordes of $npcNamePlural:21000003$, $npcNamePlural:21000353$, and $npcNamePlural:21000306$ that are attacking the fortress.
quest.manual: Defeat $npcNamePlural:21000003$ at the $map:02000013$|Defeat $npcNamePlural:21000353$ at the $map:02000013$|Defeat $npcNamePlural:21000306$ at the $map:02000013$

quest.name: Cacophony
quest.desc: $npc:11000741$ has moved to a new studio in the remote $map:02000186$ in order to compose his magnum opus. Unfortunately, the locals are too noisy for him to concentrate. Beat up the $npcPlural:21000278$ and $npcPlural:21000173$ so that $npc:11000741$ can focus on writing real music.

quest.name: Diet Hard
quest.desc: $npcName:11000973$ already knows that she's a beauty, but she wants to lose a little weight before swimsuit season begins! Her diet plan doesn't seem to be working, so drop by $npcName:11000974$ to get some nutrition advice.

quest.name: A Tasty Weight Loss Treat
quest.desc: $npcName:11000974$ is horrified by $item:30000288$. She's going to work on some new dishes to help $npcName:11000973$ reach her weight loss goal. Gather some $itemPlural:30000289$, $itemPlural:30000290$, and $itemPlural:30000291$ from the $map:02000186$ for her.
quest.manual: Hunt $npcNamePlural:21000160$ for $itemPlural:30000289$|Pick $itemPlural:30000290$ from golden apple trees|Collect $itemPlural:30000291$ in the $map:02000186$

quest.name: Getting in Shape
quest.desc: $item:30000292$ is all packed, just for $npcName:11000973$! Deliver it to her before it gets cold.

quest.name: Scorching Skill
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000976$ claims to be one of the world's greatest martial artists. He looks the part, but the more you talk with him, the less convincing he is.
He's asked you to gather some $itemPlural:30000294$ so that he can participate in an important tournament. He seems harmless enough, so you might as well do it.

quest.name: An Angry God
quest.desc: $npcName:11000977$ is preparing for 777 days of prayer to the god of his people. Bring the items he needs to safely perform the ritual.

quest.name: Wake-up Call
quest.desc: Now that $npcName:11000977$'s ritual is almost ready, it's time to awaken the kunkun shamans.

quest.name: 마음은 청춘이라오
quest.desc: $npc:11000744$ is a forest witch who used to brew a soup that has the power to grant any wish. But after being tired of boiling soup all day, $npc:11000744$ started to daydream and began to imagine eating sweets, and somehow ended up in $map:02000185$. $npc:11000744$ can't explain exactly what happened. The only thing she knows is that she needs to replenish her sugar as soon as possible! I have to follow the sweet scent to find something delicious for the forest witch!

quest.name: Back in Time
quest.desc: $npc:11000984$ from the Andersen Village arrived in $map:02000185$ after messing up the incantation which resulted in the wrong door of time opening. In order to open the door that leads to the town of fairy tales, $npc:11000984$ needs $item:30000301$, which was taken by $npc:21000278$. It's time to hunt $npc:21000278$ and take the $item:30000301$ back.

quest.name: A Bold Move
quest.desc: $npc:11000984$ is ready to go back to the Andersen Village, but $npc:11000984$'s friends morphed into violent monsters after warping through the distortion of time and space. $npc:11000984$ feels responsible for this turn of events, and doesn't want to go back without fixing this. For the safety of the Andersen Village and $map:02000185$, let's defeat $npc:21000278$, $npc:21000173$, and $npc:21000160$.

quest.name: Haywire
quest.desc:
$npc:11000985$ has spent much of his career developing robots to help take care of the forests of $map:02000023$. However, his precious creations have gone haywire and are now laying waste to the very woods he sought to protect.
Now you must destroy the $npcPlural:21000241$ and figure out what went wrong.

quest.name: Iteration
quest.desc:
$npc:11000985$ refuses to give up just because his $npcPlural:21000241$ went berserk. He plans to carefully analyze the error that led to all this, but he needs the data from his computer if he's going to do so.
Go to his computer at the $map:02000128$ and copy the data onto the $item:30000302$ he gave you.
quest.manual: Copy the data from $npcName:11000985$'s lab at the $map:02000128$

quest.name: The Lost Stones
quest.desc:
$npc:11000986$ is upset that her birthstones—gifts left behind for her by her father—were stolen by monsters. She needs those gemstones to make a gift for her friends, who got her through some difficult times.
Reclaim the gemstones from the $npcPlural:21000052$ and $npcPlural:21000004$ living in $map:02000128$.

quest.name: Secret Friends
quest.desc:
To thank you for retrieving her birthstones, $npc:11000986$ wants to introduce you to her very special friends. They're the boroboro, the forgotten fairfolk dwarves of Ellinia!
$map:02000197$ is at the top of the $map:02000128$. What kind of place could it be?
quest.manual: Enter $map:02000197$ through the top of the $map:02000128$

quest.name: Moving Day
quest.desc: $npcName:11000987$, the boroboro elder in $map:02000197$, is upset that his fellow dwarves are being lazy bums during such a critical time. Help wake them up from their naps.
quest.manual: Wake up the boroboro dwarves in $map:02000197$

quest.name: The Lone Patrolman
quest.desc: $npc:11000959$ is guarding the $map:02000091$ alone. Pushed to his absolute limit, he can't hold the tower much longer without some help. Hold off the $npcNamePlural:21000265$ and $npcNamePlural:21000306$ while he fortifies his position.

quest.name: Call for Relief
quest.desc:
Fortunately, the majority of the monsters threatening the watchtower at the entrance have been defeated. Unfortunately, it's still too early to let your guard down because $npc:11000959$ can't hold off an attack on his own. The $map:02000091$ needs reinforcements.
Send a carrier pigeon from the $map:02000091$ to request reinforcements from headquarters.
quest.manual: Send a carrier pigeon to ask for reinforcements

quest.name: Sticky Situation
quest.desc: From the corner of $map:02000196$ in $map:02000091$, a girl screams in horror. She says her name is $npc:11000960$, and the reason she let out such a bloodcurdling scream…is because toilet paper is nowhere to be found. …It looks like she didn't check if there was any $item:30000313$ before taking care of business. Let's show some sympathy and go through the emergency aid box to find $item:30000313$ for $npc:11000960$, who is in quite a sticky situation.
quest.manual: Go through the emergency aid box to find $item:30000313$

quest.name: First Contact
quest.desc: You place the $item:30000313$ through the crack in the door, but $npc:11000960$ lets out another ear-piercing scream as soon as you turn around. It turns out she can't reach the $item:30000313$ from where she is sitting… At the end of her rope, $npc:11000960$ asks you to come in to the $map:02000196$… Could this situation get any worse…

quest.name: Battle for Bowels
quest.desc: $npc:11000960$ confesses that she is currently suffering from…ahem…chronic constipation. She claims that consuming the $npc:21000353$ extract will relieve her from this painful condition. Let's hunt $npc:21000353$ to relieve $npc:11000960$ from such a painful condition.

quest.name: Undoing the Damage
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000746$ jokingly said that Lo could make himself more handsome if he had a seed from the $map:02000023$. She didn't expect him to actually try to take it! To make matters worse, he's placed an enchanted mask on Moomoo, turning the giant into his thrall.
Now it's up to you to take down $npc:23000035$ and get that $item:30000329$ back.

quest.name: Song of the Ladybugs
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000876$ went to $map:02000215$ to listen to the ladybugs sing, but it seems that something has made the ladybugs horribly sick. $npcName:11000876$ thinks that the $npcPlural:21090176$, $npcPlural:21090177$, and $npcPlural:21090175$ are behind this trouble.
You know what to do.

quest.name: Another World
quest.desc: $npc:11001016$ was teleported through time and space to Maple World by a mage. With no way to get back to his own kingdom, he's decided to claim $map:02000181$ as his own. As the new liege in town, he's tasked you with clearing the castle grounds of $npcPlural:21000220$, $npcPlural:21000222$, and $npcPlural:21000266$.

quest.name: Rebellion of the Heretics
quest.desc: $npc:11001053$ taught fighting skills to the Red Dragon Jaw Smashers, who were often ridiculed for their appearance. Unfortunately, the Red Dragon Jaw Smashers are abusing their skills to harass other innocent beings. Although $npc:11001053$ knows that's unacceptable, $npc:11001053$ still feels attached to the Red Dragon Jaw Smashers and would prefer having you do the job. I suppose it's up to me to defeat $npc:21000312$, $npc:21000311$, and $npc:21000310$ occupying $map:02000093$.
quest.manual: Hunt the Red Dragon Jaw Smashers occupying $map:02000093$

quest.name: Innocence Lost
quest.desc: $npc:11001052$ is trying to catch Little Croix, one of the Demon King's underlings. $npc:11001052$ rushed to $map:02000259$ after hearing that Croix was there, but it was too late… Croix was long gone after casting the spirit of the demon to the toys, thereby turning them into monsters. $npc:11001052$ says that in order to find Little Croix, items that belong to the toy monsters imbued with the spirit of Croix are required. I have to hunt $npc:21000279$, $npc:21000168$, and $npc:21000195$ in $map:02000259$, and acquire $item:30000359$, $item:30000360$, and $item:30000361$!
quest.manual: Hunt $npc:21000279$ to acquire $item:30000359$|Hunt $npc:21000168$ to acquire $item:30000360$|Hunt $npc:21000195$ to acquire $item:30000361$

quest.name: Money and Honor
quest.desc: Some of the researchers from the $map:02000269$ ran away with the data containing an important technical document. $npc:11001033$ thinks they simply got tired of conducting the same research all day, and are planning to sell the technology to an unknown organization in $map:02000100$. But what $npc:11001033$ was most appalled by is the fact that they sprayed the sleeping gas that was developed to be equipped on weapons. Fortunately, the effects of the weren't life-threatening to the researchers. Let's wake up the researchers who fell asleep because of the gas, and send them to a safe place.
quest.manual: Wake up the researchers who fell asleep because of the sleeping gas

quest.name: The Bunny and the Moon
quest.desc: $npc:11000885$ was chasing the halo around the moon with friends in an attempt to travel through time, and somehow ended up in $map:02000280$. $npcName:11000885$'s friends got hungry and ate some carrots they found on the field…but that turned them into monstrous bunnies. Who knew carrots could be so dangerous? Let's defeat $npc:21090189$, $npc:21090187$, and $npc:21090188$, who all turned into monsters because of the curse.
quest.manual: Defeat the monster bunnies who became zombies due to the curse of time

quest.name: Isolated Agent
quest.desc: $npc:11001040$ from the marine exploratory base HQ got stuck in this place while investigating the mountain peak that suddenly froze when the dimensional rift of Ludibrium was twisted. $npc:11001040$ seems to be the only survivor in $map:02000260$, as all of the other researchers either disappeared in the snow, or lost their lives due to the monsters' attack. Let's defeat $npc:21000002$, $npc:21000199$, and $npc:21000089$, who are all blocking the way, so that $npcName:11001040$ can safely escape $map:02000260$.

quest.name: Mysterious Screams
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001041$ is looking pretty ragged. She says she's been kept up the last few nights by the echoes of children crying, madmen screaming, and animals howling. To make things work, prehistoric monsters have started showing up in the nearby fields.
$npcName:11001041$ is certain this is no coincidence, and wants you to bring her $itemPlural:30000345$, $itemPlural:30000346$, and $itemPlural:30000344$ to aid in her divinations.
quest.manual: Destroy icebergs to get $itemPlural:30000344$ |Hunt $npcNamePlural:21000199$ for $itemPlural:30000345$ |Hunt $npcNamePlural:21000089$ for $itemPlural:30000346$

quest.name: A Piercing Wind
quest.desc:
After her divination, $npcName:11001041$ is petrified with fear. She received visions of ancient $npcNamePlural:21000199$ and $npcNamePlural:21000089$ gathering to awaken $npcName:23000026$, an terrible demon who was defeated by the Sages. If the demon awakens, $map:02000260$ will surely be engulfed in icy darkness.
Defeat $npcName:23000026$ and avert this terrible prophecy.

quest.name: The Enemy Within
quest.desc: $npc:11001043$'s job was to make sure the core technology of $map:02000277$ doesn't leak out. Unfortunately, there was a traitor from within; one of the team members was bribed by the mafia and stole the technology. The most urgent task at hand is to destroy the robotic weapons by manipulating the system, while simultaneously escaping the area. I have to destroy all of $npc:21000245$, $npc:21000247$, and $npc:21000242$ in $map:02000277$.
quest.manual: Destroy the killer robot weapons devastating $map:02000277$

quest.name: Heavy Security
quest.desc: Fortunately, the number of dangerous robotic weapons has been greatly reduced thanks to a quick response. But it's still too early to relax! $npc:11001043$ says the ones who stole the technology will come back to $map:02000277$ in order to destroy the evidence. $npcName:11001043$ is going to do whatever possible to capture the suspects. I'll need to activate the intruder detection sensor installed in $map:02000277$.
quest.manual: Install the intruder detection sensors in various spots around $map:02000277$

quest.name: Christmas Clothes
quest.desc: $npc:11001044$ delivers Christmas presents to children all over Maple World every year. One day, $npc:11001044$ went to take a relaxing bath only to find out that monsters stole all of $item:30000348$ and $item:30000349$ upon his return. Let's go to $map:02000261$ to reclaim Papa Santa's items that were stolen by $npc:21000227$ and $npc:21000263$.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02000261$ to reclaim $item:30000348$ from the monsters|Go to $map:02000261$ to reclaim $item:30000349$ from the monsters

quest.name: Shocking Development
quest.desc: $npc:11001045$ was dispatched to fix the utility pole that was letting out sparks in $map:02000276$. $npc:11001045$ found out that the electric current is much stronger than expected, and is worried about not being able to check all of the utility poles before all of the electricity leaks out. I'll have to find the high-voltage electrical wire and disconnect it to help $npc:11001045$.

quest.name: Research Gone Wrong
quest.desc: A long time ago, Dr. Kernel discovered that magnetic energy and electricity are combined, immense power can be drawn out. Wanting to find out just how powerful this energy can be, Dr. Kernel performed an experiment that was considered extremely controversial on a wild bear. But this experiment went awry, and $npc:22000023$ the electrical bear was created. No one was able to control this vicious bear, and it not only injured Dr. Kernel, but also destroyed the entirety of $map:02000276$. I must defeat $npc:22000023$ that is putting $map:02000276$ in great peril.

quest.name: Listen to Me…Or Else
quest.desc: $npc:11001047$ is not very happy about how the reformation project of the Goldus Industrial Development Institute is going. Despite its objective of trying to provide jobs for criminals and hoodlums instead of sending them to jail, these ungrateful delinquents don't care about jobs and are slacking off all day. $npc:11001047$ request that I teach them a lesson so that they can get back to work.

quest.name: Shrouded in Darkness
quest.desc: As most unicorns have disappeared after getting possessed by demonic spirits, only a handful of unicorns remain. They've been hiding in $map:02000192$ as they attempt to recover their magical power. Despite their efforts, they've been getting weaker ever since the Kwinko Grave Robbers have begun occupying $map:02000192$. A unicorn named $npc:11001058$ is asking if you can get the $item:30000352$ back, as the unicorns cannot regain their power without it. I'll have to defeat $npc:21091023$, $npc:21000110$, and $npc:21091021$ to reclaim the $item:30000352$.
quest.manual: Reclaim the stolen $item:30000352$ from the monsters in $map:02000192$

quest.name: This Little Light of Mine
quest.desc: Now that $npc:11001058$ has the $item:30000352$, there's one last thing to do before the unicorns can regain their lost power. $npc:11001058$ says if I light up the extinguished beacon crystal, they will then be able to receive the regenerative energy from the crystal. Let's light up the extinguished beacon crystal in $map:02000192$.
quest.manual: Light up the extinguished beacon crystal in $map:02000192$

quest.name: Everlasting Childhood
quest.desc: Living in the space of suspended time, $npc:11000783$ is unbelievably bored, as every day feels the same. $npc:11000783$ now understands why his girlfriend Korin left this place to become an adult. $npc:11000783$ asked you if you could help him get $item:30000378$, so that he too can become an adult… and maybe find Korin one day as well. Let's hunt $npc:21000163$, $npc:21000171$, and $npc:21000194$ in $map:02000262$ to acquire $item:30000378$.

quest.name: Enemy or Ally
quest.desc: 어둠의 땅의 카카린은 커닝시티의 한 브로커를 통해 $item:30000353$에 대한 정보를 입수하여, $map:02000273$$pp:를,을$ 습격했다. 사건의 현장을 모두 기록하고 있던 로봇 $npc:11000850$$pp:는,은$ 사건 정보를 저장하던 중 에너지의 고갈로 동작이 멈춰버린다. $npc:11000850$의 시스템 초기화 직전 마지막 저장되어 있는 기록에 따라, 에너지 저장 캡슐에 보관되어 있는 $item:30000353$$pp:를,을$ 가져오자.
quest.manual: Bring $item:30000353$ that is being kept in the energy storage capsule

quest.name: Beloved Brother
quest.desc: $npc:11001076$ is part of the Snowfolk, and is the younger brother of $npcName:11000018$, the weapon seller in $map:02000051$. To meet his brother, he decided to leave his hometown and venture into $map:02000051$. On his way to $map:02000051$, $npc:11001076$ heard about $item:30000351$, a highly valuable and expensive material for a weapon. It can be found in $map:02000011$, but Snowfolk like $npc:11001076$ won't be able to endure the hot temperature. I'll have to acquire $item:30000351$ for $npc:11001076$.
quest.manual: Find the red rock in $map:02000011$ and acquire $item:30000351$

quest.name: Typical Masterminds
quest.desc: $npc:11000837$ noticed the greedy Kwinko Grave Robbers were acting suspicious, and decided to track them. The Kwinko Grave Robbers arrived in $map:02000176$, which is one of the ancient ruins managed by the Ereve Royal Court. $npc:11000837$ is determined to reveal all of their schemes once and for all. $npc:11000837$ request that I defeat $npc:21091022$, $npc:21091024$, and $npc:21091094$, to stop them from stealing the relics while $npc:11000837$ goes for the leader of the Kwinko Grave Robbers.
quest.manual: Defeat the monsters trying to steal relics in $map:02000176$

quest.name: Believe It or Not
quest.desc: Getting tired of going through the same routine every day, $npc:11001059$ went fishing to relieve some stress. $npc:11001059$ dozed off while fishing, however, and somehow woke up in $map:02000263$. But because $npc:11001059$ enjoys ice fishing so much, $npc:11001059$ isn't questioning how it happened, or isn't even trying to get back home. …Despite that, $npc:11001059$ asked me to kick out $npc:21091024$ and $npc:21091022$ disturbing the otherwise peaceful and quiet fishing grounds.

quest.name: Midlife Crisis
quest.desc: $npc:11001059$ is really getting into ice fishing! But $npc:11001059$ still isn't used to the cold weather in $map:02000263$. It's plainly obvious it's going to take a while to catch some big fish. $npc:11001059$ is asking if I could help him make a fire around the fishing area. $npc:11001059$ also needs $item:30000358$, which could be used as bait.
quest.manual: Acquire $item:30000354$ to make a fire|Catch $item:30000358$ to be used as fishing bait

quest.name: Plotting Schemes
quest.desc: Arguing that the archaic research methods and just plain stubbornness are getting in the way of technological development, $npc:11000848$ wants to release the technology containing all the crucial information collected over the years…in exchange for obscene amounts of money. $npc:11000848$ wants me to collect the core energy sources that have been planted inside the monsters in the center. Let's defeat $npc:21000296$, $npc:21000248$, and $npc:21000110$ in $map:02000274$, and collect $item:30000355$ and $item:30000356$.
quest.manual: Hunt monsters in $map:02000274$ to collect $item:30000355$|Hunt monsters in $map:02000274$ to collect $item:30000356$

quest.name: 나의 죄를 씻어주오
quest.desc: $npc:11001077$$pp:는,은$ 보름달이 떠오른 어느 날 밤, 마왕의 하수인이 잠들어 있는 악마 개를 깨울 때 부르던 켈베로스의 노래를 자신도 모르게 흥얼거렸다고 한다. 결국 $map:02000044$에 잠들어 있던 사나운 악마의 개 $npc:23000045$$pp:는,은$ 깨어나 버렸고, 자신의 경솔한 행동이 불러온 재앙 때문에 $npc:11001077$$pp:는,은$ 깊은 죄책감에 빠져버린다. 반쯤 넋 나간 사람이 되어 방랑생활을 하고 있는 $npc:11001077$$pp:가,이$ 마음의 죄를 덜어낼 수 있도록, $map:02000044$에서 깨어난 사나운 악마의 개 $npc:23000045$$pp:를,을$ 처치하자!

quest.name: Dungeon: Piece of Cake
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20014002$ (Entrance: $map:02000011$) Party Size: 10 The quest is only available in challenge mode.
By imperial decree, any prisoner who defeats $npcName:23100011$ 50 or more times in $map:02000311$ will be granted a special pardon. $npcName:11001079$ wants to take advantage of this opportunity, but he's getting cold feet about facing $npcName:23100011$. Perhaps you can go in his place.

quest.name: 우리 딸 좀 말려주세요
quest.desc: $map:02000167$에 살고 있는 $npc:11001115$. 그녀는 하나밖에 없는 외동딸 $npc:11001116$$pp:가,이$ 아무것도 안 하고 하루 종일 시무룩한 상태로 오염된 정원 주변만 서성이고 있어 걱정이 이만저만이 아니다. $npc:11001115$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11001116$$pp:를,을$ 만나 집으로 어서 돌아오라는 말을 전해달라고 한다.

quest.name: 마음이 아픈 이유
quest.desc: $npc:11001116$$pp:는,은$ 씨앗을 파는 한 노파로부터 새빨간 튤립꽃을 피우는 씨앗을 받아 정원에 심었지만, 자신의 생각과는 다르게 씨앗에서는 맹독의 몬스터들이 태어났다고 한다. 이 모든 게 자신의 경솔함에서 비롯됐다며 죄책감 때문에 집으로 돌아갈 수 없다고 말하는 $npc:11001116$. $map:02000328$에 있는 $npc:24001101$, $npc:24001102$$pp:를,을$ 처치하자!

quest.name: 오염되어버린 정원
quest.desc: $map:02000328$$pp:가,이$ 본래의 아름다운 모습을 되찾은 후, 한 동안 $map:02000167$의 사람들은 정원을 다시 찾았다. 하지만 시간이 흐르면서 정원의 식물들은 다시 생기를 잃어가며 오염되기 시작했고, $npc:11001116$$pp:는,은$ 다시 깊이 상심하고 만다. 아무래도 정원에 나타난 거대한 식인 꽃 $npc:24001103$$pp:가,이$ 의심된다는 $npc:11001116$. $map:02000328$$pp2:로,으로$ 다시 한번 가서, $npc:24001103$$pp:를,을$ 처치하자.

quest.name: Hazardous Working Conditions
quest.desc: $npc:11001140$ says the gas tanks around $map:02000110$ are dangerous. If one of the $npc:21000281$ throws a bomb the wrong direction, they're all doomed. $npc:11001140$ needs you to lend a hand inspecting the gas tanks for leaks and making sure all the valves are closed, so they don't have a major accident.
quest.manual: Inspect the gas tanks to prevent an explosion in $map:02000110$

quest.name: 지킬 건 지키고 삽시다!
quest.desc: $npc:11001129$$pp:는,은$ 환경 오염에 대한 일말의 책임감 따위는 느끼지 않는 사람들 때문에 잔뜩 화가 나 있다. 서로 조금씩만 협조하면 될 것을, 무분별한 쓰레기 투기 때문에 $map:02000139$$pp:는,은$ 점점 더 쓰레기장처럼 변해버리고 있다고 한다. $map:02000139$ 주변에 널려있는 쓰레기들을 치우자.

quest.name: 심봤다!
quest.desc: $npc:11001130$$pp:는,은$ 웬만해서는 구할 수 없는 진귀한 약초인 $item:30000385$$pp:를,을$ 발견했지만, 그 기쁨도 잠시. 멋모르고 $item:30000385$$pp:를,을$ 채집하러 $map:52000037$에 들어갔다가 죽을뻔했다고 한다. $npc:11001130$$pp:를,을$ 대신해 $map:52000037$ 안으로 들어가서 $item:30000385$$pp:를,을$ 채집해오자.

quest.name: 한기를 품은 괴물
quest.desc: $npc:11001131$$pp:는,은$ 이상기후로 인해 일부 지역만 녹지 않는 얼음이 생겨버린 $map:02000085$$pp:를,을$ 조사하기 위해 파견을 나왔다. 오랜 시간 주변을 살펴보던 $npc:11001131$$pp:는,은$ $npc:21099190$$pp:가,이$ 뿜어대는 한기가 녹지 않는 얼음의 주범임을 밝혀내고, $npc:21099190$$pp:를,을$ 처치해 달라고 부탁한다.

quest.name: 여기, 사람 있어요!
quest.desc: $map:02000085$ 한복판에 들리는 한 여자의 소리. 소리가 나는 근처로 가보니 $map:02000330$ 안에서 들려오는 도움 요청이다. 창고 안에 고립되어 있는 $npc:11001138$$pp:는,은$ 밖에서 창고 문이 잠기는 바람에 사람들과 함께 창고 내부에 고립되어 있다고 한다. $npc:11001138$$pp:는,은$ 잠겨버린 창고 문의 열쇠를 가지고 있는 $npc:11001133$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가라고 한다. $map:02000085$에서 $npc:11001133$$pp:를,을$ 찾아보자.

quest.name: 잃어버린 열쇠
quest.desc: $npc:11001133$$pp:는,은$ 잠겨버린 창고 문을 열기 위해 열쇠를 찾아서 되돌아가는 중 갑작스러운 몬스터들의 공격을 받아 $item:30000386$$pp:를,을$ 잃어버렸다고 한다. $map:02000085$에 있는 $npc:21000063$, $npc:21000302$, $npc:21000016$, $npc:21099190$$pp:를,을$ 사냥하여, 잃어버린 $item:30000386$$pp:를,을$ 되찾아주자.

quest.name: 그리웠던 바깥 공기
quest.desc: $npc:11001133$$pp:는,은$ 한 시가 급한 상황이라고 말하며, 서둘러 $item:30000386$$pp2:로,으로$ 잠겨있는 문을 열고, 갇혀있는 사람들을 구해달라고 부탁한다. $map:02000330$ 내부로 진입하여, 갇혀 있는 사람들을 구출하자.

quest.name: 희귀한 가죽
quest.desc: 전국의 희귀한 가죽을 찾아 떠돌아다니는 $npc:11001139$$pp:는,은$ 한동안 주춤하다가 오랜만에 마음에 쏙 드는 희귀한 가죽을 발견한다. 직접 무두질을 하기에는 워낙 사나운 몬스터들을 상대할 자신이 없었던 $npc:11001139$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000054$에 있는 $npc:21000026$의 $item:30000387$$pp:와,과$ $npc:21000067$의 $item:30000388$$pp:를,을$ 구해다 달라고 부탁한다.

quest.name: 모험과 신비가 가득한 그 곳!
quest.desc: $npc:11000471$$pp:는,은$ 얼마 전 $map:02000136$에서 이상한 광경을 목격했다고 한다. 이 근처를 돌아다니다 보면 푸른빛이 번쩍번쩍한 모자가 마술처럼 나타나는데, 마치 새로운 공간으로 통하는 차원의 문 같다는 것이다. 무슨 일이 벌어질지 몰라서 무작정 들어가 볼 순 없지만, 분명 무언가 신비하고 재미있는 일이 가득할 거라고 한다. 언젠가 푸른빛의 모자가 나타나면 모자 속 세상을 꼭 한번 다녀오고 얘기를 전해달라고 말하는 $npc:11000471$. 과연 그곳은 어떤 곳일지 탐험해보자!
quest.manual: 푸른빛이 새어나오는 모자 속 세상을 탐험해보기

quest.name: 나쁜 놈, 그리고 나쁜 놈
quest.desc: $npc:11000220$$pp:는,은$ 언젠가 $map:02000136$$pp:가,이$ 완공되면, 이 근방에서 가장 멋진 랜드마크가 될 거라는 자부심을 가지고 있다. 허나 그것도 어디까지나 '완성' 되었을 때의 이야기. 최근 난폭한 몬스터들이 록펠러 타워 현장을 점령하면서 기물 파손은 물론, 곳곳에 화재를 일으키는 일도 부지기수가 되어버려 갈수록 공사 진척도가 더뎌지고 있다고 한다. 원활한 공사 진행을 위해 $map:02000136$$pp:를,을$ 점령하고 있는 $npc:21000282$, $npc:21099049$$pp:를,을$ 처치하자!

quest.name: The Green Menace
quest.desc: $npcName:11001328$ has a grudge against the turtles of $map:02010043$ ever since they spooked his salamander mount. He's asked you to do something about the $npcNamePlural:21000143$, $npcNamePlural:21000144$, and $npcNamePlural:21000145$ so that they never terrorize a poor, defenseless salamander ever again.

quest.name: A Daring Theft
quest.desc:
Last night, a gang of $npcNamePlural:21000423$ and $npcNamePlural:21000417$ busted into $npcName:11001350$'s vacation home and stole a bunch of $itemPlural:30000451$.
$npcName:11001329$, who is supposed to be watching the home, is in a panic. See if you can help reclaim the stolen goods.
quest.manual: Reclaim $itemPlural:30000451$ stolen by the monsters in $map:02010084$

quest.name: Mr. Arthur's Day Out
quest.desc: $npcName:11001330$ is drowning his sorrows in cheeseburgers, but no amount of ground beef can solve his marital troubles. Find out if there's any way you can help.

quest.name: Mrs. Arthur's Day Out
quest.desc: After a hard day's shopping, $npcName:11001331$ was rewarded by having all of her new items stolen by monsters! She refuses to go home until she gets everything back. Hunt the $npcNamePlural:21000726$, $npcNamePlural:21000720$, and $npcNamePlural:21000714$ around $map:02010010$ and retrieve her $itemPlural:30000452$.

quest.name: A Mall in Crisis
quest.desc: $npcName:11001332$, president of the $map:02010010$ Merchant Union, is overwhelmed by customer complaints. It seems that rampaging monsters are bad for business. Defeat the $npcNamePlural:21000726$, $npcNamePlural:21000720$, and $npcNamePlural:21000714$ that have attacked $map:02010010$.

quest.name: Addicted to Coconade
quest.desc: $npcName:11001333$'s pet $npcName:11001334$ is throwing a tantrum because he wants to drink $item:30000453$. You know just how to handle a tantrum: give him whatever he wants until he shuts up.
quest.manual: Get $item:30000453$ from the vending machine in $map:02010010$

quest.name: Laziness Is a Virtue
quest.desc: $npcName:11001335$ wants to return the skateboard he rented, but the shop is just too far, see? Now that it's past due, he's looking for someone to return it to $npcName:11001336$. Are you that someone?

quest.name: Late Fees
quest.desc: $npcName:11001336$ asked you to collect the abandoned rental skateboards scattered around $map:02010014$.

quest.name: The Thieving Swarm
quest.desc: $npcName:11001336$ is in utter shock after a swarm of bugs stole all of his $itemPlural:30000458$. Find the $npcNamePlural:21000434$ and $npcNamePlural:21000438$ in $map:02010014$ and get the stolen goods back.

quest.name: Bugging Out
quest.desc: $npcName:11001340$ in $map:02010014$ is having insect troubles at his food truck. Get rid of the $npcNamePlural:21000434$ and $npcNamePlural:21000438$ swarming the area.
quest.manual: Get rid of the bugs attacking $map:02010014$

quest.name: A Call for Help
quest.desc: $npcName:11001341$ was dispatched to $map:02010014$ to make war on the bugs there, but he was quickly overwhelmed. Find $npcName:11001342$ in $map:02010019$ and ask for backup.

quest.name: Like Rats in a Trap
quest.desc: $npcName:11001344$ has come to $map:02010019$ in search of escapees from Alikar Prison. With his keen guarding skills and your ability to look under beds and in closets, you'll recapture the inmates in no time.

quest.name: Impostors
quest.desc: $npcName:11001370$ claims that monsters have disguised themselves as repairmen and broken into $map:02010009$. Defeat the $npcNamePlural:21000735$ and $npcNamePlural:21000732$.

quest.name: Safety First
quest.desc: $npcName:11001370$ is worried about the real repairmen who were trapped in $map:52010009$. Help get them to safety.

quest.name: Precious Gifts
quest.desc: $npcName:11001373$ is on the verge of tears because all the gifts she bought for her family were stolen by monsters during the evacuation. Hunt down $npcNamePlural:21000735$ and $npcNamePlural:21000732$ in $map:02010009$ to get the $itemPlural:30000479$ back.

quest.name: 한정품은 필수
quest.desc: $npc:11001374$$pp:는,은$ 알리바가 한정판 최신 스포츠카를 사 오라고 했는데, $map:02010016$$pp:를,을$ 점령한 몬스터들 때문에 차마 움직일 용기가 나질 않는다. $npc:11001374$$pp:가,이$ 건네준 $item:30000480$$pp:를,을$ 들고 $map:02010016$의 $npc:11001375$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가자.

quest.name: 믿고 받는 알리바 백지수표
quest.desc: $npc:11001375$$pp:는,은$ $item:30000480$라면 확인이나 계약절차 없이도 무조건 차를 내줄 수 있다며 $item:30000481$$pp:를,을$ 가지고 가라고 선뜻 내어준다.
quest.manual: 스페셜 부스에 전시된 한정판 최신 스포츠카를 재조립해서 가져가기

quest.name: 이놈들, 차라리 나를 때려라
quest.desc: $npc:11001375$$pp:는,은$ $map:02010016$$pp:를,을$ 습격한 몬스터들을 모두 쫓아내 달라고 부탁한다. $npc:21000525$, $npc:21000528$, $npc:21000531$$pp:를,을$ 처치하자.

quest.name: 자동차는 사랑입니다
quest.desc: 자신보다 전시되어 있는 자동차들을 더 소중이 생각하는 $npcName:11001375$. $map:02010016$에 또 한차례 몬스터들이 쳐들어오기 전에 서둘러 전시되어 있는 차들을 안전하게 컨테이너 박스 안에 넣어서 보관해 달라고 부탁한다.
quest.manual: $map:02010016$에 전시된 자동차를 컨테이너 박스 안에 보관하기

quest.name: Quality Television
quest.desc: Reality television! That's the future! $npcName:11001376$ is going to hit the big time with real live footage of the chaos at $map:02010020$. Gather the $itemPlural:30000482$ for him.

quest.name: Fair and Square
quest.desc: $npcName:11001377$ is suspicious of the results of the latest match. Collect the $item:30000483$ from $map:52010010$ to help assuage—or confirm—her fears.

quest.name: 선수의 명예를 걸고
quest.desc: $map:02010020$의 $npc:11001378$$pp:는,은$ 세상에서 단 하나뿐인 자신의 이름이 새겨진 글러브를 몬스터들에게 빼앗겼다고 한다. $map:02010020$에 있는 $npc:21000419$, $npc:21000420$$pp:를,을$ 사냥하여 $item:30000484$$pp:를,을$ 찾아주자.

quest.name: 뜨거운 주먹맛
quest.desc: $npc:11001379$$pp:는,은$ 갑작스럽게 $map:02010020$$pp:를,을$ 습격한 몬스터들 때문에 골머리를 썩고 있다. $npc:11001379$$pp:를,을$ 도와서 $npc:21000419$, $npc:21000420$$pp:를,을$ 쫓아내자.

quest.name: 던전 : 사라지는 여행자들
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25009001$ (입구 맵 : $map:02010023$)
$npc:11001399$$pp:는,은$ 최근 발견된 $map:02010023$의 피라미드에 대한 조사가 한창이다. 오랜 시간 발견되지 않았던 피라미드가 얼마 전 사막의 큰 모래폭풍이 일고 난 이후에 발견되었다는 것. 정찰병들이 피라미드를 조사하기 위해 떠났지만 몇날 며칠이 지나도 소식이 없다고 말하며 아무래도 무언가 안에서 일이 생긴게 틀림없다고 한다. $map:02010070$ 내부로 들어가 실종된 정찰병들의 생사여부를 확인하자.
quest.manual: $map:02010070$ 내부로 들어가 실종된 정찰병들의 생사 여부 확인하기

quest.name: 던전 : 욕심의 끝
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25009001$ (입구 맵 : $map:02010023$)
$npc:11001399$$pp:는,은$ 본부에 $map:02010070$에 대한 위험성을 전하긴 했지만 지금도 유적지를 찾아오는 여행객들 사이에는 여전히 환영의 메아리가 들려오고 있어 걱정이라고 한다. $npc:11001314$$pp:는,은$ $npc:24001904$$pp:를,을$ 완벽하게 봉인시키려면 $npc:24001904$의 유품을 구해 성불을 해주어야 한다고 일러주었다고 한다. $map:02010070$에서 $npc:24001904$$pp:를,을$ 처치하고 $item:30000495$$pp:를,을$ 구해오자.

quest.name: 던전 : 선로를 벗어난 열차
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21015001$ (입구 맵 : $map:02010009$) 파티권장 (4명) 노멀 모드에서만 퀘스트 수행이 가능합니다.
$npc:11001458$$pp:는,은$ 물품을 운반하는 불랙노프호에 탑승했다가 갑자기 열차가 선로를 바꾸는 바람에 떨어졌다고 한다. $npcName:11001458$$pp:는,은$ 루델리 모노레일에서 딱 한번 열차가 정차할 때가 있으니, 이 틈을 타서 달리는 블랙노프호에 탑승하여 내부 상황 파악을 해달라고 부탁한다.

quest.name: 던전 : 대화의 시간은 끝났다
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21015001$ (입구 맵 : $map:02010009$) 파티권장 (4명) 노멀 모드에서만 퀘스트 수행이 가능합니다.
블랙노프호를 탈환했던 정체불명의 괴한들이 또다시 블랙노프호를 습격하는 사건이 발생했다. $npc:11001458$$pp:는,은$ 한 번도 아닌 두 번씩이나 블랙노프호를 노린건 흑성회를 무시하고 있는 뜻이기도 하다며 노발대발 하고 있다. $npcName:11001458$, 당시 블랙노프호에 잡혀있던 조직원으로부터 괴한 무리의 우두머리들에 대한 정보를 알아냈다고 말하며 $npc:24001508$, $npcName:24001506$, $npcName:24001507$$pp:를,을$ 처치해 달라고 부탁한다.
quest.manual: $map:02000335$에 있는 $npc:24001508$ 처치하기|$map:02000336$에 있는 $npcName:24001506$ 처치하기|$map:02000337$에 있는 $npcName:24001507$ 처치하기

quest.name: 알 수 없는 불길함
quest.desc: 나즈카르 중앙 홀에서 만난 $npc:11001473$$pp:는,은$ 나즈카르 신전 내부를 조사하겠다고 들어간 자신의 동료 $npcName:11001474$$pp:가,이$ 반나절이 지나도록 돌아오지 않는다며 걱정한다. 날이 어두워지기 전에 서둘러 돌아가야 한다는 $npcName:11001473$$pp:는,은$ 나즈카르 안으로 들어가 $npcName:11001474$$pp:를,을$ 찾아보고, 서둘러 돌아오라는 자신의 말을 전해달라고 부탁한다.

quest.name: 던전 : 어둠을 깨우는 자
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20016002$ (입구 맵 : $map:02010030$) 파티권장 (10명)
$map:02010030$에서 만난 $npc:11001474$$pp:는,은$ 잔뜩 겁에 질려 오들오들 떨고 있다. 알 수 없는 거대한 그림자가 $map:02010051$$pp2:로,으로$ 들어가는 것을 목격했다는 것이다. 틀림없이 저곳에서 수상한 일이 벌어지고 있을 거라고 추측하는 $npcName:11001474$$pp:는,은$ 서둘러 $map:02010051$ 안으로 들어가 검은 그림자의 실체에 대해 파악해 달라고 부탁한다.
quest.manual: $map:02010030$ 내부로 진입하여 검은 그림자의 실체 확인하기

quest.name: 스승님의 소식
quest.desc: $npcName:11000001$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000361$에서 $npcName:11001232$$pp:가,이$ 찾고 있다며 그녀를 만나보라고 한다.

quest.name: 중요한 단서
quest.desc: $npcName:11001232$$pp:는,은$ $npcName:11001229$$pp:가,이$ 돌아온다는 소식을 전한다. $npcName:11001229$$pp:는,은$ 급하게 찾아야 할 물건이 있어 예전에 찾았던 $map:52000021$에 가 있다고 하니, $npcName:11001229$$pp:를,을$ 만나러 $map:52000021$$pp2:로,으로$ 가보자.

quest.name: 고대의 서책
quest.desc: $npcName:11001232$$pp:는,은$ $npcName:11001230$$pp:가,이$ 고대의 서책 해독을 위해 엘리니아로 떠났다는 소식을 전한다. $npcName:11001230$$pp:는,은$ 고대 서책은 룬의 힘으로 공간이동을 시킬 수 없기 때문에 뱃길로 이동을 해야한다는 사실과 $map:02000063$을 통해 $map:02000023$$pp2:로,으로$ 곧장 이동할 것이라는 자신들의 계획을 전해왔다고 한다. 계속해서 $npcName:11001229$에게 다음 계획에 대해 들어보자.

quest.name: 계획의 시작
quest.desc: $npcName:11001229$$pp:는,은$ 자신이 $npcName:11001232$$pp:와,과$ 함께 $map:02000063$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npcName:11001230$$pp:와,과$ 원정대를 맞이하는 동안 $map:02000023$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npcName:11000031$$pp:를,을$ 만나라고 한다. $npcName:11000031$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가 $npcName:11001231$의 상황과 '궁극의 비기'에 대한 소식을 전하고, 미리 양해를 구한 뒤 도움을 청해보자.

quest.name: 한 발 늦은 도착
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000063$$pp2:로,으로$ 룬 블레이더들과 원정대가 도착할 것이라는 소식을 듣고 $map:02000063$에는 해적들이 기승을 부리고 있어 온전하게 동료들이 돌아오지 못할 거라며 염려한다. $npcName:11000031$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000063$$pp2:로,으로$ 가 동료들의 생사여부를 확인하고 모두 $map:02000023$$pp2:로,으로$ 데리고 올 것을 명한다. $map:02000063$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 룬 블레이더 동료들의 생사여부를 확인하자.

quest.name: 부상
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$$pp:와,과$ 원정대가 타고 왔던 배는 $map:02000063$에 도착하자마자 해적들의 습격으로 아수라장이 되어 있고 곳곳에 부상당한 원정대원들이 쓰러져 있다. $npcName:11001232$$pp:는,은$ 부상당한 $npcName:11001233$$pp:를,을$ 비롯해 원정대 폐선 상황 정리는 자신에게 맡기고, $npcName:11001229$$pp:를,을$ 도와 해적들의 본거지를 소탕하고 약탈당한 고대 서책과 물품들을 되찾아 오라고 말한다. 첼리스카 해안 외곽 동굴 안에 있는 해적들의 본거지를 찾아가자!
quest.complete: $map:02000063$ 외곽 동굴 쪽에 있는 해적 본거지 찾아가기

quest.name: 계속되는 난제
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$$pp:는,은$ 자신의 부상보다 근처에 해적들과 맞서고 있는 $npcName:11001229$$pp:와,과$ 원정대를 도와주는 것이 급선무라고 한다. 원정대와 함께 해적들의 본거지에 있는 해적들을 모두 소탕하고, 약탈당한 고대의 서책을 되찾아야 한다.

quest.name: 어떤 간절함
quest.desc: $npcName:11001229$$pp:는,은$ 곧장 $map:02000023$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:11000031$에게 이곳 상황을 전하고 도움을 요청하라고 지시한다. 서둘러 $map:02000023$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가 $npcName:11000031$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 따뜻한 배려
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$$pp:는,은$ 많이 지쳐보인다며 룬 블레이더 동료들과 원정대가 $map:02000023$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아오는 동안 먼저 몸을 추스리고 휴식을 취하고 있으라고 말한다. $map:02000023$에 있는 $npc:11000029$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가보자.

quest.name: 위기는 희망으로
quest.desc: 라리는 부상당한 룬 블레이더 동료들과 원정대원들이 지금 막 $map:02000023$에 도착했다는 소식을 전해준다. 부상이 생각보다 깊은 룬 블레이더를 위해 $npcName:11000031$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:11000032$$pp:가,이$ 직접 $map:02000179$에서 치료를 해주고 있다고 한다. 스승 $npcName:11001229$$pp:와,과$ 동료들을 만나러 $map:02000179$$pp2:로,으로$ 가보자.

quest.name: 지체할 수 없는 걸음
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$$pp:는,은$ 고대 서책을 해독하고, $npcName:11001231$$pp:를,을$ 막기 위해서는 보다 많은 병력이 필요할 것이라고 한다. 동료들이 치료를 받고 잠시 휴식을 취하는 동안 $npc:11000075$$pp:를,을$ 만나 긴급 소집령을 내려달라고 말하는 $npcName:11000031$. $npc:11000075$$pp:를,을$ 만나기 위해서는 먼저 $npc:11000119$$pp:를,을$ 찾아가 왕실 출입 허가를 받아야 할 것이라 당부한다. $map:02000001$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $npc:11000119$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: Asimov's Command
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$의 지령을 $npc:11000075$에게 전달해야 한다는 말을 들은 $npcName:11000119$$pp:는,은$ 왕궁 출입을 허가해준다. $map:02000025$ 안으로 가서 $npcName:11000075$$pp:를,을$ 만나고, $npcName:11000031$의 지령을 전하자.

quest.name: 특별한 소집
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$의 전달 내용을 확인한 $npc:11000075$$pp:는,은$ 생각보다 상황이 다급하게 흐르고 있음을 파악하고 각 수호세력 대표자들에게 소집령을 내리겠다고 말한다. $npcName:11000075$$pp:는,은$ 각 수호대표들이 모이기 전까지 $map:52000026$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 기다리라고 한다. $map:02000001$ 북서쪽 $map:02000119$ 방향 입구 주변으로 가면 $map:52000026$ 입구를 찾을 수 있다. 그곳으로 가 보자.

quest.name: 쉽지 않은 화합
quest.desc: $npcName:11000601$$pp:는,은$ 원정대 요청에 가장 부정적이었던 시프와 어쌔신을 설득하는 것이 중요하다고 말하며, 험플스를 이끄는 $npcName:11000006$의 마음을 얻으면 어쌔신도 합류할 수 있을 것이라고 말한다. 루아나의 조언대로 $map:02000208$$pp2:로,으로$ 이동하여 $npcName:11000006$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 증명
quest.desc: $npcName:11000006$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000065$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:11000251$$pp:와의,과의$ 유착관계를 밝히기 위해 흑성회에 몰래 잠입한 험플스 요원 한 명이 지하 하수구에 갇혀있어 다급한 상황임을 말해준다. $map:02000100$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $map:52000027$ 입구를 찾아 들어가서 임무를 수행하고 있는 $npc:11000051$$pp:를,을$ 도와 고립되어 있는 험플스 대원을 구출하자.

quest.name: 희망을 품은 약속
quest.desc: $npcName:11000006$$pp:는,은$ 무사히 험플스 대원을 구출해준 것에 대한 보답으로 최고의 어쌔씬을 선별해서 별빛 원정대에 합류할 수 있도록 $map:02000023$$pp2:로,으로$ 보내준다고 약속한다. $map:02000023$의 $map:02000179$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아가 스승 $npcName:11001229$에게 이 사실을 보고하자.

quest.name: 서서히 드러나는 실체
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$$pp:는,은$ 칼리브 아일랜드에서부터 가지온 온 고대 서책 중 한 권의 해독을 마쳤다고 한다. '궁극의 비기'의 실체에 대한 정보를 알 수 있는 단서가 보관된 곳의 위치를 알아냈다고 말하는 $npcName:11000031$. 책에서 가리키고 있는 좌표는 $map:02000129$라고 말해준다. $map:02000129$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 고대 룬 블레이더 선조들이 남겨놓은 단서가 있는지 찾아보고, $map:52000028$$pp2:로,으로$ 돌아오자.
quest.manual: Search for clues in $map:02000129$ to find out the truth behind the Ultimate Transcendence

quest.name: 진정한 힘의 원천
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$ stated that through combining the $item:30000538$ we may be able to discover the history of how the ancient ancestors of the Runebladers collected the "Ultimate Transcendence" and find the method to restore its power. Let's watch $npcName:11000031$ combine $item:30000538$.

quest.name: 운명의 대결
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$$pp:는,은$ 자신은 원정대를 집결한 뒤 마지막 점검을 마치고 후발대로 합류할테니, 먼저 선발대로 출발하는 $npcName:11001229$$pp:를,을$ 따라가 잘 보필해 줄 것을 부탁한다. $npcName:11001229$$pp:를,을$ 따라 $map:02000112$$pp2:로,으로$ 가서 $map:52000029$ 입구를 찾아서 이동하자.

quest.name: 참을 수 없는 배신감
quest.desc: $npcName:11001229$에 대한 안타까움과 사라진 $npcName:11001231$에 대한 불안감을 감추지 못하는 $npcName:11000031$. 일단은 누구보다 상처와 아픔이 컸을 동료 곁을 지켜주는 것이 좋겠다고 한다. $npcName:11000031$$pp:는,은$ 다음 행보에 대해 나름대로 계획을 세우고 있을 테니, $npcName:11001230$$pp:를,을$ 만나 위로를 해 주라고 한다.

quest.name: 실낱같은 희망을 꿈꾸며…
quest.desc: $npcName:11001232$$pp:는,은$ 어둠의 땅에서 돌아온 이후 $npcName:11001229$$pp:가,이$ 틈틈히 제자를 위한 선물을 만들고 있었다는 사실을 말해준다. $map:02000179$ 나무 아래 가지런히 놓여 있는 상자를 찾아서 열어보자.

quest.name: 불타는 커닝시티
quest.desc:
느닷없이 커닝시티로 침략해온 정체불명의 생명체! $npcName:11000044$은 사태수습을 위해 다크윈드 전 병력을 소집하고 비상사태 프로토콜, '블랙머쉬룸'을 발령한다. $map:52000067$ 지역에서 $npcName:11000044$의 지시에 따라 정체불명 생명체들의 침략을 방어하자.
<font color="#909090">(재 접속시, 퀘스트 진행 중 대사로 재진입 할 수 있습니다.)</font>
quest.manual: 모든 커닝시티 방어 임무 완수 하기 <font color="#909090">퀘스트 진행 중 대사로 재 진입 가능</font>

quest.name: Tria in Crisis
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000069$ warns that the forces of darkness are marching on Tria. $npcName:11000064$ is rallying the royal guards, but there simply aren't enough forces to protect the city. Hold the line while $npcName:11000069$ gets reinforcements!
If you leave by mistake, talk to $npcName:11001238$ to return.
quest.manual: Hold off $npcName:11001698$'s army at $map:52000068$ <font color="#909090">If you leave by mistake, talk to $npcName:11001238$ to return.</font>

quest.name: The Shield of Tria
quest.desc:
The enemy failed to capture Tria, but many guards fell in the battle. Speak to the injured with $npc:11000076$ at the $map:52000068$.
If you leave by mistake, speak with $npcName:11001238$ to return.

quest.name: Unite
quest.desc: The Maple Alliance needs your assistance. Speak with Empress $npcName:11001969$ in $map:52000087$.

quest.name: Eccentric Interests
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000042$, the master wizard, has concocted a spell using the Lumenstone to track the magical power of the lumarigon. Her expertise is vital in the mission to find $npcName:11001698$, but she's stubbornly refusing to do any field work.
See if you can change her mind.

quest.name: Eclipse of Ice and Fire
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ finally agreed to go on the mission with you. Begin by meeting her at $map:52000088$.

quest.name: Remnants of Dragon Magic
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ senses lumarigon magic coming from the rune stones in $map:52000088$. Take a closer look at these stones.

quest.name: Bathing in Fire
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ is sure that the dragon you're tracking is in fact lumarigon—or at least related to the lumarigon in some way. Based on what you found, you should search for more evidence in $map:52000089$ at $map:02000268$.

quest.name: The Wounded Dragon
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ can learn a lot about a dragon from its scales. Examine the scales in $map:52000089$.

quest.name: Teleportation Tag-along
quest.desc:
The dragon scales in $map:52000089$ were tainted with dark magic. $npcName:11000042$'s spell is now pointing her towards the Land of Darkness, but first she needs to visit the $map:02000146$ to get a more precise reading.
Speak with $npcName:11003089$ at the $map:02000146$.

quest.name: Breath of Darkness
quest.desc:
After arriving at $map:02000146$, $npcName:11000042$ picked up massive amounts of lumarigon magic in $map:52000090$. She needs you to hurry there, as the natural dark energies of the forest could make the dragon hard to track if it moves on.
Defeat $npcNamePlural:29000164$ in $map:52000090$, which can be found at $map:03000043$ in the Land of Darkness.

quest.name: The Phase-shifted Shadows
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000042$ has pinpointed the exact mix of lumarigon and dark magic needed for her tracking spell. Surprisingly, the location revealed to her by the spell isn't far.
Meet her at the $map:52000092$ beneath the $map:02000146$.

quest.name: Magic Counter
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000042$ discovered a stretch of distorted space. It's as if something is being hidden by magic. She is preparing a counterspell to remove the cloak, but she needs your help to gather reagents.
Gather $item:30000726$ in $map:52000093$.
quest.manual: Defeat monsters in $map:52000093$ or collect $item:30000726$ from runes

quest.name: Dark Essences
quest.desc: To continue the plan to reveal whatever is hidden here, gather $item:30000727$ in $map:52000094$.

quest.name: Uncover the Darkness
quest.desc: To complete the counterspell, place rune stones on the circles of the magic seal. You can get rune stones in the $map:52000092$.
quest.manual: Place rune stones from $map:52000092$ on the magic seal

quest.name: Finally, Suddenly
quest.desc: The counterspell is ready! Overload the phase distortion with $npcName:11000042$.

quest.name: Shadows on the Move
quest.desc:
The cloak has been lifted, revealing none other than $npcName:11001698$'s stronghold. As if on cue, you've spotted her armies preparing to launch a new attack.
There's no time to call for reinforcements. Do what you can to delay the enemy's movements for now, then fall back and alert the alliance when you have a chance.

quest.name: Planted Feet
quest.desc:
There is no end to $npcName:11001698$'s army. $npcName:11000042$ will try to teleport alliance reinforcements to the battle. Stand your ground until then.
If you leave by mistake, talk to $npcName:11003091$ in $map:52000091$ to return.
quest.manual: Survive the enemy's attack <font color="#909090">If you leave by mistake, talk to $npcName:11003091$ in $map:52000091$ to return.</font>

quest.name: Secret Knights on the Scene
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ successfully teleported your reinforcements to the battlefield! Captain Allon and his Secret Knights are just in time to help you take care of the enemy army.

quest.name: Locked Down
quest.desc: Blackeye and his Dark Wind agents are dominating the battlefield, thanks to the master wizard's mass teleportation spell.

quest.name: Militia's Arrow
quest.desc: $npcName:11001585$ and her Green Hoods have cut off the retreat of $npcName:11001698$'s army.

quest.name: The Stronghold Revealed
quest.desc:
After all this time, you finally stand before $npcName:11001698$'s stronghold. It was hidden in a pocket dimension in the center of Maple World this entire time!
With $npcName:11001698$'s forces routed, the Maple Alliance plans to push its advantage and go on the offensive. Speak with $npcName:11003089$ about your next steps.

quest.name: The Maple Alliance Attacks
quest.desc:
The time has come for the Maple Alliance's counterattack! Strike into the heart of $npcName:11001698$'s base, Madrakan, and win a victory for justice!
Use the Enter Dungeon button in the quest notification window to enter the dungeon and do the quest.
quest.manual: Use the Enter Dungeon button to travel to $dungeonTitle:21024001$ and clear Madrakan Castle Bailey

quest.name: First Victory
quest.desc:
The siege on Madrakan was a rousing success! With her army destroyed and her stronghold under Maple Alliance control, $npcName:11001698$ was forced to retreat. Somehow you doubt you've seen the last of her, however…
Return to $map:52000087$ and deliver the good news to $npcName:11001969$.

quest.name: Magically Late
quest.desc:
You're late. To class. Again.
But you're a mage, so who cares, right? In fact, you used to skip class all the time, so just being late is an improvement. So relax. Take your time.

quest.name: Chores in Silence
quest.desc: You missed class after all. Professor $npcName:11000032$ may look like an angel, but there's nothing angelic about his punishments.

quest.name: The Weight of Knowledge
quest.desc: Cleaning without magic? The indignity of it! You have a feeling that $npcName:11000032$ is just getting started. Find out what other punishments he has in mind.
quest.manual: Bring text books to the podiums

quest.name: On the Banishing of Monsters
quest.desc:
How humiliating! What's the point of learning magic if you still have to do chores by hand? Why, you might as well be a lowly warrior, rolling around in the dirt!
Oh, $npcName:11000032$ is staring at you. You'd better close your quest journal and talk to him.

quest.name: An Unorthodox Lesson
quest.desc:
Fighting those monsters was fun, but now $npcName:11000032$ is standing in the corner mumbling to himself. It's a little creepy.
He's probably thinking up your next lesson. What could it be?

quest.name: An Unexpected Duel
quest.desc:
Did those monsters seem a little strong for a classroom practice session…? Nah, must be your imagination.
$npcName:11003146$ looks pretty unhappy right now. What's going on?

quest.name: Transfer Student
quest.desc:
Even though you lost your duel with $npcName:11003146$, it was still a ton of fun. $npcName:11003146$ didn't seem to have much fun, though…
And now Headmaster Asimov is here, and at some point the classroom exploded, and… and…
You may be in a lot of trouble.

quest.name: Thrilling Life Abroad
quest.desc:
And so began your life in Tria, where the only escape from your days of boredom is taking the occasional oddball assignment. Luckily for you, there's a caravan coming from $map:02000062$, and they could use an extra pair of arms to make sure the merchants aren't scared off by any especially aggressive butterflies.
Talk to $npcName:11003180$ to let him know you've arrived.

quest.name: Infiltrate Madrakan
quest.desc:
The time has come for the Maple Alliance's counterattack! Strike into the heart of $npcName:11001698$'s base, Madrakan, and win a victory for justice!
Use the Enter Dungeon button in the quest notification window to enter the dungeon and do the quest.
quest.manual: Use the Enter Dungeon button to travel to $dungeonTitle:21025001$

quest.name: Madrakan's Monarch
quest.desc:
The time has come for the Maple Alliance's counterattack! Strike into the heart of $npcName:11001698$'s base, Madrakan, and win a victory for justice!
Use the Enter Dungeon button in the quest notification window to enter the dungeon and do the quest.
quest.manual: Use the Enter Dungeon button to travel to $dungeonTitle:20022002$ and clear Madrakan Spire

quest.name: Fusion Core Test
quest.desc: A world where people do not have to rely on magic for power—that is your dream! And today, you make a great step towards your dream. Follow $npcName:11003291$ into your lab to test your latest invention, the fusion core.

quest.name: Blazing Passion
quest.desc: A fire started during the fusion core test. You need to put it out before something terrible happens!

quest.name: Slime Coolant
quest.desc: You put out the fire, but the core's temperature is critical. You need $itemPlural:30000771$ to cool it down.

quest.name: Shutting Down
quest.desc: You managed to stop the fusion core from going critical. It's time to replace the fuses and reboot the system.
quest.manual: Replace the core fuses (Pick them up and place them on the orange rectangles) |Reboot the fusion system

quest.name: Unexpected Guests
quest.desc: Some old friends have paid an unexpected visit. Well, ex-friends. Nowadays they're more interested in stirring up trouble than helping Maple World. Defeat their $npcName:29000260$ and kick them out.

quest.name: Who Needs Friends?
quest.desc: Years ago, $npcName:29000261$ was your friend. Now he's been ordered to take your fusion core by force. Show him that you won't give up your invention so easily!

quest.name: The Mayor Speaks
quest.desc: The HAPPY protocol worked perfectly. Sure, your workshop was destroyed, and Edelstein Square got hit hard by the blast, but otherwise, a great success. Talk to $npcName:11003294$.

quest.name: Big Picture
quest.desc: Your savior has appeared! $npcName:11000264$, the great alchemist of $map:02000270$, has come to pay for the damage to Edelstein. But what are his intentions?

quest.name: Ladin's Watchful Eye
quest.desc: Left with no other options, you went to work for $npcName:11000264$. Your first assignment: escort goods from $map:02000001$ from $map:02000270$. Meet with your contact in the guard, $npcName:11003180$.

quest.name: Rendezvous
quest.desc: You've arrived in Kerning City for a mission. Meet with $npcName:29000290$ and the Rooks at the entrance to $map:52000112$.

quest.name: The Raid
quest.desc: Your mission: raid the Dark Wind headquarters disguised as a $map:52000112$. The members of your organization are ruthless killers, but you are determined to complete this mission without any fatalities on either side. Convince $npcName:29000290$ to let you complete this mission solo.

quest.name: Interrogation
quest.desc: You successfully defeated the $npcNamePlural:11003336$ without killing any of them. You intended to interrogate the bartender, but $npcName:11003185$ showed up without warning and seems annoyed at your non-lethal methods.

quest.name: Underground
quest.desc: Even though you weren't able to get answers from your hostage, $npcName:11003185$ seems to know a lot about this facility. Continue your raid and subdue the remaining $npcNamePlural:11003336$… without killing anyone.

quest.name: Dark Wind's Secrets
quest.desc: You managed to capture a $npcName:11003337$ and learn the whereabouts of the information the Rooks need. Search through the books to find $item:30000775$. If you hadn't shown mercy, you doubt the $npcName:11003337$ would have been so cooperative…

quest.name: Way of the Rooks
quest.desc: Do the Rooks know only killing? Convince $npcName:11003185$ that there is another way.

quest.name: Traitor
quest.desc: $npcName:11003185$ has declared you a traitor to the Rooks simply because you want to end the senseless killing. You have no choice but to fight your fellow $npcNamePlural:29000293$.

quest.name: Resurfacing Emotions
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003185$ keeps talking about things you don't remember. A Rooks soldier isn't supposed to have emotions, so why do you feel so conflicted? Angry? Sorrowful?
Questions for another time. $npcName:11003185$ is trying to kill you. Defend yourself!

quest.name: Farewell
quest.desc:
You couldn't defeat $npcName:11003185$, but you did manage to use one of his own techniques to escape. It was a move usually used to take a life, but you used it instead to save your own.
There's no time for sentimentality. Speak with the $npcName:11003337$ and make your escape.

quest.name: Lost Assassin
quest.desc:
Starting today, you are no longer a Rook. You have taken countless lives in their name—lives that you may never be able to atone for—but now you have a chance to take a stand against their evil. Head to $map:02000062$ and stop the Rooks' attack on the caravan.
Thus begins your search for redemption… and your lost memories.

quest.name: Rage and Peace
quest.desc: Out of 998 matches against the old man, you have won… none. But you won't give up yet! Nothing will quench your rage! Not even Lilin forcing you to help her with her stupid flower arrangement!

quest.name: An Escalation of Events
quest.desc: These $npcNamePlural:29000294$ have no fighting spirit. Cut them down! Cut them all down!!

quest.name: The Old Man's Thoughts
quest.desc: You were feeling better after taking out your anger on the flowers, but then Lilin had to go and prod you some more. The old man appeared and broke up your fight, and now he's getting ready to talk your ears off…

quest.name: The Red Blade
quest.desc: Lilin wants you to gain complete control over the god of rage sealed inside of you. Until you do, the original inhabitants of the island can never return—including her know-it-all big brother. You aren't against her goal. You also want to control the rage inside so that you can use its power. The old man things you should work together, and has even offered to train you himself. You can't wait to turn that training against him…

quest.name: Real Training
quest.desc: You thought you would have to waste time with practice dummies, but the old man actually summoned monsters for you to practice against! As it turns out… real battle is fun!

quest.name: Real Training Part 2
quest.desc: This is fun. Fun! Fun!! You defeated the second round of monsters with ease. Why didn't the old man let you do this sooner?!

quest.name: The 999th Match
quest.desc:
999 matches against the old man. This last one was… different. For a moment there, it was if he could actually kill you. You need to work on your defenses…
It was a lesson you will never forget. The 1,000th match will be different!

quest.name: Looming Omen
quest.desc: Just as you finished training, a letter came for the old man. From the capital! As soon as he read it, he turned pale and set sail for the mainland. It's been days since he left. Lilin's a nervous wreck. She's even started seeing things, like the creepy shadows that are crawling your way. Wait, there are creepy shadows crawling your way…!

quest.name: Finding the Old Man
quest.desc:
You fought off the shadow monsters that attacked without warning. It seems your training is already paying off.
But now Lilin is freaking out. She's pulled something out of the monsters you defeated. What could it be…?

quest.name: Never Back Down
quest.desc:
Lilin found a piece of the old man's cape on one of the monsters. She's scared, but you know it takes more than that to stop the old man!
You've decided to leave the island and find him. After all, he owes you more training! It looks like you're going on that warrior's pilgrimage, after all.

quest.name: Hero's Rest
quest.desc: Tria Royal Cemetery is the final resting place for those brave heroes who made the ultimate sacrifice to protect Maple World. You've come here to visit an old friend and compatriot, $npcName:11003344$.

quest.name: What You've Missed
quest.desc: In a visit to Tria's cemetery, you catch your old friend $npcName:11003344$ up on the events of recent days. Things aren't quite the same without him around.

quest.name: Regrets
quest.desc: While visiting your old friend $npcName:11003344$ at Tria's cemetery, you can't help but wonder whether there was something you could have done to save him. Suddenly, your musings are interrupted by a mysterious knight.

quest.name: An Early Inspiration
quest.desc:
The mysterious knight reveals herself to be $npcName:11003897$, former captain of Tria's Royal Knights, and one-time instructor to both $npcName:11003679$ and $npcName:11003861$. Further, it seems she was the one who saved you from hoodlums during your childhood and set you on the path of the knight.
It seems she's come to check up on you after a talk with $npcName:11003679$ and $npcName:11003861$.

quest.name: A Knight's Purpose
quest.desc: As you wrestle with feelings of guilt and sorrow over Joddy's death, $npcName:11003897$ tries to help you. She hands you a mysterious crystal.

quest.name: The Will of the Fallen
quest.desc:
The crystal turns out to be something called a lapenshard. Said to grant special power to those who seek it, they began appearing throughout the world some time after the attack on Tria.
Seeking to wake you from your sorry state, $npcName:11003897$ offers to help you with your training as a knight.

quest.name: A Knight's Watch
quest.desc: After some gentle nudging by $npcName:11003897$, you resume your training as a knight.

quest.name: Training's End
quest.desc: After a difficult but successful period, you've completed your training with $npcName:11003897$. Speak with her to find out what comes next.

quest.name: The Lapenshard's Might
quest.desc: No wonder it was tough… you weren't aware of the weights added to the armor and shield! That is why the training was tough! Looking back, it was tough at first, but you didn't feel the weights at all towards the end of the training. Was this all… because of the power of the lapenshard?

quest.name: The Shield of the Frontier
quest.desc: It seems the power of the lapenshards are more than simple rumor. $npcName:11003897$ suggested you join the Frontier Foundation to learn more about the shards, and test your newfound strength.The Foundation is an organization dedicated to regulating the possession and usage of lapenshards so they do not fall into the wrong hands.

quest.name: The Call of the High Priest
quest.desc: After a group of Royal Guards encountered an unidentified wraith and were inflicted with incurable wounds, you were called to the priest academy to assist. There you met with Bishop $npcName:11003901$ and High Priestess $npcName:11003904$. Considering their own healing magic came to no avail, you can't help but wonder how you're supposed to help.

quest.name: The Power of Belief
quest.desc: It seems your light, and the darkness that wounded these soldiers are two sides of the same coin. It was to that end the High Priestess requested your aid in healing them. Can you succeed where $npcName:11003901$ and $npcName:11003904$ have failed? You have to at least try. You might not have been able to save $npcName:11003344$, but perhaps you can help these men…

quest.name: When Hope is Lost
quest.desc: Despite your great effort, it seems you cannot save the wounded guardsmen. Whatever affliction they are suffering from only seems to feed upon your efforts to heal the soldiers. As you stand powerless to aid them, you can only wonder, is this truly what is meant to be?

quest.name: The Darkest Hour
quest.desc: One of the guards mustered the last of his strength to thank you for trying to save him and his brothers-in-arms before closing his eyes, perhaps for the last time. As all signs of life vanished from his body, you can't help but wonder, is there truly nothing you can do?

quest.name: Traces of Life
quest.desc: …No, not yet! You can still feel the trace of life within the wounded soldier… You can't let these men die without a fight!

quest.name: And Then, Something Miraculous
quest.desc: Much to everyone's surprise, a miracle has occurred. After all your efforts and determination, have you managed to conjure a light bright enough to stave off even the unyielding embrace of death?

quest.name: Brilliant Light
quest.desc: It seems that the brilliant light you conjured restored the guardsmen to health. Did the goddess herself answer your prayer? How did you manage to perform such a feat?

quest.name: Radiant Potential
quest.desc: As the guardsmen profess their unending gratitude for your saving their lives, you cannot help but be humbled. It seems reward enough that they're alive, but if the men have their way, there will be a celebration before the day is through.

quest.name: Unleashing the Divine
quest.desc:
According to High Priestess $npcName:11003904$, your little miracle may be connected to a crystal known as a lapenshard. These lapenshards are said to bestow power upon those that seek it.
$npcName:11003904$ said the guardsmen and the specter alike were both seeking one such lapenshard, resulting in their confrontation. It seems in the dust-up, fragments of the lapenshards ended up in the soldiers' wounds.
In a fortunate turn of events, it was these very fragments which empowered your magic enough to save the soldiers' lives. If you could only learn to harness the lapenshards' incredible power, you could use it to do truly great things.

quest.name: Looking Toward Tomorrow
quest.desc: High Priestess $npcName:11003904$ told you about the Frontier Foundation, a newly established organization created by the royal court to govern the use of lapenshards. There's a lot you could learn at a place like that. If there's a chance that unlocking the secrets of the lapenshards means you'll never again be powerless to save the people you care about, then the road ahead is clear.

quest.name: Priest Job Rank Quest 10
quest.desc: High Priestess $npcName:11003904$ told you about the Frontier Foundation, a newly established organization created by the royal court to govern the use of lapenshards. There's a lot you could learn at a place like that. If there's a chance that unlocking the secrets of the lapenshards means you'll never again be powerless to save the people you care about, then the road ahead is clear.

quest.name: Aisha's Letter
quest.desc: You received a letter from $npcName:11003929$. Why would she send you a letter? Is her phone broken? What is this madness?!

quest.name: Sweet Science
quest.desc: $npcName:11003929$ has been secretly working with a new material called lapenshard. She claims that it generates an incredible amount of energy, but you doubt such a thing is possible. Still, it wouldn't hurt to look…

quest.name: Off the Charts
quest.desc: These readings can't be right. According to $npcName:11003929$'s research, a single lapenshard outputs over 100 times the energy of the fusion core! If Ladin gets his hands on this, it's only a matter of time before he tries to weaponize it…

quest.name: Make a Mint
quest.desc: So, $npcName:11003929$ had her eye on the almighty meso. A lapenshard generator could create enough electricity to power Tria for a week after being turned on for just one minute. But…

quest.name: In the Wrong Hands
quest.desc: If someone were to use the lapenshards to create a bomb, it could change the world forever—and not in a good way. You don't know how your enemies found out about the fusion core in the first place, but you can't afford the same to happen with this new technology.
