You have to take steps to make sure that nobody can use this tech, no matter how revolutionary it is…

quest.name: Back to Reality
quest.desc:
Money is meaningless. Patents won't make you happy. Heck, being rich is more trouble than it's worth.
At least, that's what you keep telling yourself…

quest.name: The Big Picture
quest.desc: To your surprise, $npcName:11003929$ had a really good idea. Use quantum cryptography to prevent the bad guys from getting their hands on your specs, then use it to upgrade your own weapons. After all, Maple World needs more powerful heroes—heroes like you!

quest.name: The Peacemaker
quest.desc: Now it is time to create a weapon to end all wars: the Peacemaker! You and $npcName:11003929$ had better get to work before $npcName:11000264$ gets back from his business trip.

quest.name: Power On
quest.desc: It's the 60th boot-up attempt. Quantum cryptography is locked and energy output is optimal. We are a go!

quest.name: The Search for Lapenshards
quest.desc: Your greatest invention, the Peacemaker, is online! But you'll need to find more lapenshard samples if you want to keep improving the technology. Where could you get such a thing?

quest.name: Climbing the Ladin Corp Ladder
quest.desc: $npcName:11003929$ suggests you join the Frontier Foundation, an organization dedicated to studying lapenshards. While you're at it, you can get some more lapenshard samples for her. But why does she insist on staying behind…?

quest.name: A Boss's Promise
quest.desc:
While you were off adventuring, $npcName:11003929$ made a life for herself at Ladin Corp. But even if Ladin treats her better than you ever did, she still believes in you!
You resolve to give her back pay and even a bonus when this is all over. Somehow!

quest.name: Breaking Limits
quest.desc: You set off to train in the hopes of growing stronger, but the same old methods just aren't cutting it. You need a new approach…

quest.name: Master Haster
quest.desc: $npcName:11003932$ showed up out of the blue! He seemed pretty composed for someone who betrayed the Green Hoods and handed a lapenta over to the forces of darkness! But the biggest surprise of all was that he came here… to train you?

quest.name: The Terms of the Deal
quest.desc: $npcName:11003932$ offered to train you, under one condition: no questions. That's no easy choice. On the one hand, you have a lot of unanswered questions. On the other, there's a lot the man could teach you…

quest.name: Accelerated Learning
quest.desc: You reluctantly accepted $npcName:11003932$'s offer to train you. Your progress is expedited by the lapenshard, a miraculous crystal capable of awakening new power in those that seek it.

quest.name: Finding Your Path
quest.desc: You decide to give up on getting answers about $npcName:11003932$ actions in exchange for his help with your training. At least for now, it's time to forget about the past and focus on becoming stronger.

quest.name: Nock and Loose
quest.desc: Your training with $npcName:11003932$ wasn't easy, but after a while it was almost like old times. But things will never be like before, will they? Not after what $npcName:11003932$ did.

quest.name: Questions and Answers
quest.desc: $npcName:11003932$ said he had nothing more to teach you. After your training, you feel stronger. $npcName:11003932$ may think his business here is done, but he owes you some answers!

quest.name: Seeya Never
quest.desc: Training's over, so you can't hold that over me! Now tell me, where have you been all this time?! Why did you betray us?!

quest.name: Haster's Note
quest.desc: By the time you awakened, $npcName:11003932$ was gone. You never even got a chance to say goodbye. $npcName:11003932$ didn't even have the courtesy to leave a note, but instead left behind some sort of pamphlet.

quest.name: A Clear Path
quest.desc: $npcName:11003932$ left a pamphlet for you to find calling for adventurers to join something called the "Frontier Foundation." Apparently, it's the new governing body in charge of regulating access to lapenshards. Maybe Haster wants you to go there. You can learn more about the lapenshards, and maybe you'll run into Haster again in the process. Your reunion with $npcName:11003932$ was short-lived, but at least he's shown you the way forward.

quest.name: Moonlight on the Serene Sea
quest.desc: Having returned home to Calibre Shore. The unchanging moonlight sea puts you at ease. Worried that your abilities have peaked, you have come to seek out your old teacher. Perhaps he can show you the way forward?

quest.name: Confronting Holstatt
quest.desc: It's difficult to believe the traitor $npcName:11004028$ has returned to Calibre Island after all this time. It seems he's searching for something called a lapenshard. Whatever he's up to, he must be stopped!

quest.name: Obtaining Vengeance
quest.desc: Can you really defeat one of the Eight Blades? Can you defeat $npcName:11004028$? No, there's no time for self-doubt… You must win!

quest.name: Resonance
quest.desc: When you crossed blades with $npcName:11004028$, a torrent of energy was released which permeated your body. As the strange energy flowed through you, you recognized it immediately… It was the very same rune magic used by $npcName:11004028$ and his fellow Jibricia traitors.

quest.name: Heir to the Twin Arts
quest.desc: Just as you somehow obtained the power of the Jibricia, it seems that $npcName:11004028$ has obtained the power of the Pelgia. Thus it seems you have both become "heirs to the twin arts"…

quest.name: Echoes of the Clash
quest.desc: The timely arrival of your teacher and his associates has spared you what would certainly have been the battle of your life. Your master also noticed the changes in your powers. It seems you have a lot to talk about.

quest.name: The Miraculous Crystal
quest.desc: Runeblades who can muster the power of both Jibricia and Pelgia are known as Rune Sages. Such a state is said to be unattainable, and yet you and $npcName:11004028$ are the living proof. Acting Elder Blade Landevian believes it was the lapenshards' influence that made it possible. A miraculous crystal that grants power to those who desire it. What was $npcName:11004028$ planning to do with such power?

quest.name: The Path of the Rune Sage
quest.desc: Your master says that the royal court has requested that Terrun Calibre offer their assistance to the Frontier Foundation, an organization responsible for securing and regulating the lapenshards. Preventing $npcName:11004028$ from getting his hands on the lapenshards is reason enough to join, but this may prove a good opportunity to train your new power. The next time you face $npcName:11004028$, you plan to be ready.

quest.name: The Wolf Returns to Its Den
quest.desc: You returned to your old neighborhood after a series of hectic adventures, only for no one to greet you. You can't help but wonder what it's all been for—your quest to defend the weak. If you yourself have reached the limits of your power, how can you really defend anyone?

quest.name: The Big Fish's Lament
quest.desc: In a way, $map:63000020$ is where your grand adventure really began. You can't help but reminisce over old memories. Your identity, your sense of self-worth, it all springs from having the power to defend others. But on the cosmic scale, the famous Gray Wolf is just a small big fish in a wide ocean.

quest.name: Dr. Chen, Pugilist and Therapist
quest.desc:
Training alone won't be enough to reach the new heights of power you seek. You need to make an evolutionary leap. As you stood around $map:63000020$ moping about your situation, you ran into $npcName:11003948$.
Much to your surprise, $npcName:11003948$ seemed quite willing to help you unwind your dilemma.

quest.name: People Like Us
quest.desc: Vasara Chen believes that all of your self-righteous talk about protecting the world is just a pretext for what you truly love: fighting. Perhaps he's right.

quest.name: A Dialogue of Fists
quest.desc: Maybe all this started off being about fighting and getting stronger, but somewhere along the way you found that defending those who couldn't defend themselves was your calling. But is this philosophy holding you back from the power you seek? They only way to settle the question is with a duel.

quest.name: Rivals
quest.desc: Your fight with $npcName:11003948$ showed him to be a formidable opponent worthy of the title of $map:63000020$'s champion. You may not have defeated him, but much was revealed to you over the course of your battle.

quest.name: The Roads We Walk
quest.desc:
Your fight with $npcName:11003948$ has left you with a newfound perspective, and a new sense of direction. You find yourself feeling faster and stronger than ever before.
It seems $npcName:11003948$ too owes his new path to your battle. But, he reveals, the two of you had a little help in the form of something called a lapenshard.

quest.name: The Wolf and the Stone
quest.desc: It seems Vasara was ordered to bring you the lapenshard by $npcName:11000251$. $npcName:11000251$ wants to send you to the Frontier Foundation—the governmental body responsible for regulating the lapenshards—as a Blackstar mole. Vasara however has another idea.

quest.name: A Wolf Unchained
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003948$ ignored $npcName:11000251$'s instructions and destroyed the Blackstar listening device, thereby setting you free. It seems he wants you to granted you to become stronger.
He suggests you travel to the Frontier Foundation to learn about the lapenshards and grow stronger. The next time you meet, he's expecting a good fight.

quest.name: Welcome to the Foundation
quest.desc: You've arrived at the Frontier Foundation, a sprawling manor filled with adventurers.
quest.complete: Go to the center of the foyer

quest.name: The Commencement Speech
quest.desc: $npcName:11003971$, director of the foundation, began her commencement speech in which she explained the mission of the organization. That is until she noticed you, and became quite distracted. Have the two of you met somewhere?

quest.name: Hero of the Family
quest.desc: According to $npcName:11003972$, personal butler to the foundation director, you saved $npcName:11003971$'s life during the siege on Tria. Henceforth, and without your knowledge, you became a hero to her family—resulting in a special assignment. Special assignments are a good thing… right?

quest.name: A Special Assignment
quest.desc: While the other adventurers have already formed into groups and commenced their missions, you await instruction regarding a special assignment. What could it be?

quest.name: Unseasonable Weather
quest.desc:
The Frontier Foundation has two major concerns when it comes to the lapenshard: The first is preventing their unauthorized distribution and misuse, and the second is investigating a series of strange phenomena endangering lives.
Your mission is to deal with the latter. It seems that at just about the same time the lapenshards made their first appearance, strange weather conditions began cropping up around the globe. Further, they've persisted for far longer than one would expect of normal weather. Odds are, they are tied in some way to the lapenshards.
It's not clear where this investigation will take you, but one thing is certain: adventure awaits!

quest.name: Lapenshards and You
quest.desc: It's been suggested that your special assignment from the Foundation gives you dispensation to use the lapenshards as you see fit. Why not use the powers of the lapenshards to give the bad guys what-for? You've earned it. Go wild!

quest.name: 소중한 항해일지
quest.desc: 항해 중에 갑자기 원인 모를 폭풍우를 만나 $map:02000062$에 떠내려 온 $npc:11000444$. 그가 10년간 소중히 써온 항해일지가 물에 떠내려갈 위기에 처했다. 다리를 다친 그를 대신해 $map:02000062$ 앞바다에서 $item:30000150$$pp:를,을$ 건져오자.

quest.name: The Bare Necessities
quest.desc: 폭풍우때문에 전재산이었던 배도 부서져버리고 $item:30000151$도 잃어버리고 만 $npc:11000444$. 슬프게 우는 모습이 안쓰러우니 $map:02000068$에 가서 $npc:11000019$$pp:를,을$ 만나 $item:30000151$$pp:를,을$ 발급해줄 수 있는지 물어보자. $map:02000068$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000062$에 있다.

quest.name: The New World
quest.desc: Apparently, $npc:11000019$ is a huge fan of $npc:11000444$. Let's take $item:30000151$ to $npcName:11000444$, and let $npcName:11000444$ know that $item:30000151$ can be taken from $npc:11000019$'s drawer at $npc:11000019$ anytime.

quest.name: The Forgotten Incident
quest.desc: After taking out a scrapbook consisting of articles relating to Dr. Kartronic, $map:02000145$'s $npc:11000372$ asked me to help $npc:11001032$, who is currently investigating Dr. Kartronic's most recent project…the MK Project. Is $npc:23000054$ really related to the MK Project?

quest.name: Private Project
quest.desc: While looking over $item:39000005$, $map:02000187$'s $npc:11001032$ tried his best to remember every single detail. Wondering where the necessary clues could be found, he said that looking over the robots in $map:02000187$ might help in finding $item:39000006$. Let's go look at the robots as he suggested.

quest.name: Doctor's Den
quest.desc: After closely examining $item:39000006$, $map:02000187$'s $npc:11001032$ was certain that $map:02000232$ will help figure out why the MK Project failed. But in order to enter, more information is still needed. $npc:11001032$ asked me to investigate the computers in $map:02000187$ and bring $item:30000357$.

quest.name: Valuable Rubble
quest.desc: $npc:11000135$ at $map:02000044$ heard that the rare $item:30000055$ can be found at $map:02000235$. $npc:11000135$ also said that it's a pretty expensive and valuable item, and asked me to acquire some.

quest.name: Ancient Relic
quest.desc: After finding $item:30000056$ mixed inside $item:30000055$, $npc:11000135$ began violently trembling in fear. When I asked him what was wrong, all $npc:11000135$ told me was to take it to $npc:11000039$.

quest.name: In Search of Vayar
quest.desc: $npc:11000039$ said that $item:30000056$ can be used to locate the Stone Giants spread out across the world. However, $npc:23100006$, the strongest (and most evil) one of them all, cannot be tracked down accurately. Sharper than a blade, and colder than the harshest winter! The salty scent of the ocean, penetrating both the nostrils and lungs! Let's carefully consider these clues from $npc:11000039$, and look for any traces of $npc:23100006$.

quest.name: Foretold
quest.desc:
You spoke with $npc:11000144$ at $map:02000173$ who asked you to help him repay his life-debt by preventing $npc:23090005$'s reawakening. $npcName:11000144$'s willingness to put his life on the line to keep his promise is inspiring
You should help $npc:11000144$ defeat the monsters of $map:02000268$ and locate$item:30000157$ to defy what was prophesied. Once you have found it, bring it to $npc:11001046$ at $map:02000268$ to learn how to stop the $npc:23090005$.
quest.manual: Defeat the monsters in $map:02000268$ and find the $item:30000157$

quest.name: The Blade of a Hero
quest.desc:
After transforming the $item:30000157$ back into the $item:13200028$ and packing it in the $item:30000155$, $npcName:11001046$ asked you to deliver it to $npcName:11000144$.
He also had another request: for you to tell $npcName:11000144$ that $item:13200028$ can be restored to its true power by. All he needs to do is find the $item:30000153$ below the stone grave markers where the nameless heroes rest, then to use the Cleansing Flames to transform it into the $item:30000154$, and place within the $item:13200028$.
You should hurry over to $map:02000173$ and let $npc:11000144$ know before you forget.

quest.name: The $item:30000153$
quest.desc:
Find the $item:30000153$, which contains the souls of the heroes who sealed away the $npc:23090005$ within $map:02000200$.
Once you've done that, cast it into the $npc:11000345$.
quest.manual: Search the stone grave markers in $map:02000200$ and locate the $item:30000153$

quest.name: Wake the Dead
quest.desc:
Onward to the $map:02000200$! You must cast the $item:30000153$ into the $npc:11000345$ at the end of the path!
If what you've been told is true, that will awaken the soul within the $item:30000153$ and cause it to transform into the $item:30000154$.
Once you have obtained the $item:30000154$ take it to $npc:11000144$ and instruct him to embed it within the $item:13200028$.

quest.name: Mechanical Monsters: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
You agreed to analyze the battle tactics and capabilities of machine monsters. As there are said to be a large number in $map:2000270$, that seems like an excellent place to begin your research.
quest.manual: Battle Machine monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Invasive Insectoids: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
Although insect monsters are found all across the world, it's said that there is an especially high number of them in the areas around $map:2000023$. That should be a good place to start your research.
quest.manual: Battle insect monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Inanimate Monsters: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
Although inanimate monsters can be found around the world, they are said to be plentiful around areas that have been transformed into Ludibrium blocks. You should search such locations for monsters to battle and analyze.
quest.manual: Battle inanimate monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Perilous Plants: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
Seeing as plant monsters can be found nearly anywhere, you can challenge them wherever you like, and study their tactics.
quest.manual: Battle plant monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Divine Beasts: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
Divine monsters may be rare, but you don't give up easy. Locate and defeat divine monsters, and share what you learn in the process!
quest.manual: Battle divine monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Devilish Dangers: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
Devil monsters are usually found in the Land of Darkness, but they can also be found in other parts of Maple World touched by shadow. Defeat devil monsters and record your findings!
quest.manual: Battle devil monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Barbarous Beasts: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
Considering how beast monsters can be found nearly anywhere, you can challenge them wherever you like, and study their tactics.
quest.manual: Battle beast monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Understanding the Undead: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
Undead monsters are known to dwell in dark places like the Ant Tunnel or the Land of Darkness. Those places seem as good as any to start your monster research.
quest.manual: Battle undead monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Fiendish Fairies: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
It's said that fairy monsters can be found in the areas surrounding $map:2000076$ and $map:2000023$. You should pick one and begin your monster research.
quest.manual: Battle fairy monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Horrible Humanoids: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
It's said that humanoid foes can be found in the areas around $map:2000100$. You should start your investigative hunt there!
quest.manual: Battle humanoid foes to learn more about them

quest.name: Spiteful Spirits: An Illustrated Guide
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001179$ is developing a line of illustrated monster guides to sell for his business. To incentivize your assistance gathering data, he has offered you not only a substantial reward, but credit as a co-author.
Spirit monsters can be found all over the place. Find some to battle, and document your findings!
quest.manual: Battle spirit monsters to learn more about them

quest.name: Barrels of Fun
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate if Flaming Barrels can be effectively used as weapons. You should be able to find some in the areas surrounding $map:2000270$.
Go find out how useful they are by throwing them at enemies!

quest.name: Cartloads of Chaos
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether mine carts can be effectively used as weapons. Mine carts can be found near the Ant Tunnels or inside abandoned mines.
Go find out how useful they are by throwing them at enemies!
quest.manual: Attack enemies with rolling mine carts

quest.name: Booming Barrels
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether explosives barrels can be effectively used as weapons. Explosives barrels can be found within the Ant Tunnels or near pirate-infested beaches.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Terrible Tires
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether tires can be effectively used as weapons. Tires can be found in the areas around $map:02000100$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Trash Can Smackdown
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether trash cans can be effectively used as weapons. Trash cans can be found in the areas surrounding $map:2000270$ and $map:02000100$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Gas Tank Takedown
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether gas tanks can be effectively used as weapons. Gas tanks can be found in the research centers near $map:02000270$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Toxic Waste Tossup
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether toxic waste drums can be effectively used as weapons. Toxic waste drums can be found in the research centers near $map:02000270$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!
quest.manual: Throw toxic waste drums at enemies

quest.name: Totem Toss
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether Fire Totems can be effectively used as weapons. Fire Totems can be found in the areas surrounding $map:02000051$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Poison Bag Beatdown
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether poison bags can be effectively used as weapons. Poison bags can be found in the areas surrounding $map:02000051$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Deadly Dynamite Carts
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether dynamite carts can be effectively used as weapons. Dynamite carts can be found near quarries.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Explosive Bomb Blowout
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate how powerful of a weapon Bombs can be. Discarded bombs can be found within caves like the abandoned mines or the Ant Tunnels.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Chicken Coop Crash
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether chicken coops can be effectively used as weapons. Chicken coops can be found in the areas surrounding $map:02000076$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Drive-by Egging
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether eggs can be effectively used as weapons. Unattended eggs can be found near places with avian monsters.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Bottle Crate Catastrophe
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether boxes of bottles can be effectively used as weapons. Boxes of bottles can be found at research labs.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!
quest.manual: Attack by throwing a crate of bottles

quest.name: Torch It
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether torches can be effectively used as weapons. Torches can be found in caves or in areas surrounding $map:02000051$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Rainbow Poo Panic
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether rainbow poop trees can be effectively used as weapons. Rainbow poop trees can be found in green pastures on bright sunny days.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!
quest.manual: Strike enemies using rainbow poop trees

quest.name: Rotten Poo Peril
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether rotted rainbow poop trees can be effectively used as weapons. Rotted rainbow poop trees can be found in green pastures on bright sunny days.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!
quest.manual: Strike enemies using rotted rainbow poop trees

quest.name: Runaway Road Signs
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether road signs can be effectively used as weapons. Road signs can be found on the sides of roads.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Stoplight Shellacking
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether stoplights can be effectively used as weapons. Stoplights can be found on the sides of roads in areas surrounding $map:2000100$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Telephone Pole Terror
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether telephone poles can be effectively used as weapons. Telephone poles can be found on the sides of roads in areas surrounding $map:2000100$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Totemic Trouncing
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ said that tall totems can become useful weapons when swung with a great force. The tall totems can be found in the areas surrounding $map:2000051$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Snap, Crackle, Pipe
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ said that pipes can become useful weapons when swung with a great force. The pipes can be found in the areas surrounding $map:02000270$ and $map:2000100$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Perion House Hammering
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ said that Perion houses can become useful weapons when slammed down with a great force. Perion houses can be found in the areas surrounding $map:2000051$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Kerning Bus Bash
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether Kerning buses can be effectively used as weapons. Decommissioned Kerning buses can be found on the sides of asphalt roads.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Phone Booth Barrage
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether Kerning phone booths can be effectively used as weapons. Kerning phone booths can be found in the areas surrounding $map:2000270$, and those north of $map:2000100$.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!
quest.manual: Smack enemies with Kerning phone booths

quest.name: Kerning Truck Tumult
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether Kerning trucks can be effectively used as weapons. Kerning trucks can be found near the sides of asphalt roads.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Igloo, Interrupted
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether igloos can be effectively used as weapons. Igloos can be found in frozen areas.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Shower Stall Smash
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether shower stalls can be effectively used as weapons.
Public shower stalls are said to be found in random locations. You'll have to track them down before you can determine whether they are an effective weapon.

quest.name: Portable Toilet Travesty
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate whether portable toilets can be effectively used as weapons.
Portable toilets are said to be found in random locations. You'll have to track them down before you can determine whether they are an effective weapon.

quest.name: Electric EMP Bombshells
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate how powerful of a weapon EMP Bombs can be. They are said to be found within laboratories and factories.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Clanking Clockwork Bombs
quest.desc:
$npc:11001179$ wants you to investigate how powerful of a weapon Wind-Up Bombs can be. They are said to be found in the areas north of $map:2000100$, where Ludibrium's influence has spread.
Go find out how useful they are by using them on enemies!

quest.name: Notorious Monsters: Fragmented Soul
quest.desc:
Overwhelmed with the monumental task of documenting every monster in Maple World in a single compendium, $npcName:11001179$ has decided to publish a small digest containing only the most notorious and powerful adversaries.
Having heard from a traveler about the powerful entity known as $npc:22000045$, $npcName:11001179$ has tasked you with identifying your new target's strengths and weaknesses. With your aid, this booklet is bound to be a best-seller! Defeat $npc:22000045$ at $map:02000262$, and report back with everything you learn!

quest.name: [Dungeon] Test Your Might
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25000001$ Entrance: $map:2000217$
$npc:11001179$ has heard that $map:2000325$ is an excellent place to hone your combat skills. It just so happens that there are unique monsters dwelling there that $npc:11001179$ is curious about. If you could help with his research, he would be very grateful.

quest.name: [Dungeon] Temporal Economics
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21008001$ Entrance: $map:2000259$ Party Size (4 People)
$npc:11001179$ has heard there is a time machine being developed in $map:2000298$. He was ecstatic at the thought of being the first commercial time machine vendor.
Travel to $map:2000298$ and discovered whether someone really has invented a time machine!

quest.name: [Dungeon] Shaved Ice
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20001001$ Entrance: $map:2000183$ Party Size: 4 This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npc:11001179$ heard that a particular Vayarian who disappeared long ago has reappeared at $map:02000321$. Rumor has it, there are mysterious ice shards on $npc:23100006$'s body which hold the power to cure diseases.
You should travel to $map:2000321$ in $map:2000183$ and unearth the truth about $npc:23100006$.

quest.name: [Dungeon] Aah… Fuzzy Monsters!
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20015001$ Entrance: $map:2000175$ Party Size: 4 This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npc:11001179$ has heard that $npc:23100033$'s fur is extremely soft. However, due to $npc:23100033$'s aggressiveness, their fur is very hard to come by.
Ever profit-driven, $npc:11001179$ is determined to commercialize their fur. Still… if it is as fuzzy as rumored, it might be nice to get a few handfuls to rub your face into. Go to $map:02000322$ in $map:2000175$, and find out firsthand!

quest.name: [Dungeon] Dark Implications
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21014001$ Entrance: $map:02010047$ Party Size: 4 This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
Ever looking for the competitive advantage, $npc:11001179$ is contemplating the use of dark magic in lifting heavy objects. He wants to be sure that it's safe, and asks you to track down and investigate $npc:24002005$'s mental state.
Harnessing dark magics just to get ahead seems a little much, but a job's a job. Go to $map:02010054$ in $map:02010047$ and study $npc:24002005$'s to determine if using dark magic is safe.

quest.name: Dungeon: Mutant Block Golem
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:02000346$ (Entrance: $map:02000003$)
$npc:11001179$ recently watched a documentary on Maple TV that was about certain anomalies in various ecosystems. One particular anomaly that caught his attention was about a strange block golem that appeared in an area where water was solidifying into a land comprised of Ludibrium blocks for some unknown reason. Although most people were worried about the odd phenomenon of water solidifying into a block, $npc:11001179$ was excited at having the opportunity of finding and repairing the block golem itself, so that it could be sold as toys to children. Although this seems like a fool's errand, I suppose it wouldn't hurt to go to $map:02000346$ at $map:02000003$ as he requested, and see for myself if $npc:24001603$ can be repaired.

quest.name: Dungeon: Mutant Cactus
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:02000347$ (Entrance: $map:02000045$)
$npc:11001179$ recently watched a documentary on Maple TV that was about certain anomalies in various ecosystems. One particular anomaly that caught his attention was about a red cactus that appeared for some unknown reason. Although most people were worried about such an odd phenomenon occurring, $npc:11001179$ was excited at the prospect of subduing the cactus' aggressiveness and selling it as a decorative plant. Although this seems like a fool's errand, I suppose it wouldn't hurt to go to $map:02000347$ at $map:02000045$ as he requested, and see if $npc:24001604$ can be tamed and used as a decorative plant.

quest.name: Dungeon: Mutant Little Devil
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:02000348$ (Entrance: $map:02000010$)
$npc:11001179$ recently watched a documentary on Maple TV that was about certain anomalies in various ecosystems. One particular anomaly that caught his attention was about an evil Little Devil that appeared for some unknown reason. $npc:11001179$'s trading business with the mine, the location where the Little Devil appeared, has come to grinding halt due to the presence of the monster. Let's go to $map:02000347$ at $map:02000045$ as he requested, and defeat $npc:24001605$.

quest.name: Dungeon: A Cute Yet Horrible Box
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:02000344$ (Entrance: $map:02000255$) Party Size (4 players)
$npc:11001179$ recently watched a documentary on Maple TV that was about certain anomalies in various ecosystems. One particular anomaly that caught his attention was about a toy that turned into a terrifying monster for some unknown reason. Although most people were worried about such an odd phenomenon occurring, $npc:11001179$ was excited at the prospect of preventing the monster's transformation to sell it as a toy to children. Although this sounds like a difficult task, I should still go to $map:02000344$ at $map:02000255$ as he requested, and see if $npc:24001601$ can be fixed and sold as a toy.

quest.name: Dungeon: Deadly Kiss
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:02000345$ (Entrance: $map:02000007$) Party Size (4 players)
$npc:11001179$ recently watched a documentary on Maple TV that was about certain anomalies in various ecosystems. One particular anomaly that caught his attention was about a queen chess piece transforming into a deadly, yet attractive, monster. Although most people were worried about such an odd phenomenon occurring, $npc:11001179$ was excited at the prospect of changing the monster back into an adorable toy by vanquishing its evil aura, so that it could be sold as a children's toy. Although this sounds like a difficult task, I should still go to $map:02000345$ at $map:02000007$ as he requested, and see if $npc:24001602$ can be purified.

quest.name: Socketed Fashion
quest.desc: Apprentice $npc:11001612$ of the Victoria Design Association is teaching adventurers about outfit sockets. You should go and learn more!

quest.name: Fashion Deconstructed
quest.desc: $npc:11001612$ is giving a special class on outfit sockets. You should go listen.

quest.name: The Empire Gives Back
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$ tells you that empress $npcName:11000075$ has prepared a gift for you, and instructs you to visit $npc:11000005$ in $map:02000031$ to claim it. It would be rude to refuse a gift from the empress!

quest.name: About Lumistones
quest.desc: $npcName:11000005$, the head of $map:02000001$ library, is holding a lumistone for you that was prepared as a gift by empress $npcName:11000075$. Go visit them.

quest.name: 크리스마스의 마법 1
quest.desc:
크리스마스 이브, 필드 보스를 처치하고 $npc:11001002$에게 크리스마스의 마법이 깃든 선물을 받자!

quest.name: Spring Seed Planting : South Royal Road
quest.desc: 봄을 맞아 $npc:11003878$$pp:가,이$ 봄맞이 이벤트를 준비하고 있다. 꽃이 피고 나면 봄 소풍을 갈 생각이라는 말과 함께 씨앗 주머니에 담긴 씨앗을 $map:02000115$에 심어달라고 한다. $npcName:11003878$$pp:가,이$ 기분 좋은 봄 소풍을 즐길 수 있도록 씨앗을 심으러 가자.

quest.name: Spring Picnic : Baum Tree
quest.desc: $map:02000103$에서 $npc:11003878$$pp:과,와$ 봄소풍을 즐기자!

quest.name: Glass Shoe Appraisal
quest.desc: 요정 $npcName:11004846$$pp:가,이$ 또 구두를 잃어버렸다고 한다. 이번에는 $npc:11200005$$pp:를,을$ 통해 도움을 청해왔다. 풀숲에 굴러다니는 수많은 $item:30001102$중의 하나는 $npcName:11004846$의 것이 있지 않을까? 집히는 대로 들고 가서 $npcName:11200005$에게 감정을 부탁해야겠다. $map:02000023$ 인근에서 수상쩍은 수풀을 발견하면 뒤져보자

quest.name: 루비의 벚꽃 맞이 : 벌레 소탕
quest.desc: $npcName:11001002$$pp:가,이$ 벚꽃 나무들을 갉아먹는 벌레들을 처리해 달라고 한다. 성공적인 벚꽃 축제를 위해 $npcName:11001002$$pp:를,을$ 도와주자!

quest.name: 루비의 벚꽃 맞이 : MC 케이의 이벤트
quest.desc: MC 케이의 부탁을 받은 $npcName:11001002$$pp:가,이$ 이벤트에 참여해 달라고 한다. MC 케이의 이벤트에 참여하고 벚꽃 축제를 즐기

quest.name: 루비의 벚꽃 맞이 : 거대한 기계 벌레
quest.desc: 크리티아스에서 발견된 거대한 벌레형 기계, 기간티카를 처치해 해달라고 한다. 기간티카를 처치하고 평화로운 벚꽃 축제를 지켜내자

quest.name: Harvest rice from rice paddy fields 10 times
quest.manual: Harvest rice from rice paddy fields 10 times
quest.complete: Harvest rice from rice paddy fields 10 times

quest.name: Gather 10 Marjoram Herbs in Alkimi Island or other areas
quest.manual: Gather 10 Marjoram Herbs in Alkimi Island or other areas
quest.complete: Gather 10 Marjoram Herbs in Alkimi Island or other areas

quest.name: Participate in MC Kay events 5 times
quest.manual: Participate in MC Kay events 5 times
quest.complete: Participate in MC Kay events 5 times

quest.name: Look through binoculars 10 times across the world
quest.manual: Look through binoculars 10 times across the world
quest.complete: Look through binoculars 10 times across the world

quest.name: Mine 10 Copper Veins in Berg Island or other areas
quest.manual: Mine 10 Copper Veins in Berg Island or other areas
quest.complete: Mine 10 Copper Veins in Berg Island or other areas

quest.name: Visit the beauty salon, dye workshop, or plastic surgery
quest.manual: Visit the beauty salon, dye workshop, or plastic surgery
quest.complete: Visit the beauty salon, dye workshop, or plastic surgery

quest.name: Use the Greet Emote 10 times in Tria
quest.manual: Use the Greet Emote 10 times in Tria
quest.complete: Use the Greet Emote 10 times in Tria

quest.name: Winter Is Coming
quest.desc: $npc:11000596$, whom I met in $map:02000103$, was jumping up and down to try to fight off the cold. Because fairies are more prone to the cold compared to humans, they are in greater need of warm clothing. But human fabric is too heavy for fairies. The truth is, fairies use the rare $item:30000177$ to make all of their clothes! $npcName:11000596$ has worked diligently to collect the fluff needed to make some warm clothing, but they all disappeared. $map:02000103$'s $npc:21000239$ used to be completely black, but has been slowly turning white ever since the fluff disappeared. $npc:11000596$ thinks that $npc:21000239$ stole the $item:30000177$ away… Thought seemingly reluctant, $npc:11000596$ gave me a rather detailed explanation. It's obvious from $npc:11000596$'s pleading eyes that my help is desperately needed.

quest.name: Glasses Gone
quest.desc: When $npcName:11000595$ woke up this morning, his glasses were missing, and now he can't see a thing. Take a look around for the poor man's glasses.

quest.name: Chasing Fairfolk
quest.desc:
In place of $npcName:11000595$'s glasses, you found a note. The researcher is convinced that $npcName:11000677$, a playful fairfolk, is behind the disappearance.
$map:02000320$ is hidden behind a $npcName:11000598$ that's growing from the top of the $map:02000103$.

quest.name: Glasses Found
quest.desc: You've spotted the entrance to $map:02000320$ behind the $npcName:11000598$. Get the glasses back from $npcName:11000677$, but be quiet, since he may be sleeping.

quest.name: The Returned Villager
quest.desc: $npc:11000136$ says a bunch of folks from $map:02000051$ headed to $map:02000169$ the other day, but only one has returned: $npc:11000696$. $npc:11000136$ wants you to talk to $npc:11000696$ to find out where the others are.

quest.name: Infiltrating Toh's Hideout
quest.desc: The $npc:11000686$ was locked tight. The $item:30000137$ should be on $npc:22409034$. Obtain it, then save the villagers of $map:02000051$ from $map:02000230$. While you're at it, punish the $npcNamePlural:29000032$ for what they did.

quest.name: Locked Up Tight
quest.desc: The villagers of $map:02000051$ used to be friends with Googoo, before he was influenced by Toh. They attempted to free Googoo of Toh, but before they could, Toh's mirror images ambushed them! $npc:11000696$ was able to escape, but the others are locked tight at the $map:02000230$. It's up to you to head to $map:02000169$ and free them!

quest.name: A Cure for a Curse
quest.desc:
A few days ago, $npc:11000695$ found a toad wearing a crown by the lake. She's convinced that he's a prince who was turned into a toad, but you can't rule out the possibility that it's just an especially fashionable amphibian.
She's almost done concocting a cure for the curse, but she's missing some $item:30000138$. Fetch some and get to the bottom of this mystery.

quest.name: Breaking the Curse
quest.desc:
After finishing her concoction, $npc:11000695$ suddenly turned beat red. It turns out that it's less of a "potion" and more of an "ointment."
Since she's feeling a bit shy, go ahead and rub some $item:30000144$ all over the toad prince.

quest.name: 천연 자양강장제
quest.desc: $map:02000172$에서 $npc:11000712$$pp:를,을$ 만났다. $npcName:11000712$$pp:는,은$ 아빠가 얼마 전부터 원인 불명의 병으로 시름시름 앓고 있다며 자기와 놀아주지 못하고 있는 것이 속상하기도 하고 내심 아빠가 걱정되는 모양이다. $npcName:11000712$$pp:는,은$ 평소에 아빠가 보양식으로 즐겨 먹는 $item:30000205$$pp:를,을$ 구해서 아빠에게 드리고 싶어한다. $item:30000205$$pp:는,은$ $npc:21090069$에게 구할 수 있는데, 아빠에겐 손 쉬운 간식거리였을지도 모르지만 $npcName:11000712$$pp:는,은$ $npc:21090069$$pp:가,이$ 무섭기만 하다. $map:02000172$에 있는 $npc:21090069$로부터 $item:30000205$$pp:를,을$ 구해서 $npcName:11000712$에게 전해주자.

quest.name: 전설의 만병통치약
quest.desc: $npc:11000713$$pp:는,은$ $item:30000205$$pp:를,을$ 먹었지만 병세에 차도가 없다. 친척 집에 전해 내려오는 고서에서 본 만병통치약, $item:30000206$$pp:를,을$ 구해달라고 부탁하는 $npcName:11000713$. $npcName:11000713$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000172$의 풀숲 곳곳에 숨어 사는 $npc:29000001$에게서 $item:30000206$$pp:를,을$ 구해달라고 부탁했다.

quest.name: 재료를 넉넉히?!
quest.desc: $map:02000257$에서 만난 꼬마 $npc:11001145$$pp:는,은$ 엄마가 만들어 주는 간식을 무척 좋아한다. 그런데 최근에 $npc:11001145$의 엄마는 일 때문에 바빠서 $npc:11001145$의 간식을 잘 챙겨주지 않는다고… 엄마가 만들어 준 $item:30000395$$pp:가,이$ 너무 먹고 싶었던 $npc:11001145$$pp:는,은$ 직접 $item:30000395$$pp:를,을$ 만들기 위해서 $map:02000257$에 왔다. 하지만 $npc:11001145$$pp:가,이$ 가져온 $npc:11001146$에는 $item:30000395$$pp:를,을$ 만드는데 필요한 4가지 재료의 이름만 적혀 있고, 필요한 개수는 적혀 있지 않다고 한다. $npc:11001145$$pp:는,은$ 일단 4가지 재료를 넉넉하게 10개씩 구해달라는데...?!
quest.manual: $npc:21000031$에게서 $item:30000390$ 구하기|$npc:21000009$에게서 $item:30000392$ 구하기|초콜릿 샘에서 $item:30000391$ 구하기|붉은 나무에서 $item:30000393$ 채집하기

quest.name: 반쪽짜리 레시피
quest.desc: 아무리 생각해봐도 $npcName:11001146$에 재료의 이름만 적혀 있고 정확한 요리 방법이 나와 있지 않다는 것이 수상하다. $npc:11001145$$pp:가,이$ 가져왔다는 $npcName:11001146$$pp:를,을$ 꼼꼼히 읽어보자.

quest.name: 사탕을 만들어 볼까?
quest.desc: 재료도 구했고, 요리 방법도 알게 되었으니 직접 만들어 보겠다던 $npc:11001145$$pp:가,이$ 다시 도움을 요청했다. 레시피에 쓰여 있는 대로 만든 것 같은데 자꾸 $npc:11001146$$pp:가,이$ 재료를 토해낸다는 $npc:11001145$. 분명 어디에선가 틀린 게 아닐까? $npc:11001147$ 뒷면에서 발견한 요리 방법에 따라 $npcName:11001146$$pp:를,을$ 사용해서 $item:30000395$$pp:를,을$ 만들어보자.

quest.name: 창고 정리는 나중에
quest.desc: $npc:11000148$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000104$$pp:와,과$ 함께 창고 정리를 하기로 했다. 하지만 허리가 아파, 창고 정리를 나중으로 미루겠다는 $npc:11000148$. $npc:11000054$의 행방에 대해 말해 주러 $npc:11000104$에게 가는 김에, 이 소식도 함께 전해 주자.

quest.name: 온정의 손길
quest.desc: 트로피컬 주스를 사려다 모래사장에 쓰러진 사내를 발견한 $npc:11000105$. 경황이 없어 도울 생각을 못 하고 지나쳤다고 한다. $npc:11000105$$pp:를,을$ 대신해, 모래사장에 쓰러진 사내를 도와 주자.

quest.name: 풍선 주인은 티보
quest.desc: 날아가는 풍선을 낚아챈 $npc:11000114$$pp:는,은$ 풍선을 주인에게 돌려주고 싶어한다. 누나를 만나야 하는 $npc:11000114$$pp:를,을$ 대신해, $item:30000171$$pp:를,을$ $npc:11000389$에게 가져다주자.

quest.name: 음료 배달
quest.desc: $item:30000195$$pp:를,을$ 주문하고 사라진 $npc:11000080$! $npc:11000704$$pp:가,이$ 주스를 만드는 동안 어디론가 간 모양이다. 주스 안의 얼음이 녹기 전에 $npc:11000080$에게 $item:30000195$$pp:를,을$ 가져다주자.

quest.name: 수레 일으키기
quest.desc: 지진의 충격 탓에 쓰러진 수레. $npc:11000618$$pp:가,이$ 일으켜 세우려 하지만 만만치 않은 모양이다. $npc:11000618$$pp:를,을$ 도와, 수레를 일으켜 세우자.

quest.name: 여보 어디 가?
quest.desc: 수레를 같이 일으켜 세워줄 사람을 찾으러 간 $npc:11000618$의 부인 $npc:11000619$. 그만 찾고 돌아오면 좋으련만, 계속해서 헤매고 있는 부인이 답답하기만 한 $npc:11000618$. $npc:11000619$$pp:를,을$ 만나 남편에게 돌아가라고 말해 주자.

quest.name: 긴급 복구 조치
quest.desc: 지진으로 도로가 끊기고 시설물도 망가졌다. 주민들의 불평이 쏟아지기 전에 피해 복구에 나선 $npc:11000622$. 우선 사다리부터 고치려 하는데, 수리에 필요한 $item:30000196$$pp:를,을$ $npc:21000007$들에게 빼앗겼다고 한다. 발만 동동 구르고 있는 $npc:11000622$$pp:를,을$ 도와주자.

quest.name: 폴의 메시지
quest.desc: 지진이 일어난 원인을 밝히기 위해 조사 장비가 도착했으나, 근위대의 인력이 부족해 장비 사용이 언제 이뤄질 지는 모르겠다. 조사 현장에 먼저 가 있는 $npc:11000617$$pp:가,이$ 하염없이 조사 장비를 기다리고 있을 지 모르니, 우선은 육안으로 조사해 달라고 얘기해 주자.

quest.name: 긴장과 떨림
quest.desc: 지진은 끝난 줄 알았건만, 아직도 땅이 흔들리고 있다. 상부의 명령으로 여진을 조사하러 온 $npc:11000617$$pp:는,은$ 두려운 마음에 흔들리는 땅을 앞에 두고 차마 발이 떼지 못 하고 있다. $npcName:11000617$$pp:를,을$ 대신해 흔들리는 땅을 조사해 보자.

quest.name: 연회를 위한 식재료
quest.desc: 연회에 맞춰 음식 준비를 하려면 서둘러 음식 재료를 $map:2000001$$pp2:로,으로$ 보내야 한다. $map:2000001$$pp2:로,으로$ 나를 짐을 꾸리고 있는 $npc:11000157$에게 $item:30000070$$pp:를,을$ 가져다주자.

quest.name: Misplaced Book
quest.desc: 누군가 읽던 책을 엉뚱한 책장에 꽂아 넣었나 보다. $npc:11000670$$pp:는,은$ 새 보금자리가 못 마땅한 눈치다. $item:30000082$$pp:를,을$ 도서관 입구에 있는 책장에서 꺼내, 원래 있던 책장으로 옮겨 놓자. 참, 원래 있던 책장은 잠겨 있어서 $npc:21000216$$pp:로,으로$부터 열쇠를 빼앗아야 한다. 혹시, 책을 읽던 누군가는 책장이 잠긴 탓에 아무 곳에나 책을 꽂아둔 게 아닐까?
quest.manual: 도서관 입구에 있는 책장에서 $item:30000082$ 꺼내기|$npc:21000216$$pp:를,을$ 처치하고 $item:30000102$ 구하기

quest.name: Double Vision
quest.desc:
$npc:11000710$ has lost his glasses and can barely see a thing. He can't go anywhere like this!
Search for $item:30000203$ under the bridge!

quest.name: A Short Trip Over a Narrow Bridge
quest.desc:
$npc:11000710$ is terrified of heights and afraid to cross the bridge which makes his job of transporting firewood a bit difficult.
Lend $npc:11000710$ a hand and carry the $itemPlural:30000207$ across the bridge.
quest.manual: Move the $itemPlural:30000207$ near $npc:11000710$ across the bridge

quest.name: 사라진 조리 도구
quest.desc: 장난 치기 좋아하는 몬스터들이 $npc:11000705$의 조리 도구를 훔쳐가 $map:02000129$의 물가 근처에 숨겼다고 한다. 발이 느린 $npc:11000705$$pp:를,을$ 대신해 $item:30000204$$pp:를,을$ 찾아다 주자.

quest.name: Mano's Meanderings
quest.desc:
There's something unsettling about $npc:22000059$'s new flower. For whatever reason, it's kept him away from home—much to the annoyance of his wife, $npc:11000705$.
Find that old snail and try to convince him to head home.

quest.name: Let the Green Grass Grow All Around
quest.desc: For years, $map:2000111$ has been famous for its sandy white beaches, blue oceanfronts, and green fields. But ever since the $npcPlural:21000025$ and $npcPlural:21000058$ showed up, the grass has been destroyed. You should chase them out of there, so the grass has a chance to return to its former beauty.

quest.name: 늦겠다는 전갈
quest.desc: 어떠한 이유에서인지 $map:02000118$에 파견 나온 근위대가 식량난을 겪고 있다고 한다. 급기야 $npc:11000546$에게 음식을 가져달라 요청했다는데…… 평소, 음식을 취급하지 않는 $npcName:11000546$$pp:는,은$ 음식을 구하러 마을에 들러야 하기 때문에 예정보다 늦게 근위대 기지에 도착할 것 같다고 한다. 이 소식을 $npc:11000157$에게 전해 주자. 참, $npcName:11000546$$pp:가,이$ 조금이라도 빨리 근위대 기지에 갈 수 있도록 $map:02000118$의 몬스터들을 처치해 놓자.

quest.name: 도끼빗 도둑
quest.desc: 판매도 안 된 $item:30000244$의 재고량이 줄었다며 근심에 쌓인 $npc:11000795$. 자칫 본인의 돈으로 부족한 수량을 메꿔야 할지 모른단다. 마침 $npc:21000013$$pp:가,이$ $item:30000244$$pp:를,을$ 훔쳐 가는 걸 본 사람이 있다고 하니, $npc:21000013$$pp2:로,으로$부터 $item:30000244$$pp:를,을$ 되찾아 $npc:11000795$에게 가져다주자.

quest.name: 음료 구입은 마트에서
quest.desc: 뜨거운 햇살 아래서 공원을 순찰하다보면 금세 목이 마르다는 $npc:11000352$. 잠시라도 공원을 비우기 힘들다는 $npcName:11000352$$pp:를,을$ 위해, $map:02000209$에 들러 $item:30000245$$pp:를,을$ 구입하자. 참, 마트 직원에게 $npcName:11000352$의 심부름이라고 얘기하면 계산은 필요없다고 한다.

quest.name: 정산이 필요해
quest.desc: $npc:11000795$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000352$의 외상값이 너무 많아 정산을 하기 전에는 더 이상 외상을 주지 말라는 사장님의 지시를 받았다고 한다. 안타까워 하는 $npcName:11000795$$pp:를,을$ 뒤로 하고, 이 슬픈 소식을 $map:02000147$에 있는 $npcName:11000352$에게 전해 주자.

quest.name: 들끓는 파리떼
quest.desc: $map:02000138$ 과일 가게엔 손님 대신 파리떼만 들끓고 있다. 과일 주위를 날아다니는 파리떼 때문에 오던 손님도 돌아간다고 한다. 과일 장수 $npc:11000867$$pp:는,은$ 파리떼가 하수구 아래에 집을 짓고 사는게 틀림없다며 울상이다. $npc:11000867$$pp2:로,으로$부터 $item:30000246$$pp:를,을$ 건네 받아, 하수구 뚜껑 아래에 $item:30000246$$pp:를,을$ 뿌려 파리떼를 몰아내자.
quest.manual: $map:02000138$에 있는 $npc:11000867$로부터 $item:30000246$ 건네 받기|$map:02000138$의 하수구 뚜껑 아래에 $item:30000246$ 뿌리기

quest.name: 입막음
quest.desc: $npc:11000211$$pp:는,은$ 낯선 이로부터 정체를 알 수 없는 가방을 숨겨달라는 부탁을 받고는 흔쾌히 응했다고 한다. 거액의 메소를 사례로 지급하겠다는 말에 거절할 수 없었다고 한다. 하지만, 그의 부탁을 들어주고나니 왠지 모르게 꺼림칙한 모양이다. 더구나 몇몇 몬스터들은 $npc:11000211$$pp:가,이$ 가방 숨기는 광경을 목격하기도 했다고 한다. 소문이 나지 않게 몬스터들을 상대로 입막음을 해 달라는 $npc:11000211$! 내키지는 않지만 불안해 하는 $npc:11000211$$pp:를,을$ 위해 부탁을 들어주자.

quest.name: 안 좋은 예감은 틀리지 않는 법
quest.desc: 우려가 현실이 된 걸까. $npc:11000211$$pp:는,은$ 다짜고짜 가방의 행방을 묻는 흑성회를 상대로 거짓말을 하다 흠씬 두들겨 맞았다고 한다. $npc:11000867$$pp:가,이$ 타박상에 좋은 약을 가지고 있다고 하니, 온 몸이 쑤셔 거동이 불편한 $npc:11000211$$pp:를,을$ 위해 $npc:11000867$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 쇠똥도 약에 쓰려면 없는 법
quest.desc: $npc:11000867$$pp:는,은$ 약을 새로 만들어야 한다며 필요한 재료를 구해달라고 부탁한다. $npc:11000867$$pp:가,이$ 말한 재료는 다름 아닌 $npc:21000161$의 머리 장식! $map:02000138$에 있는 $npc:21000161$$pp2:로,으로$부터 $item:30000247$$pp:를,을$ 구해 $npc:11000867$에게 가져다주자.

quest.name: 몸에 좋은 약은 입에 쓴 법
quest.desc: $npc:11000867$의 명약을 만들기 위해 필요한 또 하나의 재료는 바로, $item:30000248$! $npc:11000867$$pp:는,은$ 팔지 못 한 $item:30000248$$pp:를,을$ 쓰레기통에 버렸다며, 쓰레기통을 뒤지면 약을 만드는데 필요한 만큼의 $item:30000248$$pp:를,을$ 구할 수 있을 거라고 말한다. 내키지는 않지만 $map:02000138$에서 쓰레기통을 뒤져 $item:30000248$$pp:를,을$ 구한 뒤, $npc:11000867$에게 가져다주자.

quest.name: Such Great Heights
quest.desc:
You found $npc:11000471$ staring at the top of Fellowstone tower, and he told you how he climbed to the top to take photos, so that he would always remember the view from up there. Unfortunately, he was spooked by some monsters and dropped his camera.
Recover $npc:11000471$'s camera, and the precious memories stored inside.
quest.manual: Find $item:30000249$ at the top of Fellowstone Tower

quest.name: 화재의 불씨를 없애자
quest.desc: $map:02000136$ 주변에 가스통이 널려 있음에도 여기저기 폭탄을 던져대는 $npc:21000282$. $npc:11000222$$pp:는,은$ $npc:21000282$ 때문에 자칫 큰 화재나 폭발이 발생하지는 않을까 불안해하고 있다. $npc:11000222$의 근심을 덜어주기 위해 $map:02000136$ 주변에 있는 $npc:21000282$$pp:를,을$ 쫓아내자.

quest.name: A Lesson in Fence Repair
quest.desc:
You caught $npc:11000472$, who is not afraid of $npcPlural:29000025$ at all, doing warm-ups so he doesn't lose his balance when he repairs the poorly-secured metal fencing around the crawl space behind him.
You decide to repair the fence for him, and not because he's afraid of heights, which he isn't.

quest.name: A Foolproof Scheme
quest.desc:
Everyone knows fairies like shiny things, and it seems like the monsters of $map:02000006$ have been stealing such baubles to antagonize the fairies.
But according to $npc:11000875$, there's a great profit to be made in re-appropriating said items. Help $npc:11000875$ collect shiny stuff dropped by monsters, in the hopes of future riches!

quest.name: Too Early to Give In
quest.desc: $npc:11000875$ thinks there's treasure in them thar mounds. Dig up the suspicious dirt mounds in $map:02000006$ in hopes of striking it rich!
quest.manual: Investigate the mounds of earth in $map:02000006$|Defeat $map:02000006$'s $npcPlural:21000264$

quest.name: Water Distribution Logistics
quest.desc:
The magical water that falls from the treetops of $map:02000024$ once flowed across the entire forest, giving life to all in its path. However, an earthquake has subverted the stream's flow to this part of the forest, causing it to wither and die.
Take $npc:11000876$'s bottle and collect water from the treetops so that it can be used to restore life to the dying forest.
quest.manual: Gather water from the $map:02000024$'s treetops using $item:30000259$

quest.name: The Water Must Flow
quest.desc:
$npc:11000876$ needs to sprinkle the stream's life-giving waters around the forest, but there are too many monsters about.
Defeat monsters indiscriminately to clear a path for $npc:11000876$.

quest.name: 시끄러운 알람 소리
quest.desc: 동 틀 무렵, 잠든 이를 깨우는 건 $npc:21000159$의 몫. 오랜 시간, 우아하고 청량한 목소리로 아침이 왔음을 알려 왔다. 그런데 언제부턴가 시끄럽기만 한 따르릉 소리가 아침마다 울려대고 있다. 따르릉 소리에 $npc:21000159$의 꼬끼오 소리도 묻혀 들리지 않는다. 자존심에 상처 입은 $npc:11000996$! 이 구역의 알람 시계는 $npc:21000159$ 뿐이라며, $npc:21000280$의 태엽 열쇠를 빼앗아 달라고 부탁한다.

quest.name: 태엽 열쇠 되찾기
quest.desc: $npc:11000997$$pp:는,은$ 누군가 $npc:21000280$의 시계 태엽 열쇠를 빼앗아갔다며 되찾아 달라고 부탁한다. $npc:21000159$와 $npc:21000280$ 중, 누군의 편도 들어줄 수 없는 상황같다. 일단은 상황을 원래대로 돌려 놓는게 좋겠다. 바닥에서 $item:30000308$$pp:를,을$ 찾아 $npc:11000997$에게 돌려주자.

quest.name: 다시 들리는 알람 소리
quest.desc: $npc:11000996$$pp:는,은$ $npc:21000280$의 알람 소리가 다시 들리기 시작했다며 의아해 한다. 잠시 주저하다 그간 벌어졌던 일들에 대해 얘기를 하자, $npc:11000996$$pp:는,은$ 의리를 저버렸다며 분개한다. 그리고는 $npc:21000280$$pp:를,을$ 혼내주면, 배신 행위에 대해 용서해 주겠다는데……

quest.name: 태엽 열쇠 버리기
quest.desc: $npc:11000996$$pp:는,은$ $item:30000307$$pp:를,을$ 갖고 있기도 싫다며 멀리 버려 달라고 부탁한다. 옆에 있는 나무 위로 올라가 던져 버리라고 하는데……
quest.manual: $npc:11000996$의 옆에 있는 나무 위로 올라가 $item:30000330$ 멀리 던지기

quest.name: 닮고 싶은 마음에
quest.desc: 외모 색이 달라 친구들에게 소외된 $npc:11000979$. 다른 친구들처럼 까만색 외모를 갖고 싶은 마음에 $item:30000309$$pp:를,을$ 먹어 보기로 결심한다. $npc:11000979$$pp:를,을$ 위해 $item:30000309$$pp:를,을$ 따다 주자.

quest.name: 무모한 시도
quest.desc: 바로 $item:30000309$$pp:를,을$ 먹어 보는 $npc:11000979$. 속이 울렁거린다며 구역질을 해대더니, 이어지는 복통을 참지 못 하고 해독제를 찾는다. $item:30000310$$pp:를,을$ 구해 $npc:11000979$에게 요정수를 먹여 보자.

quest.name: 생긴대로 살자
quest.desc: 요정수를 마시고 안정을 찾은 $npc:11000979$. 외모 색을 바꾸기 위한 그리몽의 도전은 앞으로도 계속될까?

quest.name: 보부상은 비를 싫어해
quest.desc: 비를 피해 지붕이 있는 곳으로 몸을 숨긴 $npc:11000980$. $map:02000239$에 가면 우산이 있지만, 봇짐을 챙겨가자니 봇짐이 비에 젖을까 걱정되고 두고가자니 잃어버릴까 두려워 이러지도 저러지도 못 하고 있다. 게다가 $item:30000311$마저 잃어버려 난처한 상황이다. $npc:11000980$$pp:를,을$ 대신해 $item:30000311$$pp:를,을$ 찾아, $map:02000239$에 있는 $item:30000312$$pp:를,을$ 가져다주자.

quest.name: Witch's Wager
quest.desc:
While on his daily stroll, $npcName:11000857$ encountered a witch named $npcName:11000745$. After a little wager, she won the shirt off his back—literally.
Help the naked nobleman by defeating $npcName:11000745$ in the most dangerous game: rock-paper-scissors.

quest.name: Saving Souls
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000745$ has grown bored of winning. She's ready to restore the people of $map:02000278$, but first you'll have to get their souls back.
By fighting monsters, of course.

quest.name: 옥수수 도둑
quest.desc: 작은 텃밭에서 옥수수를 재배하는 $npc:11001006$. 비록 얼마 안 되는 양이지만 $npc:11001006$와 $npc:11001007$ 모녀가 먹기에는 부족함 없는 양이었다. 하지만 얼마 전부터 몬스터들이 옥수수를 서리하는 바람에 골머리를 앓고 있다고 한다. 몬스터들이 훔쳐 간 $item:30000325$$pp:를,을$ 되찾아 $npc:11001006$에게 가져다주자.

quest.name: World Beyond the Rainbow
quest.desc: 무지개 너머에 무엇이 있을까? 무지개 너머 세상이 궁금한 $npc:11001007$. 하지만 $npc:11001007$의 어머니는 그곳으로 가는 입구 근처에도 얼쩡거리지 말라며 주의를 줬다고 한다. 그럴 수록 호기심은 강해지는 법. $map:02000305$$pp:를,을$ 구경하고 돌아와 $npc:11001007$에게 알려주자.

quest.name: 빈손으로 돌아갈 순 없어
quest.desc: 콩나무 줄기를 타고 올라가면 보물이 넘쳐나는 곳에 이를 거란 소문을 듣고 이곳까지 온 $npc:11001009$. 하지만 콩나무가 인도한 곳은 보물과는 거리가 멀다. 빈손으로 돌아가면 사람들의 놀림거리가 될 거라는 $npc:11001009$. 뭐라도 들고 가야겠다며, $item:30000326$에 눈독을 들인다.

quest.name: 인턴 사원 서먼
quest.desc: 해적들을 상대로 장사하기 위해 $map:02000063$$pp:를,을$ 찾은 캐시마트 $npc:11001010$. 가져온 상품들을 해적들에게 모두 뺏겼다고 한다. 빈손으로 돌아가면 해고될 것이 뻔한 상황이다. 불쌍한 $npc:11001010$$pp:를,을$ 위해 해적에게 뺏긴 물건들을 되찾아주자.

quest.name: 시끄러운 이웃
quest.desc: 조용한 해변의 전망 좋은 집이라 소개받고 $map:02000182$$pp2:로,으로$ 이사 온 $npc:11001011$. 보이는 건 절벽이요, 들리는 건 파도 소리가 아니라 해적들의 왁자지껄 떠드는 소리와 폭탄 터지는 소리! 무를 수 없는 계약이라는 걸 뒤늦게 확인하고는 자포자기한 심정으로 살아가고 있다. 하지만 항상 참고만 지낼 수는 없는 법! 시끄러운 소리만이라도 안 나게 해보자.

quest.name: 새로운 거처
quest.desc: 루디브리엄 지역의 시간이 멈췄다는 소식을 듣고 이곳을 찾은 $npc:11001012$. 시간이 멈췄으니 더 이상 나이를 먹지도, 늙지도 않을 거라며 이곳에 터를 잡고 살겠다고 한다. 하지만 몬스터의 위협때문에 신변의 안전이 걱정된다는데……

quest.name: 나는야 마법 소녀
quest.desc: 마법에 걸려 몬스터로 변한 사람들을 구하기 위해 $map:02000214$$pp:를,을$ 찾아 왔다는 자칭 마법 소녀 $npc:11001015$! 혼자 몬스터를 상대하긴 벅차니 몬스터에 깃든 영혼을 구출해 달라고 부탁한다.

quest.name: 마녀의 충직한 개
quest.desc: 흑마법을 다룬다는 이유로 요정들에게 밀려나 어둠 속에서 지내던 마녀 $npc:21400746$$pp:는,은$ 3명의 세이지에 의해 봉인된 괴수 $npc:23000047$$pp:를,을$ 깨워 자신의 충견으로 만들었다. 하지만 요정들의 우려와는 달리 모습을 드러내지 않던 $npc:21400746$와 $npc:23000047$. 자칭 마법 소녀 $npc:11001015$$pp:는,은$ 그들의 흔적을 찾아 $map:02000214$까지 왔다며 흑마법사와 전설의 괴수를 처치하고 영혼을 봉인해 메이플 월드의 평화에 기여하겠다며 의지를 불태운다.

quest.name: 쉽지 않은 퇴단
quest.desc: 동경해 왔던 해적 생활을 직접 경험해 보니, 험하고 거친 일상에 적응하기 힘들다는 $npc:11001063$. 해적 생활을 청산하기 위해 해적단에서 나오고 싶으나, 쉽게 보내주지 않는 해적단 때문에 몰래 탈출을 감행했다고 한다. 하지만 $map:02000067$ 곳곳에 있는 동료들에게 걸릴까봐, 쉽게 움직이질 못하고 있다는데……

quest.name: 알 수 없는 시험
quest.desc: $map:02000068$ 소속으로 이곳을 찾았다는 $npc:11001064$. 비밀 임무를 수행 중이나, 혼자 힘으로 어려우니 도와달라고 한다. 대체 무엇을 하려는 건지는 모르겠지만, 도와달라 하니 도와주자.

quest.name: 실제 임무
quest.desc: $npc:11001064$$pp:는,은$ 물에 떠밀려와 모래사장에 널브러져 있는 널빤지를 수거 중이라고 한다. 어떤 용도로 쓸 것인지 제대로 답해 주지는 않지만, 중요한 일인 것 같다. 눈에 띄지 않는 곳에 있는 널빤지 하나라도 그냥 넘기지 말고 수거해야 한다니 말이다.

quest.name: 사사로운 욕망
quest.desc: 밖에 있는 몬스터들이 두려워 성 안에서만 지낸다는 $npc:11001065$. 어느 날, 성을 방문한 한 노파가 자신에게 내기를 제안했고 내기에서 이긴 노파는 성 안의 사람들에게 마법을 걸어 몬스터로 만들었다고 한다. 노파는 떠나면서 마법을 풀 방법을 알려줬는데, 정원에 핀 싱싱한 장미를 모아 화관을 만든 후 몬스터에게 씌우는 것이 그 방법이라고……

quest.name: 소환술의 원천
quest.desc: 소환술을 자유자재로 다루기 위해 $npc:22090007$$pp:가,이$ 가지고 있는 $item:30000366$에 탐을 내는 $npc:11000304$. $map:02000132$에 $npc:22090007$$pp:가,이$ 나타나면 $item:30000366$$pp:를,을$ 빼앗아 $npc:11000304$에게 가져다주자.

quest.name: 중요한 건 사람 목숨
quest.desc: $map:02000038$$pp:는,은$ 나무들이 울창해 나무꾼들의 방문이 잦지만, 몬스터들, 특히 $npc:22000024$의 위협 때문에 사고 또한 많은 곳이다. $npc:11000001$에 따르면 나무꾼들은 자경단을 동원해 $npc:22000024$$pp:를,을$ 처치해 달라고 자주 요구했다고 한다. 하지만 산림 보호를 위해 $map:02000038$에서의 벌목을 금지해야 한다는 의견도 있어 쉽게 나무꾼들의 요구를 들어줄 수 없었다는데……

quest.name: 그들의 연주는 소음
quest.desc: $map:02000142$의 몬스터들 $npc:21000169$, $npc:21000172$, $npc:21000174$$pp:가,이$ 내는 소음 때문에 연구에 집중할 수 없다는 $npc:11000869$. 아름다운 음악은 집중력을 키우는데 도움이 되나, 그들이 내는 소리는 그저 소음일 뿐이라고… 몬스터들이 가진 악기들을 빼앗아 $npc:11000869$의 연구를 돕자.

quest.name: 열차 없는 철로
quest.desc: 멍하니 선 채, 무언가를 기다리는 듯 한 $npc:11001066$. 한때는 웃고 떠드는 아이들을 잔뜩 실은 $map:02000184$ 투어 열차가 이곳 철로 위를 달렸다고 한다. 하지만 지금은 $map:02000184$$pp:를,을$ 찾는 아이들도 없고, 열차 또한 폐기됐다고 하는데… 그 원인이 $map:02000184$$pp:를,을$ 점령한 몬스터들 때문이라고 믿는 $npc:11001066$. 몬스터들만 없으면 $map:02000184$$pp:가,이$ 부활할 수 있을 거라 말한다.

quest.name: 수상한 선물 상자
quest.desc: $map:02000184$에 온 것을 환영하는 $npc:11001067$. 입장 손님들 모두에게 선물을 준비했다며, $map:02000184$ 곳곳에 놓아둔 선물 상자를 찾아보라고 한다. 선물 상자 안에는 뭐가 있을까?

quest.name: 혼재된 시간
quest.desc: $npc:11000847$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000184$$pp:와,과$ $map:02000255$$pp:를,을$ 비교하며, 루디브리엄 지역 곳곳에 시공간이 혼재해 있는 것 같다고 의심한다. 의심을 확신으로 바꾸기 위해 $map:02000255$에 있는 로봇이 미래에 생산된 로봇이 맞는지 확인하고 싶다며, 로봇의 생산 시기를 파악할 수 있는 메모리칩을 구해달라고 부탁한다.

quest.name: 안전한 공연을 위해
quest.desc: 록 밴드 '오일앤워터'의 공연이 코앞으로 다가왔으나, 아직 공연장 정비가 안 돼 있어 걱정이라는 $npc:11001068$. 무질서한 관객들 때문에 안전사고가 우려된다며, 몬스터가 훔쳐 간 $item:30000372$$pp:를,을$ 찾아 공연장 앞에 설치해 줄 것을 부탁한다.

quest.name: 먹보의 꿈
quest.desc: 드디어 지상 최대의 낙원을 발견했다며 좋아하는 $npc:11000053$. $map:02000257$ 전체를 먹어치울 기세다. 사탕처럼 생긴 나무도 맛보고 싶고 달콤한 향기가 나는 연못에 몸도 담그고 싶지만 몬스터들의 방해 때문에 여의치 않다고 하는데……

quest.name: 내 꿈의 완성
quest.desc: $npc:11000784$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000018$$pp:가,이$ 자신이 꿈에서 봤던 곳이라며 놀라워한다. 혹시나 자신이 여전히 잠에서 깨지 않고 꿈속에 머물러 있는 것은 아닌가 의심하는 $npc:11000784$. 진실이 무엇이든 자신의 꿈에 몬스터가 득실대는 것은 봐줄 수 없다며, 예쁘고 사랑스러운 자신의 공간에서 몬스터를 없애달라고 부탁한다.

quest.name: 위험한 불청객
quest.desc: 자신은 다른 시간대에서 온 사람이라 말하는 $npc:11000849$. 시간 여행을 시도해 이곳에 왔으나, 실수로 자신이 있던 곳의 몬스터들까지 데리고 왔다고 한다. 자신으로 인해 이곳이 혼란스러워지는 것은 원치 않는다며 몬스터들을 처치해 달라고 말하는데……

quest.name: 턱권단 몰아내기
quest.desc: 자연 그대로의 모습이 잘 살아있는 $map:02000051$ 지역에 건설 현장이 들어섰다. 페리온 지역 주민들의 반대가 거셌지만 건설을 주도한 측에서는 턱권단을 동원해 주민들을 제압했다고 한다. $npc:11001072$$pp:는,은$ 자신의 부모와 주민들을 해코지한 턱권단을 마을에서 내쫓아 달라고 부탁하는데……

quest.name: 영웅을 추모하는 방법
quest.desc: 마왕이 봉인된 그 시절, $npc:11000075$$pp:를,을$ 도와 함께 싸운 4명의 영웅 중 한 명인 '텐'은 카카 부족 출신이다. 카카 부족의 후예인 $npc:11000887$$pp:는,은$ 다른 살아있는 3명의 영웅이 라펜타의 수호자로서 대접받고 있는 것에 비해 목숨을 바친 '텐'은 별다른 대접을 못 받았다며 불만이 가득하다. 텐과 카카 부족의 명예를 되찾기 위해 텐을 위한 추모 공원 설립을 제청하기로 하고 서명서를 모았으나, 바닥에 놓아둔 서명서들이 바람에 날리면서 몬스터들의 손에 들어갔다고 한다. 서명서를 되찾아 $npc:11000887$에게 전해주자.

quest.name: 영웅의 쉼터
quest.desc: 전사 '텐'은 전투 후 바위에 걸터앉아 땀을 식히곤 했다고 한다. $npc:11000500$$pp:는,은$ 카카 부족의 영웅이자 메이플 월드 전체의 영웅인 '텐'에게 도움을 줬다는 사실에 대해 자랑스러워하고 있다. 그리고 자신은 영웅만을 위한 휴식처로 남을 거라며, 다른 이들이 바위 위에 걸터앉는 것을 허락할 수 없다고 말한다. 특히 바위를 걷어차는 몬스터들은 용서할 수 없다는데……

quest.name: 야카야마 열매의 부작용
quest.desc: $npc:11000790$$pp:는,은$ 산할멈에게 저주를 받아 멸족 당한 포레마가시 부족의 사연을 들려준다. 그리고 자신은 포레마가시 부족의 유일한 생존자라며, 자신의 정체를 숨기기 위해 야카야마 열매를 먹고 노화를 촉진시켰다고 한다. 또한 그 부작용으로 몸이 자주 가렵다고 한다. 그럴 때 $npc:21000111$의 갈기로 문지르면 가려움이 사라진다는데……

quest.name: 무도인의 자격
quest.desc: 하늘에 가장 가까운 $map:02000097$이야말로 수련하기에 이상적인 장소라고 말하는 $npc:11001073$. 자신과 대화하기 위해서는 자신과 동급의 무도인이어야 한다며, $map:02000097$의 몬스터들을 처치하면 대화에 응해주겠다고 한다.

quest.name: 전시된 그림들
quest.desc: 바닥에 쓰러진 그림들을 일으켜 세우는 $npc:11001074$. 이곳에서는 아이들이 그림 그림을 액자에 담거나 이젤 위에 놓아 전시 중이라고 한다. 그런데 짓궂은 몬스터들이 자꾸 액자를 삐뚤게 걸어 놓거나 이젤을 쓰러뜨린다고 한다. 그대로 방치할 수 없어 계속 액자를 바로잡거나 이젤을 세우지만 여간 귀찮은 일이 아니다. 몬스터들이 더 이상 짓궂은 짓을 못 하게 그들을 혼내주자.

quest.name: 밀거래용 메모리칩
quest.desc: 카트로닉 박사는 로봇 상품 대중화를 위해 보급형 메이드 로봇을 개발했다. 하지만, 누군가 심어놓은 바이러스에 의해 일부 로봇들이 공격적인 성향을 갖게 됐고, 그들의 공격에 의해 연구소는 폐쇄됐다고 한다. 이후 메이드 로봇의 공격 성향에 관심을 갖는 이들이 생겨났고, 해당 로봇의 AI가 담긴 메모리칩은 고가에 밀거래되고 있다고 한다. $item:30000375$$pp:를,을$ 구하기 위해 $map:02000265$$pp:를,을$ 찾은 $npc:11001075$$pp:를,을$ 도와주자.

quest.name: 잃어버린 지갑을 찾아서
quest.desc: 갑자기 비명을 지르는 $npc:11000244$. 현금이 잔뜩 든 지갑을 잃어버렸다고 한다. 자신의 주위를 맴돌던 로봇들이 소매치기한 게 분명하다고 말하는데……

quest.name: (Dungeon) A Reason to Train
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20015001$ Entrance: $map:02000175$ Party Size: 4 This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npcName:11001073$ is determined to become skilled enough to win an 18-on-1 battle. If you want to follow in his footsteps, then you need to start by facing two worthy opponents at once. He demands that you defeat $npcName:23100033$.

quest.name: (Dungeon) Upping the Ante
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20015001$ Entrance: $map:02000175$ Party Size: 4 This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npcName:11001073$ is stunned that you not only defeated $npcName:23100033$, but that you did it dozens of times. Now he's bragging that he regularly wins 4-on-1 fights, and that you'll have to do better to reach his level.

quest.name: 던전 : 위험에 처한 암탉들
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25002001$ (입구 맵 : $map:02000087$)
거대 달팽이 $npc:24001006$를 보고 놀라 신처럼 떠받드는 몽키 일당. 몽키 일당은 $npc:24001006$의 환심을 사고자 그에게 바칠 닭 요리를 준비 중이다. 키우던 암탉들이 모두 사라져 난감해 하는 $npc:11001141$$pp:를,을$ 위해, 몽키 일당을 처치하고 닭장에 갇힌 암탉들을 구해내자.
quest.manual: 닭장 문을 열어 암탉들을 모두 구출하기

quest.name: 던전 : 다시 사라진 암탉들
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25002001$ (입구 맵 : $map:02000087$)
다시 사라진 $npc:11001141$의 암탉들. 정작 $npc:24001006$$pp:는,은$ 닭 요리에 별 관심이 없는 것 같으나, 몽키 일당은 여전히 닭을 요리해 바치려고 한다. 또다시 납치된 닭들을 구출해 $npc:11001141$에게 돌려보내자.
quest.manual: 닭장 문을 열어 암탉들을 모두 구출하기

quest.name: The Hardest Thing to Say
quest.desc: $npc:11000293$ is leaving $map:02000024$, but can't bear to say goodbye to his friend $npc:11001142$. He's asked you to deliver the message in his stead.

quest.name: A Parting Gift
quest.desc: $npc:11001142$ acts like a jerk, but he seems shocked to learn $npc:11000293$ is leaving $map:02000024$. He's asked you to deliver a $item:30000389$ to $npc:11000293$ as a parting gift.

quest.name: Friendship's Burden
quest.desc:
$npc:11000298$'s friends, the $npcPlural:21091166$, have been corrupted by some dark force, rendering them violent.
Set the $npcPlural:21091166$ free from their torment, so that they can once again know peace.

quest.name: The Plastic Plague
quest.desc:
After the toys arrived, the forest began to change. The forest-folk, initially intrigued by the toys too were warped into toys themselves.
$npc:11000298$ begs you to get rid of the toys in the hopes that this will allow the forest to recover.

quest.name: 유적지 보존의 시작
quest.desc: 많이 파손되긴 했으나, 높게 쌓아올린 성벽과 마을의 형태가 고스란히 남아 있는 $map:02000130$. $npc:11001143$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000130$의 웅장함에 반해, 유적지 보존을 위해 헌신하기로 한다. 우선은 유적지를 망가뜨리는 몬스터들부터 없애는 게 급선무라고 판단한 $npc:11001143$. 그를 도와 유적지 보존에 일조하자.

quest.name: Daily Fortune
quest.desc: $npcName:11001144$ looks like a beggar. He smells like a beggar. But he insists that he's really a fortune teller, and he'll tell your fortune for free!

quest.name: 주인 없는 무기
quest.desc: 뛰어난 무기를 구하기 위해서라면 메이플 월드 곳곳을 물불 가리지 않고 찾아 헤매는 욕심많은 $npc:11001148$. $npc:11001148$$pp:는,은$ 오랜 세월동안 버려져, 이제는 주인 없는 요새에 보관된 각종 무기들에 탐을 낸다. 오랜 세월 동안 관리되지 않은 무기들이 제대로 작동하는지가 궁금한 $npc:11001148$. $map:02000021$에 있는 대포의 발포 테스트를 부탁한다.

quest.name: Strong Grip
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited an island full of people who climbed everywhere to get around. Maybe you should give it a try.
quest.manual: Use the $skill:20000011$ skill to move 100 m

quest.name: Abyssal Courage
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited a village where the warriors entered tiger dens to test their courage. You know of a place scarier than a tiger den…

quest.name: A Soaring Conversation
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he had a chat with a bird while it flew him across a valley. What kind of conversation did he have, anyway…?

quest.name: Greater Heights
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited an island where people jumped everywhere to get taller. Would that even work?

quest.name: Hanging Around
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. According to him, the strongest man he ever met got that way simply by hanging off a ladder for hours. This could be an easy way to work on your beach bod…
quest.manual: Hang on a ladder for 300 seconds

quest.name: To Catch a Mate
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited an island where all the $male:men,female:women$ hung from ropes to attract a mate. Could such an intriguing ritual work in modern society…?
quest.manual: Hang from a rope for 120 seconds

quest.name: Take a Dip
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited an island full of people who practically lived in the water. You could probably use a quick bath, yourself.

quest.name: Growth through Adversity
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he learned a secret technique for helping grass grow: stomping the heck out of it. This sounds legit.

quest.name: To Survive a Shipwreck
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. According to him, all Allicari are strong swimmers so that they're ready if they ever shipwreck. That's not a bad idea…

quest.name: Keep Low
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited an island where the hunters all crawled when they were hunting their prey. Sounds stealthy.

quest.name: Wayfarer's Blues
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. He loves to travel, but he feels bad leaving all of his old friends behind. If only there was another way to see far-off places…

quest.name: Finders Keepers
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. He's heard there are golden treasure chests hidden all over the place. It won't do for these precious treasures to distract future customers from precious Allicari merchandise! You should help round these treasures up.

quest.name: World in a Hat
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. He's heard there are magical hats that will take you to pocket realms, where you can find many fantastical things. You like fantastical things, don't you?

quest.name: $npcName:11000273$
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he lost a fight against a monster and needed to see a doctor to get fixed up. You should get to know $npcName:11000273$ in case you ever need treatment after a bad fight.

quest.name: $npcName:11000274$
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he lost a fight against a monster and needed to see a doctor to get fixed up. You should get to know $npcName:11000274$ in case you ever need treatment after a bad fight.

quest.name: The Safest Bank
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. He often has to run errands at the bank, and has been using $map:02000034$ since coming to Tria. It seems he's interested in $map:02000155$…

quest.name: A Blessed Day
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One of his favorite hobbies is clapping, and he hears there's a place nearby that's just great for it. You might as well indulge in his weird hobby and check it out.

quest.name: These City Streets
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. He says that losing yourself in a city can wipe away your frustration and sadness. Imagine how effective it would be to lose yourself in <i>six</font> cities!

quest.name: The Best Policy
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he made a stop at a prison colony and it made him devoted to a life of honesty. Maybe you need a reminder of the high price of crime.

quest.name: Fashion in Chains
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. According to him, you can probably find a prison jumpsuit if you dig through the trash cans in jail. This strikes you as a sensible course of action.

quest.name: Nothing Is Useless
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. According to him, sometimes you'll find something of value in plain wooden chests. You have been known to covet things of value…

quest.name: The Secret to Health
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited an island where everybody runs all day. He doesn't know why they did it, but they were probably in great shape.

quest.name: Quick and Convenient
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited an island where everybody used taxis to get around. Wait a second! Doesn't this island have taxis?

quest.name: Rest Your Feet
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited an island where everybody rode mounts instead of walking. When you really think about it, mounts rule and walking drools.

quest.name: Nature's View
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. According to him, the best way to see nature is with your naked eye looking through the lens of a telescope.
quest.manual: Use the binoculars at $map:02000090$ |Use the binoculars at $map:02000172$ |Use the binoculars at $map:02000103$ |Use the binoculars at $map:02000024$

quest.name: See the Sea
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. According to him, nothing soothes the furious heart like a nice, long glare at the sea.
quest.manual: Use the binoculars at $map:02000062$ |Use the binoculars at $map:02000067$

quest.name: Cityscapes
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. He says that every city has a dark side. Like most things, the best way to see it is with a telescope.
quest.manual: Use the binoculars at $map:02000100$ |Use the binoculars at $map:02000164$ |Use the binoculars at $map:02000273$

quest.name: $item:20000102$ for Your Wounds
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. One time, he visited an island that used $item:20000102$ to cure itchy bug bites. You can probably find some in the Land of Darkness.

quest.name: Going for the Gold
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. He says that finding a golden treasure chest is no big deal, and that he can do it in his sleep. You've resolved to find one, too—and you'll do it without even being half asleep!

quest.name: The Worst
quest.desc: Traveling with the Allicari, $npcName:11001181$ has experienced and seen a lot of crazy stuff for his young age. According to him, Victoria Island is probably the worst place he's ever been thanks to all the monster. Vanquish monsters and save the local tourism industry!

quest.name: 낚시 입문
quest.desc: $npc:11000003$에 따르면 $map:02000002$에 있는 $npc:11000781$$pp:가,이$ 낚싯대를 무료로 나눠주고 있다고 한다. $npc:11000781$의 마음이 언제 바뀔지 모르니, 서둘러 받으러 가자.

quest.name: 처음 느껴보는 손맛
quest.desc: 물고기 낚는 법에 대해 더욱 자세하게 알려주는 $npc:11000781$. 특히 처음 낚는 종류의 물고기라면 찌를 적당한 높이로 유지하는 게 중요하다고 한다. $npc:11000781$의 조언을 기억해 물고기를 낚아보자.

quest.name: 다른 곳에 사는 물고기
quest.desc: 서식처에 따라 낚을 수 있는 물고기의 종류가 다르다고 말하는 $npc:11000781$. $npc:11000781$의 제안대로 독액에 사는 물고기를 낚아보자.

quest.name: 던전 : 물이 마르지 않는 이유
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21010001$ (입구 맵 : $map:02010084$) 파티권장 (4명)
마을을 가로지르는 물길이 마르지 않게 하려고 정기적으로 지하 동굴의 지배자에게 제물을 바친다는 마을 사람들. 그 누구도 그를 본 적이 없으며 그에 대해 제대로 알고 있지 않으나, 지하에서 시작된 물길이 끊길 수 있다는 두려움 때문에 의심 없이 그에게 복종하고 있다. 하지만 이제는 제물로 바칠 가축이 남아 있지 않아, 발만 동동 구르고 있다는데… 몬스터라도 잡아 바치면 위기를 모면할 수 있다니 그들을 대신해 사냥에 나서보자.

quest.name: 던전 : 안절부절못하는 이유
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21010001$ (입구 맵 : $map:02010084$) 파티권장 (4명)
마을 사람들이 일부러 자신을 혼쭐내기 위해 용사를 보냈다고 생각한 $npc:24001309$. 잔뜩 약이 올라, 마을 사람들에게 더 많은 제물을 요구했다고 한다. $npc:24001309$$pp:가,이$ 자신들을 위협하지 않도록 제대로 혼쭐을 내달라고 부탁하는 $npc:11001437$$pp:와,과$ 마을 사람들. 불안에 떠는 모습이 처량하니 이번에도 도와주자.

quest.name: 던전 : 벌레들의 소굴
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20017001$ (입구 맵 : $map:02010019$) 파티권장 (4명)
마을 사람들의 작은 수영장을 인수한 $map:02010019$. 기존의 수영장은 버려둔 채 그 옆에 최신식 물놀이장을 짓는다. 시간이 흐르고, 방치된 수영장에 고여 있던 물은 썩어 심한 악취를 만들어낸다. 급기야 새로 지은 물놀이장으로까지 악취가 흘러들어갔는데... 결국 $map:02010050$$pp:를,을$ 청소하기로 한 $map:02010019$. 하지만 그곳은 이미 벌레들의 터전. 벌레들을 없애지 않고는 청소가 불가능한 상황이다.

quest.name: 던전 : 벌레들의 단결
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20017001$ (입구 맵 : $map:02010019$) 파티권장 (4명)
$npc:23190066$$pp:를,을$ 처치하면 그를 따르던 무리들도 실망하며 이곳을 떠날 거라 기대했지만, 오히려 똘똘 뭉치는 것은 물론이거니와 다른 지역의 벌레들까지 몰려온 것 같다고 한다. 벌레들과의 싸움만이 능사인지 의심되지만, $npc:11001444$의 부탁을 들어주자.

quest.name: Scary Cute
quest.desc: Most adults know to avoid the snakes in $map:02010022$, but it usually takes a snakebite or two for the local children to learn their lesson. If only the $npcNamePlural:21000392$ and $npcNamePlural:21000400$ weren't so dang cute!

quest.name: $npcName:11001456$'s Message
quest.desc: $npcName:11001456$ asked me to find her husband, who's looking for $itemPlural:30000505$ in $map:02010022$. Since you already gathered the petals, there's no need for him to wrestle with any more snakes.

quest.name: Rock Formations of $map:02010022$
quest.desc: $npcName:11001457$ spotted a telescope in $map:02010022$, but he can't reach it. With your $skill:20000021$, you should be able to get to it and take a look at the island's landscape.

quest.name: A Big Name in Begging
quest.desc: $map:02010012$ may still be under construction, but $npcName:11001466$ has already claimed his begging spot. Unfortunately, the robots keep giving him a hard time. Punish them for hurting $npcName:11001466$.

quest.name: Construction Unending
quest.desc: $npcName:11001466$ says that the work around $map:02010012$ is going too slowly. The sooner construction finishes, the sooner he can get to the good begging!

quest.name: Construction Check-up
quest.desc: If you really want to know how the construction is going, you need to talk to $npcName:11001468$. Apparently he's late sending his status report to $npcName:11001467$.

quest.name: Scattered Plan
quest.desc: $npcName:11001468$ would just love to give you a report on the construction status, but he misplaced his $item:30000506$. Get his copy back from one of the robot workers. You may need to use force…

quest.name: Get Rich Quick
quest.desc: $npcName:11001470$ was kicked out of his family home for trying to cheat his own brother. While he's just barely getting by, it seems he has big plans—and he wants you to be part of them.
quest.manual: Jump from $map:02010039$ |Defeat the robot workers in $map:02010039$

quest.name: Perpetual Repairs
quest.desc: The bridge is new, but it's already in need of constant repair. One of the bridge supports is even leaning to the side. Maybe $npcName:11001470$ knows why.

quest.name: Mile-high Fog
quest.desc:
You can clearly from one end of the bridge in $map:02010039$ to the other, but the middle is hidden in thick fog. There's a local rumor that an evil dragon lives in the fog, damaging the bridge and scaring the local children. Others say that the bridge is haunted by the ghosts of workers who died.
$npcName:11001469$ came out here to check it out. Maybe he knows the true story.
quest.manual: Climb the arch above $map:02010039$ and look around

quest.name: The Brave Friend
quest.desc:
