There's a lot of money pouring in from $map:02010002$ to develop $map:02010063$. Many locals of the surrounding areas have come to work high-paying construction jobs, but since the robots all went insane, most of the workers are now trying to escape with their lives.
$npcName:11001401$ climbed up the bridge in a desperate attempt to evade the bots, but got stuck halfway. His friend $npcName:11001400$ is trying to get him some food to calm his nerves.
quest.manual: Get $itemPlural:30000507$ from the supply packages in $map:02010038$

quest.name: Part-time Trap
quest.desc: $npcName:11001401$ seems to have calmed down a bit. He wants you to clear a path through the crazed robots so he can escape. When you're done, ask $npcName:11001400$ if he's given any thought to $npcName:11001401$'s idea.

quest.name: The Best Business Plan
quest.desc: $npcName:11001381$ has great plans for the future of $map:02010063$, but first he needs to win over the locals. A picture of the desolate, unexploited mountain peaks would be just the thing—but the rampaging robots make taking pictures a bit challenging. This job is right up your alley.

quest.name: It's Just Business
quest.desc: $npcName:11001381$ has finished his $item:30000509$, and it's time to share it with to $npcName:11001386$ of $map:02010063$. The villagers may not respond well to being asked to relocate while the development is going on…

quest.name: The Elder Approves
quest.desc: $npcName:11001386$ is satisfied with the $item:30000509$. He believes that this development can bring the region into the modern world. Take his $item:30000510$ to $npcName:11001382$.

quest.name: 시끄러운 개척 상인
quest.desc: 임무 수행을 위해 $map:02010002$에 온 $npc:11001310$. 시끄럽게 굴며 자신에게 말 붙이는 $npc:11001369$$pp:가,이$ 꽤나 신경 쓰이나 보다. $npc:11001369$$pp:와,과$ 대화해 무슨 일이 하고 싶은지 확인해 보자.

quest.name: Feet on the Wall
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by climbing a wall with the $skill:20000011$ skill.
quest.manual: Use the $skill:20000011$ skill to move 100 m

quest.name: Flight of Fancy
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by flying the friendly skies.

quest.name: On All Fours
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by crawling around.

quest.name: Swimming the Day Away
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by going for a swim.

quest.name: Mount Up
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by riding around on your mount.

quest.name: Desert Scenery
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by taking in the desert scenery with a telescope.
quest.manual: Use the binoculars at $map:02010084$ |Use the binoculars at $map:02010033$

quest.name: Full Tilt
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by going for a run.

quest.name: Beneath the Bridge
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by checking out the view under the bridge with a telescope.
quest.manual: Use the binoculars at $map:02010039$ |Use the binoculars at $map:02010038$

quest.name: With Outstretched Arms
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by jumping from a high place.

quest.name: The Human Pogo
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by jumping around.

quest.name: Hello, Ludari City!
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by greeting passersby in $map:02010002$.

quest.name: Hello, Minar!
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by greeting passersby in $map:02010063$.

quest.name: On the Line
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by enjoying some nice, relaxing fishing.

quest.name: The Joys of Freshwater Fishing
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by enjoying some freshwater fishing.

quest.name: The Joys of Ocean Fishing
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by enjoying some ocean fishing.

quest.name: The Thrill of Lava Fishing
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by lava fishing.

quest.name: The Thrill of Foulwater Fishing
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by enjoying some foulwater fishing.

quest.name: No More Worries
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by experiencing the freedom of the $item:50400107$.

quest.name: Rockabye
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by taking a rest on a comfortable $item:50400109$.

quest.name: Lost in the Music
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary so you don't get too serious, yourself. You can start by getting lost in the rhythm with a solo performance.

quest.name: Hammer Pig Mayhem
quest.desc: $npcName:11001179$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by challenging $npcName:23000057$ in $map:02010020$.

quest.name: Shady Shaman
quest.desc: $npcName:11001179$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by challenging $npcName:23000009$ in $map:02010027$.

quest.name: Face the Legend
quest.desc: $npcName:11001179$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by challenging $npcName:23000029$ in $map:02010022$.

quest.name: (Dungeon) One Last Card
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21015001$ Entrance: $map:02010009$ Party Size: 4 This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by challenging $npcName:24001507$ in $map:02000337$.

quest.name: (Dungeon) Obfuscating Stupidity
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21010001$ Entrance: $map:02010084$ Party Size: 4 This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by challenging $npcName:24001309$ in $map:02000338$.

quest.name: (Dungeon) Stinky Neighbors
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:20017001$ Entrance: $map:02010019$ Party Size: 4 This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by challenging $npcName:23090066$ in $map:02010050$.

quest.name: (Dungeon) Giving Chase
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25010001$ Entrance: $map:02010026$ This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by challenging $npcName:24001807$ in $map:02010052$.

quest.name: (Dungeon) Shaman behind the Moon
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21014001$ Entrance: $map:02010047$ Party Size: 4 This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by challenging $npcName:24002005$ in $map:02010054$.

quest.name: (Dungeon) The End of Desire
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25009001$ Entrance: $map:02010023$ This quest is only available on normal difficulty.
$npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by challenging $npcName:24001904$ in $map:02010070$.

quest.name: Desert Outlaws
quest.desc: $npcName:11001369$ feels bad for the city folk, who live hurried and serious lives. He suggests you do something extraordinary to spice things up. Start by teaching the monsters of Karkar Island a lesson in manners.
quest.manual: Defeat the monsters of Karkar Island

quest.name: Celebratory Gathering
quest.desc: $npcName:11001292$, $npcName:11001297$, and $npcName:11001294$ are celebrating having safely completed their missions as dragon knights. Let's join the gathering.

quest.name: By Neccessity, Not Chance
quest.desc: The Huntis Federation and the dragon knights, two groups destined to unite, completed the missions together. $npcName:11001297$ is happy to have met $npcName:11001292$ and $npcName:11001294$ through this event. I've heard that $npcName:11001292$ has a similar story of how he met $npcName:11001294$…

quest.name: Grand Opening
quest.desc: $npcName:11001292$ recalled the grand opening of $map:02010053$ and $npcName:11001294$ described the circumstances of that day.
quest.manual: Speak with $npcName:11001493$ and go to the past|Speak with $npcName:11001499$ of the past

quest.name: The Customer Is Right
quest.desc: $npcName:11001294$ continued to explain that because he was the only customer, he was able to eat without stopping. However, after he appeared, $npcName:11001292$ couldn't handle cooking alone… $npcName:11001292$ finished the story for $npcName:11001294$ of that nightmarish day…
quest.manual: Speak with $npcName:11001498$ and go to the past|Observe the situation of that day

quest.name: Origins of Fate
quest.desc: From the mark on his wrist, $npcName:11001292$ recognized that $npcName:11001294$ was a dragon knight just like him. $npcName:11001297$ also brought up the first day she met $npcName:11001292$.

quest.name: Second Fate
quest.desc: $npcName:11001297$ suffered from an unknown source of pain until $npcName:11001292$ recognized that she was a dragon knight after hearing about her symptoms.

quest.name: 너희 또한 빛이 되리라
quest.desc: $npcName:11001292$ is curious what's written on $item:30000515$. Let's go to $map:52010022$ and bring back $item:30000515$.

quest.name: $npcName:11001537$ the Indelicate
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001537$'s unsavory word-choice has proven offensive to onionkind, and landed him in something of a pickle.
Drive off the outraged $npcPlural:21000262$ and $npcPlural:21000264$ so that he can escape.

quest.name: Tasty Tasty Tears
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001537$ wouldn't leave even if he could—not until he collects some spring water made from $npcName:11000285$'s tears.
Allegedly, any who consume food cooked in the tears will instantly fall in love with the dish. You should go collect spring water for $npcName:11001537$ so that he stops riling up the local onion populace.
quest.manual: Fill the bottle with water from $npcName:11000285$'s spring

quest.name: The Hopeless Romantic
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001538$ traveled long and far to find $npcName:11000285$, after hearing he held the power to transform unrequited love into the requited kind.
Sadly for her, $npcName:11000285$ refused to help her. Perhaps you can talk to $npcName:11000285$ on her behalf and change the old turtle's mind.

quest.name: A Self-Help Story
quest.desc: $npcName:11000285$ says that the rumors about his powers over love are false. He is merely a sad old turtle, tired of others coming to remind him what he has lost.

quest.name: 도와주실 분을 찾아요
quest.desc: 자신을 도와줄 누군가를 찾고 있는 $npcName:11000221$. $npcName:11000221$$pp:를,을$ 만나 무슨 도움이 필요한지 물어보자.

quest.name: 아무도 모르게
quest.desc: $map:03000135$의 허름한 책상 위에 놓아둔 비밀 지령서를 확인하라는 메시지가 전달됐다. 누가 보낸 것이며, 무슨 내용일까?

quest.name: 임무는 계속된다
quest.desc: $map:03000135$에서 $npcName:11000614$$pp:가,이$ 기다리고 있다고 한다. 무슨 임무가 기다리고 있을까…

quest.name: 웨이 홍의 속셈
quest.desc: 모두가 알현식이 취소된 걸 아쉬워하고 있을 때 미소 짓고 있는 한 사람, $npcName:11000251$$pp:다,이다$. $npcName:11001690$의 말에 따르면, $npcName:11000251$$pp:는,은$ 알현식 취소로 쓸모없어진 물품들을 빼돌리거나 싸게 매입하기 위해 왕실 담당자에게 줄을 댔다고 한다.

quest.name: 두 얼굴의 넬프
quest.desc: 무기고 도난 사건에 $npcName:11000492$$pp:가,이$ 연루된 사연을 알게 된 상황에서 더는 알현식 물품들을 빼돌리기가 어려워졌다. 계획이 틀어져 화가 나 있을 $npcName:11000251$$pp:를,을$ 달래려면 어떻게 해야 할까…

quest.name: 넬프의 행방
quest.desc: $npcName:11000492$$pp:가,이$ 벌인 무기고 도난 사건 때문에 알현식 물품을 빼돌리려던 흑성회의 계획이 물거품이 됐다. $npcName:11000492$$pp:를,을$ 잡아 $npcName:11000251$ 앞에 무릎 꿇리지 않으면 $npcName:11000251$의 분노가 어디로 향할지 모른다. 서둘러 $npcName:11000492$의 행방을 쫓자.

quest.name: 블랙 하우스
quest.desc: $map:52000034$의 공사가 진행되는 동안 무척이나 시끄러워 경비 서기 힘들었다는 $npcName:11001677$. 어떤 이유인지는 모르겠지만, 공사가 중단돼 다행이라고 말한다. $npcName:11001677$$pp:가,이$ 알려준 곳으로 가보자.

quest.name: 넬프가 남긴 것
quest.desc: 구겨진 메모에 표시된 $map:02000043$의 $map:52000037$까지 찾아왔지만… 안타깝게도 $npc:11000492$는 죽어 있었다. $npc:11000492$$pp:는,은$ 왜 이런 곳에서 죽어있는 것일까? 그에게는 도대체 무슨 일이 있었던 것일까? 그가 저지른 비리와 그의 죽음과 관련한 풀리지 않는 의문들을 풀어줄 수 있는 단서가 이 주변에 있지 않을까? 정신을 가다듬고 $npc:11000492$의 주변을 자세히 살펴보자.

quest.name: 새로운 단서
quest.desc: $npc:11000492$의 죽음과 그 주변에서 발견된 의문의 수첩에 대한 이야기를 들고 난 후, $npc:11000169$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11000119$에게 직접 지금까지 조사한 내용을 보고해달라고 했다. $map:02000001$에서 $npcName:11000119$$pp:를,을$ 만나보자.

quest.name: 자베스의 호출
quest.desc: $map:52000034$에서 잿빛의 이리를 기다리던 $npc:11001682$. 무슨 말이 하고 싶어 안달 났던 걸까.

quest.name: 눈의 가시
quest.desc: $item:20000046$$pp:며,이며$ $item:20000015$$pp:를,을$ 흑성회가 유통하고 있다는 사실은 $map:02000100$에선 비밀이 아니다. 더구나 아무도 이를 문제 삼고 있지 않다고 한다. 오로지 다크윈드만이 못마땅히 여기고 시비라는데…

quest.name: 흑성회의 비밀 멤버
quest.desc: 보스의 지시를 잿빛의 이리에게 전하는 $npcName:11001674$. 다크윈드를 드나들며 이상 분위기를 감지하게 되면 즉시 흑성회에 알리라고 말한다.

quest.name: 사찰 대상
quest.desc: 잿빛의 이리에게 수첩을 건네는 $npcName:11000251$. 다크윈드 대원이 지니고 있던 수첩인 듯 하다. 어떤 내용이 담겨 있을까?

quest.name: 다크윈드 지령
quest.desc: 다크윈드 대장 $npcName:11000044$$pp:가,이$ 나를 찾고 있다고 한다. $map:02000100$ $map:02000152$$pp2:로,으로$ 가 보자.

quest.name: 의례적인 호출
quest.desc: 잊을만 하면 $map:52000034$$pp2:로,으로$ 잿빛의 이리를 호출하는 $npc:11001682$. 딱히 할 말이 있어 부른 것 같지는 않은데…

quest.name: 제이시의 호출
quest.desc: $map:02000216$$pp:를,을$ 방문한 잿빛의 이리를 반기는 $npcName:11000515$. 무슨 말을 하고 싶어 부른 걸까?

quest.name: 그녀가 하고 싶은 말
quest.desc: 알현식 물품 도난 사건의 범인으로 험플스가 지목됐다는 사실에 의구심을 표하는 $npcName:11000515$.

quest.name: 고독한 비밀
quest.desc: 다크윈드 대장 $npcName:11000044$$pp:가,이$ 나를 찾고 있다고 한다. $map:02000100$ $map:02000152$$pp2:로,으로$ 가 보자.

quest.name: 새로운 지시
quest.desc: 비욘드 링크에서 관리하는 건물이 어둠의 땅에서 발견됐다고 한다. $npcName:11001678$, $npcName:11001686$ 무리에 합류해 건물을 조사하자.

quest.name: 수상한 창고
quest.desc: 버려진 것 같은 창고에 경비 시스템이 잘 갖춰진 게 수상하다는 $npcName:11001678$. 이곳에서 어떤 정보를 얻을 수 있을까? 그리고, $npcName:11000251$$pp:가,이$ 얻고자 하는 정보는 무엇일까?

quest.name: 의미 모를 단서
quest.desc: 창고의 경비 로봇 부품을 살펴 보던 $npcName:11001678$$pp:는,은$ 부품에 적혀 있는 문구 중에 낯익은 지명을 발견한다. 그곳에 가면 원하는 걸 얻을 수 있을까?

quest.name: 내가 없는 곳에선
quest.desc: 흑성회에서 $map:52000039$$pp:를,을$ 조사하라는 지시가 내려왔다고 한다. $npcName:11001679$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:11001687$$pp:는,은$ 먼저 출발했다고 하니, 서둘러 $map:52000039$에 가보자.

quest.name: 위기의 순간, 빛나는 동료애
quest.desc: $npcName:11001679$$pp:가,이$ 위험에 처했다고 한다. $npcName:11001687$$pp:는,은$ 다급한 목소리로 $npcName:11001679$$pp:를,을$ 구하러 가자는데…

quest.name: 본격적인 조사
quest.desc: $map:52000039$의 위험 요소는 모두 제거한 듯 하다. 본격적으로 내부를 조사해 보자.

quest.name: 나설 수 없는 일
quest.desc: $npcName:11000251$$pp:가,이$ 찾고 있다며, $map:02000156$$pp2:로,으로$ 가 보라는 $npcName:11000515$.

quest.name: 앞길을 가로막는 자
quest.desc: 뒷골목 사람들이 끌려갔다는 그곳, $map:63000038$에 도착했다. 그들의 생사가 걱정되니, 서둘러 구하러 가자.

quest.name: 뒷골목 사람들을 찾아서
quest.desc: $npcName:11001782$에 따르면, 뒷골목 사람들은 $map:63000039$에 갇혀 있다고 한다. 어서 가서 그들을 풀어주자.

quest.name: 나를 위한 희생
quest.desc: 더 이상 가이던스를 위험에 빠뜨리지 않기 위해, 그리고 내가 누구인지 알기 위해 더 이상 비욘드 링크와 칸두라를 외면할 수는 없을 것 같다. 망설이지 말고, $map:63000038$에 들어가 보자.

quest.name: 또 다른 희생
quest.desc: 나를 대신해 부상을 입은 $npcName:11001789$$pp:를,을$ 뒤로 하고 $npcName:11001780$$pp:를,을$ 상대하자.

quest.name: 새로운 가족
quest.desc: 보여주고 싶은 것이 있다는 $npcName:11001791$. 그를 따라 $map:63000040$$pp2:로,으로$ 이동하자.

quest.name: Popularity
quest.desc: $npcName:11000076$ needs your attention urgently. What a burden it is to be so popular!

quest.name: Settling the Ranks
quest.desc: Though $npcName:11000044$ has left Dark Wind, his agents remain in Dark Wind and the army. You must track down his allies and remove them from the ranks. Meet with $npc:11000119$ and come up with a plan.

quest.name: Scene of the Crime
quest.desc: It's time to root out $npcName:11000044$'s spies. Search $map:52000073$ for clues.

quest.name: A Careful Search
quest.desc: Search the $map:52000073$ carefully to see if $npcName:11000044$ left any evidence behind. Start with the desk.

quest.name: A Hidden Place
quest.desc: Everything is not always what it seems. As $npcName:11000044$ had a hidden side, the $map:52000073$ may also be hiding something.

quest.name: Accomplice
quest.desc: Someone is covering $npcName:11000044$'s tracks. Ask $npcName:11000215$ if there have been any other visitors to the office.

quest.name: Cold Sweat
quest.desc: $npcName:11000215$ denies being a follower of $npcName:11000044$. You'll have to keep looking for suspects…

quest.name: The List
quest.desc: The charred documents that you found contain a list of people who have crossed $npcName:11000044$ and their location. Much of it is illegible, but you can just make out the words "$map:52000075$."

quest.name: Criminal Protection
quest.desc: $npcName:11000526$ may be a criminal, but he still deserves a fair trial. Make sure that he's safe and secure in the $map:02000134$.

quest.name: The Next Target
quest.desc: You weren't able to save $npcName:11000526$, but $npcName:11000064$ is also on $npcName:11000044$'s list. Make sure that he's safe.

quest.name: Increased Guard
quest.desc: You've let the guard know that $npcName:11000064$ may be in danger. That should be enough… right?

quest.name: A Difficult Rumor
quest.desc: It seems that $npcName:11000266$ has something to say.

quest.name: Reassuring the Ranks
quest.desc: To help bolster morale, $npcName:11000076$ suggests making $npcName:11000064$ the leader of Dark Wind. However, $npcName:11000266$ isn't sure if the other members would agree with this idea…

quest.name: The Leader of Dark Wind
quest.desc: I must first find out if $npcName:11000064$ is even interested in becoming the leader of Dark Wind.

quest.name: A Worthy Proposition
quest.desc: $npcName:11000064$ suggests that you ask $npcName:11000006$ to be the new leader of Dark Wind, instead.

quest.name: The Bait
quest.desc: Humblis has been investigating $npcName:11000044$'s activities on their own, and they think they've found the members of Dark Wind who are loyal to him. They have a plan…

quest.name: Misdirection
quest.desc: Set the trap by feeding false information to $npcName:11000215$, who happens to be a terrible gossip.

quest.name: Cleaning House
quest.desc: It's time to spring the trap on $npcName:11000044$'s spies. Defeat $npcNamePlural:29000146$ in the $map:52000070$.

quest.name: Elated Victory
quest.desc:
Now that $npcName:11000044$'s spies have been captured, the members of Humblis are going to rejoin Dark Wind.
Deliver this news to the guard.

quest.name: Too Soon to Celebrate
quest.desc: $npcName:11000064$ is curious about the news of $npcName:11000006$ and $npcName:11000044$'s spies. Bring him up to date.

quest.name: Strange Disappearance
quest.desc: There's urgency in $npc:11000076$'s voice. What does he have to say?

quest.name: Taken Away
quest.desc: $npcName:11000076$ believes that $npcName:11000523$ was kidnapped. It seems like a trap for $npcName:11000064$—one that he willingly jumped into. Make sure he isn't jumping into the trap alone.
quest.manual: Enter the $map:52000072$ at the $map:02000146$ and find $npcName:11001915$

quest.name: Her Reasons
quest.desc: It seems that $npcName:11000523$ left with $npcName:11000044$ of her own free will. $npcName:11000064$ is sure she must have had a reason, but the guard would never understand. Why don't you just tell them that she's gone on a… a trip?

quest.name: Getting Lennon
quest.desc: $npcName:11000064$ has yet to return. $npcName:11000266$ wants to discuss the matter of Dark Wind's new leader with him. Go find him.

quest.name: Losing Lennon
quest.desc: $npcName:11000064$ is nowhere to be found. Wouldn't $npcName:11000006$ know where he went?

quest.name: Low Profile
quest.desc: $npcName:11000006$ has an idea about how to find $npcName:11000064$ more quickly.

quest.name: A Kind of Lead
quest.desc: Since $npcName:11000006$ can't afford to make any waves in the search for $npcName:11000064$, he wants you to reach out to one of his less conventional sources. Meet the informant at the $map:03000103$.

quest.name: Searching Sight
quest.desc: $npcName:11001238$ will show you the way to $npcName:11000064$. Of course, she needs you to fetch ingredients for her first.
quest.manual: Get $item:30000614$ from $npcName:40000145$ in $map:03000060$ |Get $item:30000615$ from $npcName:40000128$ in $map:03000024$ |Get $item:30000616$ from $npcName:40000126$ in $map:03000101$

quest.name: An Unseen Threat
quest.desc:
It seems that $npcName:11000064$ is in trouble. Perhaps $npcName:11001238$ will send you to his side.
If you don't want to speak to $npcName:11001238$, you can take the temporary portal to the $map:52000076$, instead.
quest.complete: Go to $map:52000068$ from $map:02000349$ and speak with $npcName:11001917$

quest.name: Guard Captain's Lament
quest.desc: $npcName:11000119$ thanks you for saving $map:02000001$. He looks like he's aged ten years…

quest.name: Rob from the Rich
quest.desc: Empty out the safe before the coppers arrive.
quest.manual: Move $item:30000776$ from the safe to the exit

quest.name: Give to the Poor
quest.desc: Share the money you took from $map:52000128$ with the poor of $map:52000129$.
quest.manual: Give money to $npcName:11003277$ |Give money to $npcName:11003278$ |Give money to $npcName:11003279$

quest.name: Holy Mission
quest.desc: The soldiers who went out with $npcName:11003328$ all returned from the mission with grave injuries. Fulfill your duties as a Priest and heal them.

quest.name: Picking Up
quest.desc: Clean up the trash in $map:52000145$ for $npcName:11003189$.

quest.name: Quiver Basket Cleanup
quest.desc: While $npcName:11003189$ gets some "well deserved" sleep, move the quiver baskets into position for today's practice.

quest.name: The Fallen Squire
quest.desc: Carry $npcName:11003398$'s unconscious body to $npcName:11003400$.

quest.name: A Friend in Need
quest.desc: If you don't hurry, $npcName:11003399$ will die of terminal nausea! Get help from the priest, $npcName:11003402$.

quest.name: Homebound
quest.desc: Jonathan Button reached out to say that he'd found something interesting he wants you to see. It's been a while since you've been back home, why not go see what he has to say? Meet with Jonathan in $map:52000156$.

quest.name: An Unexpected Reunion
quest.desc: Jonathan called you into the $map:52000155$—a former Dark Wind hideout. Thankfully, they've abandoned the place. Apparently he's been living there with some associates. Well, might as well go inside and see what he wants to show you.

quest.name: Fresh-Squeezed Joy
quest.desc: $npcName:11003272$… $npcName:11003273$… You thought they were dead. But here they are waiting for you at the Jazz Club. They said $npcName:11001927$ tried to kill them, too, but failed to finish the job. All that matters now is you've been reunited with your old crew!

quest.name: An Important Discussion
quest.desc: With $npcName:11003272$ and $npcName:11003273$ in a sugar coma after your juice party, Jonathan becomes very serious. He wants to talk to you about something. Meet him in the basement.

quest.name: An Old Grudge
quest.desc: You followed Jonathan to the basement, where he shows you a photograph that opens some old wounds, and causes you to adjust your priorities. See what else Jonathan has to say.

quest.name: The Call of Vengeance
quest.desc: Jonathan showed you a picture of $npcName:11001927$, the man who betrayed you and attempted to kill you and your friends. It seems he's been illegally dealing in lapenshards. With this information in hand, you begin to form a plan to take your revenge.

quest.name: The Appointed Time
quest.desc: Your training is complete and the power of the lapenshard is yours. The question remains: are you ready to take down $npcName:11001927$? Talk to Jonathan and see what he thinks.

quest.name: Nothing Comes Free
quest.desc: With your newfound power, Jonathan believes you just might be up to the challenge of defeating $npcName:11001927$. But if you're going to have your revenge, you'll need to actually find the guy. Lucky for you, Jonathan has a plan! Listen to what he has to say.

quest.name: The Debt Comes Due
quest.desc: Jonathan says that his help was not free, but rather comes at a steep cost… Though you are initially filled with dread, it turns out his terms are actually quite reasonable. In a way, they've already been paid. Speak with Jonathan.

quest.name: Such Sweet Sorrow
quest.desc: The cost of Jonathan's help was to be his friend? Little did he realize, you were friends from the start. Now, a new mission awaits you at the Frontier Foundation. It's time to say goodbye to your friends once again—the old, and the "new."

quest.name: Recovering Lost Memories
quest.desc: In pursuit of your lost memories, you close your eyes and think of $map:52000156$. There in your mindscape, you recall a conversation you had with $npcName:11000006$.

quest.name: Memories of the Past
quest.desc: The lapenshard $npcName:11000006$ gave you was being studied by Dark Wind. Owing to its connection to the red lapenta which controls time, he's optimistic the crystal can help you recover your lost memories.

quest.name: Mystery Man
quest.desc: $npcName:11000006$ gave you something called a lapenshard and a report on what Dark Wind had learned about them. His hope was that you might be able to use it to recover your lost memories, and it seems to be working! You find yourself whirled away to a different place in the midst of calamity.

quest.name: Distorted Memories
quest.desc: You found yourself in a burning, but when you approached the flames you couldn't feel their heat. It was a memory, and in it you witnessed $npcName:11003185$ speaking with a $npcName:11004044$. You were not prepared for what came next.

quest.name: The Forgotten Truth
quest.desc: After witnessing the $npcName:11004044$'s death at the hands of $npcName:11003185$, your head begins to reel. That child next to the $npcName:11003915$… Is that you? A murderous rage overtakes you.

quest.name: An Origin Remembered
quest.desc: As the $npcName:11003915$ breathed his last, a murderous rage washed over you. $npcName:11003185$ said something about seeing if you have what it takes. What did he mean by that? You awaken from your memory to a startling realization.

quest.name: Muscle Memory
quest.desc: Awakening from your memory, you come to the startling realization that your whole life has been spent in service of the man who murdered your father—the monster known as $npcName:11003185$. There was more to the memory, though. Something that may help you quell your burning desire for vengeance.

quest.name: A Lethal Technique
quest.desc: After reliving one of your lost memories, a thought strikes you. The technique $npcName:11003185$ used is one that he never taught you. $npcName:11003185$ may have taught you everything you know, but apparently not everything he knows. If you can master this skill, perhaps you can use it when you give $npcName:11003185$ his just desserts.

quest.name: Exacting Vengeance
quest.desc: The skill $npcName:11003185$ used in your memory seems to have been intentionally hidden from you. Perhaps he feared you would use it against him. Now that you've memorized it, it's time to resume your journey.

quest.name: Cruelty and Justice
quest.desc: Now that you have mastered $npcName:11003185$'s secret technique, it's time to figure out where to go from here. Since he provided you with the lapenshard in the first place, you decide to speak with $npcName:11000006$ and bring him up to speed on what happened.

quest.name: As the Crow Flies
quest.desc: After emerging from your memory and mastering a new technique, you returned to $npcName:11000006$. It seems that $npcName:11000006$ was also familiar with the technique, but resolved never to use it because it was too cruel. He also filled you in on the latest intel regarding $npcName:11003185$.

quest.name: Renewed Pursuit
quest.desc: $npcName:11000006$ says that Dark Wind has received word of $npcName:11003185$'s recent movements. As much as you want to track down $npcName:11003185$ and end his life, you can't do that without finding him first. Talk to $npcName:11000006$.

quest.name: Introspection
quest.desc: On a visit to Lith Harbor, you stumbled over some crystals sitting on the ground and just about blew your top. Maybe if you take a moment to reflect on your thoughts, you can calm down a little.

quest.name: A Familiar Face
quest.desc: After a conversation with your $npcName:11003918$ that sounded suspiciously like $npcName:11003920$, who should you encounter but your adoptive sister herself! But what is she doing here? Speak with $npcName:11003920$.

quest.name: A Not-So-Stupid Stone
quest.desc: Wait a second! How did $npcName:11003920$ know you were in Lith?! Is she stalking you? $npcName:11003920$ said she paid some information broker to find you… Was she that worried about you? Maybe it's time you told $npcName:11003920$ about what's going on with you.

quest.name: Awakened Rage
quest.desc: $npcName:11003920$ seemed unsurprised to hear what you had to say. In fact, she seems to know more about that dumb rock than you do! Even though sisters are annoying and should be ignored as a general rule, maybe you should listen to what $npcName:11003920$ has to say.

quest.name: Anger Management
quest.desc: $npcName:11003920$ says that stone you've been kicking around is something called a lapenshard. Apparently they've been making people stronger and giving them new abilities. Wow! It's a good thing it hasn't exploded or anything. Anyway, she says maybe that lapenwhatever's started to wake up the god of rage's power which has been slumbering within you. Welp, now what? Speak with your smarty-pants sister.

quest.name: Whack-An-Island
quest.desc: While you were away from $map:52000161$, $npcName:11003920$ thumbed through your old man's books on the god of rage. She has this crazy theory that if you can master the abilities the god of rage used, maybe you can control your rage too. That would be awesome! And at the very least, it's an excuse to break things. So you hopped on a boat with $npcName:11003920$, and off you go!

quest.name: Mastery of Rage
quest.desc: Hoping to learn to control your anger and unlock the power of the god of rage without unleashing untold destruction, $npcName:11003920$ develops a training regimen for you. After destroying the many—thankfully unoccupied—outlying islands around Rien, your training is complete. Now what? Talk to $npcName:11003920$.

quest.name: An Upscale Affair
quest.desc: With your training complete and your rage under slightly better control, it's time to figure out what comes next. Thankfully, $npcName:11003920$ has a plan!

quest.name: The Real Agenda
quest.desc: Though your training is over, your work has just begun. Apparently all this was to help get your anger under control so you can go somewhere fancy. When all's said and done, maybe you'll find the old man. Talk to $npcName:11003920$ to learn more.

quest.name: We'll Meet Again
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003920$ told you about the "Frontier Foundation," an organization responsible for regulating the lapenshards. She says you have a responsibility to use your power to help the world, but it sure seems like her main goal is tracking down the old man. Still, that's fine by you. You'll go to the Frontier Foundation, learn about the lapenshards, and get any help they can offer toward finding the geezer.
Before you go, you should probably say goodbye to $npcName:11003920$.

quest.name: A Barbecue Among Friends
quest.desc:
After a long journey, a letter from an old friend brings you back to Ellinel. What could be better than a barbecue with your best bud Kate?!
You and $npcName:11003925$ should catch up!

quest.name: Stoking the Flames of Friendship
quest.desc: You're having a lovely visit with your old friend $npcName:11003925$, but for some reason your dinner isn't roasting properly! $npcName:11003925$ seems really worked up about something. She must be hungry.

quest.name: One-Track Mind
quest.desc: $npcName:11003925$ has been talking to herself for quite some time… Something about Professor Einos? Why isn't this stupid meat cooking faster?!

quest.name: Crunchy Crystal Candy
quest.desc: Kate's been nagging you about something again, but it was hard to pay attention with your stomach grumbling like that. But what's that shiny thing over there, a bit of tasty rock candy?!

quest.name: Power Overwhelming
quest.desc: You found a tasty-looking piece of rock candy on the ground, and your hunger got the better of you. Forget the five second rule, a wizard's gotta eat!

quest.name: Mana Overload
quest.desc: You feel a little funny after munching on your ground-candy. Perhaps something to do with that explosion? $npcName:11003925$ seems worried, but what ever for? Sure eating off the floor was kinda gross, but you were starving!

quest.name: A Wizard Reborn
quest.desc: So eating the floor-candy might not have been a such a good idea… It was a GREAT one. Sure it was weird that the mana overflowing from your body created an explosion that rocked the whole forest, but you feel AMAZING! Still, Kate seems really worried. You should talk to her.

quest.name: What Do You Mean it Wasn't Candy?
quest.desc: Contrary to you, who feels totally awesome, $npcName:11003925$ is worried. She took you back to Ellinel for a checkup, but you don't know what the big deal is. See what she has to say.

quest.name: Word of Mouth
quest.desc: According to Kate, what you thought was carelessly misplaced rock candy was actually a powerful magical object called a lapenshard. Apparently they make people stronger? Given your strange new situation, Kate proposes an idea.

quest.name: What's a Wizard to Do?
quest.desc:
Now that you're a lapenshard-enhanced wizard, $npcName:11003925$ suggests you join the Frontier Foundation to learn more about the lapenshards. Apparently the Frontier Foundation is an organization responsible for researching the lapenshards.
It could be worth considering. See what else Kate has to say!

quest.name: Professor Kate
quest.desc:
Inspired by your battles against the forces of darkness, $npcName:11003925$ wonders aloud if she has a bigger part to play. After all, with the power of the lapenshards, any wizard could become strong enough to join the fight!
Wait… Kate's still talking?

quest.name: If You Say So
quest.desc: Kate says you should join the Frontier Foundation, and who are you to disagree? She's a pretty smart girl. That means it's time to say bye bye $npcName:11003925$ for now!

quest.name: A Much-Needed Break
quest.desc: After a long and difficult journey, you decide to pay a visit to your old home on Halo Mountain in the hopes of encountering your friends. Much to your delight, there you encountered $npcName:11003952$ and $npcName:11001709$. It's about time you three caught up.

quest.name: Drifting Off
quest.desc: After you told them of your adventures since parting, your friends suggested that you get some well-deserved rest. That was when $npcName:11001709$ let something slip about events going in Maple World. $npcName:11003952$ said that was a discussion best left for later. Just what is going on?

quest.name: A Power Sealed Within
quest.desc: You were about to ask $npcName:11003952$ what was going on when your head got a little foggy. Next thing you knew, you found yourself somewhere else and were met by a familiar face.

quest.name: The Will to Power
quest.desc:
It seems you were called into this inner space by $npcName:11003951$. There you learned that gems called "lapenshards" had appeared throughout Maple World.
Somehow related to the lapentas, these shards had awakened the power of the Munakra sealed within you. As this power grows, it threatens to break the shackles that bind it—the force of which could end your life.
If you are to survive, you must free this power immediately. For that however, you need determination, and clarity of purpose. Speak with $npcName:11003951$ to learn more.

quest.name: Clarity of Purpose
quest.desc: I can't tell you whether you're worthy of the power of the Munakra or not but… Your intentions are true. Well then, let's begin.

quest.name: The Power of the Munakra
quest.desc:
With $npcName:11001560$'s aid, you succeeded in freeing the power of the Munakra sealed within you, saving your own life and unleashing new power.
You awakened to find $npcName:11001558$ and $npcName:11003949$ worrying over you. Speak with $npcName:11003949$.

quest.name: Unshackled and Empowered
quest.desc:
When you came to your senses, you were lying in Guidance's lodgings on Halo Mountain. It seems you were out for some time. And according to your friends, the chi flowing through your body moves more powerfully than ever.
Out of the corner of your eye you spot a familiar face… one you never expected to see here.

quest.name: A Time for All Things
quest.desc: Who's that over there? …$npcName:11001560$?! Apparently as a bonus from unleashing the power of the Munakra, $npcName:11001560$ can come into the real world to chat. See what else $npcName:11001560$ has to say!

quest.name: Inside Information
quest.desc: You're a little worried about what it means to have $npcName:11001560$ walking about the real world unseen, but $npcName:11001560$ says not to worry about that right now. Your friends are probably worried about you. Why not talk with $npcName:11003952$?

quest.name: Walk Your Own Path
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003952$ said he and Tinchai were getting ready to go help the "Frontier Foundation" with their investigation into the lapenshards. $npcName:11001558$ was taken aback by your knowledge of the lapenshards, but answered your questions about the Foundation anyway.
With that matter settled, it seems that $npcName:11003952$ has an unusual request for you.

quest.name: The Constant Companion
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001558$ and $npcName:11003949$ have set off for the Frontier Foundation. Before you follow suit, you have unfinished business with $npcName:11003951$.
Speak with $npcName:11003951$.

quest.name: The Strange Swordsman
quest.desc: Upon arriving at the Frontier Foundation, you discovered a group of powerful-looking adventurers. As you take in the scenery, a long-haired swordsman strikes up a conversation with you. Speak with the $npcName:11003963$.

quest.name: A Different Manner of Bladecraft
quest.desc: Upon arriving at the Frontier Foundation, you discovered a group of powerful-looking adventurers. Say, is that person over there a swordsman like you? What's up with her shield? Go speak with the $npcName:11003955$.

quest.name: Little Miss Fancypants
quest.desc: You arrive at the Frontier Foundation and discover a group of tough-looking adventurers. They'd probably make a decent challenge. You asked if anyone wanted to spar, but some self-important little jerk started cramping on your style. Does this $npcName:11003956$ think she's better than you?

quest.name: Accosted By a Brute
quest.desc: You finally arrived at the Frontier Foundation, a place of true splendor. As you admire your surroundings, you can't help but be distracted by a loud and uncivilized individual shouting in your ear. What is such a person doing in a place like this?

quest.name: A Matter of Methods
quest.desc: As you arrived at the Frontier Foundation, finding $npcName:11003932$ was still the first thing on your mind. Where did he go? Perhaps someone here can help you track him down?

quest.name: Magical Superiority
quest.desc:
Wow the Frontier Foundation has so much free food, and it's all delicious! You decided to take a break from eating to explore the premise when you bumped into a real jerkwad.
All you wanted to do was help out a stranger and the guy decided to bite your head off.

quest.name: Technical Superiority
quest.desc: You arrived at the Frontier Foundation and bumped into a hapless fellow with a dilemma only you could solve! You suggested the perfect solution, but naturally, an air-headed wizard couldn't help butting in.

quest.name: The Wolf's New Fan
quest.desc: So you've arrived at the Frontier Foundation. There are a few people here who look really tough. Maybe they'd be up for a fight? But first maybe you should introduce yourself and let them know that you are in fact the famous Gray Wolf. It's only polite.

quest.name: An Unusual Introduction
quest.desc: You finally arrived at the Frontier Foundation and marveled at its decadence. It's filled with strong-looking adventurers. But who is that strange man, and why is he approaching you?

quest.name: Opportunity and Motive
quest.desc: You arrived at the Frontier Foundation and found it packed to the gills with priceless junk. You could easily sneak off with a small fortune's worth of goodies, if it weren't for that nosy lady staring at you.

quest.name: A Crime of Opportunity
quest.desc: You arrived at the Frontier Foundation only to discover a loud and obnoxious individual clearly casing the establishment. You can't help but feel angry about his blatant intent. You should keep an eye on him.

quest.name: First Order of Business
quest.desc: You've arrived in the new land, and already $npcName:11004341$ needs to see you. Check in with her and make sure everything is okay.

quest.name: A Thorough Investigation
quest.desc: $npcName:11004341$ has detected a source of lapenta energy on Kritias. How could it have come to be here? Speak with her to learn more.

quest.name: Epiphany
quest.desc: Sky Fortress doesn't have the manpower to investigate $npcName:11004341$'s unexpected readings. Go to the coordinates she provided and see if you can find the source of this lapenta energy.

quest.name: Unknown yet Familiar
quest.desc: There was a cave at the coordinates $npcName:11004341$ gave you. This place is stunning! Examine the strange light.

quest.name: Instinct for Power
quest.desc: The energy in the cave is strangely familiar. Examine the $npcName:11004339$.

quest.name: An Inner Change
quest.desc: The light of the lapenta energy is captivating. Without thinking, you reached out to touch it, and then…

quest.name: A Powerful Resonance
quest.desc: A change occurred within you after coming into contact with the lapenta energy. For now, go back to $npcName:11004341$ and give her your report.

quest.name: Your New Self
quest.desc: You're resonating with lapenta energy. With this new power, you feel ready to take on anything Kritias throws at you!

quest.name: Starving Refugees
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said the only way to get food for the refugees is hunting the animals in the vicinity. But the mechanical lifeforms are attacking the refugees and giving them a hard time in hunting. $npc:11004574$ is worried that refugees will collapse from starvation if this goes on. Defeat $npcName:25022203$ in $map:02020066$, $npcName:25022305$ in $map:02020067$, and $npcName:25022408$ in $map:02020068$.

quest.name: Changed Poing
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ is wallowing in grief as the furious Poings are harming the Leshies. It must be the Poing exposed to aetherine mentioned by $npcName:11004614$. If you face the first Poing, the second and third appear to help. As you face the three, they combine into the 'Three Poing Brothers'. $npcName:11004620$ said the combined 'Three Poing Brothers' are very strong and the Leshies can't go against them. They must be stopped before there are more sacrifices with the Leshies. Defeat $npcName:25022805$ in $map:02020068$ and $npcName:25022815$ in $map:02020069$.

quest.name: Tairen's Intervention
quest.desc: The Tairen forces are attacking the residents of $map:02020066$. $npcName:11004574$ said Tairen wouldn't have attacked if Humanitas never came. You need to defeat the Tairen forces to build more trust with the refugees. Defeat $npcName:25022200$, $npcName:25022201$, and $npcName:25022204$ in $map:02020066$.

quest.name: Loathing and Revenge
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said only one out of the five that went hunting returned. The last one was kidnapped, but was released to make the refugees fear Kharon. Such atrocity by Kharon can't be allowed anymore. Defeat $npcName:25022300$, $npcName:25022306$, $npcName:25022303$, $npcName:25022301$, and $npcName:25022307$ in $map:02020067$.

quest.name: Reason for the Forest Being Tainted Black
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ said $map:02020068$ is being tainted black because of the Daemon Army. The forest along with the lifeforms are being encroached by the dark power. $npcName:11004620$ said the lifeforms encroached by the dark power are under the Daemon Army's control. He said they are being encroached because the Daemon Army is trying to steal the 'mysterious power' of the Leshies… Defeat $npcName:25022406$, $npcName:25022409$, and $npcName:25022402$ in $map:02020068$.

quest.name: One Who Protects
quest.desc: $npcName:11004620$ said the Daemon Army is tainting the lifeforms of $map:02020069$ black. The lifeforms encroached by the dark power are under the control of the Daemon Army. He's sure they were encroached because the Daemon Army wants to steal the 'mysterious power' of the Leshies. Defeat $npcName:25022500$, $npcName:25022503$, and $npcName:25022502$ in $map:02020069$.

quest.name: Refugees in Panic
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said it's a matter of time until $map:02020066$ falls. It's because the new Kharon commanders are kidnapping refugees all over the place. If this goes on, Galan will be striken by fear and collapse from within. Defeat $npcName:25022801$ in $map:02020066$ and $npcName:25022811$ in $map:02020067$.

quest.name: Monsters Created by Kharon
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said no is hunting because of the beasts released by Kharon. Many of the residents who went hunting came back injured as they were attacked by the beasts. The beasts of Kharon have to be suppressed to free the refugees from hunger. Defeat $npcName:25022208$ in $map:02020066$ and $npcName:25022307$ in $map:02020067$.

quest.name: Hoodlums Who Grabbed an Opportunity
quest.desc: $npcName:11004620$ said the Leshies insisting on driving out strangers are trying to break the peace of the forest. On the surface, it seems like they are attacking strangers. But they are actually hoodlums committing all sorts of wrong deeds. The Leshy hoodlums need to be suppressed before their group gets larger. Defeat $npcName:25022409$ in $map:02020068$ and $npcName:25022503$ in $map:02020069$.

quest.name: Reason for the Decrease of Drones
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said they lack parts and had to cut back on the number of surveillance drones in operation. It's because Kharon frequently attacks and brings the drones down. The drones can be in operation if $item:30001353$ from $npcName:25022206$ flying near $map:02020066$ is used. Go to $map:02020066$, defeat $npcName:25022206$, and get $item:30001353$.

quest.name: A Brilliant Way to Get Aetherine
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said they are always in need of aetherine because there is only 1 aetherine fusion device in $map:02020066$. The lack of aetherine can be resolved if $item:30001354$ is removed from the magic wand of $npcName:25022204$ stationed nearby. Go to $map:02020066$, suppress $npcName:25022204$, and get $item:30001354$.

quest.name: Sly Kidnapping
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said Kharon's kidnapping season is back. When the kidnapped people become weak and useless, they resume their large scale kidnapping again. $npc:11004574$ is sad that three refugees who went hunting today didn't return. Can't sit by and see more victims. Go to $map:02020067$ and defeat $npcName:25022300$ kidnapping refugees.

quest.name: Those Worse than Monsters
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said $npcNamePlural:25022306$ are having fun getting the refugees hurt. They are monsters torturing people as if killing bugs for fun. You can't let this happen. Go to $map:02020067$ and suppress $npcName:25022306$ throwing knives at the refugees.

quest.name: Cudgel of the Leshies
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ refused the Humanitas forces stationing in $map:02020069$. He also refused the modern weapons from Humanitas to protect the mysterious power. All that's left is to improve the uncouth cudgel of the Leshies into a powerful weapon. It can become a powerful weapon if you embed it with $item:30001355$. Go to $map:02020068$, defeat $npcName:25022403$, and get $item:30001355$.

quest.name: Besieged $map:02020069$
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ said he already knows about the lifeforms besieging $map:02020069$. Those lifeforms were encroached by the Daemon Army. $npc:11004620$ said he's certain the Daemon Army is controlling the lifeforms to steal the mysterious power.You can't let the mysterious power fall into the hands of the Daemon Army. Suppress $npcName:25022502$ threatening $map:02020069$.

quest.name: Those Who Muddy the Waters
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ said Leshy hoodlums are going around in groups committing all sorts of wrong deeds. They trouble good Leshies and steal things. The mood in $map:02020069$ is chaotic because of them. If left alone, <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> will become uncontrollable. Teach $npcName:25022503$ roaming around $map:02020069$ a lesson.

quest.name: Insane Kharon
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said the Kharon forces started throwing grenades when the attack on $map:02020066$ failed. It seems they're trying to destroy $map:02020066$ out of hatred. If left alone, the infrastructure of $map:02020066$ will take a hit. Defeat $npcName:25022205$ throwing grenades at $map:02020066$.

quest.name: Dark Conspiracy
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ thinks the Daemon Army increased their forces to taint $map:02020067$ black. They don't usually attack the refugees, but they attack without mercy if those that went out hunting come near. For now, it's best to go and see what the Daemon Army is plotting. Go to $map:02020067$ and suppress $npcName:25022304$.

quest.name: Pain and Poverty
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said it's too late to rescue the kidnapped refugees because they would be doing forced labor by now at the Kharon base. $npc:11004574$ they are severely lacking food because the refugees that went hunting have been kidnapped. Go to $map:02020067$, defeat $npcName:25022307$, and get $item:30001360$.

quest.name: Dark Insanity
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ said $npcName:25022402$ is attacking the Leshies. He said many Leshies are injured by the poisonous sap spurted everywhere by $npcName:25022402$. $npc:11004620$ said $npcName:25022402$'s mind broke down after it was encroached by the dark power. Before the damage gets worse, go to $map:02020068$ and suppress $npcName:25022402$.

quest.name: A Sacred Request
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ wants you to help repair the temple. $item:30001361$ is needed to repair the walls. Go to $map:02020068$, defeat $npcName:25022405$, and get $item:30001361$.

quest.name: Fatal Hunting Method
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ said the ecological disturbance near $map:02020069$ is due to $npcName:25022504$'s pollen. Animals hallucinate and lose their sense of direction when $npcName:25022504$'s pollen enters their eyes. $npc:11004620$ said the damage to the animals isn't small as $npcName:25022504$ increased in numbers. Go to $map:02020069$ and restore the ecology by reducing the number of $npcName:25022504$.

quest.name: Crude Conspiracy
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ said the Leshy hoodlums captured $npcName:25022505$ and released it in $map:02020069$. While the Leshies flee from $npcName:25022505$, they come and steal. If nothing is done, $map:02020069$ will fall into great confusion. Destroy $npcName:25022505$ going through $map:02020069$.

quest.name: Kharon's Psychological Warfare
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said $npcName:25022207$ used a dagger to carve out all sorts of threats around Galan. The threat was Galan will be burned to the ground if they didn't surrender voluntarily within a week. $npc:11004574$ said the refugees are in a state of confusion, breaking the rules and doing whatever they want. If this goes on, Galan will collapse from within. Defeat $npcName:25022207$ near $map:02020066$ instigating this fear.

quest.name: Threatened Refugees
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said the refugees that went hunting near Galan were attacked by mechanical lifeforms. They are attacking the refugees for no reason with their frightening pincers. If nothing is done, Galan will collapse from injury and hunger. Defeat $npcName:25022203$ wandering $map:02020066$.

quest.name: A Way to Cool the Heat
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said $map:02020066$ is boiling from the heat. She said getting the wings of $npcName:25022305$ flying around $map:02020067$ will be helpful. It's because $item:30001363$ of $npcName:25022305$ is useful as a shade since it blocks the burning light. Go to $map:02020067$, defeat $npcName:25022305$, and get $item:30001363$.

quest.name: The Brightest of Ideas
quest.desc: Modern weapons and military training were offered for the security of $map:02020069$, but $npc:11004620$ refused. Kanturang said Leshies will fight with their own weapon. The only thing that's left is to upgrade the uncout cudgel of the Leshies into a powerful one. Sticking $item:30001365$ from $npcName:25022507$ into the cudgel will make it a powerful weapon. Defeat $npcName:25022507$ living around $map:02020069$ and get $item:30001365$.

quest.name: Resting Area of the Mysterious Power
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ said Leshies are working together to repair the temple where the 'mysterious power' is enshrined. He asked you to get $item:30001366$ in order to repair the murals. Defeat $npcName:25022501$ living near $map:02020069$ to get $item:30001366$.

quest.name: Persistent Insanity
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ said the Daemon Army in $map:02020068$ built up their forces not too long ago. He said the Daemon Army built up their forces to contaminate the entirety of $map:02020068$. The built up force is $npcName:25022400$. If his prediction is correct, Kanturang said $map:02020068$ will soon be encroached whole by the dark power. Go to $map:02020068$ and defeat $npcName:25022400$ to stop the contamination of the forest.

quest.name: Nuisance of $map:02020069$
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ is lacking food due to the animals released by the Daemon Army. The Leshies lack food because $npcName:25022401$ is devouring all the fruits in $map:02020068$. You can't stand the Leshy children going hungry. Go to $map:02020068$ and defeat $npcName:25022401$.

Party with the couple and attack monsters together in $map:02000021$ or elsewhere by picking up and throwing chicken coops.

부부와 파티 맺고 함께 $map:02010023$ 또는 다른 곳에서 막사를 집어 던져 몬스터 공격하기
Party with the couple and attack monsters together in $map:02000057$ or elsewhere by swinging rainbow trees.

메린이 사라졌다
quest.desc: $npc:11001167$$pp:는,은$ 동생 $npc:11001166$$pp:를,을$ 찾아 $map:02000101$ 곳곳을 헤매고 있다. 친구들과 어울리길 좋아하는 $npc:11001166$$pp:가,이$, 아무래도 위험한 $map:02000331$에 들어간 것 같다는데... $npc:11001166$$pp:를,을$ 찾아서 안전한 곳으로 데려오자.

quest.name: 던전 : 어린이에게 도움을
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25004001$ (입구 맵 : $map:2000101$)
$npcName:11001167$$pp:가,이$ 예상한 대로 $map:2000331$에 친구들과 몰래 들어갔다는 $npcName:11001166$. 숲에 들어온 사람을 공격한다는 까칠한 마법사의 기척을 느끼고 도망쳐 나와, $map:2000101$ 남쪽에 숨어서 떨고 있었다고 한다. 아직 친구들이 $map:2000331$에 있다며 걱정하는 $npcName:11001166$$pp:와,과$ 함께 $map:2000331$에 들어가, 친구들을 도와 주자.
quest.manual: $map:02000331$에 숨어 있던 몬스터 처치하기|$map:02000331$에서 위험에 빠진 어린이 친구들 모두 도와주기

quest.name: 던전 : 위기 탈출 도우미
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25004001$ (입구 맵 : $map:2000101$)
$map:02000331$에 숨바꼭질을 하러 몰래 들어갔다가, 또 마법사에게 들키고 말았다는 $npc:11001166$$pp:와,과$ 친구들. 다시 한 번, 이 철없고 귀여운 꼬마들이 안전하게 $map:2000331$$pp:를,을$ 탈출할 수 있도록 도와 주자.
quest.manual: $map:02000331$에서 위험에 빠진 어린이 친구들 모두 도와주기

quest.name: Eve of the Deadline
quest.desc: 메이플 TV $npc:11001191$$pp:는,은$ 메이플 월드 곳곳의 생태계 이상 현상을 다루는 다큐멘터리를 촬영하고 있다. $map:2000045$, $map:2000003$, $map:2000010$, $map:2000255$, $map:2000007$$pp:를,을$ 촬영 현장으로 선정하고 카메라 설치까지 완료했지만, 영상을 회수하러 간 팀원들이 모두 돌아오지 않고 있어 걱정이다. 특히 가장 먼저 현장으로 간 $npc:11001195$$pp:는,은$ 며칠째 돌아오지 못하고 있다는데… 그를 찾아 $map:2000045$$pp2:로,으로$ 가 보자.

quest.name: 던전 : 근거 없는 자신감의 말로
quest.desc:
(입구 맵 : $map:2000045$)
우연히 본 $npc:11001191$에게 첫눈에 반한 $npc:11001195$$pp:는,은$ 그녀를 위해 촬영 테이프를 회수하러 현장에 나왔다. 하지만 현장에는 뜻밖의 변수가 기다리고 있었다고…. 차마 테이프 회수에 실패했다고 $npcName:11001191$에게 말할 수 없어 며칠째 이곳에 서서 발만 동동 구르고 있다는 그를 위해 $item:30000414$$pp:를,을$ 회수해 주자.

quest.name: 던전 : 예비 신랑의 꿈
quest.desc:
(입구 맵 : $map:2000003$)
결혼을 앞두고 있다는 $npc:11001194$. 몰려드는 업무로 매일이 전쟁 같은 가운데, 촬영 현장에서 마주한 위기 상황 때문에 퇴근도 못 하고 슬픔에 잠겨 있다. 오늘만은 약혼녀와의 약속을 지키고 싶다는 $npcName:11001194$에게 도움의 손길을 내밀어 주자.

quest.name: 던전 : 복잡한 세상, 편하게 삽시다
quest.desc:
(입구 맵 : $map:2000010$)
촬영 현장에 나온 $npc:11001196$$pp:는,은$ 불만에 가득 찬 표정이다. 일손이 부족하다지만 아픈 중년 직원에게 외근이라니, 너무 매정하다는 것이다. 서 있을 기운도 없다는 $npc:11001196$$pp:를,을$ 위해 $item:30000416$$pp:를,을$ 찾아 가져다 주자.

quest.name: 던전 : 우울한 막내 작가
quest.desc:
(입구 맵 : $map:2000255$) 파티권장 (4명)
한때는 메이플 TV가 꿈의 직장이었지만, 지금은 꿈에 나올까 두려울 정도로 힘들다는 $npc:11001192$. 촬영 테이프 회수에 실패하고 방송국에 돌아갈 수는 없다며 슬퍼하는 $npcName:11001192$$pp:를,을$ 도와 주자.

quest.name: 던전 : 동기를 위하여
quest.desc:
(입구 맵 : $map:2000007$) 파티권장 (4명)
입사 동기인 $npcName:11001191$$pp:가,이$ 고군분투하는 모습이 안쓰러워 다큐멘터리 촬영을 적극적으로 돕고 있는 $npc:11001193$. 촬영 테이프 회수는 간단한 일이니 금방 해치우고 다른 작업을 하러 가려고 했는데, 계획이 망가져 버렸다며 곤란해하고 있다. 충격 때문인지 쉴 새 없이 혼잣말을 하고 있는 $npcName:11001193$$pp:를,을$ 위해 촬영 테이프를 회수해 주자.

quest.name: A Tip from the Blacksmith
quest.desc:
$npc:11001211$ says the smuggler who deals in $itemPlural:30000421$ has expressed an interest in you. Perhaps he knows something?
Go to $map:03000014$ and find Smuggler $npcName:11001212$.

quest.name: News from the Smuggler
quest.desc: $npcName:11001212$ the smuggler really wants to know if you bought $item:30000421$ just for the power. Once you fill him in about defeating $npcName:23090005$ (which he already seemed to know) he sends you to meet the eccentric scientist $npcName:11001242$, saying that he could be of help. Go find $npcName:11001242$ in $map:03000024$.

quest.name: Darkness Within Darkness
quest.desc: $npcName:11001242$ is very interested in $item:30000432$ and $item:30000433$. He tells you there is a way to break the strange curse on the weapon based on his power wavelength theory, and instructs you to get a crystal of condensed darkness to test his theory. Find the $item:30000437$ in $map:2000350$ and take it to $npcName:11001242$.

quest.name: Darkness Within Darkness
quest.desc: $npcName:11001242$ is very interested in $item:30000423$ and $item:30000427$. Find the $item:30000437$ in $map:2000350$ and take it to $npcName:11001242$.

quest.desc:

Find the $item:30000437$ in $map:2000350$ and bring it to $npcName:11001242$.

quest.name: Power Struggle
quest.desc: $npcName:11001242$ was good to his word and drove out the curse in $npcName:23090005$'s weapon. He then sends you to $map:02000203$ and instructs you to reforge the weapon. Take $item:13200043$ and $item:14100126$ to $npcName:11001211$ in $map:02000203$.

quest.name: Power Struggle
quest.desc: $npcName:11001242$ was good to his word and drove out the curse in $npcName:23090005$'s weapon. He then sends you to $map:02000203$ and instructs you to reforge the weapon. Take $item:13200043$ and $item:14100126$ to $npcName:11001211$ in $map:02000203$.

quest.name: Power Struggle
quest.desc: $npcName:11001242$ succeeded in breaking the ominous curse on $npcName:23090005$'s weapon. But he also said that wasn't enough, and you need to head to $map:02000203$ and reforge the weapon. Take $item:15000041$ to $npcName:11001211$ in $map:02000203$.

quest.name: Power Struggle
quest.desc: $npcName:11001242$ succeeded in breaking the ominous curse on $npcName:23090005$'s weapon. But he also said that wasn't enough, and you need to head to $map:02000203$ and reforge the weapon. Take $item:15200142$ to $npcName:11001211$ in $map:02000203$.

quest.name: 던전 : 얼어붙은 마음
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25010001$ (입구 맵 : $map:2010026$)
$map:02010033$의 $npc:11001433$$pp:는,은$ 모래폭풍이 불던 날 만났던 소녀 $npcName:24001807$$pp:를,을$ 찾고 있다고 한다. $map:02010026$ 안, 차가운 바람이 새어 나오던 문에서 그리운 기운을 느꼈지만 몬스터의 습격으로 들어가 보지 못했다는 $npcName:11001433$ 대신, $map:02010052$$pp:라,이라$고 불린다는 그곳에서 소녀의 흔적을 찾아보자.

quest.name: 던전 : 설표 종족의 비밀
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:25010001$ (입구 맵 : $map:2010026$)
$map:02010026$의 $npc:11001434$$pp:는,은$ 신성한 힘을 자각할수록 인간의 모습과 기억을 잃어간다는 신비한 설표 종족에 대해 연구하고 있다. $map:02010052$에서 설표 종족을 연구하는 데 귀중한 자료가 되는 $item:30000478$$pp:를,을$ 찾아 가져다 달라는 $npcName:11001434$의 요청을 들어 주자.

quest.name: 대장님 설득 대작전
quest.desc: $map:02010047$에서 독립적으로 활동하고 있는 미어캣 정찰대원 $npcName:11001084$. 대장 $npcName:11001080$, 파트너 $npcName:11001355$와 함께 이따금 이곳에 나타나는 검은 그림자의 비밀에 대해 조사하고 있다. 열심히 조사해서 그 정체를 밝혀낸 것 같은데, 대장 $npcName:11001080$$pp:는,은$ 신중해야 한다며 자꾸 다른 가설을 세우고 있다고 한다. $npcName:11001084$$pp:는,은$ $npcName:11001080$$pp:가,이$ 대체 무슨 생각을 하는지 궁금하다며 알아봐 달라고 부탁한다.

quest.name: 던전 : 달그림자의 재림
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21014001$ (입구 맵 : $map:2010047$) 파티권장 (4명)
$npc:11001080$$pp:는,은$ 그믐달이 뜨는 밤이나 일식, 월식이 있는 날이면 나타나는 그림자의 정체가 고대의 기록에 남아 있는 주술사, $npcName:24002005$$pp:라,이라$고 생각하고 있다. 하지만 이 사실을 $npcName:11001084$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:11001355$에게 숨기는 이유는 호기심 강한 그들이 직접 현장으로 뛰어들자고 할 것 같아 두려워서라고…. 두려워하는 $npc:11001080$ 대신 $map:02010054$ 끝까지 들어가 그림자의 정체에 대해 조사해 보자.

quest.name: 던전 : 달그림자를 막아라
quest.desc:
$dungeonTitle:21014001$ (입구 맵 : $map:2010047$) 파티권장 (4명)
$npc:11001080$$pp:는,은$ $npc:24002005$$pp:가,이$ 다시 활동을 시작한다면 이 세계에 큰 위험을 줄 수 있을 거라며 경계한다. 흑마술의 힘으로 세상을 어지럽히고, 드래곤의 힘을 빼앗으려 했던 $npcName:24002005$의 힘이 더욱 강해지기 전에 꾸준히 그를 공격해 약화시켜야 한다는 것. $map:02010054$에서 부활을 꿈꾸는 $npcName:24002005$$pp:를,을$ 물리치자.

quest.name: It's a Secret
quest.desc: $npc:11001406$ is looking for $npcName:11001412$ who went missing in $map:02010033$. Look for clues that could lead you to $npcName:11001412$ in $map:02010026$.

quest.name: Meerkat Matters
quest.desc: $npc:11001406$ is certain that $npcName:11001412$ made it back to $map:02010006$ safe and sound. He made a big deal about it… but maybe you should check to be sure. Go to $map:02010006$ and ask $npc:11001408$ about $npcName:11001412$.

quest.name: Meerkats Care
quest.desc: The Meerkat Patrol is not just a gaggle of small, weak critters. $npcName:11001408$ said they were able to build an organization that keeps tabs on all of Karkar Island through bonds of trust. Their tireless vigilance is what helped them save $npcName:11001412$, in fact. Go have a word with $npcName:11001412$.

quest.name: Walk with Light
quest.desc: $npcName:11001430$ is a mysterious boy in $map:02010047$. He's from another dimension and is looking for a way to return home. Meet with $npcName:11001431$ who was there when the boy arrived. He might have some clues to share.

quest.name: A Light in the Night
quest.desc: $npcName:11001431$ said that on that fateful day, there was a shooting star and a small earthquake but that was it. Still, you're pretty sure he knows more about $npcName:11001430$ than he's letting on. Tell $npcName:11001430$ what you've learned.

quest.name: The Smallest Clue
quest.desc: $npcName:11001430$ said you might turn something up if you examine the monsters in the area. Battle $npcName:21000645$ and $npcName:21000424$ and search their bodies for clues.

quest.name: Studies in Light
quest.desc: $npcName:11001430$ has been studying the history of the ruins intently, searching for a way to return to his home. He finally came across something of note, and asks you to review the research journal he hid. Look for $item:30000497$ in $map:02010007$, $npcName:11001430$'s hideout.
quest.manual: Find the research journal that $npcName:11001430$ hid in $map:02010007$

quest.name: A Friend's Request
quest.desc: $item:30000497$ was filled with information about a relic of light that can pierce the barriers between dimensions. $npcName:11001430$ wants to find $npcName:11000735$ because he thinks she knows more about the relic. Since you decided to be friends with $npcName:11001430$, listen to $npcName:11001431$'s request in his place.

quest.name: Raising Starlight
quest.desc: $npcName:11001431$ said you'll need materials first before watering the starflower. He said to get $item:30000498$ and $item:30000499$. Find what you need in $map:02010047$.

quest.name: Blooming Starflowers
quest.desc: $npcName:11001431$ produced $item:30000500$ from the materials you gathered. He said the lonely starflowers will love the water from this tool. Find the starflowers all over $map:02010047$ and water them.

quest.name: Patience Training
quest.desc: $npcName:11001409$ is in charge of training the top meerkat patrols. He suggests that you take part in the Meerkat Patrol's patience training to shape up as their members have. Try the Meerkat Patrol's beginner course.
quest.manual: Climb 200m |Hang on the ladder for 180 sec |Hang on the rope for 180 sec

quest.name: Combat Training
quest.desc: $npcName:11001409$ is in charge of training the top meerkat patrols. He explains that although the meerkats mostly patrol from high places, in critical situations they have to fight. Try the Meerkat Patrol's combat training.

quest.name: Conversation Training
quest.desc: $npcName:11001409$ is in charge of training the top meerkat patrols. He said one of their key talents is getting information through conversation. He tells you to find $npcName:11001407$ somewhere in $map:02010033$ and have a full conversation.

quest.name: An Unexpected Clue
quest.desc: A shaman from $map:02000203$ told $npcName:11001211$ that the way to remove the powerful curse of a demon is to enter the demon's consciousness. Find $npcName:23090005$ and meet $npcName:11001485$ who left for $map:02000200$.

quest.name: An Unexpected Clue
quest.desc: A shaman from $map:02000203$ told $npcName:11001211$ that the way to remove the powerful curse of a demon is to enter the demon's consciousness. Find $npcName:23090005$ and meet $npcName:11001485$ who left for $map:02000200$.

quest.desc: A shaman from $map:02000203$ told $npcName:11001211$ that the way to remove the powerful curse of a demon is to enter the demon's consciousness. Find $npcName:23090005$ and meet $npcName:11001485$ who left for $map:02000200$.

quest.name: An Unexpected Clue
quest.desc: A shaman from $map:02000203$ told $npcName:11001211$ that the way to remove the powerful curse of a demon is to enter the demon's consciousness. Find $npcName:23090005$ and meet $npcName:11001485$ who left for $map:02000200$.

quest.name: An Unexpected Clue
quest.desc: A shaman from $map:02000203$ told $npcName:11001211$ that the way to remove the powerful curse of a demon is to enter the demon's consciousness. Find $npcName:23090005$ and meet $npcName:11001485$ who left for $map:02000200$.

quest.name: Eternal Flame
quest.desc: $npcName:11001485$ tells you that if you want to break the curse of a powerful demon like $npcName:23090005$, you must enter their consciousness while they are weakened. There's a device in $map:02000200$ which can allow you to do just that, so once you defeat $npcName:23090005$ you need only find the path which opens nearby. Defeat $npcName:23090005$ and enter $map:52000014$ to find a way to break the curse.
quest.manual: Defeat $npcName:23090005$ and then enter $map:52000014$ to break the curse on $item:13200043$ | Defeat $npcName:23090005$ and then enter $map:52000014$ to break the curse on $item:14100126$

quest.manual: After defeating $npcName:23090005$, enter $map:52000014$ and break the curse on $item:15400064$

quest.name: 간절한 마음
quest.desc: $npc:11001392$$pp:를,을$ 도우려고 했지만 실패했던 $npc:11001396$$pp:는,은$ 비약을 만들어 주었던 $npc:11001397$에게 따지러 갔다가 오히려 어린이에게 급하게 약을 썼다며 질책을 들었다고 한다. 성급했던 자신의 행동을 반성하며, 새로 만든 약은 괜찮을지 먼저 확인을 하고 싶다는 $npcName:11001396$. 그녀가 부탁한 대로 $map:02010063$의 $npc:11001443$$pp:를,을$ 만나 보자.

quest.name: 의사의 진단
quest.desc: $npc:11001443$$pp:는,은$ $item:30000520$$pp:를,을$ 꼼꼼히 살펴보고 어린이에게 써도 괜찮을 것 같다는 처방을 내린다. 다만 $npc:11001392$$pp:와,과$ 그 오빠 $npcName:11001391$$pp:가,이$ 체력이 떨어져 있고, 약에 대해 거부감도 클 테니 음식에 섞어 먹도록 하는 것이 좋을 것 같다. $map:02010063$에서 가장 요리를 잘 한다는 인심 좋은 $npc:11001388$$pp:를,을$ 만나 보자.

quest.name: 가족의 마음으로
quest.desc: 사연을 들은 $npc:11001388$$pp:는,은$ 남매를 위해 기꺼이 음식을 준비한다. 몸도, 마음도 아픈 남매의 가족이 되어 주고 싶다는 마음으로 $npcName:11001388$$pp:가,이$ 정성껏 준비한 $item:30000521$$pp:를,을$ $npcName:11001392$의 오빠인 $npcName:11001391$에게 전하자.

quest.name: 보답받은 믿음
quest.desc: $npc:11001392$$pp:는,은$ $item:30000521$$pp:를,을$ 먹고 상태가 한결 나아졌다며, 자신과의 약속을 지켜 준 $npcName:11001396$에게 고맙다는 말을 전해 달라고 한다. 강하고 똑똑해 보이지만 마음이 약하다는 $npc:11001396$에게 $npcName:11001392$의 상태와 그녀의 인사를 전해주자.

quest.name: 수다쟁이 아주머니
quest.desc: $map:02000006$에서 서성거리고 있는 $npc:11001536$. 그녀는 $map:02000285$의 상인 $npc:11000167$의 누나로, $map:02000036$ 상인 모임에 놀러 갔다가 $npc:11000270$에게 받은 부탁 때문에 곤란한 상황이라고 한다. 항상 인상을 찌푸리고 있는 $npc:11000270$$pp:를,을$ 설득해 없던 일로 해 달라는 $npc:11001536$의 부탁을 들어 주자.

quest.name: 수면 부족은 이제 그만
quest.desc: $npc:11000270$$pp:가,이$ 항상 인상을 찌푸리고 있는 건 밤마다 깊이 잠들지 못하고 무서운 꿈을 꾸는 겁 많은 딸 때문에 잠이 부족해서라고 한다. 딸이 깊은 잠을 잘 수 있도록 시끄러운 $map:02000006$ 몬스터들을 해치워달라고 부탁했다는 $npc:11000270$$pp:는,은$ $npc:11001536$의 사정을 듣고 곤란해하는데… 오늘 밤에는 그녀와 딸이 편안히 잘 수 있도록 $map:02000006$의 몬스터를 해치워주자.

quest.name: 신비한 약초에 대한 소문
quest.desc: $map:02000036$의 $map:02000288$에서 열심히 일하는 청년 $npc:11000230$. 밝아 보이는 그는 사실 불치병에 걸린 동생을 낫게 할 약을 찾고 있다. 얼마 전 손님들로부터 $map:02000006$ 어딘가에 있는 $map:02000074$$pp:라는,이라는$ 곳이 약초학자의 비밀 공간이며, 모든 병에 효험이 있는 약초가 자란다는 소문이 있다는 이야기를 들었다는 $npc:11000230$. 그는 $map:02000074$에 약초가 있는지 찾아봐달라고 부탁한다.

quest.name: A Special Calling
quest.desc: $npcName:11000075$ has asked to meet you in the $map:52000033$ in the upstairs of $map:02000025$.
quest.complete: Talk to $npcName:11000075$ in $map:52000033$, above the $map:02000025$ entrance

quest.name: New Power
quest.desc: $npc:11000075$ warns of a suspicious tremor that's been felt west of Victoria Island. If you are to overcome this coming threat, you will need to access a new source of power: traits.

quest.name: 모험을 위한 준비
quest.desc: 새로운 힘, "특성"을 개방한 만큼 보다 다양한 형태로 성장할 수 있을 거라고 말해주는 $npc:11000119$. 자신을 단련하기 위해 다양한 일들을 해 보라고 조언하며, "메이플 길라잡이" 를 확인하면 지금의 레벨에 해볼만한 일들을 확인할 수 있을 거라고 알려준다. 특히 스킬을 업그레이드하면 보다 강한 힘을 사용할 수 있을 것이라며, $item:40100022$$pp:를,을$ 선물로 주었다.

quest.name: A Mysterious Power
quest.desc: $npcName:11000601$ wishes to teach you of a new way to become more powerful. She's waiting for you at $map:02000025$.

quest.name: Keepers of the Stars
quest.desc: The Starkeepers gather rare star fragments and distill their power. They'll trade special supplies for your adventures for $itemPlural:30000447$ or $itemPlural:30000448$. Speak with $npcName:11001271$ to learn how to obtain $itemPlural:30000447$.

quest.name: Mission from the Empress
quest.desc: $npc:11000075$ needs to see you. Meet her in $map:02000025$.

quest.name: The Royal Lowdown
quest.desc: $npc:11000075$ has received disturbing reports from the Land of Darkness. Followers of the ancient Demon King have appeared. She wants you to venture into the Land of Darkness and discover the origin of these monsters.

quest.name: A Potent Light
quest.desc: $npcName:11000601$ has decided to tell you about gemstones, a kind of material that holds extraordinary power. Meet her in $map:02000025$ to learn how you can make their power your own.

quest.name: Darkness Within Darkness
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001242$ is very interested in the $item:30000560$. He has a hypothesis on how to remove the weapon's curse, and asks you to obtain a crystal formed from condensed darkness to test it.
Find the $item:30000437$ in $map:2000350$ and bring it to $npcName:11001242$.

quest.name: Darkness Within Darkness
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001242$ is very interested in the $item:30000561$. He has a hypothesis on how to remove the weapon's curse, and asks you to obtain a crystal formed from condensed darkness to test it.
Find the $item:30000437$ in $map:2000350$ and bring it to $npcName:11001242$.

quest.name: Power Struggle
quest.desc: $npcName:11001242$ succeeded in breaking the ominous curse on $npcName:23090005$'s weapon. But he also said that wasn't enough, and you need to head to $map:02000203$ and reforge the weapon. Take $item:15500064$ to $npcName:11001211$ in $map:02000203$.

quest.name: Power Struggle
quest.desc: $npcName:11001242$ succeeded in breaking the ominous curse on $npcName:23090005$'s weapon. But he also said that wasn't enough, and you need to head to $map:02000203$ and reforge the weapon. Take $item:15600064$ to $npcName:11001211$ in $map:02000203$.

quest.name: An Unexpected Clue
quest.desc: A shaman from $map:02000203$ told $npcName:11001211$ that the way to remove the powerful curse of a demon is to enter the demon's consciousness. Find $npcName:23090005$ and meet $npcName:11001485$ who left for $map:02000200$.

quest.name: An Unexpected Clue
quest.desc: A shaman from $map:02000203$ told $npcName:11001211$ that the way to remove the powerful curse of a demon is to enter the demon's consciousness. Find $npcName:23090005$ and meet $npcName:11001485$ who left for $map:02000200$.

quest.name: Eternal Flame
quest.desc: $npcName:11001485$ tells you that if you want to break the curse of a powerful demon like $npcName:23090005$, you must enter their consciousness while they are weakened. There's a device in $map:02000200$ which can allow you to do just that, so once you defeat $npcName:23090005$ you need only find the path which opens nearby. Defeat $npcName:23090005$ and enter $map:52000014$ to find a way to break the curse.
quest.manual: After defeating $npcName:23090005$, enter $map:52000014$ and break the curse on $item:15500064$

quest.name: Eternal Flame
quest.desc: $npcName:11001485$ tells you that if you want to break the curse of a powerful demon like $npcName:23090005$, you must enter their consciousness while they are weakened. There's a device in $map:02000200$ which can allow you to do just that, so once you defeat $npcName:23090005$ you need only find the path which opens nearby. Defeat $npcName:23090005$ and enter $map:52000014$ to find a way to break the curse.
quest.manual: After defeating $npcName:23090005$, enter $map:52000014$ and break the curse on $item:15600064$

quest.name: 근위대장의 부름
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$$pp:가,이$ 전할 말이 있다며 찾고 있다고 한다. $map:02000001$에서 그를 만나보자.

quest.name: 짙은 그림자의 습격
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$$pp:는,은$ $map:02000118$의 끊어진 땅에 수상한 어둠의 문이 올라왔다고 말해준다. 그 문 너머는 어느 곳으로 통할지 모르는 비틀린 어둠의 공간으로, 조사하러 들어갔다가 운좋게 살아돌아온 근위대원들의 증언에 따르면 그 안은 마치 다른 세상 같은 칠흑의 어둠이 가득했고 괴력을 소유한 몬스터들이 있었다고 한다. 이에 왕실 근위대에서는 능력 있는 모험가들에게 '그림자 원정대'라는 이름 아래 그곳을 탐험하고 내부를 파악해 줄 것을 요청하기로 했다고 한다.

quest.name: 그림자 속으로
quest.desc: $map:02000118$의 끊어진 땅에 파견된 $npc:11001700$$pp:는,은$ 깊은 어둠 속에서 살아남으려면 그 안에서만 통용되는 규칙과 원정대 전용 특성을 잘 이해하고 활용하는 것이 중요하다고 말한다. 실제 도전을 눈앞에 두었으니, 이제 최선을 다해 그곳을 탐사해 달라며 응원의 말을 전한다.

quest.name: 다시 모인 제자들
quest.desc: $npc:11001677$$pp:는,은$ 사형들이 오른쪽으로 난 길을 따라가면 있는 귀여운 나무집으로 들어갔다고 한다. $npcName:11001715$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:11001707$$pp:를,을$ 만나기 위해 $map:52000041$$pp2:로,으로$ 가보자.

quest.name: 탐문 시작
quest.desc: 우선 $map:02000001$에서 신기에 대한 정보를 탐색해 보자고 말하는 $npc:11001707$. $npc:11001716$의 간호를 위해 움직일 수 없는 그녀 대신 정보를 탐색해 보자. 마침 $npc:11001707$$pp:가,이$ 왕궁 앞에서 안내원을 본 적이 있다고 하니, 일단 $npc:11000160$에게 가서 정보를 얻어보자.

quest.name: 정신없는 안내원
quest.desc: $npc:11000160$$pp:는,은$ 유물이라면 거의 $map:02000001$ 왕궁에 보관되어 있을 테지만 왕실 관계자들은 알현식 취소로 모두 정신이 없어 제대로 대답해줄 수 있는 사람이 없을 거라고 말한다. 하지만 수인에 관련된 유물이라면, $map:02000001$의 정보를 많이 알고 있는 수인 $npc:11000003$$pp:가,이$ 정보를 알고 있을지도 모른다는데… $npc:11000160$$pp:가,이$ 가르쳐준 대로 $npc:11000003$$pp:를,을$ 만나러 가보자.

quest.name: 틴차이의 연락
quest.desc: $npc:11000012$$pp:가,이$ $npc:11001707$가 보내온 연락을 전한다. $npc:11001707$가 할 말이 있다고 하니 $map:52000041$$pp2:로,으로$ 만나러 가자.

quest.name: 가이던스의 옛 제자
quest.desc: 알고 보니 $map:52000041$은 예전에 $npc:11001716$, $npc:11001707$$pp:와,과$ 함께 가이던스에서 수행자 생활을 했던 호랑이 수인 타이그 퓨리안이 마련한 거라고 한다. $npc:11001707$$pp:는,은$ 타이그 퓨리안을 만나 신기에 대한 정보를 모으는 것을 도와달라고 해야겠다고 한다. 다부지고 날렵한 몸매, 호탕한 성격의 호랑이 수인이라는 그를 찾으려면 같은 호랑이 수인에게 물어보는 것이 빠르지 않을까? 일단 $npc:11000003$에게 가서 타이그 퓨리안에 대해 물어보자.

quest.name: 타이그 퓨리안
quest.desc: $npc:11000003$$pp:는,은$ 과거 가이던스에서 수행을 쌓았던 타이그 퓨리안이 바로 자기라고 말한다. 아무리 봐도 $npc:11001707$$pp:가,이$ 말한 모습과는 거리가 있어 보이는데… $npc:11001716$$pp:와,과$ $npc:11001707$$pp:가,이$ $map:02000001$에 와 있다는 것을 듣고 놀란 $npc:11000003$$pp:는,은$ 너울빛 산에서 벌어진 사건을 전해 듣고 우리를 돕겠다고 한다. 우선 $npc:11001707$$pp:를,을$ 만나보고 싶다는데… $map:52000041$에서 그들의 재회에 함께 하자.

quest.name: 단서를 찾아라
quest.desc: 자리를 박차고 나가버린 $npc:11001003$. 그 때문에 $npc:11001707$는 $npc:11000003$에게 가이던스의 신기와 관련된 정보를 함께 수집하자는 말을 하지 못했다. $npc:11001707$ 대신 $npc:11000003$를 찾아가 정보 수집을 도와달라고 말하자.

quest.name: 넬프가 남긴 것
quest.desc: 가이던스의 신기에 대한 정보, 그리고 무기고 도난 사건의 전말을 말해줄 수 있는 사람이었던 $npc:11000492$$pp:가,이$ 쓰러져 있다. 아쉽게도 $npc:11000492$에겐 이제 아무 말도 들을 수 없게 된 것 같다. 혹시 단서가 될 만한 것이 있는지 $npc:11000492$의 주변을 살펴보자.

quest.name: 새로운 단서
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$에게 가서 $npc:11000492$의 가방에서 발견한 수첩을 보여주며 그동안의 조사 결과를 보고하고, 신기에 대한 정보 수집에 도움을 줄 것을 요청하자.

quest.name: 대제자의 호출
quest.desc: $npc:11000012$가 $npc:11001707$가 보내온 연락을 전한다. $npc:11001716$의 분노를 사고 싶지 않으면 얼른 뛰어오라는 $npc:11001707$… 어서 $map:52000041$$pp2:로,으로$ 사형들을 만나러 가자.

quest.name: 중간 보고
quest.desc: 여태까지의 조사 내용에 대해 묻는 $npc:11001716$. 복잡한 사건들에 휘말렸던 이야기를 하면 인간에 대한 거부감이 있는 $npcName:11001716$$pp:는,은$ 분명 싫어할 터. 그래서 간단하게만 보고했더니, 그는 시원치 않은 표정이다.

quest.name: 틴차이의 부름
quest.desc: $npc:11000012$$pp:가,이$ $npc:11001707$가 보내온 연락을 전한다. $npc:11001707$가 할 말이 있다고 하니 $map:52000041$$pp2:로,으로$ 만나러 가자.

quest.name: 특별한 창고
quest.desc: 정보원과 함께 조사를 진행한 $npc:11001707$의 말에 따르면, $map:02000216$을 운영하는 흑성회에게는 특별한 고객에게만 물건을 미리 보여주고 구입할 수 있게 하는 특별한 비밀 창고가 있다고 한다. 마침 요즘 통 큰 고객이 있어 흑성회의 경비가 허술한 참이라고 하니, 그 곳에서 가이던스의 신기와 관련된 무언가의 단서를 수집할 수 있을지도 모른다는데… 일단 $map:02000216$으로 가서 $npc:11001730$와 만나보자.
