quest.descFameUI: You learned of the Daemon lieutenant $npcName:23000301$ from some orders you recovered. The search is on.

quest.name: Seeing Ghosts
quest.desc: Until you have identified your new foe's capabilities, it's too risky to go in swinging. Return to Alliance HQ to discuss your next mission.
quest.descFameUI: Return to $map:02020041$ and discuss your options

quest.name: The Price of Power
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004316$ says he called upon the Eye of Providence to determine $npcName:23000301$'s location.
It looks like you're headed to $map:02020032$.
quest.descFameUI:
$npcName:11004316$ says he called upon the Eye of Providence to determine $npcName:23000301$'s location.
It looks like you're headed to $map:02020032$.

quest.name: The Price of Power
quest.desc:
You brought Nairin's "Darkwave Analyzer" to $map:02020032$ in the hopes of picking up $npcName:23000301$'s trail, but it seems the device was broken. While you wait for them to repair it, thin the Daemon Army's ranks.
Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020701$, $npcNamePlural:25020702$, and $npcNamePlural:25020703$ in $map:02020032$.
quest.descFameUI: While you wait to hear from $npcName:11004316$, reduce the number of Daemon Forces in the area.

quest.name: The Price of Power
quest.desc:
With the Darkwave Analyzer damaged beyond repair, $npcName:11004316$ once more called upon the Eye of Providence to locate $npcName:23000301$.
It seems your next destination is $map:02020016$.
quest.descFameUI: $npcName:23000130$ has been tracked to $map:02020016$. Move out immediately.

quest.name: The Price of Power
quest.desc: Upon arriving in $map:02020016$, you felt the presence of a powerful darkness. To safeguard you in your upcoming battle against its source, $npcName:11004316$ allegedly created a protective sigil outside of $dungeonTitle:23037002$. Receive its power (if it exists).
quest.descFameUI: Activate $npcName:11004316$'s sigil.

quest.name: The Price of Power
quest.desc: The time has come to enter $map:02020200$ and put an end to $npcName:23000301$'s schemes. Go forth and conquer!
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020200$ and defeat $npcName:23000301$.

quest.name: The Price of Power
quest.desc: $npcName:23000301$ has been defeated. Return to $map:02020041$ for a debriefing.
quest.descFameUI: $npcName:23000301$ has been defeated. Return to $map:02020041$ for a debriefing.

quest.name: Plots and Ploys
quest.desc:
Attempts to locate $npcName:11004430$ have proven fruitless. Perhaps you can track him down using the machines he's controlling?
Go to $map:02020017$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020017$ to destroy Turka's hacked sentries.

quest.name: Plots and Ploys
quest.desc: Go to $map:02020017$ for now and destroy $npcNamePlural:25021202$ while Nairin analyses their data transmissions.
quest.descFameUI: Destroy $npcNamePlural:25021202$ to while Nairin analyses their data transmissions.

quest.name: Plots and Ploys
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ needs more data to track down the source of the signal. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021205$ while she analyses the data.
quest.descFameUI: $npcName:11004315$ needs more data to track down the source of the signal. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021205$ while she analyses the data.

quest.name: Plots and Ploys
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004315$ says the source of the signal is on the move. She's managed to calculate its trajectory, but that could change in an instant. Hurry and intercept it at the coordinates she provided!
(To return to the map, press the "Resume Dungeon" button.)
quest.descFameUI: The dark signal is on the move, but $npcName:11004315$ has mapped out its trajectory. Intercept its source!

quest.name: Plots and Ploys
quest.desc: You encountered $npcName:11004430$ at $map:52020039$. He said some very odd things, and then vanished—but not before leaving behind some Daemon Army soldiers hell-bent on your demise. Deal with them, before they deal with you.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcName:11004430$'s lackeys and resume your efforts to find him.

quest.name: Plots and Ploys
quest.desc: By the time you defeated the attacking $npcNamePlural:25021308$, $npcName:11004430$ was long gone. There's nothing to do now but return to $map:02020041$ and tell $npcName:11004316$ what happened.
quest.descFameUI: Return to $map:02020041$ to tell $npcName:11004316$ everything that's happened.

quest.name: The Stone God
quest.desc:
The Lumiknights' investigation revealed that $npcName:23000073$ is an ancient demon sealed away alongside Kritias. $npcName:23000073$ had been summoned before in Maple World, and the team was able to track him down after analyzing the site of the ancient ritual.
Go to $map:02020034$, and find $npcName:23000073$.
quest.descFameUI: Travel to $map:02020034$ in search of $npcName:23000073$.

quest.name: The Stone God
quest.desc:
The path to Zakum is filled with enemies.
Defeat the $npcNamePlural:25020801$, $npcNamePlural:25020803$, and $npcNamePlural:25020805$ who stand in your way.
quest.descFameUI: Clear a path to $npcName:23000073$ by culling the nearby mechanized soldiers.

quest.name: The Stone God
quest.desc:
Your best chance at defeating $npcName:23000073$ lies in destroying the totems that grant him his power.
$MyPCName$ smash!
quest.descFameUI: Destroy the totems used to summon $npcName:23000073$ to weaken him.

quest.name: The Stone God
quest.desc: The time has come to take on $npcName:23000073$.
quest.descFameUI: With his totems destroyed, $npcName:23000073$ is weakened. Now is the time to strike!

quest.name: The Stone God
quest.desc:
You encountered $npcName:11004430$ on your way to defeat $npcName:23000073$. He said a few odd things before vanishing, but that's something to worry about later.
Go to $map:02000426$ and defeat $npcName:23000073$.
(Defeat Zakum in the $dungeonTitle:230410031$ chaos raid.)
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcName:23000073$ in either $dungeonTitle:23041003$ or $dungeonTitle:23040003$

quest.name: The Stone God
quest.desc: $npcName:23000073$ has been defeated. Return to $map:02020041$ to discuss what comes next.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020041$ and discuss $npcName:23000073$'s defeat.

quest.name: Kritian Pioneers
quest.desc:
Since the appearance of Kritias in Maple World, many pioneers have traveled to see the new continent for all manner of reasons. As their assistance may one day prove vital to Alliance operations on the continent, the Green Hoods have elected to help these individuals with anything they should need.
Do your part by greeting the latest batch of arrivals!
quest.descFameUI: It seems a number of familiar faces are visiting Kritias. Go and say hello.

quest.name: Kritian Pioneers
quest.desc: It's been a while since you last saw $npcName:11004319$, $npcName:11004320$, $npcName:11004321$, and $npcName:11004322$, but they all seem well—and invested in a brand new adventure! It seems $npcName:11004324$ and $npcName:11004323$ are here too. Why not go say hello?
quest.descFameUI: It seems like $npcName:11004324$ and $npcName:11004323$ never go anywhere unless they're together—even to the wild unknown of Kritias!

quest.name: Kritian Pioneers
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004323$ is worried over something $npcName:11000044$ once said, and came to Kritias in hopes of finding answers. $npcName:11004324$ seems to have followed her here out of a sense of duty.
It seems $npcName:11004331$ and $npcName:11004332$ are also here, and causing no end of trouble for the Green Hoods. You should stop by and check in with them.
quest.descFameUI: After catching up with a number of old friends, Lanemone and Orde ask you about a special request. See what they have to say.

quest.name: Kritian Pioneers
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004331$ and $npcName:11004332$ seem extremely eager to study aetherine, an abundant power source unique to Kritias. They ask you to bring them some aetherine crystals to research.
Well, Nairin did say to help the new arrivals any way you could…
quest.manual: Take the Aetherine Crystal from the Aetherine Device
quest.descFameUI: Orde and Lanemone need your help gathering an aetherine crystal for their studies.

quest.name: Kritian Pioneers
quest.desc:
You had intended to help $npcName:11004332$ with her request, but then you got a talking-to about misappropriating resources. Since $npcName:11004315$ outranks you, and tends to get scary when she's being serious, it's best to do as she says.
With that episode behind you, it's time to say hello to $npcName:11004330$ and $npcName:11004329$.
quest.descFameUI: $npcName:11004330$ and $npcName:11004329$ are here too. You should pay them a visit.

quest.name: Kritian Pioneers
quest.desc: $npcName:11004329$ is very excited with the progress of his research into the magic of Kritias. $npcName:11004330$, has not found the remedy to $npcName:11000032$'s condition she was hoping to by coming here. Now that you've greeted the newest arrivals, you should return to $npcName:11004315$ with that Aetherine Crystal.
quest.descFameUI: Return to $npcName:11004315$ with the Aetherine Crystal.

quest.name: The Puppetmasters
quest.desc: With Humanitas under siege from Tairen and Kharon alike, $npcName:11004315$ has asked you to provide whatever support you can in an unofficial capacity.
quest.descFameUI: Humanitas is struggling to wage a battle on multiple fronts. Assist them by reducing Kharon's numbers.

quest.name: The Puppetmasters
quest.desc: Kharon soldiers have expanded their territory into $map:02020001$, hampering Humanitas efforts in the area. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020506$ and $npcNamePlural:25020507$ to buy Humanitas some breathing room.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat the $npcNamePlural:25020506$ and $npcNamePlural:25020507$ threatening Humanitas.

quest.name: The Puppetmasters
quest.desc: The Kharon's incursion into $map:02020001$ has interrupted a vital Humanitas mining operation. Assist Humanitas by recovering the unusual green ore that's been unearthed nearby.
quest.descFameUI: Kharon's incursion into $map:02020001$ has interrupted a vital Humanitas mining operation. Assist Humanitas by recovering the unusual green ore that's been unearthed nearby.

quest.name: The Puppetmasters
quest.desc: Tairen is using Kharon to attack Humanitas. Deal a blow to their operation at $map:02020004$ by destroying the supplies they've prepared for Kharon.
quest.descFameUI: Tairen provides supplies to Kharon to aid them in their fight with Humanitas. It's time to fight back against this evil alliance.

quest.name: The Puppetmasters
quest.desc: You went to $map:02020004$ in the hopes of crippling Tairen's efforts to supply Kharon in their fight against Humanitas. Destroy the supply crates!
quest.descFameUI: Destroy the supply crates Tairen has prepared for Kharon.

quest.name: The Puppetmasters
quest.desc: Before you could finish destroying all of the supply crates the Tairen had prepared for Kharon, Sky Fortress detected the approach of additional Tairen forces. It seems there's no choice but to retreat from $map:02020004$ for now.
quest.descFameUI: Tairen reinforcements are approaching $map:02020004$. You have no choice but to retreat.

quest.name: Digging for Answers
quest.desc: The Green Hoods are ready to start their study of the Kritian continent with a survey of plant life. Travel to $map:02020013$ and collect some plant samples.
quest.descFameUI: The Green Hoods have begun exploring Kritias. Assist them by collecting samples of local flora.

quest.name: Digging for Answers
quest.desc: You discovered an odd plant bearing fruits that smell similar to ones found in Maple World. You should collect some and investigate.
quest.manual: Collect a sample of the local flora
quest.descFameUI: You've discovered plants in Kritias that seem similar to ones found in Maple World. This warrants further investigation.

quest.name: Digging for Answers
quest.desc: The fruit you tasted on your investigation of Kritias's flora tasted just like $item:30000232$. How such a thing is possible remains a mystery, but it could suggest some kind of link between Maple World and Kritias. Your next task is to investigate the soil at the $map:02020051$. Get started!
quest.descFameUI: After investigating the flora of $map:02020013$, it's time to sample the soil at the $map:02020051$.

quest.name: Digging for Answers
quest.desc:
$map:02020051$에는 그린후드가 토양 분석을 위하여 기간틱 드릴을 설치해놨다. 토양을 알아내면 크리티아스의 모든 역사를 알아낼 수 있다고 자신하는 $npcName:11004315$.
그린후드가 설치해 놓은 기간틱 드릴을 이용하여 $map:02020051$의 토양 성분을 분석해보자.
(기간틱 드릴을 작동하기 위해서는 $item:30001278$$pp:가,이$ 필요합니다. $item:30001278$$pp:는,은$ 세력 상점에서 구매할 수 있습니다.)
quest.descFameUI: Use the Gigantic Drill in $map:02020051$ to analyze the properties of the local soil for the Green Hoods.

quest.name: Digging for Answers
quest.desc: When you activated the Gigantic Drill, a giant mechanical worm shot out of the earth and began wreaking havoc. You should defeat it before it hurts someone.
quest.descFameUI: Operating the Gigantic Drill has caused a huge monster to appear. Defeat the creature and put an end to its rampage.

quest.name: Digging for Answers
quest.desc: After you defeated the giant mechanical worm creature, $npcName:11004315$ contacted you seeking answers. Return to $map:02020041$ and explain what happened.
quest.descFameUI: Return to $map:02020041$.

quest.name: A Link to the Past
quest.desc: According to $npcName:11004315$, some of Kritias's oldest structures bear a striking resemblance to ancient ruins found on Victoria Island. She wants you to go to $map:02020003$ to investigate.
quest.descFameUI: Some of Kritias's oldest structures bear a striking resemblance to ancient ruins found on Victoria Island. This warrants investigation.

quest.name: A Link to the Past
quest.desc: You traveled to $map:02020003$ to investigate an ancient structure, but found the area crawling with Tairen soldiers. Drive them out so you can continue your mission.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat the $npcNamePlural:25021504$ and $npcNamePlural:25021505$ interfering with your investigation in $map:02020003$.

quest.name: A Link to the Past
quest.desc: You've driven out many of the Tairen soldiers in the area. Now you should be able to take photos of the ancient structure for $npcName:11004315$ using a camera already set up on site.
quest.manual: Take a picture of the ancient structure using the camera
quest.descFameUI: Take a picture of the ancient structure in $map:02020003$ and send it to $npcName:11004315$.

quest.name: A Link to the Past
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ examined the photos you sent her of the structure in $map:02020003$ and was blown away by the similarities to some of Maple World's ancient ruins. Eager to know more, she has tasked you with exploring the underground passage into the structure that can be found nearby.
quest.descFameUI: Enter $map:52100106$ to investigate the structure's interior

quest.name: A Link to the Past
quest.desc: You entered the $map:52100106$ to investigate the structure's interior, ended up triggering some kind of alarm. $npcName:11004315$ suggests you hide in the large chamber at the end of the corridor ahead.
quest.manual: Search for answers and get to safety
quest.descFameUI: An alarm triggered while you were investigating the $map:52100107$. Search for any clues you can about the purpose of the structure and get out of there.

quest.name: A Link to the Past
quest.desc: You found some old books in the old building that may be of particular interest. Bring them to $npcName:11004315$ in $map:02020041$.
quest.descFameUI: Deliver the mysterious books you found in $map:52100107$ to $npcName:11004315$ in $map:02020041$.

quest.name: Ancient History
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ analyzed the books you brought her. She revealed them to be a personal journal chronicling events in Kritias. Eager to determine whether the tomes were fact or fiction, she dispatched you to $map:02020018$, a location mentioned numerous times in the books. Travel to $map:02020018$ and continue your investigation.
quest.descFameUI: $npcName:11004315$ wants to determine whether the old books you brought her are fact or fiction. Help her validate their authenticity.

quest.name: Ancient History
quest.desc: You traveled to $map:02020018$, a location mentioned frequently in the old journals. It seems a perfect match to its descriptions. See what else you can discover by reading the books!
quest.descFameUI: $map:02020018$ seems a perfect match to its descriptions in $npcName:11004315$'s old books. See what else you can discover!

quest.name: Ancient History
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ says that some of the books' pages appear to have been deliberately torn out. Luckily, through some impressive work, she has determined that the missing $itemPlural:30001289$ are still on site. Search $map:02020018$ for the missing pages.
quest.descFameUI: Search for the $itemPlural:30001289$ in $map:02020018$.

quest.name: Ancient History
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004315$ discovered the journal's author was none other than the sage $npcName:11004431$. As she continued her analysis of the books, she realized that there were more missing pages. Using Sky Fortress's sensors, she determined the missing pages were in the possession of $npcNamePlural:25021703$ or $npcNamePlural:25021704$ nearby.
Retrieve the missing pages by force!
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021703$ and $npcName:25021704$ in $map:02020018$ to recover the missing journal pages.

quest.name: Ancient History
quest.desc: You located the remaining missing pages of $npcName:11004431$'s journal and sent them to $npcName:11004315$ for analysis. Now, to see what new information they contain!
quest.descFameUI: Wait for Nairin to finish translating $npcName:11004431$'s journal.

quest.name: Ancient History
quest.desc: $npcName:11004431$'s writings revealed that he was deeply upset by some kind of social upheaval, and left Kritias for another world. Talk to $npcName:11004315$ and see what other new information the journal brings to light.
quest.descFameUI: Talk to $npcName:11004315$ about $npcName:11004431$'s journal in $map:02020041$

quest.name: After the Alliance with Humanitas
quest.desc: An urgent call from Captain $npcName:11004408$ telling you to go straight to $map:52100103$. Did something happen? Go to $map:52100103$ for now.

quest.name: Change in Strategy
quest.desc: $npcName:11004401$ thanked you for coming, but she looked very worried… She said she was waiting and has something to tell you about the alliance between Humanitas and Maple Alliance. Listen to $npcName:11004401$ for now.

quest.name: Absolutely Necessary Existence
quest.desc: $npcName:11004401$ said there were many changes after the Maple Alliance and Humanitas became allies… She explained the strategy changed as each were focused on different enemy forces unlike the beginning. However, the issue Humanitas had to resolve was not only observing enemy forces… It's impossible for Humanitas to solve everything with their current manpower. Talk a little more with $npcName:11004401$.

quest.name: Entrusting Humanitas
quest.desc: $npcName:11004401$ asked for help saying Humanitas needs the data and information on Kritias that you gave the Maple Alliance. Humanitas is truly in a poor situation. $npcName:11004401$ thanked you when you said you will help them. But she said there's a problem… Listen to what $npcName:11004401$ has to say.

quest.name: 필드퀘스트 더미퀘스트
quest.desc: 작업 예정

quest.name: Cry of the Wildflower
quest.desc:
$npcNamePlural:21000013$ are trampling the rare, beautiful flowers of $map:02000147$. If this continues, this tourist attraction will become a hideous eyesore!
Wipe out the $npcNamePlural:21000013$ before they do any more harm.

quest.name: 돼지가 점령한 도시
quest.desc:
$npcName:21000015$$pp:가,이$ $map:02000147$$pp:를,을$ 무단으로 도로와 시설을 점거하여 도시 기능이 마비되고 거주민들이 모두 피신해야만 했다.
$npcName:21000015$$pp:를,을$ $map:02000147$에서 소탕하여 지역을 정상화해야 한다.

quest.name: Resource Robbers
quest.desc:
The $npcName:21000068$ population of the $map:02000148$ has been devouring the area's crude oil. This essential resource has countless uses, and must be preserved at any cost.
Exterminate the $npcNamePlural:21000068$ to protect the local cache of crude.

quest.name: 강력한 콧바람
quest.desc:
메이플 월드 전역으로 공급하는 원유의 주 생산지인 $map:02000148$에 급격하게 늘어난 $npcName:21000015$$pp:가,이$ 화가 날 때 마다 강력한 콧바람을 일으켜 원유 시추 타워의 불을 꺼버려 시설을 망가뜨리고 있다.
귀중한 천연자원인 원유의 공급이 줄어들면 메이플 월드 전체에 악영향을 미칠 수 있다.
원유 시추를 방해하는 $npcName:21000015$$pp:를,을$ 퇴치하여 원유의 생산과 공급을 원할히 할 수 있도록 돕자.

quest.name: Hacked By Who?
quest.desc: The androids of $map:02000265$ have become inexplicably violent. It's time to decommission them. Eliminate $npcNamePlural:21000240$, $npcNamePlural:21000243$, and $npcNamePlural:21000246$!

quest.name: The Case of the Missing Plungers
quest.desc: Drive the $npcNamePlural:21000161$ out of $map:02000138$ so the people there can use their bathrooms in peace.

quest.name: 냄새 나는 지뢰 매설자
quest.desc:
$npcName:21000024$$pp:가,이$ $map:02000138$의 길 아무 곳에나 냄새나는 지뢰를 매설하고 있어 $map:02000138$의 환경 오염이 심각하다.
요즘 들어 $npcName:21000024$의 수가 급격히 늘어나면서 냄새나는 지뢰를 밟고 미끄러져 다치는 주민이 늘어나고 있고 매설된 지뢰의 냄새를 맡고 몰려든 파리로 인해 마을 전체의 위생 상태도 엉망이 되고 있다.
$npcName:21000024$$pp:를,을$ $map:02000138$$pp2:로,으로$ 부터 소탕해 청결한 마을이 될 수 있도록 돕자.

quest.name: Barrota Port Panic
quest.desc: Thugs have invaded $map:02000139$, looting cargo, commandeering ships, and terrorizing people. Drive out the thugs at $map:02000139$ to restore order.

quest.name: The Station Situation
quest.desc:
$npcNamePlural:21000124$ have taken control of the $map:02000279$, putting all of Victoria Island's passenger and supply trains in jeopardy.
Eliminate the $npcNamePlural:21000124$ and restore order to the station

quest.name: Taking Over the Airwaves
quest.desc:
$npcNamePlural:21000385$ have taken over the communication tower in $map:02000266$ in an attempt to gain followers and fix pickled radish prices.
The local $npcNamePlural:21000240$ have already fallen under their control. Defeat the $npcNamePlural:21000240$ and drive out the $npcNamePlural:21000385$!

quest.name: Concert Catastrophe
quest.desc: A crime wave in $map:02000137$ is threatening to cancel Blake's next concert. $npcName:11003536$'s heart would probably break if this happened, so it's up to you to put an end to the $npcNamePlural:21099049$ and $npcNamePlural:21000282$'s scheming.

quest.name: Junk Hoarders
quest.desc: The residents of $map:02000084$ make a living by collecting scrap metal to recycle or sell, but recently, a large group of masked thugs have started hoarding it all to sell to Blackstar. Drive out the masked thugs to bring the local economy back to life.

quest.name: 오염 확산 차단
quest.desc:
$map:02000084$에 최근 나타난 젤라임들이 오염된 유독성 폐기물을 먹고 다른 지역까지 진출하였고 배출한 오염원들로 인해 주변 땅이나 강들이 오염되고 있다.
왠일인지 유독성 폐기물을 많이 먹은 젤라임들은 변이로 인해 공격적으로 변해서 주민들을 공격하고 있다.
$map:02000084$에 늘어나고 있는 $npcName:21000387$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:21000388$$pp:를,을$ 퇴치하여 주변 지역으로 오염이 확산되는 것을 막고 주민들이 피해를 입지 않도록 돕자.

quest.name: Barrota Shore Shakedown
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:21000083$ of $map:02000110$ have joined forces with their rivals, the $npcNamePlural:21000085$ to shake down the locals for money. It's time someone taught them both a lesson!

quest.name: Double-Dealing
quest.desc:
The $npcNamePlural:99990016$ running the furnace at the $map:02000086$ have started selling weapons meant for the Alliance to Blackstar gangsters.
It's time somebody taught them a lesson. That somebody is you.

quest.name: Masked Exploitation
quest.desc: $map:02000111$, a popular vacation spot, has been overrun by $npcNamePlural:21000101$ trying to make a buck. Drive the $npcNamePlural:21000101$ out of the area and help keep $map:02000111$ the vacationer's paradise it's always been.

quest.name: A Violent Compromise
quest.desc:
Construction of Fellowstone Tower has been delayed by a hostage situation. $npcNamePlural:21099049$ and $npcNamePlural:21000282$ thugs are demanding a ransom for the safe release of the construction workers, but $npcName:11003535$ has no intent of paying up.
Teach the $npcNamePlural:21099049$ and $npcNamePlural:21000282$ to leave their lives of crime behind forever.

quest.name: The Lonely Cafe
quest.desc: $map:02000135$ is famous for its scenery and cable car tours, but the $npcNamePlural:21000084$ are driving away tourists. Without tourists, a lot of businesses will have to close down, including $npcName:11003535$'s favorite cafe. She wants you to deal with the $npcNamePlural:21000084$ to ensure that never happens.

quest.name: 포자에 감염된 나무
quest.desc:
트라이아 공습 이후 어둠의 힘에 영향을 받은 $npcName:21000340$들이 $map:02000135$에 악성 포자를 퍼트렸고 $npcName:21000081$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:21000082$들이 포자에 감염되어 사납게 변해버렸다.
악성 포자를 퍼트리는 $npcName:21000340$$pp:와,과$ 포자에 감염되어 난폭하게 변한 $npcName:21000081$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:21000082$들을 퇴치하자.

quest.name: Gene Therapy
quest.desc: The bunnies being used as test subjects at the $map:02000145$ have turned into horrible monsters. Exterminate the $npcNamePlural:21090184$ and $npcNamePlural:21090185$, and stop them from further harming the researchers or their facility.

quest.name: Masked Pain
quest.desc:
The masked thugs that terrorize $map:02000083$ don't work for Ralph anymore. Now they've graduated to terrorizing civilians for Blackstar.
It's time someone gave those thugs a taste of their own medicine!

quest.name: Consult Your Pharmacist
quest.desc:
Violent, mutant bunnies have taken over $map:02000134$! If they're not driven out, Maple World will lose access to one of its greatest sources of life-saving drugs.
Drive the $npcNamePlural:21090186$ and $npcNamePlural:21090184$ from $map:02000134$ and restore the factory to normal operations.

quest.name: Robots Running Amuck
quest.desc: Robots have taken over the $map:02000187$! If things continue down this path, they'll create a massive robot army… Exterminate the $npcNamePlural:21000242$, $npcNamePlural:21000245$, and $npcNamePlural:21000248$ at the $map:02000187$!

quest.name: All We Wanna Do Is Eat Your Brains
quest.desc: The zombie situation at $map:02000276$. is getting out of hand. Put those corpses back in the ground.

quest.name: Daily Production Quotas
quest.desc:
Androids have taken over the $map:02000277$, disrupting industries across Maple World.
Take out the $npcNamePlural:21000242$, $npcNamePlural:21000245$, and $npcNamePlural:21000247$, and return $map:02000277$ so things can get back to normal.

quest.name: Robo-terror
quest.desc:
Machines have taken over $map:02000163$ and are forcing the researchers there to create new parts for them.
Take out the $npcNamePlural:21000242$, $npcNamePlural:21000245$, and $npcNamePlural:21000247$, before they become a bigger threat.

quest.name: The Android Offensive
quest.desc:
The ripples of the ongoing android crisis can be felt around the world. Now they've attacked and taken control of the $map:02000274$ near Taliskar, a source of drinking water for millions of people.
Take out the androids and their pets before the situation escalates.

quest.name: Toxic Explosion
quest.desc:
Androids have taken over the $map:02000269$, which is full of tanks of toxic gas. If the androids decide to blow them up, the damage could devastate the entire region.
Destroy the $npcNamePlural:21000121$ and $npcNamePlural:21000122$ before that can happen!

quest.name: G-g-ghosts!?
quest.desc: Strange spirits have taken over machines at the $map:02000275$. Take care of the $npcNamePlural:21000196$, $npcNamePlural:21000296$, and $npcNamePlural:29000062$ while $npcName:11003535$ takes real good care of Nairin.

quest.name: The Android Alliance
quest.desc: The rogue androids of $map:02000273$ are forging alliances with those who share their aims. They've become a serious threat, and it's up to you to wipe them out!

quest.name: A Powerful Source of Energy
quest.desc: Robots have taken over the $map:02000162$. Wipe them out before they learn how to harness the station's geothermal energy!

quest.name: Evil on the Road
quest.desc: Evil encroaches on one of the few passable roads in the Land of Darkness. Advance to $map:03000118$ and eliminate the dark forces that threaten the area.

quest.name: Risen from the Depths
quest.desc: A great darkness calls souls lost at sea long ago back from the depths as horrible revenants. Purge them from $map:03000117$ so these lost souls may finally know peace.

quest.name: The Forgotten Toys
quest.desc: Long ago, $map:03000057$ was used as a dumping ground for unwanted toys. Since the town was lost to the darkness, those toys have taken on a new life, and now they seek to take revenge on the humans who abandoned them.

quest.name: Livid Livestock
quest.desc:
Before the darkness came, $map:03000143$ was the largest ranch on Victoria island. In the years since the Land of Darkness was formed, the livestock have transformed into monsters.
Now they crave the flesh of man. Put the twisted creatures out of their misery.

quest.name: The Savage Wilds
quest.desc:
The deadly beasts dwelling within the $map:03000003$ were once ordinary creatures, before they were twisted by darkness.
Now they are beyond redemption, and a threat to all around them. End their misery.

quest.name: An Accursed Ritual
quest.desc:
The $map:03000130$ were once a sacred site to the wizards of Victoria Island. However, dark forces have taken over the area, and now they're using the latent magic within the ruins to perform an evil ritual of their own.
Put an end to their plans.

quest.name: Shadow and Flame
quest.desc:
$map:03000022$ was once a crystal-clear river, but when the darkness swept over it, it erupted into flame. So too were the animals who lived there transformed into blazing beasts.
Defeat the beasts that dwell there and strike back against the darkness.

quest.name: Hungering Darkness
quest.desc:
$npcNamePlural:40000018$ haunt $map:03000146$, feeding on the magical traces left behind by a powerful demon. Let unhindered, they could grow extremely dangerous.
Make sure that never happens.

quest.name: Armor of Darkness
quest.desc:
The pigs who dwell on $map:03000115$ have somehow acquired their own armor, making them a special menace to those who dare brave the Land of Darkness.
Put an end to this threat.

quest.name: A Town Reclaimed
quest.desc:
Long ago, $map:03000165$ was a peaceful town. It was abandoned when the land of darkness was sealed away, but it remains surprisingly intact.
If it were cleansed of monsters, it might one day be reclaimed.

quest.name: Sweet Vengeance
quest.desc: $map:03000185$ is home to a host of fetid confections, which the crazed $npcNamePlural:40000081$ intend to use to unleash havoc on Tria's famed bake sale. Stop them, and save our snacks!

quest.name: A Cleansing Wind
quest.desc:
Like many locations in the Land of Darkness, $map:03000007$ was once a beautiful place. Now it is tainted, and it gives rise to such horrors as $npcNamePlural:40000083$ and $npcNamePlural:40000084$.
These beasts endanger one of the Land of Darkness's precious few shelters. Dispatch them.

quest.name: The Storm in the Hills
quest.desc: The $map:03000009$ were a popular vacation spot in another age. Perhaps it can be once again… but not while malodorous $npcNamePlural:40000085$ infest the area. Deal with them.

quest.name: To Drink of the Spring
quest.desc:
$map:03000089$ was once a source of pristine waters, but now it is tainted with dark magic. $npcNamePlural:40000122$ have been kidnapping adventurers and unfortunate wanderers on this land, and forcing them to drink from the corrupted spring, twisting their minds and poisoning their bodies.
Put a stop to these mad games.

quest.name: An Axe to Grind
quest.desc:
The $map:03000006$ used to be a major logging site for the empire. But after the darkness fell, it became a haunting ground for vengeful spirits who gave life to the fallen logs and stumps of the forest. These wooden monstrosities now stalk the forest in search of revenge.
Cut them down.

quest.name: Make Way for Science
quest.desc:
The Alliance wants to dispatch a team to $map:03000101$ in an ongoing investigation of how to purify the Land of Darkness, but the local monster populace is a problem.
Reduce their numbers.

quest.name: The Rotting Forest
quest.desc: When the sun was blotted out over the Land of Darkness, the forest of $map:03000024$ began to die. When the $npcNamePlural:40000127$ moved in to feast on the decay, they became a host to the tree-killing diseases. Destroy these creatures so their disease never spreads beyond the Land of Darkness.

quest.name: Sleep-Deprived Sentries
quest.desc: The increasing number of creatures at the $map:02000091$ have put the Green Hood sentries there on edge. Help ease their burden by reducing the monster population a bit.

quest.name: Beefing Up Security
quest.desc: Additional defenses are being built at $map:02000057$ to protect against future attacks. However, $npcNamePlural:21000300$ are making the work difficult, so they must be driven away.

quest.name: A Tasty Morale-Booster
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003536$ wants to bake some sweet combat rations to boost ship morale, but the $map:02000186$, the best source of fresh ingredient, is crawling with monsters.
Take care of them, for the good of desserts!

quest.name: Gemstone Thieves
quest.desc: Ever since Henesys was attacked, the Green Hoods have been short on equipment. After a critical shipment of gemstones was stolen by beauty-seeking Toogas, you have no choice but to reclaim them by force.

quest.name: A Sticky Situation
quest.desc:
The Green Hoods have plans to refurbish the $map:02000013$ and use it as an outpost. In order to complete repairs, they'll need a ton of snail slime.
Your job? Hunt a ton of $npcNamePlural:21000353$!

quest.name: Not the Bees!
quest.desc:
To improve morale in the Green Hoods, $npcName:11003536$ wants to hold a friendly hunting competition at $map:02000054$, followed by a feast at. Unfortunately, the area is swarming with venomous $npcNamePlural:21000098$!
Take care of them so the Green Hoods can still have their party.

quest.name: The Farmers' Tears
quest.desc:
The attack on Henesys has driven wild animals living deep in the mountains down into the fields of the unsuspecting farmers of $map:02000056$.
Now, they're devouring vital crops. Deal with the plundering $npcNamePlural:21000225$ before it's too late!

quest.name: The Stirge Scourge
quest.desc:
Farming in the bitter cold of $map:02000085$ is tough enough without $npcNamePlural:21099190$ biting at your neck.
Drive them out so that the humble farmers of the region can work in peace!

quest.name: The Lumbering Menace
quest.desc: Henesys cannot be rebuilt without wood, and $map:02000059$ is a major source of wood. However, the monsters near there make it hard to gather the wood. Thin them out!

quest.name: Un-gogging the Drain
quest.desc: In the past, the crystal-clear waters of $map:02000022$ were a treasured source of drinking water for the surrounding areas. But with the unchecked expansion of the local monster populace, the river has become polluted with litter and waste. Drive the monsters out so that the river can recover.

quest.name: Cries of the Forest
quest.desc:
The androids dispatched to protect the $map:02000128$ have gone haywire and started chopping it down to establish their own base.
Destroy them before they can do any more harm!

quest.name: Cannibalistic Trees
quest.desc: In a strange turn of events, $npcNamePlural:21000044$ have begun devouring other trees, threatening the ecosystem of $map:02000215$. Defeat the $npcNamePlural:21000044$ laying waste to the forest!

quest.name: Onio-truders
quest.desc:
$npcNamePlural:21000262$ and $npcNamePlural:21000264$ displaced by human development, have made their new home in $map:02000089$. Unfortunately, they're uprooting precious Torhara's flowers to plant their own seeds.
If the balance of the spring is to be preserved, you must chase the $npcNamePlural:21000262$ and $npcNamePlural:21000264$ out.

quest.name: The Root Cause
quest.desc:
$npcNamePlural:21000252$ primarily eat soft roots, which has become a problem since their numbers have soared in recent years.
Reduce their numbers before there's nothing left of $map:02000006$ to save.

quest.name: Protecting the Trees
quest.desc:
Ecological disturbances have created a surge in the $npcNamePlural:21000249$ population at $map:02000024$. The problem is, $npcNamePlural:21000249$ feed on trees.
Reduce their numbers before there are no trees left in $map:02000024$.

quest.name: Mechanical Miscreants
quest.desc:
The $npcNamePlural:21000132$ deployed to stop the $npcNamePlural:21000289$ corrupting the forest have gone rogue and started attacking humans!
It's up to you to salvage the situation by destroying them both!

quest.name: Spore No More
quest.desc:
$map:02000113$ is a source of drinking water for all of Ellinia, but the $npcNamePlural:21000341$ are polluting it with their… toxins.
Eradicate the $npcNamePlural:21000341$ from $map:02000113$ to give the falls a chance to purify itself.

quest.name: The Snack That Bites Back
quest.desc:
To unsuspecting travelers passing through $map:02000129$, the forest seems like a goldmine of edible mushrooms. Little do they know, the $npcNamePlural:21000006$ pack a dangerous bite.
Wipe out the $npcNamePlural:21000006$ to keep these hungry, uneducated people from maiming themselves.

quest.name: A Squishy Contaminant
quest.desc:
The $npcNamePlural:21000030$ at the $map:02000112$ are causing all manner of problems. Not only are they merging to form King Slimes, their waste is polluting the water!
Cull the $npcNamePlural:21000030$ and save the forest!

quest.name: Beat Them Because You Care
quest.desc: The hideous $npcNamePlural:21000109$ of $map:02000053$ were once beautiful unicorns. They can be again, with the help of Sky Fortress's experimental darkness neutralization ray. All you have to do is beat the $npcNamePlural:21000109$ back into their senses.

quest.name: Forest-Melting Spores
quest.desc: In a healthy ecosystem, $npcNamePlural:21000339$ perform the valuable service of breaking down fallen trees. However, a hormonal imbalance has caused them to breed to problematic extents. The only solution is to slash their population.

quest.name: Tree-on-Tree Violence
quest.desc:
Twisted by dark influence, the $npcNamePlural:21090182$ of $map:02000090$ have grown jealous of the neighboring trees, and started stripping their bark.
You need to put an end to this arboreal atrocity by wiping out the $npcNamePlural:21090182$, and save the forest.

quest.name: A Coherent Crisis
quest.desc:
The number of $npcNamePlural:21000029$ at $map:02000041$ has exploded, and $npcName:11003534$ fears they'll clump together to wreak havoc as King Slimes.
Your job is to cull their population before that happens.

quest.name: Siege of the Sprites
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:21000078$ are gathering in the $map:02000043$ to lay siege to nearby human settlements. Drive them off and foil their plans.

quest.name: A Stumpy Grudge
quest.desc:
Illegal logging in the enchanted woods of the $map:02000017$ has created a horde of angry $npcNamePlural:21000041$ in search of vengeance!
These vermin are a threat to kneecaps everywhere, and must be destroyed.

quest.name: The Canyon Conundrum
quest.desc: The feral $npcName:21000062$ population at the $map:02000117$ has gotten out of hand. Thin their numbers before any more unsuspecting travelers go missing.

quest.name: An Imminent Threat
quest.desc: A large number of $npcNamePlural:21000079$ and $npcNamePlural:21000080$ have gathered at $map:02000118$ and they're trying to break into Tria. Help the Royal Guard stop them!

quest.name: The Highwaybears
quest.desc:
A group of mischievous $npcNamePlural:21000234$ have set up camp at $map:02000088$ and are robbing travelers.
It's time to teach them that crime doesn't pay!

quest.name: Threat from Beyond
quest.desc: Zombies are attacking the researchers conducting a geological survey at $map:02000087$. Secure the area by whacking any zombies you see at $map:02000087$.

quest.name: Forest Thieves
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:21000077$ are using vines to catch and mug anyone passing through $map:02000116$, including important delivery people bring supplies to Tria. Go to $map:02000116$ and stop the $npcNamePlural:21000077$!

quest.name: Horned Hunters
quest.desc:
Ever since that earthquake at the $map:02000115$, the royal guard has had difficulty controlling monster populations in the surrounding area.
The $npcNamePlural:21000007$ have become a serious threat to travelers. It's time someone thinned their numbers.

quest.name: A Slippery Road
quest.desc:
$map:02000114$ is part of the major trade route linking $map:02000062$ and $map:02000001$.
But with their population unchecked, the slimy trails of the $npcNamePlural:21000351$ has become a real problem, and a leading cause of wagon crashes.
It's time to knock the slime out of those slippery $npcNamePlural:21000351$!

quest.name: 돌보다 단단한 뿔
quest.desc:
$npcName:21000027$$pp:는,은$ 자신의 뿔을 뾰족하게 만들기 위해 $map:02000044$ 기둥에 뿔을 갈아대고 있어 협곡의 기둥들이 무너져 내리는 대참사로 이어지고 있다.
$npcName:21000027$의 수를 줄여 $map:02000044$$pp:가,이$ 무너지지 않도록 보호하자.

quest.name: 길들여지지 않는 야생
quest.desc:
길들여 전투에 활용하던 $npcName:21000066$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:21000064$가 트라이아 공습 이후 대량으로 탈출하여 $map:02000171$에 방문하는 모험가들을 공격하고 있다.
$npcName:21000066$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:21000064$$pp:를,을$ 몰아내고 $map:02000171$의 개척을 지속시켜 나갈 수 있도록 돕자.

quest.name: 무법지대
quest.desc:
$map:02000093$에 $npcName:21000312$$pp:라는,이라는$ 자가 나타나 주민들에게 시비를 걸고 다니기 시작하더니 어느새 $npcName:21000311$$pp:와,과$ $npcName:21000310$$pp:가,이$ 늘어나면서 $map:02000093$$pp:를,을$ 점거하기에 이르렀다.
이들은 페리온 전 지역에 영향력을 행사하겠다며 세력을 더욱 확장하기 위해 $map:02000093$의 주민들을 약탈하고 모험가들을 몰아내는 악행을 저지르고 있다.
$npcName:21000312$$pp:를,을$ 처치하여 적룡 턱권단의 세력 확장 시도를 저지하자.

quest.name: Bucktoothed Menace
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:21000111$ at $map:02000097$ are a serious menace to travelers. You've been conscripted to do something about the problem.

quest.name: 맹수 조련사
quest.desc:
쓰레기를 뒤지거나 시체를 먹던 $npcName:21000066$$pp:가,이$ 모험가들을 공격하기 시작한 건 꽤 오래된 일이지만 원인은 알려지지 않았다.
최근 $npcName:21000334$$pp:가,이$ $npcName:21000066$$pp:를,을$ 사납게 길들여 개척민을 공격해 지역 개척을 방해하려는 목적이 있음이 첩보를 통해 밝혀졌다.
$npcName:21000334$ 들을 $map:02000169$에서 토벌해 몰아내자.

quest.name: 현혹시키는 자
quest.desc:
$map:02000061$$pp:는,은$ 맑은 식수원으로 페리온 지역 개척의 중심이 될 수 있을 거 같다.
$npcName:21000369$$pp:는,은$ 최면을 통해 자신보다 지능이 낮은 동물들을 사납게 만들어 지역 개척을 방해하고 있다.
$map:02000061$$pp:는,은$ 개척을 방해하는 원흉인 $npcName:21000369$$pp:를,을$ 토벌하자.

quest.name: 이빨을 부러뜨리는 자
quest.desc:
$npcName:21000301$$pp:는,은$ 강력하고 날카로운 이빨로 다른 동물보다 우위에서 개체 수를 점점 늘려나가고 있었다.
수가 늘어난 $npcName:21000301$$pp2:로,으로$ 인해 모험가들이 습격당해 치명상을 입는 경우가 잦아졌다.
특히 페리온의 성지인 $map:02000133$에는 많은 모험가와 주민들이 방문하는 곳이라 $npcName:21000301$에게 습격을 받는 사람들이 날로 늘어나고 있다.
$npcName:21000301$$pp:를,을$ $map:02000133$에서 토벌하여 피해를 줄여야 한다.

quest.name: 이 물 다 내꺼!
quest.desc:
페리온 전 지역에 계속되는 건기로 인해 물이 많이 줄어들고 있다.
이런 상황에 욕심 많고 물을 몸에 저장하는 습성을 가진 $npcName:21000069$$pp:가,이$ 대량으로 늘어나면서 $map:02000049$의 지하수까지 모조리 빨아들여 자신의 몸에 저장하고 있다.
지역을 개척하는 데는 그 지역에서 바로 공급 가능한 식수가 최우선이다.
물을 독점하고 있는 $npcName:21000069$$pp:를,을$ 토벌하고 식수난이 가속화되는 것을 막자.

quest.name: 사악한 주술
quest.desc: $map:02000094$에서 권법을 연구하고 몸과 정신을 수양하던 턱권단에게 접근해 정신을 오염시켜 선량한 사람들을 공격하게 만든 장본인인 $npcName:21000334$$pp:를,을$ $map:02000094$에서 몰아내 더 이상의 피해 확산을 막자.

quest.name: Some Like It Only Lukewarm
quest.desc:
A unique balance has been reached within the volcano at the $map:02000039$, allowing for its slow and measured flow. However, the burrowing $npcNamePlural:21000255$ threaten a full-scale eruption.
Cull their population so that never occurs!

quest.name: 공사 방해꾼
quest.desc:
페리온 지역 개척을 위해 놓아둔 뼈다리가 자꾸 부서져 원인을 확인해 보니 $npcName:21000267$$pp:가,이$ 단단한 몸체가 가려워지자 뼈다리에 몸을 굴려 뼈다리가 무너지는 것으로 확인되었다.
$map:02000045$에서 공사를 방해하는 $npcName:21000267$$pp:를,을$ 토벌하자.

quest.name: 용암을 파내는 손
quest.desc:
엄청난 고열의 용암이 분출되는 $map:02000046$$pp:는,은$ 용암 온도가 일정하여 용암 에너지 추출에 매우 이상적인 장소이다.
용암 에너지 추출을 위한 개척을 진행하기 위해선 이곳에 수를 앞세워 지역을 장악하고 있는 $npcName:21000299$의 토벌은 필수 불가결이다.
$map:02000046$에 용암 에너지 추출 시설이 신축될 수 있도록 $npcName:21000299$$pp:를,을$ 토벌하자.

quest.name: Rage of the Forgotten
quest.desc:
The forgotten $npcNamePlural:21000088$ at the $map:02000010$ have suddenly grown aware that they were forgotten. In their anger and sorrow, they've started attacking civilians.
You'll have to end their tantrum by force.

quest.name: Venom and Fang
quest.desc: The slithering masses of venomous $npcNamePlural:21000076$ at the $map:02000048$ have become a serious hazard. It's up to you to do something about them.

quest.name: The Thermal Threat
quest.desc:
The geothermal energy plant at $map:02000268$ is in danger thanks to the growing number of $npcNamePlural:21000250$ and $npcNamePlural:21000253$.
Reduce their numbers so that the technicians can access the plant.

quest.name: Dug Too Deep
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:21091021$ and $npcNamePlural:21091023$ are mining $map:02000175$ for precious gemstones. Unfortunately, their greed has blinded them to the dangers, and they're close to awakening the dormant volcano under their mines. If they won't stop on their own, then you'll have to stop them by force.

quest.name: Attack of the Plushies
quest.desc:
Forgotten toys everywhere have come to life and found a new home in $map:02000262$. In their bitterness and rage, they've barred humans from entering their territory, and the $npcNamePlural:21000171$ have even gone out of their way to hunt down and attack innocent passers-by.
Put these toys away.

quest.name: Igloo Invaders
quest.desc:
The humble tribespeople of $map:02000264$ have had their igloos invaded but an unexpected pest that is damaging their homes and eating their food.
Defeat the $npcName:21000258$ before anyone starves or freezes to death.

quest.name: Curse Quarantine
quest.desc:
A powerful curse was cast upon the $map:03000090$, which is why the forest was sealed in the first place. Unfortunately, the curse has taken hold of the $npcNamePlural:40000151$ of the forest, and they're threatening to spill out into the surrounding areas.
Thin their numbers to reduce this threat.

quest.name: Cunning and Malice
quest.desc:
$npcNamePlural:40000205$ have begun raising an army in $map:03000136$ to carry out their dark schemes.
Drive out the $npcNamePlural:40000205$ before they become a serious problem.

quest.name: Contagion
quest.desc: A virus stored in the dilapidated labs of the $map:03000145$ has somehow escaped containment. Now $npcNamePlural:40000074$ are wandering the lab, spreading the virus to those unfortunate enough to pass through. Contain the disease by destroying its carriers.

quest.name: Urban Warfare
quest.desc:
The $map:03000135$ is a valuable strategic location in the Alliance's long-term plans to restore the Land of Darkness. As such, the hordes of violent $npcNamePlural:40000169$ and $npcNamePlural:40000032$ infesting the area need to be addressed.
Thin their ranks.

quest.name: A Toxic Matter
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:40000023$ have taken over $map:03000134$ and are preparing a massive batch of chemical weapons. Drive them out before they have a chance to put these weapons to use.

quest.name: Shadow's Edge
quest.desc: In the Land of Darkness, even the wildlife is twisted and monstrous. The $npcNamePlural:40000024$ and $npcNamePlural:40000132$ of $map:03000014$ present a danger to the Maple Alliance's reconnaissance teams. Thin the herd a little to make things easier for your fellow soldiers.

quest.name: The Carrot Monopoly
quest.desc:
$map:02000280$ is one of the leading producers of carrots in Victoria Island, but lately the local farms have been threatened by feral rabbit-monsters.
Drive these monsters from $map:02000280$ and restore the peace for the gentle Moon Bunny farmers.

quest.name: Recon: Undead Nelph
quest.desc:
A mysterious caped man is loitering awkwardly along trade routes through the mountains. He shows up without warning, attacks, and then vanishes. Because he's most frequently spotted in the $map:02000043$, $npcName:11003535$ thinks it might be $npcName:11000492$ risen from the dead.
Head to the $map:02000043$ and get a report from the undercover Dark Wind agent.
quest.descFameUI: Someone matching Nelph's description has been spotted in the Boulderwhite Mountains…

quest.name: Recon: Frequency Unknown
quest.desc: A few days ago, an unusual signal was detected at the $map:02000146$. Where did it come from? Who is responsible for this? Head to the $map:02000146$ and get a coded message from the Dark Wind agent.
quest.descFameUI: Unidentified signal detected at Shadow Gate! Frequency associated with ancient kingdom of [REDACTED]

quest.name: Recon: The Resistance
quest.desc: Dark Wind tailed a member of the anti-magic Resistance to $map:02000270$, but couldn't pinpoint who he reported to. $npcName:11003535$ won't give up that easily! Head to $map:02000270$ and receive coded messages from her agents.
quest.descFameUI: Dark Wind is in pursuit of the Resistance. They are a slippery bunch…

quest.name: Recon: The Brains behind Blackstar
quest.desc: $npcName:11000251$ is the infamous godfather of Blackstar. But is this brash don truly responsible for the brilliant strategy that's allowed him to avoid backlash from the law? Rumor has it that he's secretly being guided by an advisor in the shadows. Head to $map:02000131$ and get a coded message about this mystery man from one of Dark Wind's agents…
quest.descFameUI: Everyone knows that Wei Hong is the boss of Blackstar. But is someone else pulling the strings from the shadows?

quest.name: Recon: Ladin's Shady Dealings
quest.desc: While keeping an eye on Blackstar, a Dark Wind agent saw $npcName:11000264$ pass through the $map:52010010$, which seems really fishy. Head to $map:02010020$ and get in touch with the agents there.
quest.manual: Meet the $npcName:11000259$ at the $map:02010020$|Meet another $npcName:11000259$|Meet another $npcName:11000259$
quest.descFameUI: Ladin has been spotted visiting suspicious locations. What is he up to?

quest.name: Recon: Revealing the Rooks
quest.desc: $npcName:11003535$ wants to know more about the mysterious assassins who ambushed the Sky Fortress. Every time she's tried to capture one of these Rooks, they've managed to slip her grasp. Head to $map:02000083$ and gather reports from the undercover Dark Wind agents there.
quest.descFameUI: The Rooks are growing bold! You need information to prepare for their next move.

quest.name: Recon: Unethical Experiments
quest.desc:
Rumor has it a company in the Land of Darkness is performing inhumane experiments in an attempt to create superhuman soldiers. The empire needs to know everything it can about this group if it's to put an end to such evil.
Go to $map:03000145$ and meet with Dark Wind's undercover agents.
quest.manual: Meet the $npcName:11000259$ at the $map:03000145$|Meet another $npcName:11000259$|Meet another $npcName:11000259$
quest.descFameUI: BeyondLink is up to no good in the Land of Darkness.

quest.name: Recon: Tria Confidential
quest.desc: Dark Wind collects info on enemies as well as allies. $npcName:11003535$ has given you a top secret mission to collect high-level intel from $map:02000001$. How exciting! Find the secret agent in $map:02000001$ and get the passphrase.
quest.descFameUI: A man. A woman. A mystery. A game of intrigue is afoot in the city of Tria…

quest.name: Recon: The Wounded Dragon
quest.desc: A dragon-man has been spotted on Karkar Island. Even though he's injured, he's still managed to leave behind a swath of destruction in his rage. Head to the $map:02010029$ and gather intel from Dark Wind's undercover agents.
quest.manual: Meet the $npcName:11000259$ at the $map:02010029$|Meet another $npcName:11000259$|Meet another $npcName:11000259$
quest.descFameUI: A dragon-man has been spotted in Karkar. Verify the accuracy of these rumors.

quest.name: Bad Bad Baba
quest.desc: Criminals are taking advantage of the chaos in the empire to smuggle $item:30000986$ through $map:02000139$. Intercept their merchandise and bring it in for proper disposal.
quest.descFameUI: Baba powder is being smuggled through a major port. Intercept the goods before they reach their destination.

quest.name: The Great Gummy Plot
quest.desc: Everyone loves $itemPlural:20000015$, but they're also pretty darn sticky. Someone is trying to turn that stickiness into a weapon! Confiscate $itemPlural:30000987$ before they cause some real damage.
quest.descFameUI: Dubi Gummies: Fruity! Delicious! And… deadly? It's time to enact a product retail on some contraband fruit snacks.

quest.name: Bad Chemistry
quest.desc:
Change a single ingredient, and a formula can go from medicinal to explosive. This is exactly what happened at $map:02000134$, when someone thought it would be a good idea to add $itemPlural:20000055$ to one of their experimental drugs.
Now the culprit is selling these $itemPlural:30000988$ on the streets as a new kind of weapon. It's time for you to intervene.
quest.descFameUI: A dash of slime glob, and this potion becomes a paralyzing stink bomb. It's time to clean up the streets.

quest.name: More Harm than Good
quest.desc: In an increasingly dangerous world, average citizens are turning to the black market to defend themselves. Unfortunately, many of the weapons available for sale are in such poor condition that they'd do more harm than good. It's up to you to take these $itemPlural:30000989$ off the market for good.
quest.descFameUI: As panic grips the empire, more and more people are looking to poorly-made swords for their defense.

quest.name: Baba Powder Bootleggers
quest.desc: As it's become harder to smuggle $item:20000046$ from the Land of Darkness, certain shady characters are trying to create their own. Head to $map:02000129$ and search the barrels for $item:30000990$.
quest.descFameUI: Shady baba dealers are trying to make baba powder inside the empire's borders. Shut down their operation.

quest.name: A Haven for Dirty Money
quest.desc: Rumors has it that the forces of darkness are using Blackstar to launder their ill-gotten funds. Head to $map:02010010$ and confiscate their $itemPlural:30000991$.
quest.descFameUI: Blackstar is using innocent videogame consoles to hide their illegal cash. They must be punished!

quest.name: Eyes Everywhere
quest.desc: Dark Wind is everywhere and nowhere, but they've had a few issues with manpower after the invasion on $map:02000001$. They've resorted to watching some placed via security cameras. Hack the system and secure the $item:30000992$.
quest.descFameUI: Dark Wind is stretched too thin to keep tabs on everything. It's time to get a little boost from technology.

quest.name: Criminal Numbers
quest.desc: Blackstar controls the darker elements of Maple World's society. However, no matter how closely Dark Wind watches them, Blackstar is careful to always cover its tracks. You'll need to track down Blackstar's secret accounts if you want to bring them to justice.
quest.descFameUI: Blackstar is an infamous gang, but they never leave behind any physical evidence. Maybe you can change that.

quest.name: Manhunt: Flora Avenue
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$'s forces were spotted on $map:02000147$. Are they trying to keep an eye on $npcName:11000069$? Head there and look for him.
quest.descFameUI: Katvan's traitorous lackeys have been spotted on Flora Avenue! Find their hideout and root them out.

quest.name: Manhunt: Auto Bridge
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$'s forces were spotted at the $map:02010039$ in Karkar. There are plenty of places for him and his men to hide out in a place like that. Head there and look for them.
quest.descFameUI: Katvan's traitorous lackeys have been spotted at the Auto Bridge! Find their hideout and root them out.

quest.name: Manhunt: Infernal Tree
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$'s forces were spotted near the $map:03000103$. This is the last place he was seen alive—are they searching for their boss? Head there and find him first.
quest.descFameUI: Katvan's traitorous lackeys have been spotted at the Infernal Tree! Find their hideout and root them out.

quest.name: Manhunt: Ant Tunnel Entrance
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$'s forces were spotted near the $map:02000173$. Rumors of a killer mushroom have scared most people from heading out that way—it's the perfect hiding place for $npcName:11000044$. Head there and look for him.
quest.descFameUI: Katvan's traitorous lackeys have been spotted at the Ant Tunnel Entrance! Find their hideout and root them out.

quest.name: Manhunt: Hushwood Vale
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$'s forces were spotted in $map:02000116$. Since the roads there are too dangerous even for merchant caravans, it's the perfect hiding spot. Head there and look for him.
quest.descFameUI: Katvan's traitorous lackeys have been spotted in Hushwood Vale! Find their hideout and root them out.

quest.name: Manhunt: Forsaken Fields
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$'s forces were spotted in the $map:02000414$. Before they could be apprehended, they fled deep into the dangerous fields. Head there and find them.
quest.descFameUI: Katvan's traitorous lackeys have been spotted at the Forsaken Fields! Find their hideout and root them out.

quest.name: Manhunt: Lavaluna Cave
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$'s forces were spotted near $map:02000040$. He may be looking to recruit the prison laborers who work the caverns. Head there and look for him.
quest.descFameUI: Katvan's traitorous lackeys have been spotted in Lavaluna Cave! Find their hideout and root them out.

quest.name: Manhunt: Cave of Eternity
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$'s forces were spotted in the $map:02000192$. Before he went into hiding, $npcName:11000044$ had plans to turn the cave into a major outpost. Head there and look for him.
quest.descFameUI: Katvan's traitorous lackeys have been spotted in the Cave of Eternity! Find their hideout and root them out.

quest.name: Manhunt: Black Forest
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$'s forces were spotted in the $map:03000006$. It's possible that the shifty denizens of that dark place are giving them sanctuary. Head there and look for him.
quest.descFameUI: Katvan's traitorous lackeys have been spotted in the Black Forest! Find their hideout and root them out.

quest.name: Manhunt: Forgotten Keep
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$'s forces were spotted in the $map:02000013$. If his men manage to take control of the fortress, it'll be impossible to get them out again. Head there and look for him.
quest.descFameUI: Katvan's traitorous lackeys have been spotted at the Forgotten Keep! Find their hideout and root them out.

quest.name: Protect New Kerningdom
quest.desc: The Rooks have set their sights on $map:02000271$, where outstanding mechanical engineers reside. The knowledge of those engineers is an important asset to Victoria Island. Hurry over to $map:02000271$ and defeat the Rooks!
quest.descFameUI: Quest is blocked.

quest.name: Kerning Junkyard Defense
quest.desc: The Rooks have set their sights on the $map:02000084$, where all of Victoria Island's wastewater and trash are processed. The citizens of the empire will take a huge hit to their hygiene if the Rooks are successful.
quest.descFameUI: The Rooks are targeting major strategic sites around Maple World.

quest.name: Stone Quarry Defense
quest.desc: The Rooks have set their sights on the $map:02000058$, where all of Victoria Island's stone is processed. Infrastructure and construction will ground to a halt if the Rooks are successful.
quest.descFameUI: The Rooks are targeting major strategic sites around Maple World.

quest.name: Water Supply Center Defense
quest.desc: The Rooks have set their sights on the $map:02000274$, which manages all of Victoria Island's water. The residents of Victoria Island won't last even a week if the Rooks are successful.
quest.descFameUI: The Rooks are targeting major strategic sites around Maple World.

quest.name: Kernel Energy Research Defense
quest.desc: The Rooks have set their sights on $map:02000276$, where many dangerous materials and chemicals are stored. If the Rooks are successful, they could trigger a massive explosion.
quest.descFameUI: The Rooks are targeting major strategic sites around Maple World.

quest.name: Lavaworks Defense
quest.desc: The Rooks have set their sights on the $map:02000086$, which is an important part of Victoria Island's weapons manufacturing industry. If the Rooks are successful, the empire won't be able to keep its military armed and armored.
quest.descFameUI: The Rooks are targeting major strategic sites around Maple World.

quest.name: Aurora Laboratory Defense
quest.desc: The Rooks have set their sights on $map:02000412$, which is a hub of the empire's top secret research. If the Rooks are successful, who knows what valuable technology will fall into their hands?
quest.descFameUI: The Rooks are targeting major strategic sites around Maple World.

quest.name: 둔둔에게 내리는 단죄
quest.desc: $map:02000084$에 어둠에 물든 몬스터, $npcName:23000013$$pp:가,이$ 발견된다고 한다. 산업 폐기물과 스파크에 노출되어 탄생한 $npcName:23000013$$pp:는,은$ 화려하고 반짝이는 것을 좋아한다. 현재는 $map:02000084$$pp:를,을$ 빠져나가지 못하고 있지만 $npcName:23000013$$pp:가,이$ 이 지역을 벗어나 반짝이를 모으기 시작하면 메이플 월드가 위험하다. $npcName:23000013$$pp:가,이$ 반짝이는 것을 찾아 이동하며 어둠을 퍼트리기 전에 해치우자.
quest.descFameUI: 화려하고 반짝이는 것에 현혹된 어둠의 마물, 둔둔이여. 기사단의 심판을 받들어, 세계로부터의 추방을 명한다.

quest.name: 어둠에 물든 거북을 용서하소서
quest.desc: 바다가 오염된 것을 항의하러 왔던 신수 거북이가 어둠에 물들고 말았다. 그는 최선을 다해 어둠에 침식되는 것에 저항하고 있으나, 그의 저항은 오래 유지될 수 없을 것이다. 이미 시작된 오염은 막을 수 없지만, 그가 주민을 공격하는 비극과 어둠의 힘이 퍼지는 것을 막자.
quest.descFameUI: 빛의 신이시여, 이 바다의 신수를 당신 곁으로 보내어 이 땅과 바다의 평화를 되찾겠나이다…

quest.name: 어둠의 군단을 빛으로 숙청하리라
quest.desc: 아직 그림자 군단에 대한 명확한 정보는 없지만, 저번 침공을 봤을 때 그들 중에서도 특별히 강한 전사들이 존재하는 것 같다. 어둠의 세력을 약화하기 위해, 그들의 전력에 큰 타격을 주고 싶다. $map:02000115$에 강한 힘을 가진 몬스터가 출현한다고 하던데, 그가 그림자 군단 소속일 수도 있지 않을까?
quest.descFameUI: 어둠의 군단에 소속된 검은 전사여, 곧 네 존재를 빛의 세계에서 배제할지니…

quest.name: 타락한 날개의 끝
quest.desc: 사이좋은 부부였던 $npcName:23000019$과 $npcName:23000020$$pp:는,은$ 어리석은 인간에게 알을 빼앗긴 뒤, 증오와 복수의 화신이 되었다. 어둠에 물든 그들의 분노는 너무나도 강력하여, 봉인된 이후에도 계속 또 다른 $npcName:23000019$과 $npcName:23000020$$pp:를,을$ 만들어내고 있고, 특히 $npcName:23000019$의 분노가 매우 강하다고 한다. 루미나이츠가 그의 어둠의 힘이 퍼지지 않게 막는 동안, 그의 복수가 선량한 사람들에게 향하지 않도록 막자.
quest.descFameUI: 빛의 신이시여, 비극으로 끝난 이 그리폰의 운명을 거두어 남은 빛을 구하고, 그를 안식으로 인도하소서.

quest.name: 영혼없는 병기에게 구원은 없다
quest.desc: $npcName:23000054$$pp:는,은$ 로봇기술의 대가 카트로닉 박사의 마크 52 프로젝트의 초기 버전이다. 카트로닉 박사는 마크52 프로젝트가 실패한 뒤 자취를 감추었는데 누가, 어떤 기술과 설비로 $npcName:23000054$$pp:를,을$ 만들고 있는지는 불명이다. 어둠에 물들지 않은 로봇으로 엄밀히 따지면 루미나이츠의 담당은 아니지만, 도와주지 않으면 $npcName:11003537$$pp:가,이$ $npcName:11003535$에게 무서운 일을 당할 것 같으니 신속히 파괴하자.
quest.descFameUI: 영혼을 위한 구원의 기회는 영원하다. 하지만 어둠을 품은 병기에 공평한 심판은 없다.

quest.name: 그 가면의 끝에 빛의 심판을
quest.desc: 어둠에 물든 $npcName:22409035$$pp:가,이$ 무무스를 꾀어내 사람들을 괴롭히고 있다. 그가 외모를 감추기 위해 착용한 가면에 어둠의 주술이 걸려있던 것 같다. 어둠에 완전히 빠지기 전에 $npcName:22409035$$pp:를,을$ 구하고, 무무스의 자유를 찾아주자.
quest.descFameUI: 어둠의 가면을 쓰고 세상을 등지려는 악한 마음이여, 그대를 위한 구원의 손길을 지금 보내겠노라.

quest.name: 어둠이여, 그 돌에서 나오너라
quest.desc: $map:02000021$의 $npcName:23000099$$pp:가,이$ 어둠에 물들어 타락해버렸다고 한다. $npcName:34000103$$pp:는,은$ 원래 선한 존재여서 웬만한 어둠의 기운에 영향받지 않는데, 무언가 수상하다. 누군가가 $npcName:34000103$$pp:를,을$ 조종하기 위한 연습을 하는 듯하다. 아직 배후는 파악할 수 없지만 일단 어둠에 물든 $npcName:23000099$$pp:를,을$ 해치우자.
quest.descFameUI: 평화로운 전사들의 땅에, 어둠을 유희 삼아 바야르들을 조종하는 자가 있다. 그자와 바야르의 연결을 끊어야 한다.

quest.name: 지옥의 사냥개에게 안식을
quest.desc: 거칠고 흉포한 성질 탓에 봉인되었던 켈베로스족 $npcName:23000047$$pp:가,이$ 나타났다. 어둠에 물든 $npcName:23000047$$pp:를,을$ 해치우자.
quest.descFameUI: 저주받은 임무를 타고난 지옥의 파수꾼에게, 환생으로써 빛의 세계를 섬길 기회를 줘야 한다.

quest.name: 검은 힘을 가진 형제들
quest.desc: 메이플 월드 전역에 어둠에 물든 몬스터가 나타나고 있지만, 그중 가장 위협적인 존재는 사악한 바포메트 형제다. 그들은 끝을 알 수 없는 어둠의 힘을 가지고 있으며, 해치워도 끊임없이 다시 나타나는 점으로 미뤄보아 서로 어둠의 힘을 공유하며 부활하는 것 같다. 그들을 가만두면 어둠의 힘으로 제2, 제3의 어둠의 땅이 생길지도 모른다.
quest.descFameUI: 암흑의 형제들이 힘을 모아 세계를 위협한다면, 이쪽도 그만한 힘을 보여주는 수밖에 없을 것이다.

quest.name: Research: Pim's Lantern
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:40000018$, which often appear in $map:03000146$ , are never found without their green lanterns. For these lanterns to emit light through the intense miasma of the Land of Darkness… They must possess tremendous energy.
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights need your help with some delicate research.

quest.name: Research: Writhing Straw
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:40000136$ wandering the $map:03000130$ are always filled with rage. Apparently the $itemPlural:30000995$ from which they are made are filled with dark power. Gather some so that the Lumiknights can learn more about these unusual foes.
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights need your help with some delicate research.

quest.name: Research: Broken Staves
quest.desc: Defeat the cursed $npcNamePlural:40000055$ and retrieve the crystal balls from their staves.
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights need your help with some delicate research.

quest.name: Research: Savage Waters
quest.desc:
The $npcNamePlural:40000071$ are savage, but once they drink the water at $map:03000143$, their savagery grows exponentially.
Defeat the $npcNamePlural:40000071$ and collect their drinking water.
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights need your help with some delicate research.

quest.name: Research: Mushroom Shock
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:40000134$ receive a constant IV drip of medicine, and yet they're unable to recover from the $itemPlural:30000998$ they've eaten. It seems that, once ingested, these $itemPlural:30000998$ doom them to total corruption sooner or later. Defeat the $npcNamePlural:40000134$ tainted by darkness and retrieve the $itemPlural:30000998$.
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights need your help with some delicate research.

quest.name: Research: Muddy Motives
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:40000080$ once valued cleanliness above all else, but now they spend their days rolling in the dirt. Could the $item:30000999$ be behind this sudden transformation? Gather some to find out.
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights need your help with some delicate research.

quest.name: Research: Darkstones
quest.desc: As their names suggest, $npcNamePlural:40000122$ just love to steal. After stealing a stockpile of $itemPlural:30001000$, however, they've switched from petty theft to violent crime. Gather the $itemPlural:30001000$ in order to learn more about their strange powers.
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights need your help with some delicate research.

quest.name: Research: Mushrooms and Apples
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:40000109$ use $itemPlural:30001001$ to make poisoned apples. That's a lot of poison! Gather some of these mushrooms for analysis.
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights need your help with some delicate research.

quest.name: Divine Remains: Midden
quest.desc:
The Lumiknights believe that the Land of Darkness is fueled by the remains of the goddess of darkness herself. If this is true, then her remains might be located near hot spots of dark magic.
The shadow energy in the $map:03000089$ has been unusually high lately. Go there and investigate.
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights are researching the goddess of darkness and her remains…

quest.name: Divine Remains: Ena
quest.desc:
The Lumiknights believe that the Land of Darkness is fueled by the remains of the goddess of darkness herself. If this is true, then her remains might be located near hot spots of dark magic.
In $map:03000057$, there stands an ominous pyramid. Is it somehow connected to one of the goddess's cults? Investigate it for yourself.
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights are researching the goddess of darkness and her remains…

quest.name: Divine Remains: Dio
quest.desc:
The Lumiknights believe that the Land of Darkness is fueled by the remains of the goddess of darkness herself. If this is true, then her remains might be located near hot spots of dark magic.
There are the remnants of an ancient cult on $map:03000115$. Perhaps this is related to the goddess somehow.
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights are researching the goddess of darkness and her remains…

quest.name: Divine Remains: Tria
quest.desc:
The Lumiknights believe that the Land of Darkness is fueled by the remains of the goddess of darkness herself. If this is true, then her remains might be located near hot spots of dark magic.
$map:03000118$ was once a busy trade route, but the shadows have grown treacherously thick. Could a remnant of the goddess be hidden there?
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights are researching the goddess of darkness and her remains…

quest.name: Divine Remains: Tesera
quest.desc:
The Lumiknights believe that the Land of Darkness is fueled by the remains of the goddess of darkness herself. If this is true, then her remains might be located near hot spots of dark magic.
$map:03000022$ has become inundated with off-putting blinking plants. Were they fertilized by the remains of a dark divine?
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights are researching the goddess of darkness and her remains…

quest.name: Divine Remains: Thea
quest.desc:
The Lumiknights believe that the Land of Darkness is fueled by the remains of the goddess of darkness herself. If this is true, then her remains might be located near hot spots of dark magic.
$map:03000117$ has become inundated with off-putting blinking plants. Were they fertilized by the remains of a dark divine?
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights are researching the goddess of darkness and her remains…

quest.name: Divine Remains: Exi
quest.desc:
The Lumiknights believe that the Land of Darkness is fueled by the remains of the goddess of darkness herself. If this is true, then her remains might be located near hot spots of dark magic.
The shadow energy in $map:03000101$ has been unusually high lately. Go there and investigate.
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights are researching the goddess of darkness and her remains…

quest.name: Divine Remains: Okto
quest.desc:
The Lumiknights believe that the Land of Darkness is fueled by the remains of the goddess of darkness herself. If this is true, then her remains might be located near hot spots of dark magic.
There is an abandoned fortress at $map:03000007$ where it seems a great battle once took place. Go there and investigate.
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights are researching the goddess of darkness and her remains…

quest.name: Divine Remains: Enya
quest.desc:
The Lumiknights believe that the Land of Darkness is fueled by the remains of the goddess of darkness herself. If this is true, then her remains might be located near hot spots of dark magic.
The once-pristine lake of $map:03000024$ has been reduced to putrid swamp. Go there and investigate.
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights are researching the goddess of darkness and her remains…

quest.name: Divine Remains: Deka
quest.desc:
The Lumiknights believe that the Land of Darkness is fueled by the remains of the goddess of darkness herself. If this is true, then her remains might be located near hot spots of dark magic.
A deluge of evil has rendered $map:03000009$ uninhabitable. Search the area for divine remains.
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights are researching the goddess of darkness and her remains…

quest.name: World Stone: Shadow Gate
quest.desc: The Lumiknights watch over the World Stones, magic relics throughout Maple World that exist to suppress the darkness. The World Stone at the $map:02000146$ has been broken, and now it falls to you to fix it.
quest.manual: Return the World Stone Shard at the $map:02000146$|Repair the World Stone at the $map:02000146$
quest.descFameUI: The World Stones stand as sentinels against the dark. But now, the World Stones are in danger…

quest.name: World Stone: Cave of Eternity
quest.desc: The Lumiknights watch over the World Stones, magic relics throughout Maple World that exist to suppress the darkness. The World Stone in the $map:02000192$ was cracked by an overzealous $npcName:21091023$, and now it falls to you to fix it.
quest.manual: Return the World Stone Shard in the $map:02000192$|Repair the World Stone in the $map:02000192$
quest.descFameUI: The World Stones stand as sentinels against the dark. But now, the World Stones are in danger…

quest.name: World Stone: Caustic Garden
quest.desc: The Lumiknights watch over the World Stones, magic relics throughout Maple World that exist to suppress the darkness. The World Stone in the $map:02000180$ was damaged, and now it falls to you to fix it.
quest.manual: Return the World Stone Shard in the $map:02000180$|Repair the World Stone in the $map:02000180$
quest.descFameUI: The World Stones stand as sentinels against the dark. But now, the World Stones are in danger…

quest.name: Peppermint Root Examination
quest.desc:
The Green Hoods are analyzing everyday items in search of new and more effective ways they can be utilized. $npcName:11003536$ says the current subject matter is $item:30000231$ and requests that you collect some for her.
(Collect them by defeating plant monsters, fairfolk enemies, or inanimate monsters level 15 or higher.)
quest.descFameUI: Peppermint Root is a useful alchemical reagent. Researchers on Sky Fortress want samples of it for their work.

quest.name: Black Pine Mushroom Composition Test
quest.desc:
The Green Hoods are analyzing everyday items in search of new and more effective ways they can be utilized. $npcName:11003536$ says the current subject matter is $item:30000233$ and requests that you collect some for her.
(Collect them by defeating spirit monsters or undead monsters level 15 or higher.)
quest.descFameUI: Black Pine Mushroom is a useful alchemical reagent. Researchers on Sky Fortress want samples of it for their work.

quest.name: Cornelian Cherry Distillation Test
quest.desc:
The Green Hoods are analyzing everyday items in search of new and more effective ways they can be utilized. $npcName:11003536$ says the current subject matter is $item:30000232$ and requests that you collect some for her.
(Obtained occasionally when defeating beast monsters or insect monsters level 15 or higher.)
quest.descFameUI: Cornelian Cherries are believed to have many fantastic properties. But are the legends true?

quest.name: Potion Solvent Distillation Test
quest.desc:
The Green Hoods are analyzing everyday items in search of new and more effective ways they can be utilized. $npcName:11003536$ says the current subject matter is $item:30000230$ and requests that you collect some for her.
(Collect them by defeating divine monsters, humanoid foes, devil monsters, or machine monsters level 15 or higher.)
quest.descFameUI: Potion Solvents are the foundation of modern potion-making. Gather some samples for the ship's research team.

quest.name: Suspicious Sweetener Chemical Analysis
quest.desc:
The Green Hoods are analyzing everyday items in search of new and more effective ways they can be utilized or to ensure they're safe for human usage. $npcName:11003536$ says the current subject matter is $item:30000242$ and requests that you collect some for her.
(Collect them by defeating plant, insect, humanoid, undead, or inanimate monsters level 15 or higher.)
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's scientists need a large sample of $item:30000242$ for their research.

quest.name: Suspicious Meat Chemical Analysis
quest.desc:
The Green Hoods are analyzing everyday items in search of new and more effective ways they can be utilized or to ensure they're safe for human usage. $npcName:11003536$ says the current subject matter is $item:30000240$ and requests that you collect some for her.
(Collect them by defeating beast, insect, undead, devil, or inanimate monsters level 15 or higher.)
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's scientists need a large sample of Suspicious Meat for their research.

quest.name: Suspicious Seasoning Nanoscopic Scan
quest.desc:
The Green Hoods are analyzing everyday items in search of new and more effective ways they can be utilized or to ensure they're safe for human usage. $npcName:11003536$ says the current subject matter is $item:30000241$ and requests that you collect some for her.
(Collect them by defeating divine, spirit, fairfolk, or machine monsters level 15 or higher.)
quest.descFameUI: The ship's science team is performing an exhaustive study on Suspicious Seasoning.

quest.name: Arming the Troops
quest.desc: The soldiers of Sky Fortress are woefully underequipped. Donate some of your old gear to keep them in fighting shape.
quest.descFameUI: The soldiers of Sky Fortress are woefully underequipped. Donate some of your old gear to keep them in fighting shape.

quest.name: Arming the Platoon
quest.desc: The soldiers of Sky Fortress are woefully underequipped. Donate some of your old gear to keep them in fighting shape.
quest.descFameUI: The soldiers of Sky Fortress are woefully underequipped. Donate some of your old gear to keep them in fighting shape.

quest.name: Regiment Funding
quest.desc: Keeping Sky Fortress fully manned and supplied isn't cheap. Donate your "excess" mesos to $npcName:11003536$.
quest.descFameUI: It costs a lot of mesos to keep an army supplied and fed. Can you make a donation to Sky Fortress's war fund?

quest.name: Copper Ingot Collection
quest.desc: $map:02000001$ and the areas nearby have suffered a lot of damage from $npcName:11001698$'s attacks, leading to a huge loss of resources, lives, and morale. Use your mining and smithing skills to collect $itemPlural:33000063$ to help with the city's reconstruction.
quest.descFameUI: Take out your mining pick and anvil. Tria needs Copper Ingots!

quest.name: Tin Ingot Collection
quest.desc: $map:02000001$ and the areas nearby have suffered a lot of damage from $npcName:11001698$'s attacks, leading to a huge loss of resources, lives, and morale. Use your mining and smithing skills to collect $itemPlural:33000064$ to help with the city's reconstruction.
quest.descFameUI: Take out your mining pick and anvil. Tria needs Tin Ingots!

quest.name: Zinc Ingot Collection
quest.desc: $map:02000001$ and the areas nearby have suffered a lot of damage from $npcName:11001698$'s attacks, leading to a huge loss of resources, lives, and morale. Use your mining and smithing skills to collect $itemPlural:33000065$ to help with the city's reconstruction.
quest.descFameUI: Take out your mining pick and anvil. Tria needs Zinc Ingots!

quest.name: Zinc Glove Requisition
quest.desc: $map:02000001$ and the areas nearby have suffered a lot of damage from $npcName:11001698$'s attacks, leading to a huge loss of resources, lives, and morale. Use your mining and smithing skills to collect $itemPlural:20000352$ to help with the city's reconstruction.
quest.descFameUI: The ranching industry is in shambles after Madria's attacks. Help them restock their equipment.

quest.name: Silver Ingot Collection
quest.desc: $map:02000001$ and the areas nearby have suffered a lot of damage from $npcName:11001698$'s attacks, leading to a huge loss of resources, lives, and morale. Use your mining and smithing skills to collect $itemPlural:33000066$ to help with the city's reconstruction.
quest.descFameUI: Take out your mining pick and anvil. Tria needs Silver Ingots!

quest.name: Sapphire Smithing Slate Collection
quest.desc: $npcName:11003534$ says that blacksmiths and other volunteers working hard to repair $map:02000001$, but they're short on manpower. Get a $item:20000358$ for the volunteers to help get them up to speed.
quest.descFameUI: Not all of the volunteers working in Tria are experienced craftsmen. Get them something to help them learn.

quest.name: Iron Glove Requisition
quest.desc: The ranching industry isn't recovering quickly enough. Supply some $itemPlural:20000353$ to aid productivity.
quest.descFameUI: The ranching industry is in shambles after Madria's attacks. Help them restock their equipment.

quest.name: Food for the Hungry
quest.desc: $npcName:11001698$'s invasion damaged essential Victoria Island agricultural sectors, leading to food shortages all over. $item:33000147$ is easy to store and lasts a long time, so use your farming and cooking skills to craft some for the hungry.
quest.descFameUI: The forces of darkness have razed the empire's bread basket. It's time to feed the hungry.

quest.name: Soup for the Cold and Hungry
