quest.desc: In the wake of $npcName:11001698$'s attack, many of the empire's citizens are left cold and hungry. Address both issues at once by cooking some $item:20000431$.
quest.descFameUI: When you're cold and hungry, nothing beats a hot bowl of soup.

quest.name: An Apple a Day
quest.desc: Some citizens have been consuming $item:30000242$ to curb their sweet tooth during the food shortage. $npcName:11003534$ doesn't approve, and wants to feed them the healthier option of $itemPlural:33000149$ instead.
quest.descFameUI: The people of the empire need their sweets! Perhaps you can scrounge up something healthier for them.

quest.name: Gone to Waste
quest.desc: Refugees from the war against the darkness have been living on apple rations, but the apples have all gone bad. $npcName:11003534$ suggests providing $item:20000420$ instead.
quest.descFameUI: The civilian apple rations have gone bad. Maybe they should be properly preserved this time.

quest.name: Training on an Empty Tummy
quest.desc: The Royal Guards are too busy to take care of their own health. Prepare some $itemPlural:33000150$ for $npcName:11003534$ to pass out to his men.
quest.descFameUI: The Royal Guard is working tirelessly to look after the people, but who is looking after them?

quest.name: Spice for the Weary
quest.desc: Morale is low amongst the folks of Victoria Island. Perhaps something flavorful like $item:20000426$ will help cheer them up!
quest.descFameUI: The food from the reserve supplies are bland, to say the least. Perhaps some seasoning could cheer people up…

quest.name: Orange You Glad I Didn't Say…
quest.desc: Everyone's been working so hard to rebuild $map:02000001$ that they've been skipping meals. Perhaps some $itemPlural:33000151$ will offer them refreshment.
quest.descFameUI: Certain things must never be forgotten, no matter how busy or hopeless the situation: love, peace, and tasty snacks.

quest.name: Medicine in a Pinch
quest.desc: There isn't enough medicine to treat everyone who was injured in Madria's attack. Obtain some $item:33000132$ to offer relief to those who aren't critically wounded.
quest.descFameUI: Help gather medicine for all of the people who were injured in the battle against the darkness.

quest.name: Fragrant Relief
quest.desc: Some of the guards are still in a lot of pain from wounds they received during the invasion, but there's not enough pain medication for everyone. $npcName:11003534$ suggests using $item:33000100$ in the form of $item:20000405$ as a holistic alternative instead.
quest.descFameUI: Many guardsmen were hurt protecting Tria. There must be some way to ease their pain.

quest.name: Itchin' a Scratch
quest.desc: The squad of guards was bitten by monster bugs, and now they itch like crazy. Some $item:33000108$ Essence should do the trick!
quest.descFameUI: A squad of soldiers got some monster bug bites. Can you help itch their scratch?

quest.name: A Personal Request
quest.desc: $npcName:11003534$ quietly requests for you to obtain some $item:20000408$, known to help with hair growth.
quest.descFameUI: A special mission from the captain himself. Requires utmost discretion.

quest.name: The Common Cold
quest.desc: There's a cold going around. $npcName:11003534$ asked you to make $item:33000135$ to help combat the illness.
quest.descFameUI: It's cold season. Time to whip up some medicine.

quest.name: Poisoned Guards
quest.desc: Some guards were poisoned in a recent battle. Obtain $item:20000414$, which you claim has detoxifying properties, to help them.
quest.descFameUI: Antidotes were hard to find even when there was an abundance of supplies. Luckily, you have a few tricks up your sleeve.

quest.name: The Cure-All
quest.desc: Battle scars may be a mark of honor, but open wounds are a hazard. $npcName:11003534$ suggested obtaining some $itemPlural:33000136$ to use as a general cure-all.
quest.descFameUI: There is a dire need for medicine right now. If only there was an All-cure Tonic, even just one would be enough.

quest.name: A Sturdy-ish Replacement
quest.desc: Many folks were displaced from their homes after $npcName:11001698$ attacked and had to set up temporary tents, but their tent fabric is starting to tear. Use your ranching and handicraft skills to make $item:33000076$ for people to use to repair their tents.
quest.descFameUI: Daily necessities have been hard to obtain since Madria's invasion. But that's why we got you, isn't it?

quest.name: Fresh Powdered Snail
quest.desc: $item:33000077$ is a crucial ingredient for a lot of everyday items. Obtain some for the Royal Guard.
quest.descFameUI: Help stem the tide of the snail shell shortage.

quest.name: Chewing Pigskin
quest.desc: $item:33000078$ is used to make all kinds of useful items, but there's been a shortage since the attack. Make some $item:33000078$ for $map:02000001$ to help ease the shortage.
quest.descFameUI: When the people are hungry enough to eat pigskin, there isn't enough pigskin for the artisans to craft with…

quest.name: Pigskin Power
quest.desc: $itemPlural:20000345$ would speed along the process of fixing $map:02000001$'s city walls. Go obtain some.
quest.descFameUI: The damage to Tria's city walls is immense. There must be some way you can help with the repairs.

quest.name: For Strong Bones
quest.desc: $npcName:11003534$ wants $item:33000079$ for his men because they're too scrawny. Go get some for him.
quest.descFameUI: The Royal Guard must be strong for Tria to be strong. A healthy dosing of Milk Powder will put some meat on their bones.

quest.name: Home Repair
quest.desc: With so much damage to repair, $itemPlural:20000364$ would be really useful to help boost productivity. Use your ranching and handicraft skills to craft a $item:20000364$.
quest.descFameUI: Most resources have been directed toward repairing the city's walls, but civilians need their homes repaired, too.

quest.name: Working in the Cold
quest.desc: Reality is cold, but the Royal Guards don't have to be cold while they work. Not if you bring them some $item:33000080$!
quest.descFameUI: The Royal Guard isn't properly equipped for cold climates. Help them gear up.

quest.name: Red Alert: Monty de Carro
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for the $map:02000262$. $npcName:22000045$ is summoning an army of monsters.
Go to $map:02000262$, wipe out the local monsters, and defeat $npcName:22000045$.
quest.descFameUI: Ludition Carnival is on Red Alert! Multiple hostile targets detected.

quest.name: Red Alert: Lerta
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for the $map:02000175$, where $npcName:22000052$'s dark influence is driving the nearby monsters into a frenzy.
Defeat $npcName:22000052$ and his minions.
quest.descFameUI: Frostember Void is on red alert! Restore peace through force of arms.

quest.name: Red Alert: Phantom Destroyer
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for the $map:02000275$. A group of monsters tried to hack into the $npcName:22090123$'s control chip, but ended up sending the robot into a frenzy, instead.
Go to the $map:02000275$ and defeat both $npcName:22090123$ and the nearby monsters.
quest.descFameUI: The Phantoma Cyborg Center is on red alert! The robots are out of control.

quest.name: Red Alert: Urska
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for $map:02000276$. The great bear, $npcName:22000023$, has gotten into the lab's electricity grid and is going on a powered-up rampage.
Go to $map:02000276$, wipe out the local monsters, and defeat $npcName:22000023$.
quest.descFameUI: Kernel Energy Research is on red alert! An unauthorized bear has tapped into the power grid.

quest.name: Red Alert: Molten Knight
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for $map:02000018$. The beast known as $npcName:22000034$ and his cohorts are eating the castle right up!
Go to $map:02000018$ and put an end to $npcName:22000034$'s illicit munchies.
quest.descFameUI: Berrysweet Castle is on red alert! A monster with a monstrous sweet tooth is on the loose.

quest.name: Red Alert: Ninecap Copper
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for $map:02000279$. $npcName:22000042$ has been hacked and is leading a small robot army.
Go to the $map:02000279$, wipe out the local monsters, and defeat $npcName:22000042$.
quest.descFameUI: Chronoff Train Station is on red alert! Automated defenses have been compromised.

quest.name: Red Alert: Trauros
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for $map:02000171$. $npcName:22000053$ and his band of unruly monsters are hurting the local tourism industry.
Go to $map:02000171$, wipe out the local monsters, and defeat $npcName:22000053$.
quest.descFameUI: Kolopua Crag is on red alert! The tourism industry is in mortal danger.

quest.name: Red Alert: Latun
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for $map:02000132$. $npcName:22090007$ is summoning monsters non-stop.
Go to $map:02000132$, wipe out the local monsters, and defeat $npcName:22090007$.
quest.descFameUI: Rose Castle is on red alert! Unauthorized summoning detected.

quest.name: Red Alert: Lapin
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for the $map:02000180$. $npcName:22000007$ is leading a small army of monsters to capture the area.
Go to the $map:02000180$, wipe out the local monsters, and defeat $npcName:22000007$.
quest.descFameUI: The Caustic Garden is on red alert! Stop the monsters from rallying their forces.

quest.name: Red Alert: Mano
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for $map:02000113$. The generally kind-hearted $npcName:22000059$ has been spotted cavorting with ne'er-do-wells, engaging in horseplay, and generally making a mess of the place.
Go to $map:02000113$, wipe out the local monsters, and defeat $npcName:22000059$.
quest.descFameUI: Greenia Falls is on red alert! Bullying has reached catastrophic levels.

quest.name: Red Alert: King Slime
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for the $map:02000112$. Agents on the ground report that $npcName:22090107$ is making moves to expand his kingdom and has recruited the local monsters to his cause.
Go to the $map:02000112$, wipe out the local monsters, and defeat $npcName:22090107$.
quest.descFameUI: The Godspring is on red alert! The slimes are on the move.

quest.name: Red Alert: Stumpy
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for $map:02000185$. The raging $npcName:22000001$ is spreading a dark disease, making nearby monsters feral.
Go to $map:02000185$, wipe out the local monsters, and defeat $npcName:22000001$.
quest.descFameUI: Sweet Tooth Valley is on red alert! Fight the mysterious monster epidemic.

quest.name: Red Alert: Zombie Mushmom
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for the $map:02000173$. $npcName:99000055$ is using her talisman to control the monsters in that area.
Go to the $map:02000173$, wipe out the local monsters, and defeat $npcName:99000055$.
quest.descFameUI: The Ant Tunnel Entrance is on red alert! The dark fungal necromancy in the area is out of control.

quest.name: Red Alert: Dark Girant
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for $map:02000089$. Radars indicate a spike in magical power coming from $npcName:22000038$.
Go to $map:02000089$, wipe out the local monsters, and defeat $npcName:22000038$.
quest.descFameUI: Torhara Spring is on red alert! A dark energy cascade is sweeping through the area.

quest.name: Red Alert: Varaha
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for the $map:02000087$. $npcName:22000002$ is throwing the area into chaos.
Go to $map:02000087$, wipe out the local monsters, and defeat $npcName:22000002$.
quest.descFameUI: The Andrea Barony is on red alert! A rude, crude pig from the city is tearing up the countryside.

quest.name: Red Alert: Madonette
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for $map:02000147$. A strange doll monster has appeared.
Go to $map:02000147$, wipe out the local monsters, and defeat $npcName:22090165$.
quest.descFameUI: Flora Avenue is on red alert! The local convenience store is in danger.

quest.name: Red Alert: Nyxie and Epi
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for $map:02000041$. $npcName:22000003$ and $npcName:22000004$ are driving nearby monsters into a frenzy with their bickering.
Go to $map:02000041$, wipe out the local monsters, and defeat $npcName:22000003$ and $npcName:22000004$.
quest.descFameUI: Fairy Tree Lake is on Red Alert! A family squabble is spiraling out of control!

quest.name: Red Alert: Chaw
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for $map:02000083$, where roving gangs of masked criminals have practically shut down the city.
Defeat the gangs of $map:02000083$.
quest.descFameUI: Kerning Interchange is on red alert! Criminal activity has reached critical levels.

quest.name: Red Alert: Urza
quest.desc:
A red alert was issued for $map:02000117$. $npcName:22000022$ is in a frenzy after being denied her favorite honey treat.
Go to $map:02000117$, wipe out the local monsters, and defeat $npcName:22000022$.
quest.descFameUI: Crooked Canyon is on red alert! Wild bear sightings reported.

quest.name: Normal Adventure Assault
quest.desc: There are threats to the peace hidden everywhere. Clear a normal adventure dungeon to help make Maple World a better place.
quest.descFameUI: There's only so much that Sky Fortress can do. Walk the world and help those in need.

quest.name: Hard Adventure Assault
quest.desc:
Even though it's formidable, Sky Fortress isn't invincible. There are certain places that the ship can't go.
Captain $npcName:11003533$ has given you a directive to fight enemies beyond Sky Fortress's reach. Clear a hard adventure dungeon.
quest.descFameUI: There are many places that Sky Fortress can't go. Take the fight to the enemy's greatest strongholds.

quest.name: Maple Alliance Weapon Test
quest.desc: Sky Fortress has developed a new weapon that provides supporting fire from on high by launching powerful artillery. Basic systems checks are complete, but the force of the bombs hasn't been measured yet. That's where you come in.
quest.descFameUI: Help test the new Royal Guard weapon, the 150 mm Alliance Smoothbore.

quest.name: Lumiknight Weapon Test
quest.desc: Sky Fortress has developed a new weapon that provides supporting fire from on high by firing a laser cannon on the specified target. Basic systems checks are complete, but the force of the cannon hasn't been measured yet. That's where you come in.
quest.descFameUI: Help test the new Lumiknight weapon, the Manastorm Cannon.

quest.name: Dark Wind Weapon Test
quest.desc: Sky Fortress has developed a new weapon that provides supporting fire from on high by dropping projectiles that continuously attack enemies. Basic systems checks are complete, but the force of the projectiles hasn't been measured yet. That's where you come in.
quest.descFameUI: Help test the new Dark Wind weapon, the Shadow Mortar.

quest.name: Royal Guard Weapon Test
quest.desc: Sky Fortress has developed new technology that provides support from on high by shining a healing light in a target area. Basic systems checks are complete, but the power of the light hasn't been measured yet. That's where you come in.
quest.descFameUI: Help test the new Royal Guard weapon, the Sanctuary Flare.

quest.name: Green Hood Weapon Test
quest.desc: Sky Fortress has developed new technology that provides support from on high by granting an attack buff to everyone in a target area. Basic systems checks are complete, but the power of the buff hasn't been measured yet. That's where you come in.
quest.descFameUI: Help test the new Green Hood weapon, Nature's Call.

quest.name: 메이플 연합의 공중지원
quest.desc: 스카이 포트리스는 메이플 월드를 수호하기 위해 새로운 무기를 개발했다. 이 무기는 공중에서 지상을 향해 지원 사격을 할 수 있는 무기로, 사용 시 강력한 네이팜탄이 지상으로 떨어진다고 한다. 안정성 시험은 마쳤지만, 아직 위력에 대한 측정은 완료되지 않은 상태이다. 지상으로 내려가서 해당 무기를 시험 사용해보자.
quest.descFameUI: 스카이 포트리스, 지상군 지원 장비 테스트 임무 발령. 항목 : 150mm 유니온 활강포 # 메이플 연합 표준 무기

quest.name: 루미나이츠의 공중지원
quest.desc: 스카이 포트리스는 메이플 월드를 수호하기 위해 새로운 무기를 개발했다. 이 무기는 공중에서 지상을 향해 지원 사격을 할 수 있는 무기로, 사용 시 특정 대상에게 레이저 포가 발사된다고 한다. 안정성 시험은 마쳤지만, 아직 위력에 대한 측정은 완료되지 않은 상태이다. 지상으로 내려가서 해당 무기를 시험 사용해보자.
quest.descFameUI: 스카이 포트리스, 지상군 지원 장비 테스트 임무 발령. 항목 : 아케인 스톰 # 루미나이츠 국지 공격형 마력기

quest.name: 다크윈드의 공중지원
quest.desc: 스카이 포트리스는 메이플 월드를 수호하기 위해 새로운 무기를 개발했다. 이 무기는 공중에서 지상을 향해 지원 사격을 할 수 있는 무기로, 사용 시 지속해서 적을 공격하는 투사체가 지상으로 떨어진다고 한다. 안정성 시험은 마쳤지만, 아직 위력에 대한 측정은 완료되지 않은 상태이다. 지상으로 내려가서 해당 무기를 시험 사용해보자.
quest.descFameUI: 스카이 포트리스, 지상군 지원 장비 테스트 임무 발령. 항목 : 쉐도우 그라인더 # 다크윈드 거점 진압 투사체

quest.name: 트라이아 근위대의 공중지원
quest.desc: 스카이 포트리스는 메이플 월드를 수호하기 위해 새로운 기술을 개발했다. 이 아이템을 사용하면 특정 지역에 일정 시간 동안 모두를 치료하는 치유의 빛이 내리쬔다고 한다. 안정성 시험은 마쳤지만, 아직 위력에 대한 측정은 완료되지 않은 상태이다. 지상으로 내려가서 해당 아이템을 시험 사용해보자.
quest.descFameUI: 스카이 포트리스, 지상군 지원 장비 테스트 임무 발령. 항목 : 생츄어리 플레어 # 근위대 긴급 치유 지역 형성탄

quest.name: 그린후드 자경단의 공중지원
quest.desc: 스카이 포트리스는 메이플 월드를 수호하기 위해 새로운 기술을 개발했다. 이 아이템을 사용하면 특정 지역에 모두의 전투력을 올려줄 버프가 적용된다고 한다. 안정성 시험은 마쳤지만, 아직 위력에 대한 측정은 완료되지 않은 상태이다. 지상으로 내려가서 해당 아이템을 시험 사용해보자.
quest.descFameUI: 스카이 포트리스, 지상군 지원 장비 테스트 임무 발령. 항목 : 네이쳐스 콜 # 그린후드 치유 효모 발생 장치

quest.name: Dueling Horns
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:21000027$ are causing problems at the $map:02000044$. Head over there and clear some of them out.
quest.descFameUI: After the battle with the Inakimo, Perion's warriors are weakened. Help them keep the peace.

quest.name: Growing Hostilities
quest.desc: Ever since the $npcNamePlural:21000312$ appeared in $map:02000093$, the nearby $npcNamePlural:21000311$ and $npcNamePlural:21000310$ have grown more aggressive. Defeat $npcNamePlural:21000312$ to halt this madness.
quest.descFameUI: Perion needs your help! Join the Royal Guard's efforts to keep the peace.

quest.name: Wolven Whispers
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:21000334$ have been siccing packs of $npcNamePlural:21000066$ on travelers through $map:02000169$!
quest.descFameUI: Perion needs your help! Join the Royal Guard's efforts to keep the peace.

quest.name: Water Crisis
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:21000069$ are causing problems at the $map:02000049$. Head over there and clear some of them out.
quest.descFameUI: Perion needs your help! Join the Royal Guard's efforts to keep the peace.

quest.name: Construction Disruption
quest.desc: The bonebridge in the Perion region keeps falling apart because $npcNamePlural:21000267$ keep rolling into it when they get itchy. Defeat $npcNamePlural:21000267$ to stop them from disrupting the construction at the $map:02000045$.
quest.descFameUI: Perion needs your help! Join the Royal Guard's efforts to keep the peace.

quest.name: Lava Power
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:21000299$ are causing problem at the $map:02000046$. Head over there and clear some of them out.
quest.descFameUI: Perion needs your help! Join the Royal Guard's efforts to keep the peace.

quest.name: Squad Funding
quest.desc: Keeping Sky Fortress fully manned and supplied isn't cheap. Donate your "excess" mesos to $npcName:11003536$.
quest.descFameUI: It costs a lot of mesos to keep an army supplied and fed. Can you make a donation to Sky Fortress's war fund?

quest.name: Platoon Funding
quest.desc: Keeping Sky Fortress fully manned and supplied isn't cheap. Donate your "excess" mesos to $npcName:11003536$.
quest.descFameUI: It costs a lot of mesos to keep an army supplied and fed. Can you make a donation to Sky Fortress's war fund?

quest.name: Company Funding
quest.desc: Keeping Sky Fortress fully manned and supplied isn't cheap. Donate your "excess" mesos to $npcName:11003536$.
quest.descFameUI: It costs a lot of mesos to keep an army supplied and fed. Can you make a donation to Sky Fortress's war fund?

quest.name: Battalion Funding
quest.desc: Keeping Sky Fortress fully manned and supplied isn't cheap. Donate your "excess" mesos to $npcName:11003536$.
quest.descFameUI: It costs a lot of mesos to keep an army supplied and fed. Can you make a donation to Sky Fortress's war fund?

quest.name: Peppermint Root Composition Test
quest.desc:
The Green Hoods are analyzing everyday items in search of new and more effective ways they can be utilized. $npcName:11003536$ says the current subject matter is $item:30000231$ and requests that you collect some for her.
(Collect them by defeating plant monsters, fairfolk enemies, or inanimate monsters level 15 or higher.)
quest.descFameUI: Peppermint Root is a useful alchemical reagent. Researchers on Sky Fortress want samples of it for their work.

quest.name: Cornelian Cherry Composition Test
quest.desc:
The Green Hoods are analyzing everyday items in search of new and more effective ways they can be utilized. $npcName:11003536$ says the current subject matter is $item:30000232$ and requests that you collect some for her.
(Obtained occasionally when defeating beast monsters or insect monsters level 15 or higher.)
quest.descFameUI: Cornelian Cherries are believed to have many fantastic properties. But are the legends true?

quest.name: Cornelian Cherry Nanoscopic Scan
quest.desc:
The Green Hoods are analyzing everyday items in search of new and more effective ways they can be utilized. $npcName:11003536$ says the current subject matter is $item:30000232$ and requests that you collect some for her.
(Collect them by defeating beast monsters or insect monsters level 15 or higher.)
quest.descFameUI: The ship's science team is performing an exhaustive study on Cornelian Cherries.

quest.name: Suspicious Seasoning Composition Test
quest.desc:
The Green Hoods are analyzing everyday items in search of new and more effective ways they can be utilized or to ensure they're safe for human usage. $npcName:11003536$ says the current subject matter is $item:30000241$ and requests that you collect some for her.
(Collect them by defeating divine, spirit, fairfolk, or machine monsters level 15 or higher.)
quest.descFameUI: The ship's science team is performing an exhaustive study on Suspicious Seasoning.

quest.name: Black Pine Mushroom Chemical Analysis
quest.desc:
The Green Hoods are analyzing everyday items in search of new and more effective ways they can be utilized. $npcName:11003536$ says the current subject matter is $item:30000233$ and requests that you collect some for her.
(Collect them by defeating spirit monsters or undead monsters level 15 or higher.)
quest.descFameUI: The ship's science team is performing an exhaustive study on Black Pine Mushrooms.

quest.name: Potion Solvent Chemical Analysis
quest.desc:
The Green Hoods are analyzing everyday items in search of new and more effective ways they can be utilized. $npcName:11003536$ says the current subject matter is $item:30000230$ and requests that you collect some for her.
(Collect them by defeating divine monsters, humanoid foes, devil monsters, or machine monsters level 15 or higher.)
quest.descFameUI: The ship's science team is performing an exhaustive study on Potion Solvent.

quest.name: Give and Take
quest.desc: The soldiers of Sky Fortress are woefully underequipped. Donate some of your old gear to keep them in fighting shape.
quest.descFameUI: The soldiers of Sky Fortress are woefully underequipped. Donate some of your old gear to keep them in fighting shape.

quest.name: Copper Ingot Stockpiling
quest.desc: $map:02000001$ and the areas nearby have suffered a lot of damage from $npcName:11001698$'s attacks, leading to a huge loss of resources, lives, and morale. Use your mining and smithing skills to collect $itemPlural:33000063$ to help with the city's reconstruction.
quest.descFameUI: Take out your mining pick and anvil. Tria needs Copper Ingots!

quest.name: Copper Ingot Crisis
quest.desc: $map:02000001$ and the areas nearby have suffered a lot of damage from $npcName:11001698$'s attacks, leading to a huge loss of resources, lives, and morale. Use your mining and smithing skills to collect $itemPlural:33000063$ to help with the city's reconstruction.
quest.descFameUI: Take out your mining pick and anvil. Tria needs Copper Ingots!

quest.name: Medicine for the Masses
quest.desc: There isn't enough medicine to treat everyone who was injured in Madria's attack. Obtain some $item:33000132$ to offer relief to those who aren't critically wounded.
quest.descFameUI: Help gather medicine for all of the people who were injured in the battle against the darkness.

quest.name: Medicine for the World
quest.desc: There isn't enough medicine to treat everyone who was injured in Madria's attack. Obtain some $item:33000132$ to offer relief to those who aren't critically wounded.
quest.descFameUI: Help gather medicine for all of the people who were injured in the battle against the darkness.

quest.name: Savage Instincts
quest.desc: A pack of combat-trained $npcNamePlural:21000064$ escaped their cages and have been attacking civilians at $map:02000171$. It's up to you to save the day.
quest.descFameUI: Packs of war-trained $npcNamePlural:11003523$ have been unleashed. Resolve the problem with force.

quest.name: Sharp Fangs
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:21000301$ are causing problems at $map:02000133$. Head over there and clear some of them out.
quest.descFameUI: Perion needs your help! Join the Royal Guard's efforts to keep the peace.

quest.name: Boogie Brainwashed
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:21000369$ are causing problems at $map:02000061$. Head over there and clear some of them out.
quest.descFameUI: Perion needs your help! Join the Royal Guard's efforts to keep the peace.

quest.name: Sorcery!
quest.desc: The jawbreakers at the $map:02000094$ have fallen under the spells of the $npcNamePlural:21000334$. Drive the $npcNamePlural:21000334$ out of the $map:02000094$ to keep things from getting worse.
quest.descFameUI: Perion needs your help! Join the Royal Guard's efforts to keep the peace.

quest.name: The Resistance's Secret Weapon
quest.desc: The Alliance has uncovered that the Resistance's secret weapon is a mech codenamed CHKY-002. Its sole purpose is to take down the Sky Fortress. Allow it to land on the deck, then take it down!
quest.descFameUI: Reconnaissance has revealed that the Resistance has a new secret weapon: a high-powered assault mech!

quest.name: Danger Unknown
quest.desc:
Strange disturbances have been detected on the ground. Someone needs to check them out.
Find and complete a Maple Alliance field mission.
quest.manual: Complete a Maple Alliance field mission
quest.descFameUI: Strange disturbances have been detected on the ground. Someone needs to check them out.

quest.name: Dark Wind Patrol
quest.desc:
The areas under the Dark Wind tend to have a higher crime rate than others. That means someone needs to regularly go out on patrol to make sure everything is in order.
Find and complete a Dark Wind field mission.
quest.manual: Complete a Dark Wind field mission
quest.descFameUI: Dark Wind's jurisdiction has some of the highest crime rates in the empire. They depend on patrols to keep the peace.

quest.name: Laying the Groundwork
quest.desc:
The Lumiknights have long wished to reclaim the Land of Darkness. The first step to accomplishing their goal is to send someone out there to scout out the area firsthand.
Find and complete a Lumiknight field mission.
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights have long wished to reclaim the Land of Darkness. But first, they need someone to scout out the area.

quest.name: Green Hoods Patrol
quest.desc: Patrolling is important work, according to $npcName:11003536$. She wants you to patrol the areas under the Green Hoods' protection. Find and complete a Green Hood field mission.
quest.manual: Complete a Green Hood field mission
quest.descFameUI: Patrolling is important work! Please patrol the areas under the Green Hoods' protection.

quest.name: Under a Watchful Eye
quest.desc:
Keeping people safe isn't hard… Just do exactly as $npcName:11003534$ says!
Find and complete a Royal Guard field mission.
quest.manual: Complete a Royal Guard field mission
quest.descFameUI: Keeping people safe isn't hard… Just do exactly as $npcName:11003534$ says!

quest.name: All That Glitters
quest.desc:
$npcName:23000013$ has become obsessed with all things shiny and has begun robbing, burglarizing, hijacking, and ambushing to increase his glittery collection. Something must be done!
Teach $npcName:23000013$, who appears at the $map:02000084$, that stealing doesn't pay.
quest.descFameUI: Doondun's greed will lead to disaster! He must be stopped!

quest.name: Hacking the Hacked
quest.desc:
Uncover the truth behind $npcName:23000054$, the robot that's been attacking people, by disabling it while Dark Wind hacks its systems.
Defeat $npcName:23000054$ at the $map:02000145$.
quest.descFameUI: It's time to uncover the mastermind behind the recent robot attacks!

quest.name: A Big Pollution Problem
quest.desc: Thanks to all the pollution out at sea, a $npcName:23000018$ has emerged from the waters and is wrecking havoc at $map:02000111$. Put an end to its madness.
quest.descFameUI: It came from the deep! A massive, pollution-powered monster is attacking our shorelines, and we need you to stop it.

quest.name: A Father's Rage
quest.desc: $npcName:23000019$'s eggs were stolen, and he's furious, relentlessly attacking any who cross his path. Put your sympathy aside and defeat $npcName:23000019$ at $map:02000085$ to prevent further loss of life.
quest.descFameUI: A bereaved father unleashes his wrath on the locals. Now it is your grim duty to end his rampage…

quest.name: Creature of Darkness
quest.desc: Darkness spreads at an alarming pace. Defeat $npcNamePlural:23000001$ at the $map:02000115$ to slow it down!
quest.descFameUI: Darkness spreads. Foreboding fills the air. A creature who has breached the rift must be destroyed!

quest.name: Dark Cerberus
quest.desc: $npcName:23000047$, summoned by dark magic, has made $map:02000214$ his home. Destroy $npcName:23000047$ to stop him from sowing chaos and destruction upon the world.
quest.descFameUI: A great beast has been summoned by dark forces. Send him back to the underworld!

quest.name: Fixing the Forest
quest.desc: Moomoo has fallen under Lo's evil influence. Regardless of the reason, they're attacking innocent people and wreaking havoc all over $map:02000103$. Head over there and stop $npcName:23000035$.
quest.descFameUI: This destruction cannot be allowed to continue! It's time to slam down an iron first!

quest.name: Holy Rage
quest.desc: The $npcName:23000099$ has become angered by the trespassers trekking upon his land! He slumbers at the $map:02000021$, waking at intervals to wreak havoc before returning to rest. This can no longer be allowed! Defeat the $npcName:23000099$ at the $map:02000021$.
quest.descFameUI: There must be a way to calm Vayar. It's time for the guardian to go back to sleep.

quest.name: The Bitter Cold
quest.desc: The Maple Alliance discovered that the source of the cold snap coming from $map:02000260$ is $npcName:23000026$. You know what you have to do!
quest.descFameUI: Frozen toes and icy veins. Only silence can stop the cold.

quest.name: A Captain's Request
quest.desc: Captain $npcName:11003582$ is worried that she's out of practice with her swords, so she wants you to spar with her. Face her in the "Duel on the Deck" Fortress Rumble dungeon.
quest.manual: Spar with $npcName:11003582$ in the "Duel on the Deck" Fortress Rumble

quest.name: [Special] Sparring in the Skies
quest.desc:
<font color="#00a2ed">Fortress Rumble Mission</font> Spar with Captain Veliche atop Sky Fortress! You can face her in the "Duel on the Deck" Fortress Rumble.
(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Fortress Rumble missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.manual: Clear the "Duel on the Deck" Fortress Rumble
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">Fortress Rumble Mission</font> Spar with Captain Veliche atop Sky Fortress!

quest.name: A Shadow Walker Tradition
quest.desc: To help you grow stronger, $npcName:11003584$ tells you about a secret Shadow Walker training method: "Kill or be killed." Face her in the "Close Quarters" Fortress Rumble dungeon.
quest.manual: Spar with $npcName:11003584$ in the "Close Quarters" Fortress Rumble

quest.name: [Special] One-on-One with Schatten
quest.desc:
<font color="#00a2ed">Fortress Rumble Mission</font> $npcName:11003584$ wants some special one-on-one time with you. You can face her in the "Close Quarters" Fortress Rumble.
(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Fortress Rumble missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">Fortress Rumble Mission</font> Schatten is itching for some one-on-one time with you.

quest.name: The Voice of the Oracle
quest.desc: $npcName:11003586$ wants to find out if you're really fated to become the guardian of the world. To prove that you're worthy of that destiny… you must spar with him. Face him in the "Trial by Ordeal" Fortress Rumble dungeon.
quest.manual: Spar with $npcName:11003586$ in the "Trial by Ordeal" Fortress Rumble

quest.name: [Special] A Potential Destiny
quest.desc:
<font color="#00a2ed">Fortress Rumble Mission</font> $npcName:11003537$ wishes to learn the truth about your destiny by dueling against you. You can face him in the "Trial by Ordeal" Fortress Rumble.
(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Fortress Rumble missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.manual: Clear the "Trial by Ordeal" Fortress Rumble
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">Fortress Rumble Mission</font> Mason seeks to help you reach destiny by violence.

quest.name: Combat Simulator, Online
quest.desc: Nairin's Combat Simulator is almost complete. All it needs now is some additional combat data from a real battle. Face her simulation in the "Nairin's Combat Simulator" Fortress Rumble dungeon.
quest.manual: Challenge the "Nairin's Combat Simulator" Fortress Rumble

quest.name: [Special] In the Name of Perfection!
quest.desc:
<font color="#00a2ed">Fortress Rumble Mission</font> To perfect Nairin's Combat Simulator, you have to battle against it. You can face it in the "Nairin's Combat Simulator" Fortress Rumble.
(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Fortress Rumble missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.manual: Clear the "Nairin's Combat Simulator" Fortress Rumble
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">Fortress Rumble Mission</font> To perfect Nairin's Combat Simulator, you have to battle against it.

quest.name: The Ultimate Fight
quest.desc: $npcName:11003583$ thinks a little sparring match will help kickstart your career. Face him in the "Training Yard Tussle" Fortress Rumble dungeon.
quest.manual: Challenge $npcName:11003583$ in the "Training Yard Tussle" Fortress Rumble

quest.name: [Special] Royal Guard Workout
quest.desc:
<font color="#00a2ed">Fortress Rumble Mission</font> Spar with $npcName:11003583$ to improve your skills and possibly even your social standing.
(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Fortress Rumble missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.manual: Clear the "Training Yard Tussle" Fortress Rumble
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">Fortress Rumble Mission</font> Spar with Condor to improve your skills and possibly even your social standing.

quest.name: The Guardians Above
quest.desc: You've received an urgent request from $map:02000255$. Robots have taken over! Head over there and get rid of the robots.
quest.descFameUI: The Sky Fortress does not turn a blind eye to those on the ground. Enemies of the peace must be defeated!

quest.name: The Only Good Hoodlum
quest.desc: A group of masked figures have taken over the $map:02000083$, and $npcName:11003535$ will not allow that under her watch! Head over there and mop up the masked enemies!
quest.manual: Go to $map:02000083$ and defeat the hoodlums
quest.descFameUI: A gang of hoodlums are moving in on Dark Wind's turf. Time to show them the error of their ways, Shadow Walker style!

quest.name: Engulfed in Shadows
quest.desc: The $map:02000146$ swarms with enemies tainted by darkness. Head over there and cull their numbers.
quest.descFameUI: If the monsters tainted by darkness are not dealt with… only destruction awaits! Diligence is the only way to keep the world from falling into shadow.

quest.name: Overextended
quest.desc: The Green Hoods suffer from insufficient personnel, making the management of $map:02000038$, which is rather far from $map:02000076$, difficult. $npcName:11003536$ has requested that you help monitor the area.
quest.descFameUI: No matter how meaning the Green Hoods are, they can only do so much on their own.

quest.name: The Burdens of Leadership
quest.desc: The guards are busy defending $map:02000001$, but the monsters nearby sure aren't making it easy. Teach the monsters at $map:02000088$ to leave the guards alone!
quest.descFameUI: As a leader, $npcName:11003534$ worries about the soldiers under him. Help ease some of his burdens.

quest.name: Maple Alliance Drill
quest.desc: Sky Fortress crew and officers run regular drills to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003533$ asks and prove you deserve your spot aboard Sky Fortress.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress crew and officers run regular drills to ensure they're still fit for service.

quest.name: Dark Wind Drill
quest.desc: Sky Fortress crew and officers run regular drills to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003535$ asks and prove you deserve your spot aboard Sky Fortress.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress crew and officers run regular drills to ensure they're still fit for service.

quest.name: Lumiknight Drill
quest.desc: Sky Fortress crew and officers run regular drills to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003537$ asks and prove you deserve a spot aboard Sky Fortress.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress crew and officers run regular drills to ensure they're still fit for service.

quest.name: Green Hoods Drill
quest.desc: Sky Fortress crew and officers run regular drills to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003536$ asks and prove you deserve your spot aboard Sky Fortress.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress crew and officers run regular drills to ensure they're still fit for service.

quest.name: Royal Guard Drill
quest.desc: Sky Fortress crew and officers run regular drills to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003534$ asks and prove you deserve a spot aboard Sky Fortress.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress crew and officers run regular drills to ensure they're still fit for service.

quest.name: Perseverance of the Alliance
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11004312$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's crew goes through regular testing to ensure they're fit for duty. Show everyone you've still got what it takes!

quest.name: Search and Destroy
quest.desc:
Kritias is filled with hostile machines, and the only way to keep them from threatening the Alliance expedition is to thin their ranks.
Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020001$ in $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020101$ in $map:02020030$, and $npcNamePlural:25020201$ in $map:02020031$.
quest.descFameUI: Gather data about mechanical foes in $map:02020029$, $map:02020030$, and $map:02020031$ through combat.

quest.name: Perseverance of the Alliance
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11004312$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's crew goes through regular testing to ensure they're fit for duty. Show everyone you've still got what it takes!

quest.name: Dropship Defense
quest.desc:
The dropship you used to land in $map:02020029$ is being slowly torn apart by the local wildlife.
Defend the dropship by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020001$, $npcNamePlural:25020002$, $npcNamePlural:25020003$, $npcNamePlural:25020004$, and $npcNamePlural:25020005$ in $map:02020029$.
quest.manual: Defend the dropship in $map:02020029$ by defeating nearby monsters
quest.descFameUI: Defend the dropship in $map:02020029$ by defeating nearby monsters.

quest.name: Dissecting the Problem
quest.desc:
All manner of lifeforms inhabit Kritias—but are they a threat to the Alliance's work on the continent? There's only one way to find out!
Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020005$ in $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020105$ in $map:02020030$, and $npcNamePlural:25020205$ in $map:02020031$.
quest.descFameUI: All manner of lifeforms inhabit Kritias—but are they a threat to the Alliance's work on the continent? In order to find out, you'll have to get your hands dirty.

quest.name: Daemon Deleted
quest.desc: Reports indicate the Daemon Army is cutting down trees in $map:02020029$ to build a military base. That cannot be allowed to happen. Defeat the $npcNamePlural:25020001$.
quest.descFameUI: The Daemon Army's mechanical soldiers are stirring up trouble in $map:02020029$. It's time to thin the herd.

quest.name: Fauna Analysis: $item:61000153$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ wants you to capture docile monsters for research. Today's mission: capture $itemPlural:61000153$ in $map:02020029$.
quest.descFameUI: Help the Alliance research Kritias's fauna by capturing $itemPlural:61000153$ in $map:02020029$.

quest.name: Allies in Peril
quest.desc: The Tairen Kingdom is making a play for $map:02020030$, and Humanitas desperately needs your help mounting a defensive. Go to $map:02020030$ and defeat $npcNamePlural:25020101$.
quest.descFameUI: The Tairen Kingdom is in the midst of delivering a surprise attack on $map:02020030$. Go there and assist Humanitas by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020101$.

quest.name: Robotics Research
quest.desc: Sky Fortress's R&D team is researching mechanical soldiers of Kritias, and have requested a particular component for study. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020201$ in $map:02020031$ and gather $item:30001218$.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020201$ in $map:02020031$ and collect $item:30001218$.

quest.name: Daemon Defense: $map:02020029$
quest.desc: Reports indicate the Daemon Army is cutting down trees in $map:02020029$ to build a military base. That cannot be allowed to happen. Defeat the $npcNamePlural:25020002$.
quest.descFameUI: Protect $map:02020029$ by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020002$.

quest.name: Aid $map:02020030$
quest.desc: The Tairen Kingdom's machines continue to harass $map:02020030$, and Humanitas has requested your aid to address the situation. Go to $map:02020030$ and reduce the $npcNamePlural:25020102$'s numbers.
quest.descFameUI: The Tairen Kingdom's machines continue to harass $map:02020030$. Go to $map:02020030$ and reduce the $npcNamePlural:25020102$'s numbers.

quest.name: Services Rendered
quest.desc:
With supplies being a constant concern of operation in Kritias, $npcName:11003534$ suggests securing and restarting the mineral extractor at $map:02020031$. He proposes that the Alliance then trade those minerals to Humanitas for supplies. Much to your surprise, the Captain signed off on the operation.
Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020202$ in $map:02020031$ to secure the extraction equipment.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020202$ to allow resource extraction to resume in $map:02020031$.

quest.name: Violent $npcNamePlural:25020003$
quest.desc: Sky Fortress's scientists are studying the aggression of the $npcName:25020003$. They hypothesize the crystals along its spine may be involved. Go to $map:02020029$, defeat $npcNamePlural:25020003$, and collect their $itemPlural:30001219$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020029$, defeat $npcNamePlural:25020003$, and collect the $itemPlural:30001219$ on that grow from their spines.

quest.name: Tairen Aggression
quest.desc: The Tairen Kingdom is making yet another play at overrunning $map:02020030$'s defenses. Go to $map:02020030$ defeat the attacking $npcNamePlural:25020103$.
quest.descFameUI: The Tairen soldiers are attacking $map:02020030$. Move swiftly to aid Humanitas.

quest.name: Data Recovery
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004312$ wants you to destroy the $npcNamePlural:25020203$ hacked by the Daemon Army and collect their $item:30001220$ to determine how the feat was achieved.
Go to $map:02020031$ and get the job done.
quest.descFameUI: Collect $itemPlural:30001220$ from $npcNamePlural:25020203$ in $map:02020031$ to help determine how the machines were hacked by $npcName:11001813$.

quest.name: Perseverance of the Alliance
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11004312$ asks and prove you deserve to be a member of Sky Fortress.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's crew goes through regular testing to ensure they're fit for duty. Show everyone you've still got what it takes!

quest.name: Room to Explore
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004312$ has tasked you with dealing with the pests standing in the way of the Alliance's exploration.
Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020501$ in $map:02020001$, $npcNamePlural:25020301$ in $map:02020006$, and $npcNamePlural:25020401$ in $map:02020004$.
quest.descFameUI: Clear out a series of pests so that Alliance scouts can explore Kritias safely.

quest.name: Perseverance of the Alliance
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11004312$ asks and prove you deserve to be a member of Sky Fortress.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's crew goes through regular testing to ensure they're fit for duty. Show everyone you've still got what it takes!

quest.name: Relax in $map:02020001$
quest.desc:
The Sky Fortress expedition are in need of some much-deserved shore leave. And $map:02020001$ would be the perfect spot, if it weren't full of deadly monsters. The solution? Extermination!
Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020501$, $npcNamePlural:25020502$, $npcNamePlural:25020503$, $npcNamePlural:25020504$, $npcNamePlural:25020505$, $npcNamePlural:25020506$, and $npcNamePlural:25020507$ in $map:02020001$.
quest.descFameUI: $map:02020001$ would be the perfect vacation spot for the crew if it weren't full of deadly foes. It's time you did something about that.

quest.name: Problematically Cute
quest.desc:
The crew of the Sky Fortress have fallen sway to the $npcName:25020301$'s cute face, and are feeding the creatures their own rations. The time for diplomacy has long passed. It is time for a violent intervention.
Go to $map:02020006$ and reclaim the $itemPlural:30001221$ from the $npcNamePlural:25020301$.
quest.descFameUI: Retrieve $itemPlural:30001221$ from $npcNamePlural:25020301$ in $map:02020006$

quest.name: The World's Greatest Swordswoman
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004312$ was excited to learn that there were sword-wielding robots in Kritias. Though she was eager to confront one and study its fighting style, she is unable to leave her post. That's where you come in! Study the machines' fighting style and relay what you learn to the Captain.
Go to $map:02020004$ and defeat $npcNamePlural:25020401$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020004$ analyze the fighting style of the $npcNamePlural:25020401$'s through combat.

quest.name: Fauna Analysis: $item:61000158$
quest.desc: The $item:61000158$ has recently captured the hearts of Sky Fortress's crew. $npcName:11004312$ has asked you to capture one for research purposes. Capture $item:61000158$ in $map:02020006$.
quest.descFameUI: Capture $item:61000158$ in $map:02020006$.

quest.name: Leafy Beatdown
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:25020502$ are hampering the exploration of $map:02020001$. Show them you won't stand for that sort of thing by delivering a much needed whooping.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat the monsters in $map:02020001$ interfering with exploration efforts.

quest.name: Fauna Analysis: $item:61000157$
quest.desc:
The docile lifeforms of Kritias could prove valuable as livestock, pets, or beasts of burdens. But the only way to find out is to study them!
Go to $map:02020006$ and capture $itemPlural:61000157$.
quest.descFameUI: Capture $itemPlural:61000157$ in $map:02020006$.

quest.name: Tairen Technology
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ wants to research the flying machines of Kritias. Collect $itemPlural:30001222$ from $npcNamePlural:25020403$ in $map:02020004$.
quest.descFameUI: $npcName:11004312$ wants to research the flying machines of Kritias.

quest.name: Night of the $npcName:25020302$
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25020302$ have been poisoning scouts in $map:02020006$. Defeat them to protect the scouts.
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25020302$ have been poisoning scouts in $map:02020006$.

quest.name: Peace Talks
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ wants to try a diplomatic approach with the $npcNamePlural:25020501$ in $map:02020001$. When that fails, use violence instead.
quest.descFameUI: $npcName:11004312$ wants to try a diplomatic approach with the $npcNamePlural:25020501$ in $map:02020001$.

quest.name: Important Strategic Location
quest.desc: $map:02020004$ is a key strategic location and it's occupied by Tairen. Go there and defeat $npcNamePlural:25020402$.
quest.descFameUI: $map:02020004$ is a key strategic location and it's occupied by Tairen. Go there and defeat $npcNamePlural:25020402$.

quest.name: Indelible Smell
quest.desc: $npcName:25020303$ poison has a singularly unique—and persistent—smell. Collect $item:30001223$ in $map:02020006$ so that Sky Fortress can invent a cleaning solution to get rid of the stench.
quest.descFameUI: Collect $item:30001223$ in $map:02020006$ so that Sky Fortress can invent a cleaning solution to get rid of $npcName:25020303$ stench.

quest.name: Acts of Aggression
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25020503$ are big, strong, and mean. Go to $map:02020001$ and defeat them.
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25020503$ are big, strong, and mean.

quest.name: Perseverance of the Alliance
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11004312$ asks and prove you deserve to be a member of Sky Fortress.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's crew goes through regular testing to ensure they're fit for duty. Show everyone you've still got what it takes!

quest.name: Monster of the $map:02020017$
quest.desc: A familiar monster has appeared around the $map:02020017$. Go to $dungeonTitle:23038002$ in $map:02020017$ and defeat $npcName:23090006$.
quest.manual: Go to $dungeonTitle:23038002$ in the $map:02020017$ and clear the dungeon by defeating $npcName:23090006$
quest.descFameUI: Go to $dungeonTitle:23038002$ in the $map:02020017$ and defeat $npcName:23090006$.

quest.name: Perseverance of the Alliance
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11004312$ asks and prove you deserve to be a member of Sky Fortress.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's crew goes through regular testing to ensure they're fit for duty. Show everyone you've still got what it takes!

quest.name: $map:02020041$ Defense
quest.desc: The $map:02020010$, $map:02020034$, and $map:02020032$ all hold positions of strategic significance to $map:02020041$. Secure Sky Fortress's position by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020601$ in the $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020701$ at the $map:02020032$, $npcNamePlural:25020801$ in the $map:02020034$.
quest.descFameUI: The $map:02020010$, $map:02020034$, and $map:02020032$ all hold positions of strategic significance to $map:02020041$.

quest.name: Machine Secrets
quest.desc: The machines of the $map:02020010$ don't look remarkable compared to their counterparts throughout Kritias, but their attacks are devastating. Get $item:30001224$ from $npcNamePlural:25020601$ to uncover the secret behind their advanced weapons.
quest.descFameUI: Go to the $map:02020010$, defeat $npcNamePlural:25020601$, and get $item:30001224$.

quest.name: A Dearth of Information
quest.desc: Of all the Tairen soldiers in the $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020606$ are the strongest. As long as they are on the battlefield, Sky Fortress will keep losing scouts. It's crucial that you remove them from the fight immediately.
quest.descFameUI: As long as $npcNamePlural:25020606$ are on the battlefield in the $map:02020010$, Sky Fortress will keep losing scouts. It's crucial that you remove them from the fight immediately.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000160$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ is excited about a new research project and has reassigned you to $map:02020030$. Sky Fortress's research team is studying Tairen $itemPlural:61000160$, and it's your job to collect specimens for them. More information is always better, right?
quest.descFameUI: Capture $itemPlural:61000160$ in $map:02020030$

quest.name: Aetherine Supply Lines
quest.desc: In order to halt production in the $map:02020034$, Sky Fortress troops need to infiltrate and destroy the fusion reactor. So far, they've been unsuccessful, but $npcName:11004312$ says the research team has discovered a weakness: the $npcNamePlural:25020801$ regulating aetherine production. Destroy a few and collect $itemPlural:30001225$ to study their weaknesses.
quest.descFameUI: The Tairen have been using $npcNamePlural:25020801$ in the $map:02020034$ to regulate their aetherine production. Destroy a few and collect $itemPlural:30001225$ to study their weaknesses.

quest.name: Offensive Strike
quest.desc: There's an intense standoff between Sky Fortress and the Daemon Army at the $map:02020032$ on the outskirts of $map:02020041$. $npcName:11004312$ is determined strike first. She wants her best fighters on the front lines battling $npcNamePlural:25020701$, including you.
quest.descFameUI: There's an intense standoff between Sky Fortress and the Daemon Army at the $map:02020032$ on the outskirts of $map:02020041$. $npcName:11004312$ wants her best fighters on the front lines battling $npcNamePlural:25020701$, including you.

quest.name: Aid $map:02020013$
quest.desc: The native creatures of $map:02020013$ are shockingly vicious. The Sky Fortress research team's prevailing theory is that the local $npcNamePlural:11004548[gender:0]$ are somehow inciting that violent behavior, but they haven't figured out how to prevent it yet. Clear the area of $npcNamePlural:25020901$, so the scouts there can bring back some useful information.
quest.descFameUI: Clear the area of $npcNamePlural:25020901$, so the scouts there can bring back some useful information.

quest.name: Unique $npcName:25022105$ Features
quest.desc: The Tairen $npcNamePlural:25021001$ in $map:02020016$ are surprisingly agile despite their heavy armor. There's a good chance the research team can reverse engineer their tech and use the knowledge to upgrade Sky Fortress weaponry. You've been assigned to destroy those mechs and collect $itemPlural:30001226$ to aid that research.
quest.descFameUI: The Tairen $npcNamePlural:25021001$ in $map:02020016$ are surprisingly agile despite their heavy armor. Destroy the mechs and collect their parts for the Sky Fortress research team.

quest.name: Kharon Retribution
quest.desc: According to $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$, Kharon has joined forces with Tairen to kidnap exiles and attack Humanitas. The Kharon must be stopped! Head out to $map:02020010$, fight off the $npcNamePlural:25020602$, and help as many people as you can.
quest.descFameUI: Kharon forces have been kidnapping exiles to use for labor! Head out to $map:02020010$, fight off the $npcNamePlural:25020602$, and help as many people as you can.

quest.name: Laying Groundwork
quest.desc: Sky Fortress's ally, Humanitas is determined to take control of the $map:02020034$, Tairen's most valuable power production facility. But so far, they've failed. Now Sky Fortress is sending backup. Help weaken their defenses by destroying as many $npcNamePlural:25020802$ as you can.
quest.descFameUI: Weaken Tairen's defenses around the $map:02020034$ by destroying $npcNamePlural:25020802$, so Humanitas can take control of the facility.

quest.name: $item:30001227$ Research
quest.desc: Sky Fortress is in a standoff with the Daemon Army on the $map:02020032$, and they've discovered the army is drawing power from some kind of $item:30001227$. $npcName:11004312$ intends to study and use their own technology against them. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020702$ and collect their $itemPlural:30001227$, so the research team can begin studying them immediately.
quest.manual: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020702$ at the $map:02020032$ and collect their $itemPlural:30001227$
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020702$ at the $map:02020032$ and collect their $itemPlural:30001227$, so the research team can begin studying them immediately.

quest.name: Conflict Resolution
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ still hopes to ally with some of the monsters in Kritias. But her scouts aren't equipped to defend themselves if those negotiations are unsuccessful, so she's sending you instead. Go to $map:02020013$ and talk to the $npcNamePlural:25020902$ there. If it doesn't pan out, you may need to employ more aggressive negotiation tactics.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020013$ and try talking to the $npcNamePlural:25020902$ there. If it doesn't pan out, you may need to employ more aggressive negotiation tactics.

quest.name: Perseverance of the Alliance
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11004312$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's crew goes through regular testing to ensure they're fit for duty. Show everyone you've still got what it takes!

quest.name: New Threats
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ has explained that as you get closer to the heart of Kritias, it gets more dangerous. She wants you to scout ahead and learn all you can about about $npcNamePlural:25021205$ in the $map:02020017$, $npcNamePlural:25021305[gender:0]$ in $map:02020033$, and $npcNamePlural:25021104$ in the $map:02020051$.
quest.manual: Defeat $npcName:25021205$ in the $map:02020017$ |Defeat $npcName:25021305$ in the $map:02020033$ |Defeat $npcName:25021104$ in the $map:02020051$
quest.descFameUI: Study the hunting patterns and capabilities of the monsters in the new regions.

quest.name: Perseverance of the Alliance
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11004312$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's crew goes through regular testing to ensure they're fit for duty. Show everyone you've still got what it takes!

quest.name: Haunting in the $map:02020017$
quest.desc: $npcName:23090006$ was defeated, but new rumors about him have cropped up, and $npcName:11004312$ wants you to investigate. Go to the $map:02020017$ and see what you can dig up… or battle…
quest.manual: Go to $dungeonTitle:23038002$ in the $map:02020017$ and clear the dungeon by defeating $npcName:23090006$
quest.descFameUI: Go to $dungeonTitle:23038002$ in the $map:02020017$ and defeat $npcName:23090006$

quest.name: Defend $map:02020033$
quest.desc: Humanitas recently gained control of $map:02020033$, but almost as soon as they did, the Tairen led a vicious attack against them. Now they're trapped without food or equipment. Help fend off the attack by defeating Tairen soldiers.
quest.descFameUI: Defend Humanitas from the Tairen attack on $map:02020033$

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000167$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ has annoyed her research team enough and has decided to send them something cute and cuddly to win back their favor. Her exact description was four-legged, possibly furry, and impossibly cute. It sounds like $itemPlural:61000167$ from $map:02020008$ ought to do the trick.
quest.descFameUI: For once, you've been assigned a pleasant task in Kritias. Go get those $itemPlural:61000167$!

quest.name: Wriggling Wreckage
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:25021401$ population in $map:02020014$ has gotten out of control, and they've started destroying the fruit trees there. Go thin the herd, and see if they calm down.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020014$ and thin the $npcName:25021401$ population to get them to calm down.

quest.name: $map:02020014$ in Crisis
quest.desc: Tairen soldiers have taken an interest in $map:02020014$ and plan to destroy it. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021406[gender:0]$ to protect the refuge.
quest.descFameUI: Protect $map:02020014$ from the $npcNamePlural:25021406$

quest.name: $npcName:11004312$'s Decision
quest.desc: Sky Fortress plans to help Humanitas soldiers retake the $map:02020003$. $npcName:11004312$ is convinced that foothold will yield valuable resources and information. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021501$ in the $map:02020003$ to weaken the Daemon Army's hold on the area.
quest.descFameUI: Aid your Humanitas allies by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021501$ in the $map:02020003$

quest.name: The $npcName:25021201$'s Strength
quest.desc: One of the scouts assigned to the $map:02020017$ discovered incredibly strong $npcNamePlural:25021201$ inside. $npcName:11004312$ is determined to study them and use the knowledge to strengthen Sky Fortress weapons. All you have to do is collect the parts.
quest.descFameUI: Any new tech will be crucial to winning future battles. Destroy $npcNamePlural:25021201$ in the $map:02020017$ and collect $itemPlural:30001228$ for analysis.

quest.name: Defend $map:02020033$
quest.desc: Humanitas took control of $map:02020033$, but Tairen struck back viciously. They've been cut off from all resources, and they're at risk of losing all the ground they just gained. Help drive the $npcNamePlural:25021301$ out before Humanitas suffers further losses.
quest.descFameUI: Drive as many $npcNamePlural:25021301$ as you can out of $map:02020033$ before Humanitas suffers further losses.

quest.name: $map:02020051$'s Stench
quest.desc: The $map:02020051$ earned its name, because its only visitors are Tairen soldiers seeking a place to dump their waste. Hence the vomit-inducing smell… Now Sky Fortress has made you their honorary cleanup crew! Destroy $npcNamePlural:25021101$ in $map:02020051$ before they make it worse.
quest.descFameUI: The contamination oozing up from the ground has reached critical mass. Destroy $npcNamePlural:25021101$ in $map:02020051$ before they make it worse.

quest.name: Wriggler Woes
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:25021402$ are destroying every living thing in the $map:02020014$! Get 'em outta there! Defeat as many as you can and save the plants!
quest.descFameUI: If the $npcNamePlural:25021402$ are left unchecked in the $map:02020014$ much longer, there won't be anything left of the beautiful refuge.

quest.name: Secret of Organizational Power
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ is determined to find out how the Kharon forces communicate and intercept one of their messages. It might give Sky Fortress insight into how the organization functions. Go to the $map:02020003$, defeat $npcNamePlural:25021502$, and get their $itemPlural:30001229$.
quest.descFameUI: Intercepting Kharon messages is the best way to learn more about how the organization functions.

quest.name: Defend the Base
quest.desc: Humanitas took control of $map:02020033$, but they're about to lose it. The new $npcNamePlural:25021302[gender:0]$ are too strong to overcome. Help drive out as many as you can.
quest.descFameUI: The $npcNamePlural:25021302$ are threatening to overtake $map:02020033$. You must help drive them out!

quest.name: Perseverance of the Alliance
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11004312$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's crew goes through regular testing to ensure they're fit for duty. Show everyone you've still got what it takes!

quest.name: Horror-struck Members
quest.desc: Despite your best efforts to quell them, rumors about $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$ are still flying. He's been terrorizing the troops from beyond the grave. You should go to the $map:02020017$ and give that ghost a sound butt-kicking!
quest.manual: Go to $dungeonTitle:23038002$ in the $map:02020017$ and clear the dungeon by defeating $npcName:23090006$
quest.descFameUI: You have to protect Sky Fortress troops from $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$'s ghost!

quest.name: Perseverance of the Alliance
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11004312$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's crew goes through regular testing to ensure they're fit for duty. Show everyone you've still got what it takes!

quest.name: Want to Take Back a Certain Region
quest.desc: Tairen has been using the $map:02020009$ to conduct ecological experiments for years. Now that they've handed control over to Kharon, it's ripe for the taking. Now it's your job to get rid of any enemies you find there to help Humanitas gain control of the area.
quest.descFameUI: It's your job to get rid of any enemies you find in $map:02020009$ to help Humanitas gain control of the area.

quest.name: Scouting in $map:02020018$
quest.desc: One of the new regions, $map:02020018$, has some very interesting geological and atmospheric features. But the area is still overrun with enemies, and Sky Fortress scouts can't safely gather information yet. Defeat soldiers around $map:02020018$ to make studying the area safer for them.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat soldiers around $map:02020018$ to make studying the area safer for the Sky Fortress scouts.

quest.name: No More Mechs!
quest.desc: The $map:02020009$ is still under Kharon control, but now a new kind of mech has appeared, and Sky Fortress needs to know if they're taking orders from the enemy. $npcName:11004312$ has assigned you to investigate and destroy as many $npcNamePlural:25021606$ as you can. They don't need to be any stronger than they already are.
quest.descFameUI: Investigate whether the $npcNamePlural:25021606$ in the $map:02020009$ are taking orders from Kharon and destroy as many as you can.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000169$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ is missing her friends and family, so you volunteered to go capture an adorable research subject to be her new best friend! It was good timing too, since the research team has been asking about $itemPlural:61000169$ in $map:02020037$.
quest.descFameUI: The captain looks a bit down. Maybe a cute research subject will cheer her up! One of those $itemPlural:61000169$ in $map:02020037$ maybe?

quest.name: Combat Ration Retrieval
quest.desc: $map:02020036$ truly lives up to its name. It's crawling with Daemon Army soldiers, the worst of which are the $npcNamePlural:25022001$. They stole every last piece of the mouth-watering, morale-boosting, $itemPlural:30001230$. Get in there and show them what happens when you mess with a soldier's precious cacao!
quest.descFameUI: No one steals tasty, $item:30001230$ and gets away with it! Teach those $npcNamePlural:25022001$ a lesson!

quest.name: Kharon Cutbacks
quest.desc: The Kharon fighters at the $map:02020009$ are relentless! The Sky Fortress soldiers can't hold up against the constant harassment much longer. Find the $npcNamePlural:25021601$ and take as many as you can out of the fight… permanently.
quest.descFameUI: The $npcNamePlural:25021601$ at the $map:02020009$ are relentless! Find them and take them out.

quest.name: Alternate Routes
quest.desc: The heart of Kritias is near, but Tairen has sent reinforcements to stop Sky Fortress at $map:02020037$. Scouts are looking for a detour, but with so many enemies in the area, it's gotten far too dangerous. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25022101$ and find another path into Kritias.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25022101$ in $map:02020037$ and find another path into Kritias.

quest.name: Robot Factory Infiltration
quest.desc: Sky Fortress just discovered the largest $map:02020035$. It's the perfect chance to deal a massive blow to their offense. Get on site right away and fight $npcNamePlural:25021901$ to help weaken the protections around the building.
quest.descFameUI: Tairen's mechs seem to be in infinite supply, but not for long. Attack the $map:02020035$ to disrupt production.

quest.name: A Whale of a Wriggler
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ received word of a $npcNamePlural:25021801$. As cute as those guys are, a beast this size is nothing but trouble. Go to $map:02020008$ and defeat it. Once you've done that, get $itemPlural:30001231$, so the Sky Fortress researchers can figure out how this thing grew so big in the first place.
quest.descFameUI: How does one Wriggler grow so large? Collect $itemPlural:30001231$, so the Sky Fortress researchers can figure it out.

quest.name: Unique $npcName:25021701$ Features
quest.desc: $npcName:25021701$ hides are a remarkable shade of blue, but what purpose could that possibly serve? Go to $map:02020018$, defeat $npcNamePlural:25021701$, and collect $itemPlural:30001232$ for the Sky Fortress research team.
quest.descFameUI: Find out why $npcName:25021701$ hides are such a dazzling shade of blue…

quest.name: Disabling Grenade Launchers
quest.desc: Sky Fortress fighters dispatched to $map:02020009$ have suffered heavy losses. That place is crawling with $npcNamePlural:25021602$, and their grenade launchers are no laughing matter. Go put them out of commission and give the soldiers there the upper hand.
quest.descFameUI: The $npcNamePlural:25021602$ are decimating Sky Fortress troops. Put them out of commission.

quest.name: Daemons Be Gone!
quest.desc: As long as the Daemon army occupies $map:02020036$, they'll be a permanent thorn in Sky Fortress's side. $npcName:11004312$ has decided it's time to take action. Defeat as many $npcNamePlural:25022002$ as you can so Sky Fortress can take control of the area.
quest.descFameUI: Drive the Daemon Army from $map:02020036$!

quest.name: Routine Testing: The Lumiknights
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003537$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Everyone aboard the Sky Fortress must undergo routine testing to ensure they're still fit for service, including all members of the Lumiknight order.

quest.name: Scrapping with Soldiers
quest.desc: $map:02020030$, $map:02020029$, and $map:02020031$ are under attack by Tairen's mechanical soldiers. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020002$ in $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020102$ in $map:02020030$, and $npcNamePlural:25020202$ in $map:02020031$.
quest.descFameUI: $map:02020030$, $map:02020029$, and $map:02020031$ are under attack by Tairen's mechanical soldiers.

quest.name: Routine Testing: The Lumiknights
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003537$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Everyone aboard the Sky Fortress must undergo routine testing to ensure they're still fit for service, including all members of the Lumiknight order.

quest.name: $map:02020030$ in the Middle
quest.desc: $map:02020030$ is surrounded by both Tairen and Daemon Army forces. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020101$, $npcNamePlural:25020102$, $npcNamePlural:25020103$, $npcNamePlural:25020104$, $npcNamePlural:25020105$, $npcNamePlural:25020106$, $npcNamePlural:25020107$, and $npcNamePlural:25020108$ in $map:02020030$.
quest.descFameUI: $map:02020030$ is surrounded by both Tairen and Daemon Army forces.

quest.name: Dropship Defense
quest.desc: Sky Fortress agents are trying to retrieve a downed dropship, but monsters keep blocking their path. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020004$ in $map:02020029$.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress agents are trying to retrieve a downed dropship, but monsters keep blocking their path. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020004$ in $map:02020029$.

quest.name: Cloaked in Darkness
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25020104$ spread darkness everywhere they go. Go to $map:02020030$ and defeat them for their $itemPlural:30001233$.
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25020104$ corrupts the land wherever they go. Go to $map:02020030$ and uncover the source of their dark power.

quest.name: Energy of Kritias: The Origin
quest.desc: Aetherine appears to have been used by every civilization in Kritias. Even the mages of Tairen use it in their spells. To research this miraculous substance, collect samples in $map:02020031$, $map:02020030$, and $map:02020029$.
quest.manual: Collect aetherine in $map:02020031$ |Collect aetherine in $map:02020030$ |Collect aetherine in $map:02020029$
quest.descFameUI: Collect aetherine in $map:02020031$, $map:02020030$, and $map:02020029$ for the Lumiknights' research.

quest.name: $npcName:11004163$'s Corruption
quest.desc: $map:52100104$ in $map:02020031$ is occupied by the Daemon Army. $npcName:11001813$ has somehow turned Tairen's machines to his side. Dismantle $npcNamePlural:25020204$ to learn how.
quest.descFameUI: $npcName:11001813$ has somehow turned Tairen's machines to his side. Dismantle the machines in $map:02020031$ to learn how.

quest.name: Poisoned Wiles
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25020005$ may be cute, but they're still vicious monsters. Hunt them in $map:02020029$.
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25020005$ may be cute, but they're still vicious monsters. Hunt them in $map:02020029$.

quest.name: Daemons of $map:02020030$
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25020105$ are putting up fierce resistance in $map:02020030$. Destroy them.
quest.descFameUI: The Daemon Army has unleashed a devastating offensive against Sky Fortress agents in $map:02020030$. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020105$.

quest.name: Stolen Data
quest.desc: Enemies in $map:02020031$ have stolen vital research data. Go there and defeat $npcNamePlural:25020205$ to get it back.
quest.descFameUI: Enemies in $map:02020031$ have stolen vital research data. Go there and defeat $npcNamePlural:25020205$ to get it back.

quest.name: Daemon's Energy
quest.desc: Daemon Army machine soldiers have been discovered in $map:02020029$. What powers them? Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020001$ and find it.
quest.manual: Get the Aetherine Crystals from $npcNamePlural:25020001$ in $map:02020029$
quest.descFameUI: Daemon Army machine soldiers have been discovered in $map:02020029$. What powers them?

quest.name: Stop the Jamming
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25020201$ in $map:02020031$ are jamming the radio signals of Sky Fortress's scouts. Even $npcName:11004316$'s telepathy is being affected… Destroy them.
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25020201$ in $map:02020031$ are jamming the radio signals of Sky Fortress's scouts.

quest.name: Energy of Kritias: $map:02020031$
quest.desc: Aetherine appears to have been used by every civilization in Kritias. Even the mages of Tairen use it in their spells. To research this miraculous substance, collect samples in $map:02020031$.
quest.descFameUI: Aetherine appears to have been used by every civilization in Kritias. Even the mages of Tairen use it in their spells. To research this miraculous substance, collect samples in $map:02020031$.

quest.name: $map:02020030$ Defense
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25020104$ have attacked Sky Fortress agents in $map:02020030$. Go to $map:02020030$ and defeat $npcNamePlural:25020104$.
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25020104$ have attacked Sky Fortress agents in $map:02020030$.

quest.name: Routine Testing: The Lumiknights
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003537$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Everyone aboard the Sky Fortress must undergo routine testing to ensure they're still fit for service, including all members of the Lumiknight order.

quest.name: Unwelcome Disruption
quest.desc: Monsters are attacking Sky Fortress field researchers. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020502$ in $map:02020001$, $npcNamePlural:25020302$ in $map:02020006$, and $npcNamePlural:25020402$ in $map:02020004$.
quest.descFameUI: $npcNamePlural:25020502$, $npcNamePlural:25020302$, and $npcNamePlural:25020402$ are attacking Sky Fortress field researchers.

quest.name: Routine Testing: The Lumiknights
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress crew and officers take routine tests to ensure they're still fit for service. Do what $npcName:11003537$ asks and prove you have what it takes.
quest.descFameUI: Everyone aboard the Sky Fortress must undergo routine testing to ensure they're still fit for service, including all members of the Lumiknight order.

quest.name: Concentrated $item:30001236$
quest.desc: A mysterious aurora rises in $map:02020001$. The $npcNamePlural:25020504$ have absorbed $item:30001236$, condensing it in their bodies. Gather samples of this condensed energy.
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights wish to study the $item:30001236$ within $npcNamePlural:25020504$' bodies.

quest.name: Tainted Beasts
quest.desc: Sky Fortress agents were attacked by monsters in $map:02020006$. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020301$, $npcNamePlural:25020302$, $npcNamePlural:25020303$, $npcNamePlural:25020304$, $npcNamePlural:25020305$, $npcNamePlural:25020307$, $npcNamePlural:25020308$, or $npcNamePlural:25020306$.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress agents were attacked by monsters in $map:02020006$.

quest.name: Blades of Tairen
quest.desc: $map:02020004$ is particularly hard to investigate because of Tairen's blade-wielding soldiers. Head there and defeat $npcNamePlural:25020404$.
quest.descFameUI: $map:02020004$ is particularly hard to investigate because of Tairen's blade-wielding soldiers.

quest.name: $item:30001237$ Investigation
quest.desc: The Lumiknights want to investigate the $itemPlural:30001237$ worn by $npcNamePlural:25020502$. Go to $map:02020001$ and collect them.
quest.descFameUI: The Lumiknights want to investigate the $itemPlural:30001237$ of the $npcNamePlural:25020502$.

quest.name: Retrieving the Data
quest.desc: A scouting team was ambushed by Tairen forces in $map:02020004$ and had their data stolen. Retrieve the data from $npcNamePlural:25020405$.
quest.descFameUI: A scouting team was ambushed by Tairen forces in $map:02020004$ and had their data stolen.

quest.name: Energy of Kritias: $map:02020004$
quest.desc: Aetherine appears to have been used by every civilization in Kritias. Even the mages of Tairen use it in their spells. Collect aetherine from $map:02020004$ for research by the Lumiknights.
quest.descFameUI: Collect aetherine from $map:02020004$ for the Lumiknights' research.

quest.name: Back Mining
quest.desc: The $npcNamePlural:25020505$ of $map:02020001$ have what looks like aetherine growing from their backs. Get some samples.
quest.descFameUI: The $npcNamePlural:25020505$ of $map:02020001$ have what looks like aetherine growing from their backs.

quest.name: Enemy Ambush
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25020304$ attacked a Sky Fortress patrol. Go to $map:02020006$ and defeat them.
quest.descFameUI: Scouts exploring $map:02020006$ were attacked by $npcNamePlural:25020304$.

quest.name: Suppressing $npcNamePlural:25020405$
quest.desc: Sky Fortress's attack on $map:02020004$ has been halted by $npcNamePlural:25020405$. Defeat them to open a way forward.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress's attack on $map:02020004$ has been halted by $npcNamePlural:25020405$.
